SCN FollowersQuestSCRIPT
short PlayerHasFollower float FollowerWaitingLeaveDay float DogmeatWaitingLeaveDay
;***Charon Variables*** short PlayerOwnsContract ;Set by buying the contract from Ahzrukhal or by killing him. short CharonHired ;Set to 1 when the player hires Charon after obtaining his contract. short CharonFired ;Player has dismissed Charon
;***Fawkes Variables*** short FawkesHired short FawkesFired
;***Jericho Variables*** short JerichoConvince short JerichoHired short JerichoFired
;***Star Paladin Cross Variables*** short CrossDismissedPlayer short StarPaladinCrossHasBeenHired short StarPaladinCrossHired short StarPaladinCrossFired
;***Butch Variables*** short ButchHired short ButchFired
;***RL3 Variables*** short RL3Hired short RL3Fired
;***Clover Variables*** short CloverHired short CloverFired
;***Dogmeat Variables*** short DogmeatHired short DogmeatFired
BEGIN GameMode
if ( DogmeatHired == 1 ) if ( DogmeatREF.Waiting == 1 ) && ( DogmeatREF.GetInCell MegatonPlayerHouse == 0 ) && ( DogmeatREF.GetInCell Tenpenny03Player == 0 ) if ( DogmeatWaitingLeaveDay <= GameDaysPassed ) if ( DogmeatREF.GetInSameCell Player == 0 ) set Followers.DogmeatHired to 0 set Followers.DogmeatFired to 1 set DogmeatREF.Waiting to 0 DogmeatREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 DogmeatREF.RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction DogmeatREF.evp
If Player.HasPerk DLC03Puppies == 1 ShowMessage DLC03FollowerMessageLeavePuppy Else ShowMessage FollowerMessageLeaveDogmeat EndIf DogmeatREF.MoveTo EvacuationMarker set DogmeatWaitingLeaveDay to 0 endif endif endif endif
if ( PlayerHasFollower == 1 ) if ( ButchREF.Waiting == 1 ) && ( ButchREF.GetInCell MegatonPlayerHouse == 0 ) && ( ButchREF.GetInCell Tenpenny03Player == 0 ) if ( FollowerWaitingLeaveDay <= GameDaysPassed ) if ( ButchREF.GetInSameCell Player == 0 ) set Followers.PlayerHasFollower to 0 set Followers.ButchHired to 0 set Followers.ButchFired to 1 set ButchREF.Waiting to 0 set ButchREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 set ButchREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 set ButchREF.IsFollowingShort to 0 ButchREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged set ButchREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set ButchREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0 ButchREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 ButchREF.RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction ButchREF.evp
ShowMessage FollowerMessageLeaveButch ButchREF.MoveTo MuddyRudderMarker set FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to 0 endif endif endif
if ( CharonREF.Waiting == 1 ) && ( CharonREF.GetInCell MegatonPlayerHouse == 0 ) && ( CharonREF.GetInCell Tenpenny03Player == 0 ) if ( FollowerWaitingLeaveDay <= GameDaysPassed ) if ( CharonREF.GetInSameCell Player == 0 ) set Followers.PlayerHasFollower to 0 set Followers.CharonHired to 0 set Followers.CharonFired to 1 set CharonREF.Waiting to 0 set CharonREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 set CharonREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 set CharonREF.IsFollowingShort to 0 CharonREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged set CharonREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set CharonREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0 CharonREF.SetFactionRank TeammateFaction -1 CharonREF.RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction CharonREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 CharonREF.evp
ShowMessage FollowerMessageLeaveCharon CharonREF.MoveTo UnderworldNinthCircleMARKER set FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to 0 endif endif endif
if ( CloverREF.Waiting == 1 ) && ( CloverREF.GetInCell MegatonPlayerHouse == 0 ) && ( CloverREF.GetInCell Tenpenny03Player == 0 ) if ( FollowerWaitingLeaveDay <= GameDaysPassed ) if ( CloverREF.GetInSameCell Player == 0 ) set Followers.PlayerHasFollower to 0 set Followers.CloverHired to 0 set Followers.CloverFired to 1 set CloverREF.Waiting to 0 set CloverREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 set CloverREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 set CloverREF.IsFollowingShort to 0 CloverREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged set CloverREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set CloverREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0 CloverREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 CloverREF.RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction CloverREF.evp
ShowMessage FollowerMessageLeaveClover CloverREF.MoveTo ParadiseFallsEulogysPadMARKER set FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to 0 endif endif endif
if ( JerichoREF.Waiting == 1 ) && ( JerichoREF.GetInCell MegatonPlayerHouse == 0 ) && ( JerichoREF.GetInCell Tenpenny03Player == 0 ) if ( FollowerWaitingLeaveDay <= GameDaysPassed ) if ( JerichoREF.GetInSameCell Player == 0 ) set Followers.PlayerHasFollower to 0 set Followers.JerichoHired to 0 set Followers.JerichoFired to 1 set JerichoREF.Waiting to 0 set JerichoREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 set JerichoREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 set JerichoREF.IsFollowingShort to 0 JerichoREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged set JerichoREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set JerichoREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0 JerichoREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 JerichoREF.SetFactionRank TeammateFaction -1 JerichoREF.RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction JerichoREF.evp
ShowMessage FollowerMessageLeaveJericho JerichoREF.MoveTo MegatonOutsideMarker set FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to 0 endif endif endif
if ( MQ08FawkesREF.Waiting == 1 ) && ( MQ08FawkesREF.GetInCell MegatonPlayerHouse == 0 ) && ( MQ08FawkesREF.GetInCell Tenpenny03Player == 0 ) if ( FollowerWaitingLeaveDay <= GameDaysPassed ) if ( MQ08FawkesREF.GetInSameCell Player == 0 ) set Followers.PlayerHasFollower to 0 set Followers.FawkesHired to 0 set Followers.FawkesFired to 1 set MQ08FawkesREF.Waiting to 0 set MQ08FawkesREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 set MQ08FawkesREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 set MQ08FawkesREF.IsFollowingShort to 0 MQ08FawkesREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged set MQ08FawkesREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set MQ08FawkesREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0 MQ08FawkesREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 MQ08FawkesREF.RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction MQ08FawkesREF.evp
ShowMessage FollowerMessageLeaveFawkes MQ08FawkesREF.MoveTo FawkesMuseumWaitMarker set FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to 0 endif endif endif
if ( RL3REF.Waiting == 1 ) && ( RL3REF.GetInCell MegatonPlayerHouse == 0 ) && ( RL3REF.GetInCell Tenpenny03Player == 0 ) if ( FollowerWaitingLeaveDay <= GameDaysPassed ) if ( RL3REF.GetInSameCell Player == 0 ) set Followers.PlayerHasFollower to 0 set Followers.RL3Hired to 0 set Followers.RL3Fired to 1 set RL3REF.Waiting to 0 set RL3REF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 set RL3REF.IsFollowingLong to 0 set RL3REF.IsFollowingShort to 0 RL3REF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged set RL3REF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set RL3REF.CombatStyleMelee to 0 RL3REF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 RL3REF.RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction RL3REF.evp
ShowMessage FollowerMessageLeaveRL3 RL3REF.MoveTo CCBazaarMarker set FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to 0 endif endif endif
if ( StarPaladinCrossREF.Waiting == 1 ) && ( StarPaladinCrossREF.GetInCell MegatonPlayerHouse == 0 ) && ( StarPaladinCrossREF.GetInCell Tenpenny03Player == 0 ) if ( FollowerWaitingLeaveDay <= GameDaysPassed ) if ( StarPaladinCrossREF.GetInSameCell Player == 0 ) set Followers.PlayerHasFollower to 0 set Followers.StarPaladinCrossHired to 0 set Followers.StarPaladinCrossFired to 1 set StarPaladinCrossREF.Waiting to 0 set StarPaladinCrossREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 set StarPaladinCrossREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 set StarPaladinCrossREF.IsFollowingShort to 0 StarPaladinCrossREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleMelee set StarPaladinCrossREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set StarPaladinCrossREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0 StarPaladinCrossREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 StarPaladinCrossREF.RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction StarPaladinCrossREF.evp
ShowMessage FollowerMessageLeaveStarPaladinCross StarPaladinCrossREF.MoveTo CitScribeMarker04 set FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to 0 endif endif endif
endif
END

scn DogmeatSCRIPT
;Follower Variables short HasBeenHired short WeaponOut short CombatStyleRanged short CombatStyleMelee short IsFollowingDefault short IsFollowingShort short IsFollowingLong short Waiting
;Dogmeat Variables short Find ;0 = not finding, 1 = searching, 2 = found and should now return short FindAmmo short FindChems short FindWeapons short FindFood
BEGIN OnStartCombat Player
set Followers.DogmeatHired to 0 set Followers.DogmeatFired to 1 set DogmeatREF.Waiting to 0 DogmeatREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 DogmeatREF.RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction
END
BEGIN OnCombatEND
if ( GetPlayerTeammate == 1 ) resethealth restoreav perceptioncondition 100 restoreav endurancecondition 100 restoreav leftattackcondition 100 restoreav leftmobilitycondition 100 restoreav rightattackcondition 100 restoreav rightmobilitycondition 100 endif
END
BEGIN OnDeath
if ( Followers.DogmeatHired == 1 || Followers.DogmeatFired == 1 ) set Followers.PlayerHasFollower to 0 set Followers.DogmeatHired to 0 If DLC03CreatorQuest.PuppiesActive == 1 ShowMessage DLC03FollowerMessageDeadPuppy Else ShowMessage FollowerMessageDeadDogmeat EndIf endif
END

scn CrDeathclawEnclaveCageSCRIPT
float timer short doOnce short Setup ref Link
float DLC03SoundTimer short DLC03SoundEnabled
;****************************************
Begin onPackageEnd DeathclawCAGE01a ;set timer to 20 ;give the Deathclaw enough time to finish his cageExit animation set doOnce to 1
End
;****************************************
Begin onPackageEnd DeathclawCAGE01b
;set timer to 8 ;give the Deathclaw enough time to finish his clawScrape animation set doOnce to 2
End
;****************************************
Begin gameMode
if ( Setup == 0 ) Set Link to GetLinkedRef set Setup to 1 endif
if (doOnce == 1) ;if (isLastIdlePlayed DCageExit == 0) if (isIdlePlaying == 0) ;set timer to 20 ;give the Deathclaw enough time to finish his cageExit animation setav variable01 3 evp set doOnce to 3 endif
;if (timer <= 0) ;setav variable01 2 ;evp ;set doOnce to 3 ;else ;set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed ;endif endif
if (doOnce == 2) ;if (isLastIdlePlayed DClawScrape == 0) if (isIdlePlaying == 0) setav variable01 3 evp set doOnce to 3 endif
;if (timer <= 0) ; setav variable01 3 ; evp ; set doOnce to 3 ;else ; set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed ;endif endif
;ADDED SCRIPTING FOR DLC03
if ( DoOnce == 3 ) setav variable01 4 SetFactionRank EnclaveFaction -1 evp set DoOnce to 4 endif
if ( DLC03BS2.DLC03DeathclawControl == 1 ) if ( Setup == 1 ) if ( GetDistance Link > 6000 ) kill endif endif endif
;scripting for playing sound if near max range
if ( DLC03BS2.DLC03DeathclawControl == 1 ) if ( GetDistance Link > 5000 ) if ( GetDistance Link < 6000 ) if ( DLC03SoundEnabled == 0 ) set DLC03SoundEnabled to 1 endif else if ( DLC03SoundEnabled == 1 ) set DLC03SoundEnabled to 0 endif endif else if ( DLC03SoundEnabled == 1 ) set DLC03SoundEnabled to 0 endif endif endif
if ( DLC03SoundEnabled == 1 ) if ( DLC03SoundTimer <= 0 ) PlaySound UIPipBoyHighlight set DLC03SoundTimer to 2 else Set DLC03SoundTimer to ( DLC03SoundTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif
End
;***************

SCN WaterBeggarNPCSCRIPT
BEGIN OnLoad
If ( GetDead == 0 ) If ( GetAv Variable10 == 2 ) || GetItemCount DLC03AquaPura > 0 Kill endif endif
END

ScriptName MQ11Script
;Scripting and vars for quest MQ11
;Also used: ;ElderLyonsScript ;MQ11LaunchLibertyPrimeScript
short LyonsSpeech ;var incremented during Elder Lyons' speech to the troops, used in quest MainQuestConversations short SarahSpeech ;var incremented during Sarah's briefing to the Pride, used in quest MainQuestConversations short SarahMoreTime ;var set if player says he's not ready to go; used for dialogue short AutumnLeave ;var set if Autumn is talked out of fighting short AutumnDead ;flag set if Autumn is killed short Path ;var set in dialogue -- 1 for following Sarah, 2 for following robot short IntercomSayTo ;flag set to trigger initial line from Intercom short IntercomConv ;var incremented during intercom conversation in Project Purity, used in quest MainQuestConversations short Code ;var set in dialogue; determines who's going into the chamber. 1 for player, 2 for Sarah. 3 if player refuses to give Sarah the code. short IntConvInit ;flag set to start conversation between Sarah and Intercom short Split ;flag set when player is supposed to leave Pride if in Tunnel. Used in dialogue conditions ****OLD**** short PrimeActivate ;flag set after Sarah's speech, activates Liberty Prime short PresPASpeech ;var incremented during President's PA speech short WallEnabled ;flag set when energy fields are enabled; used to check for player disabling them short FieldsDisabled ;flag incremented as the player disables energy fields short PrimeTest ;var used for scale test of Liberty Prime short LDSarahLines ;ver used for tracking which lines sarah should say in topic MQ11LDSarahLines short LDSequenceStart ;flag set when Sarah reaches Prime's location; used for starting the whole LD sequence] short SarahPrimeLine ;flag set when Sarah says line to Activate Prime short ChangedMind ;flag set if player changes mind after making decision about code; used for checking dialogue short SarahVoiceVar ;flag incremented for lines in PPurity02 short PrimeVoiceStep ;flag incremented for Prime's lines at last gate short cueMusic ;flag set to 1 during Prime sequence, set to 0 after final gate off. Handles action music perpetuation. short SarahFollow ;flag set based on trigger outside PPurity entrance, used for keeping Sarah following player before going in
short IntercomTimedLines ;flag incremented as intercom counts down the amount of time left before exploding
short LineTest ;test var used for checking Prime SayTos
;following variables are handled in MQ11PPurityControlPanelScript
short EndTimerInit ;flag set when EndTimer starts running; set in dialogue with Sarah float EndTimer ;var used for timer at end of sequence -- controls whether the purifier blows up before putting code in
float HoldTimer ;timer var used to keep player locked in place at beginning of quest
;FOR DLC03
short DLC03FollowerCode ;var set if a follower is putting in the code. 1 for Fawkes, 2 for Charon, 3 for RL-3 short DLC03FollowTalk ;var set if player tells Sarah he'll have a follower input the code
Begin GameMode
;Do the whole "whee, Liberty Prime works!" thing
if ( PrimeActivate == 1 ) ScribeRothchildRef.PlayIdle UseOpenTerminalStanding set PrimeActivate to 2 MQ11LibertyPrimeCraneRef.Enable MQ11BaileyMasterEnableRef.Disable PrimeElevatorRef.playgroup forward 0 PrimeBlastDoorsRef.playgroup forward 0 PrimeKlax01.playgroup left 0 PrimeKlaxLight01.playgroup left 0 PrimeKlax02.playgroup left 0 PrimeKlaxLight02.playgroup left 0 MQ01SarahRef.EVP MQ01VargasRef.EVP PaladinKodiakRef.EVP PaladinGladeRef.EVP KnightCaptainGallowsRef.EVP set HoldTimer to 25 CitadelPrimeVoiceEmitterRef.Say MQ11PrimeActivationLine endif
;release player controls after a few seconds, so he has a chance to watch Prime activating
if ( PrimeActivate == 2 ) if ( HoldTimer <= 0 ) EnablePlayerControls ScribeRothchildRef.PlayIdle LooseScientistInspectTerminalB if ( GetStage MQ09 < 200 ) SetStage MQ09 200 endif SetStage MQ11 30
set PrimeActivate to -1 else set HoldTimer to ( HoldTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif
;During Prime sequence, check player's distance from the robot. ;If he gets too far away, stop Sarah from following him
if ( GetStage MQ11 == 30 ) if ( MQ01SarahRef.MQ11SarahTravel == 2 ) if ( MQ01SarahRef.MQ11Follow == 1 ) if ( Player.GetDistance MQ11LDPrimeREF >= 15000 ) Set MQ01SarahRef.MQ11Follow to 0 MQ01SarahRef.EVP endif
;...and start her following again if the player comes back
elseif ( MQ01SarahRef.MQ11Follow == 0 ) if ( Player.GetDistance MQ11LDPrimeRef < 15000 ) Set MQ01SarahRef.MQ11Follow to 1 MQ01SarahRef.EVP endif endif endif endif
;Loop to perpetuate action/battle music during Liberty Prime Sequence
; if getStage MQ11LD >= 10 && cueMusic == 0 ; Prime's been deployed; begin the music ; set cueMusic to 1 ; endif
if cueMusic == 1 && getStage MQ11LD < 50 ; Music has been cued if MQ11LD.PCisAway == 0 ; ensure that player is neary (<= 4000u from Prime) playMusic defaultBattle ; calling every frame to ensure it remains queued. endif elseif cueMusic == 1 && getStage MQ11LD >= 50 ; Prime has shut down final gate - cut the music set cueMusic to 2 ; let current battle track finish naturally endif
End

SCN CharonSCRIPT
short CharonKillAhzrukhalSceneStart short CharonKillAhzrukhalSceneKill short CharonKillAhzrukhalSceneTalkToPlayer short HasBeenHired short WeaponOut short CombatStyleRanged short CombatStyleMelee short IsFollowingDefault short IsFollowingShort short IsFollowingLong short Waiting
short DLC03MQ11CharonAirlockGo short DLC03MQ11CharonPanelAnimate
float Timer
BEGIN OnDeath
set DialogueUnderworld.CharonDead to 1
END
BEGIN OnActivate
if ( CharonKillAhzrukhalSceneStart != 1 ) && ( CharonKillAhzrukhalSceneKill != 1 ) activate endif
END
BEGIN Gamemode
;DLC03 MQ11 Scripting
if ( GetStage MQ11 >= 60 ) if ( DLC03MQ11CharonAirlockGo == 0 ) if ( GetDistance MQ11AirlockWaitMarker <= 150 ) Set DLC03MQ11CharonAirlockGo to 1 CharonREF.EVP endif endif endif
if ( DLC03MQ11CharonPanelAnimate == 1 ) if ( IsIdlePlaying == 0 ) Set DLC03MQ11CharonPanelAnimate to 2 set PPurityKeyPadEnterRef.PanelActivated to 2 endif endif
END
BEGIN OnCombatEND
if ( GetPlayerTeammate == 1 ) resethealth restoreav perceptioncondition 100 restoreav endurancecondition 100 restoreav leftattackcondition 100 restoreav leftmobilitycondition 100 restoreav rightattackcondition 100 restoreav rightmobilitycondition 100 endif
END
BEGIN OnDeath
set CharonKillAhzrukhalSceneKill to 0 set CharonKillAhzrukhalSceneStart to 0
if ( Followers.CharonHired == 1 ) set Followers.PlayerHasFollower to 0 set Followers.CharonHired to 0 ShowMessage FollowerMessageDeadCharon endif
END

ScriptName MQAPanelScript
short PanelInteract short button short VialIn
;Placed on Object MQAFiltrationInput ;used for adding FEV to Project Purity in quest MQA
Begin OnActivate
if IsActionRef player == 1 if ( VialIn == 0 ) if ( GetStage MQA < 100 ) if ( Player.GetItemCount MQ09FEVVial == 0 ) ShowMessage MQAPanelNoVialMessage else ShowMessage MQAPanelVialChoiceMessage set PanelInteract to 1 Activate endif endif endif endif
End
Begin GameMode
;MQ03 scripting ;placed here so it can run locally instead of in quest script
if ( GetStage MQ03 == 40 ) if ( Player.GetHasNote MQ03Holo21 == 1 ) SetStage MQ03 50 endif endif
if ( PanelInteract == 1 ) Set Button to GetButtonPressed if Button > -1 ; reset messagebox variable set PanelInteract to 0 ; which button did player press? if ( Button == 0 ) ShowMessage MQAPanelDoNothingMessage elseif ( Button == 1 ) ShowMessage MQAPanelInsertVialMessage Playgroup forward 0 set VialIn to 1
endif endif endif
if ( VialIn == 1 ) if ( IsAnimPlaying Forward == 0 ) PlayGroup Backward 0 set VialIn to 2 SetStage MQA 100 RewardKarma -1000 Set EndingBinks.EndEden to 3 endif endif End

ScriptName RadioGNRScript
;variables and scripting for GNR Radio Broadcasts
short DashwoodVar ;flag used to step through Dashwood radio plays short PSAVar ;flag used to step through PSA infos short PSANum ;flag set to determine which set of PSA infos will be used short DadStoryVar ;flag used to step through news story about dad short NewsStoryVar ;flag used to step through generic news stories short TitleHopeVar ;flag used to step through title infos short TitleScourgeVar ;flag used to step through title infos short TitleParadigmVar ;flag used to step through title infos short ExploitVar ;flag used to step through exploit infos short SongIntro ;var set to track which song has been given an intro, to make sure that song plays next short LastSongPlayed ;var set to track which song was played last, so we don't do the same one twice in a row short LastSongPlayed2 short LastSongPlayed3 short LastSongPlayed4 short LastNews short LastPSA short LastGreeting short LastGreeting2 short SongsPlayed ;var set to track # of songs played; used for ending radio conversations short ThreeDogDead ;flag set if Three Dog is killed; used for Margaret's greetings short BadDoesGood ;flag set if player with low karma ( < -250 ) finishes quest with "good" solution short GoodDoesBad ;flag set if player with high karma ( > 250 ) finishes quest with "bad" solution short DashwoodEp ;flag incremented with each version of the radio play to keep them in sequence
Float CG04Done ;flag set to GameDaysPassed when the player leaves the vault; used for allowing CG04 story to play
;The following vars are for tracking quest completion for player exploit stories
float MQ01Clear float MQ02Clear float MQ03Clear float MQ04Clear float MQ05Clear float MQ06Clear float MQ07Clear float MQ08Clear float MQ09Clear
float MS01Clear float MS02Clear float MS03Clear float MS04Clear float MS05Clear float MS06Clear float MS08Clear float MS09Clear float MS10Clear float MS11Clear float MS12Clear float MS14Clear float MS15Clear float MS16Clear float MS17Clear float MS18Clear
Short ExploitReady ;flag set when ANY quest is completed. used for logic in playing news stories
;------------------------------------------------- ;DLC03 SCRIPTING ADDITIONS ;-------------------------------------------------
float MQ11Clear float DLC03BS1Clear float DLC03BS2Clear float DLC03BS3Clear
;FORMAT
;RadioHello has Three Dog's intros. One will be picked randomly, then we go to RadioGNRNewsLink
;From here, we go to either a generic news story (not about the player) or into one of several Player Title topics, depending on player's level ;Title info drops into the list of Player Exploits; the most recent one will be played. ;After that, we go to RadioGNRNewsPost, then to RadioGNRMusicIntroGeneric
;RadioGNRMusicIntroGeneric can either then link to a specific song intro (RadioGNRMusicIntroSpecific) or directly to music ;if a specific intro is used, the specific song will play next. Otherwise, we randomly pull from the list (not allowing the last song played) ;After the song, it'll either loop back and play another song, or play a specific song intro. ;After the second song, we go to the final music selection (only 3 tracks will ever play in a row) where the conversation ends.
Begin GameMode
;handling for quest updates for MS08 story
if ( GetStageDone MS08 200 == 1 ) if ( HarknessRef.GetDisabled == 1 ) if ( MS08Clear == 0 ) Set MS08Clear to ( GameDaysPassed + 1 ) set ExploitReady to 1 endif endif endif
End

scn MQ08FawkesScript
short DoOnce
;Follower Variables short GreetPlayer short HasBeenHired short WeaponOut short CombatStyleRanged short CombatStyleMelee short IsFollowingDefault short IsFollowingShort short IsFollowingLong short Waiting
;Variable for rescuing Fawkes short Rescued
;Variables for DLC03
short FawkesAirlockGo short MQ11FawkesPanelAnimate
;This is a handler for MQ08 if Fawkes dies
BEGIN OnDeath
Showmessage MQ08FawkesDead
if ( IsKiller Player == 1 ) RewardKarma -100 endif
if ( GetQuestRunning MQ08 == 0 ) if ( Followers.FawkesHired == 1 ) set Followers.PlayerHasFollower to 0 set Followers.FawkesHired to 0 ShowMessage FollowerMessageDeadFawkes endif endif
END
BEGIN GameMode
if ( DoOnce == 0 ) if ( FollowersHireFawkes.EnclaveSoldierDown >= 3 ) StopCombat set GreetPlayer to 1 set DoOnce to -1 endif endif
;DLC03 MQ11 Scripting
if ( GetStage MQ11 >= 60 ) if ( FawkesAirlockGo == 0 ) if ( GetDistance MQ11AirlockWaitMarker <= 150 ) Set FawkesAirlockGo to 1 MQ08FawkesREF.EVP endif endif endif
if ( MQ11FawkesPanelAnimate == 1 ) if ( IsIdlePlaying == 0 ) Set MQ11FawkesPanelAnimate to 2 set PPurityKeyPadEnterRef.PanelActivated to 2 endif endif
END
BEGIN OnCombatEND
if ( GetPlayerTeammate == 1 ) resethealth restoreav perceptioncondition 100 restoreav endurancecondition 100 restoreav leftattackcondition 100 restoreav leftmobilitycondition 100 restoreav rightattackcondition 100 restoreav rightmobilitycondition 100 endif
END

ScriptName EndingBinksScript
; This script is triggered at the end of the game, and controls which series of ending binks gets played
short EndKarma ;EndKarma: 1=High Karma 1, 2=High Karma 2, 3=High Karma 3, 4=Low Karma 1, 5=Low Karma 2, 6=Low Karma 3, 7=Neutra lKarma
short EndDeath ;EndDeath: 1=Player Dies Good, 2=Player Lives, 3=Player Dies Evil
;DLC03 -------------------------
short EndEden ;EndEden: 1=Player Didn't Side With Eden 1, 2=Player Didn't Side With Eden 2, 3=Player Sided With Eden
short KarmaCheck ;checks player's Karma and sets the appropriate variable
short PlayIntroBink ;checks whether the Intro Bink has been played
short PlayKarmaBink ;checks whether the Karma Bink has been played
short PlayDeathBink ;checks whether the Player Death Bink has been played
short PlayEdenBink ;checks whether the Eden Assist Bink has been played
short PlayClosingBink ;checks whether the Closing Bink has been played
short PlayMainKarma ;Checks whether the main karma bink as been played
Begin GameMode
;This block plays the Introduction Bink
if PlayIntroBink == 0 ; If GetStage MQ11 == 200 ;Play Introduction Bink Here PipBoyRadioOff ; ShowMessage EndingBink1 ;PlayMusic "Endgame01" PlayBink "B01.bik" 0 1 0 Set PlayIntroBink to 1 ; endif endif
;This following section plays the appropriate Karma bink ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
If PlayIntroBink == 1 If PlayKarmaBink == 0 If Player.GetAv Karma >= -249 If Player.GetAv Karma <= 249 ;Play Neutral Karma Bink Here ;ShowMessage EndingBink8 ;PlayMusic "Endgame08" PlayBink "B08.bik" 0 1 0 set PlayKarmaBink to 1 set PlayMainKarma to 1 endif endif endif endif
If PlayIntroBink == 1 If PlayMainKarma == 0 If Player.GetAv Karma > 249 ;Play High Karma Bink 1 Here ;ShowMessage EndingBink2 ;PlayMusic "Endgame17" PlayBink "B17.bik" 0 1 0 set PlayMainKarma to 1 endif endif endif
If PlayMainKarma == 1 If PlayKarmaBink == 0 If Player.GetAv Karma > 249 If GetStageDone Ms06 100 == 1 ;Play High Karma Bink 1 Here ;ShowMessage EndingBink2 ;PlayMusic "Endgame02" PlayBink "B02.bik" 0 1 0 set PlayKarmaBink to 1 endif endif endif endif
If PlayMainKarma == 1 If PlayKarmaBink == 0 If Player.GetAv Karma > 249 If Getstage MS17 >= 100 ;Play High Karma Bink 2 Here ;ShowMessage EndingBink3 ;PlayMusic "Endgame03" PlayBink "B03.bik" 0 1 0 set PlayKarmaBink to 1 endif endif endif endif
If PlayMainKarma == 1 If PlayKarmaBink == 0 If Player.GetAv Karma > 249 ;Play High Karma Bink 3 Here ;ShowMessage EndingBink4 ;PlayMusic "Endgame04" PlayBink "B04.bik" 0 1 0 set PlayKarmaBink to 1 endif endif endif
If PlayIntroBink == 1 If PlayMainKarma == 0 If Player.GetAv Karma < -249 ;Play High Karma Bink 1 Here ;ShowMessage EndingBink2 ;PlayMusic "Endgame18" PlayBink "B18.bik" 0 1 0 set PlayMainKarma to 1 endif endif endif
If PlayMainKarma == 1 If PlayKarmaBink == 0 If Player.GetAv Karma < -249 If MegatonDestroyed == 1 ;Play Low Karma Bink 1 Here ;ShowMessage EndingBink5 ;PlayMusic "Endgame05" PlayBink "B05.bik" 0 1 0 set PlayKarmaBink to 1 endif endif endif endif
If PlayMainKarma == 1 If PlayKarmaBink == 0 If Player.GetAv Karma < -249 If MS10.InFlames >= 1 ;Play Low Karma Bink 2 Here ;ShowMessage EndingBink6 ;PlayMusic "Endgame06" PlayBink "B06.bik" 0 1 0 set PlayKarmaBink to 1 endif endif endif endif
If PlayMainKarma == 1 If PlayKarmaBink == 0 If Player.GetAv Karma < -249 ;Play Low Karma Bink 3 Here ;ShowMessage EndingBink7 ;PlayMusic "Endgame07" PlayBink "B07.bik" 0 1 0 set PlayKarmaBink to 1 endif endif endif
;-------------------------------------------------------------
;This section plays the Player Died Binks ;-------------------------------------------------------------- If PlayKarmaBink == 1 If PlayDeathBink == 0 If EndDeath == 1 ;Play Player Died (Good) Bink ;ShowMessage EndingBink9 ;PlayMusic "Endgame09" PlayBink "B09.bik" 0 1 0 set PlayDeathBink to 1 endif endif endif
If PlayKarmaBink == 1 If PlayDeathBink == 0 If EndDeath == 2 if MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode == 0 ;Play Player Lives Bink ;ShowMessage EndingBink10 ;PlayMusic "Endgame10" PlayBink "B10.bik" 0 1 0 set PlayDeathBink to 1 endif endif endif endif
If PlayKarmaBink == 1 If PlayDeathBink == 0 If EndDeath == 2 if MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode == 1 ;Play Player Lives Bink ;ShowMessage EndingBink29 ;PlayMusic "Endgame10" PlayBink "B29.bik" 0 1 0 set PlayDeathBink to 1 endif endif endif endif
If PlayKarmaBink == 1 If PlayDeathBink == 0 If EndDeath == 2 if MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode == 2 ;Play Player Lives Bink ;ShowMessage EndingBink28 ;PlayMusic "Endgame10" PlayBink "B28.bik" 0 1 0 set PlayDeathBink to 1 endif endif endif endif
If PlayKarmaBink == 1 If PlayDeathBink == 0 If EndDeath == 2 if MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode == 3 ;Play Player Lives Bink ;ShowMessage EndingBink27 ;PlayMusic "Endgame10" PlayBink "B27.bik" 0 1 0 set PlayDeathBink to 1 endif endif endif endif
If PlayKarmaBink == 1 If PlayDeathBink == 0 If EndDeath == 3 ;Play Player Died (Evil) Bink ;ShowMessage EndingBink11 ;PlayMusic "Endgame11" PlayBink "B11.bik" 0 1 0 set PlayDeathBink to 2 endif endif endif
;------------------------------------------------
;This section plays the Sided With Eden Binks ;--------------------------------------------------------------
If PlayDeathBink == 1 If PlayEdenBink == 0 If EndEden == 3 ;Play Player Sided With Eden Bink ;ShowMessage EndingBink14 ;PlayMusic "Endgame14" PlayBink "B14.bik" 0 1 0 set PlayEdenBink to 1 endif endif endif
If PlayDeathBink == 1 If PlayEdenBink == 0 If EndEden < 3 if MQ09.RRDestroy == 0 ;Play Player Didn't Side With Eden 1 Bink ;ShowMessage EndingBink12 ;PlayMusic "Endgame12" PlayBink "B12.bik" 0 1 0 set PlayEdenBink to 1 endif endif endif endif
If PlayDeathBink == 1 If PlayEdenBink == 0 If EndEden < 3 if MQ09.RRDestroy == 1 ;Play Player Didn't Side With Eden 2 Bink ;ShowMessage EndingBink13 ;PlayMusic "Endgame13" PlayBink "B13.bik" 0 1 0 set PlayEdenBink to 1 endif endif endif endif
;------------------------------------------------------------
;This block plays the closing bink
If PlayDeathBink >= 1 If PlayClosingBink == 0 If GetPCIsSex Male == 1 ;Play Closing Bink ;ShowMessage EndingBink15 ;PlayMusic "Endgame15" PlayBink "B15.bik" 0 1 0 set PlayClosingBink to 1 endif endif endif
If PlayDeathBink >= 1 If PlayClosingBink == 0 If GetPCIsSex Male == 0 ;Play Closing Bink ;ShowMessage EndingBink15 ;PlayMusic "Endgame16" PlayBink "B16.bik" 0 1 0 set PlayClosingBink to 1 endif endif endif
;------------------------------------------------------------
;This block plays the epilogue bink
If PlayClosingBink == 1 If GetPCIsSex Male == 1 If GetPCIsRace AfricanAmerican == 1 PlayBink "B19.bik" 0 1 0 addachievement 13 if ( EndDeath == 3 ) ExitGame Set PlayClosingBink to 2 else ;DLC03 Scripting
;Move player to starting location for the quest Player.MoveTo DLC03PlayerStartMarker
;Enable DLC Sarah ref if she didn't die in MQ11 if ( MQ11.Code != 2 ) DLC03SarahRef.Enable elseif ( MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode != 0 ) DLC03SarahRef.Enable endif

If PlayClosingBink == 1 If GetPCIsSex Female == 1 If GetPCIsRace AfricanAmerican == 1 PlayBink "B20.bik" 0 1 0 addachievement 13 if ( EndDeath == 3 ) ExitGame Set PlayClosingBink to 2 else ;DLC03 Scripting

If PlayClosingBink == 1 If GetPCIsSex Male == 1 If GetPCIsRace Caucasian == 1 PlayBink "B21.bik" 0 1 0 addachievement 13 if ( EndDeath == 3 ) ExitGame Set PlayClosingBink to 2 else ;DLC03 Scripting

If PlayClosingBink == 1 If GetPCIsSex Female == 1 If GetPCIsRace Caucasian == 1 PlayBink "B22.bik" 0 1 0 addachievement 13 if ( EndDeath == 3 ) ExitGame Set PlayClosingBink to 2 else ;DLC03 Scripting

If PlayClosingBink == 1 If GetPCIsSex Male == 1 If GetPCIsRace Asian == 1 PlayBink "B23.bik" 0 1 0 addachievement 13 if ( EndDeath == 3 ) ExitGame Set PlayClosingBink to 2 else ;DLC03 Scripting

ScriptName MQ11PPurityControlPanelScript
short PanelActivated short Button short DeathAnim ;flag set to 1 when player activates panel; wait for 1st person before actually playing anim short FadeSound ;do once flag for fading sounds out short explosionstep ;flag updated for explosions if no one puts the code in
short Num1 ;set to 0-9 depending on key press short Set1 ;flag set when first button is pressed short Num2 short Set2 short Num3 short Set3
float timer ;var used to track time between when panel is activated and playing the end movies float DeathTimer ;var used to track time between entering the code and the player's death
;Script for control panel for Project Purity
Begin OnActivate
if ( PanelActivated == 0 ) if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 )
;show message if panel's not active (any time before endgame)
if ( GetStage MQ11 < 40 ) ShowMessage PPurityControlNoPowerMessage elseif ( GetStage MQ11 >= 40 )
;check to make sure last three digits entered are the correct ones
if ( Num1 == 2 ) if ( Num2 == 1 ) if ( Num3 == 6 )
;if so, start by disabling player controls after updating var for game block
MQ05Radiation1.Disable MQ05Radiation2.Disable MQ05Klaxon1.Disable MQ05Klaxon2.Disable PlaySound ObjSwitchButtonBPass set PanelActivated to 1 RewardKarma 600 if ( GetPCIsSex Male == 1 ) SetNoActivationSound QSTDyingGaspMale else SetNoActivationSound QSTDyingGaspFemale endif DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 0 1 1 Activate
;play death anim (varies by perspective)
set DeathAnim to 1 set DeathTimer to 1
; if ( IsPC1stPerson == 1 ) ; Player.playidle LooseMQ11PlayersDeath1stperson ; else ; Player.playIdle LooseMQ11PlayersDeath ; endif
;start purifier animation
PPurityFXTankEffectRef.Playgroup Backward 1 IMod MQ11PPurityTankISFX PipBoyRadioOff Playsound MUSProjPurityActivate
;set timer that determines when quest ends and binks play
set timer to 38 return else
;show incorrect code message if numbers aren't right
PlaySound ObjSwitchButtonBFail Activate endif else
PlaySound ObjSwitchButtonBFail Activate endif else
PlaySound ObjSwitchButtonBFail Activate endif endif elseif ( IsActionRef MQ01SarahRef == 1 ) Set PanelActivated to 2 Set Timer to 20 PPurityFXTankEffectRef.Playgroup Backward 1 IMod MQ11PPurityTankISFX MQ01SarahRef.PlayIdle LooseMQ11SarahLyonsDeath Activate return ; SetStage MQ11 200 elseif ( IsActionRef MQ08FawkesRef == 1 ) Set PanelActivated to 2 Set Timer to 20 PPurityFXTankEffectRef.Playgroup Backward 1 MQ08FawkesRef.PlayIdle DLC03FawkesWaitsPurity IMod MQ11PPurityTankISFX Activate return elseif ( IsActionRef CharonRef == 1 ) Set PanelActivated to 2 Set Timer to 20 PPurityFXTankEffectRef.Playgroup Backward 1 CharonRef.PlayIdle LOOSEDLC03CharonWaitsPurity IMod MQ11PPurityTankISFX Activate return elseif ( IsActionRef RL3Ref == 1 ) Set PanelActivated to 2 Set Timer to 20 PPurityFXTankEffectRef.Playgroup Backward 1 RL3Ref.PlayIdle DLC03MisterGutsyWaitsPurity IMod MQ11PPurityTankISFX Activate return endif endif
End
Begin OnLoad
PPurityFXTankEffectRef.PlayGroup Forward 1
end
Begin GameMode
;If player activated the panel, DeathAnim is 1 ;wait until we're in 1st person before playing the animation
if ( DeathAnim == 1 ) if ( IsPC1stPerson == 1 )
set DeathAnim to 2 Player.addscriptpackage MQ11PlayerDeathPackage endif endif
;Scripting for handling MQ11.EndTimer ;added here because it needs to run every frame ;if time runs out before code gets put in, set EndDeath var so correct bink runs ;and run the binks ;Make sure PanelActivated is still 0 during this whole thing, so we don't bash one of the other endings
if ( PanelActivated == 0 ) if ( MQ11.EndTimerInit == 1 )
if ( MQ11.EndTimer <= 2.5 ) if ( ExplosionStep == 0 ) MQ11ExplosionMarker1.PlaceAtMe MQ05Explosion set ExplosionStep to 1 endif
DisablePlayerControls PipBoyRadioOff imod FadetoWhiteandBackISFX set MQ11.EndTimerInit to 2 else set MQ11.EndTimer to ( MQ11.EndTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( MQ11.EndTimerInit == 2 ) if ( ExplosionStep == 1 ) if ( MQ11.EndTimer <=1.8 ) MQ11ExplosionMarker4.PlaceAtMe MQ05Explosion set ExplosionStep to 2 endif elseif ( ExplosionStep == 2 ) if ( MQ11.EndTimer <= 0.6 ) MQ11ExplosionMarker5.PlaceAtMe MQ05Explosion MQ11ExplosionMarker6.PlaceAtMe MQ05Explosion set ExplosionStep to 3 endif endif if ( MQ11.EndTimer <= 0 ) Set EndingBinks.EndDeath to 3
StartQuest EndingBinks else set MQ11.EndTimer to ( MQ11.EndTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif endif
;Run the bink if the correct code is put in
if ( PanelActivated == 1 ) && GetStageDone MQ11 200 == 0
;fade sounds out before end bink
if (FadeSound == 0) if ( timer <= 4.15 ) FadeSFX 4.0 set FadeSound to 2 endif endif
if ( timer <= 0 ) set EndingBinks.EndDeath to 1 ; SetStage MQ11 200 StartQuest EndingBinks else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif
;Run the end if Sarah put the code in
;give a delay so her idle (called through package) can play
if ( PanelActivated == 2 ) set timer to 2
set PanelActivated to 3
elseif ( PanelActivated == 3 )
;when timer runs out, start the purifier animation, her death animation ;and reset timer before binks play
if ( timer <= 0 ) set PanelActivated to 4 Playsound MUSProjPurityActivate MQ05Radiation1.Disable MQ05Radiation2.Disable MQ05Klaxon1.Disable PipBoyRadioOff PPurityFXTankEffectRef.Playgroup Backward 1 IMod MQ11PPurityTankISFX if ( MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode == 0 ) MQ01SarahRef.PlayIdle LooseMQ11SarahLyonsDeath elseif ( MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode == 1 ) MQ08FawkesRef.PlayIdle DLC03FawkesWaitsPurity elseif ( MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode == 2 ) CharonRef.PlayIdle LOOSEDLC03CharonWaitsPurity elseif ( MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode == 3 ) RL3Ref.PlayIdle DLC03MisterGutsyWaitsPurity endif set timer to 38 else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif
elseif ( PanelActivated == 4 ) && GetStageDone MQ11 200 == 0
;fade sounds out before end bink
if (FadeSound == 0) if ( timer <= 4.15) FadeSFX 4 set FadeSound to 2 endif endif
;when timer runs out again, set stage so binks run
if ( timer <= 0 ) ; SetStage MQ11 200 StartQuest EndingBinks else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif
End

scn SOJabscoSCRIPT
ref mySelf short doOnce short gutsyOnce short runOnce short ambushOnce
BEGIN onDeath ; turn off zone respawning when Jabsco dies SetZoneRespawns FortBannisterZone 0 ; update DLC03 scene set DLC03Encounters.FBScene to 4 END
BEGIN onHit Player
set mySelf to getSelf
;// at 75% sound the alarm and two guards IF mySelf.getHealthPercentage <= .75
IF doOnce == 0 fortBJabscoRunToTerminal.enable set doOnce to 1 myself.addScriptPackage fortBJabscoUnlockPackage supremeOverlordJabscoREF.addItem WeapUniqueKnifeCombat 1 EVP ENDIF ENDIF
;// at 25% send in the Gutsy! IF mySelf.getHealthPercentage <= .25 IF gutsyOnce == 0 fortBGutsyTurnOn.enable set gutsyOnce to 1 ENDIF ENDIF
END
BEGIN gameMode
IF fortBJabscoRunToAmbush.getDisabled != 1 && runOnce == 0 myself.addScriptPackage fortBJabscorunToAmbushPackage EvP set RunOnce to 1 ENDIF
END

scn RL3SCRIPT
;Follower Variables short HasBeenHired short WeaponOut short CombatStyleRanged short CombatStyleMelee short IsFollowingDefault short IsFollowingShort short IsFollowingLong short Waiting
;Variables for DLC03
short DLC03RL3AirlockGo short DLC03MQ11RL3PanelAnimate
BEGIN OnHit player if FFER54NPC1REF.fightPlayer == 0 set FFER54NPC1REF.fightPlayer to 1 endif END
BEGIN OnStartCombat Player if FFER54NPC1REF.fightPlayer == 0 set FFER54NPC1REF.fightPlayer to 1 endif END
BEGIN gamemode if FFER54NPC1REF.fightPlayer == 0 if isCombatTarget player == 1 set FFER54NPC1REF.fightPlayer to 1 endif elseif FFER54NPC1REF.fightPlayer == 1 set FFER54NPC1REF.fightPlayer to 2 FFER54NPC1REF.modav DamageResist -85 setEssential RL3Follower 0 endif
;DLC03 MQ11 Scripting
if ( GetStage MQ11 >= 60 ) if ( DLC03RL3AirlockGo == 0 ) if ( GetDistance MQ11AirlockWaitMarker <= 150 ) Set DLC03RL3AirlockGo to 1 RL3REF.EVP endif endif endif
if ( DLC03MQ11RL3PanelAnimate == 1 ) if ( IsIdlePlaying == 0 ) Set DLC03MQ11RL3PanelAnimate to 2 set PPurityKeyPadEnterRef.PanelActivated to 2 endif endif
END
BEGIN OnCombatEND
if ( GetPlayerTeammate == 1 ) resethealth restoreav perceptioncondition 100 restoreav endurancecondition 100 restoreav leftattackcondition 100 restoreav leftmobilitycondition 100 restoreav rightattackcondition 100 restoreav rightmobilitycondition 100 endif
END
BEGIN OnDeath
if ( Followers.RL3Hired == 1 ) set Followers.PlayerHasFollower to 0 set Followers.RL3Hired to 0 ShowMessage FollowerMessageDeadRL3 endif
END

ScriptName MQ11AirlockControlPanelScript
;used in PPurity01 to control bulkheads used in MQ11
short SarahOpened ;flag set if Sarah is the one that activates the airlock short openstate short init short SarahAnim ;flag set if player has passed through airlock, used for updating Sarah's packages
float timer float ActivateTimer ;timer used to prevent player from activating airlock multiple times in succession
Begin OnActivate
if ( IsActionRef MQ01SarahREF == 1 ) set SarahOpened to 1 else set SarahOpened to 0 if IsActionRef player == 1 if ( GetStage MQ11 >= 10 ) ; if ( ActivateTimer <= 0 ) if ( OpenState == 0 ) if ( MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode == 1 ) if ( MQ08FawkesRef.GetDistance MQ11AirlockWaitMarker < 100 ) Set OpenState to 1 DisablePlayerControls return else ;do nothing endif elseif ( MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode == 2 ) if ( CharonRef.GetDistance MQ11AirlockWaitMarker < 100 ) Set OpenState to 1 DisablePlayerControls return else ;do nothing endif elseif ( MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode == 3 ) if ( RL3Ref.GetDistance MQ11AirlockWaitMarker < 100 ) Set OpenState to 1 DisablePlayerControls return else ;do nothing endif endif
if ( MQ11.Code == 2 ) if ( MQ01SarahRef.GetDistance MQ11AirlockWaitMarker < 100 ) Set OpenState to 1 DisablePlayerControls else ;do nothing endif endif return elseif ( OpenState == 4 ) set OpenState to 5 return else ; do nothing endif else ; do nothing endif else ShowMessage PPurityControlNoPowerMessage endif
endif endif
End
Begin GameMode
;Intercom stuff ;--------------------------
;Run the first line for the intercom after Sarah finishes talking to player
if ( MQ11.IntercomSayTo == 1 ) MQ11IntercomRef.Say MQ11IntercomLine set MQ11.IntercomSayTo to -1 endif
;Check MQ11.EndTimer and run a line at 2 minute mark, 1 minute mark, 30 second mark, and 15 second mark
if ( MQ11.EndTimer > 0 ) if ( MQ11.EndTimer <= 120 ) if ( MQ11.IntercomTimedLines == 0 ) set MQ11.IntercomTimedLines to 1 MQ11IntercomRef.Say MQ11IntercomTimerLines endif elseif ( MQ11.EndTimer <= 70 ) if ( MQ11.IntercomTimedLines == 1 ) set MQ11.IntercomTimedLines to 2 MQ11IntercomRef.Say MQ11IntercomTimerLines endif elseif ( MQ11.EndTimer <= 40 ) if ( MQ11.IntercomTimedLines == 2 ) set MQ11.IntercomTimedLines to 3 MQ11IntercomRef.Say MQ11IntercomTimerLines endif elseif ( MQ11.EndTimer <= 25 ) if ( MQ11.IntercomTimedLines == 3 ) set MQ11.IntercomTimedLines to 4 MQ11IntercomRef.Say MQ11IntercomTimerLines endif endif endif
if ( ActivateTimer >= 0 ) set ActivateTimer to ( ActivateTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif
if ( OpenState == 1 ) if ( SarahOpened == 1 ) DisablePlayercontrols 1 0 0 1 0 0 0 endif MQ11AirlockCollisionPlaneRef.Enable PPBulkhead02Ref.SetOpenState 0 set timer to 3 set OpenState to 2 elseif ( Openstate == 2 ) if ( timer <= 0 ) MQ11AirlockCollisionPlaneRef.Disable PPBulkhead01Ref.SetOpenState 1 set OpenState to 3 if ( SarahOpened == 1 ) EnablePlayerControls 1 1 1 0 1 1 1 Set SarahAnim to 1 endif else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( OpenState == 3 ) if ( PPBulkhead01Ref.GetOpenState == 1 ) set OpenState to 4 if ( MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode == 0 ) MQ01SarahRef.EVP elseif ( MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode == 1 ) MQ08FawkesREF.EVP elseif ( MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode == 2 ) CharonREF.EVP elseif ( MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode == 3 ) RL3REF.EVP endif endif endif
if ( OpenState == 5 ) PPBulkhead01Ref.SetOpenState 0 set timer to 3 set OpenState to 6 elseif ( OpenState == 6 ) if ( timer <= 0 ) PPBulkhead02Ref.SetOpenState 1 set OpenState to 7 else set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif elseif ( OpenState == 7 ) if ( PPBulkhead02Ref.GetOpenState == 1 ) set OpenState to 0 endif endif
End

ScriptName PPSideDoor01Script
short explode
float timer
;script for disabling ColonelAutumn during MQ05
Begin OnActivate
;enable fighting if player leaves PPurity01 during stage 75 of MQ05
if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 )
if ( GetStage MQ11 >= 40 ) && ( GetStage MQ11 < 200 ) ShowMessage MQ11PPDoorMessage elseif ( GetStage MQ05 < 75 ) if ( GetStage MQ05 >= 30 ) DisableAllMines Activate else Activate endif elseif ( GetStage MQ05 == 75 ) if ( MQ05.NoFighting == 1 ) EnablePlayerControls set MQ05.NoFighting to 2 Activate endif elseif ( GetStage MQ05 == 80 ) if ( MQ05.AutumnMove == 0 ) MQ05ColonelAutumnRef.Disable set MQ05.AutumnMove to 1 Activate else Activate endif else Activate endif
else Activate endif
End

ScriptName ScribeRothchildScript
;placed on NPC ScribeRothchild
Begin OnActivate
if ( ElderLyonsRef.NoActivate != 1 ) Activate endif
End
Begin GameMode
if ( GetQuestRunning MQ06 == 1 ) if ( GetDistance MQ06RothchildMapMarker < 100 ) if ( MQ06MapoverlayRef.GetDisabled == 1 ) MQ06MapOverlayRef.Enable endif endif endif
;-------------------------------------------------- ;DLCO3SCRIPTING
if ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep == 2 ) if ( GetDistance DLC03BS1RothMapMarker < 50 ) if ( Player.GetDistance DLC03BS1CitadelMapMarker < 150 ) DisablePlayerControls Set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to 4 ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player ScribeRothchildRef.Sayto ScribeRothchildRef DLC03BS1RothchildMapLines endif endif endif
End
Begin SayToDone MQ09ElderSarahConv
;update var on Elder Lyons when done with his line
if ( ElderLyonsRef.ConvFlag == 5 ) set ElderLyonsRef.ConvFlag to 6 MQ01SarahRef.SayTo ElderLyonsRef MQ09ElderSarahConv endif
End
Begin SayToDone MQ11ElderSarahConv
if ( ElderLyonsRef.ConvFlag2 == 5 ) set ElderLyonsRef.ConvFlag2 to 6 ElderLyonsRef.SayTo ScribeRothchildRef MQ11ElderSarahConv endif
if ( ElderLyonsRef.ConvFlag2 == 7 ) set ElderLyonsRef.ConvFlag2 to 8 ElderLyonsRef.SayTo ScribeRothchildRef MQ11ElderSarahConv endif
if ( ElderLyonsRef.ConvFlag2 == 9 ) set ElderLyonsRef.ConvFlag2 to 10 ElderLyonsRef.SayTo MQ01SarahRef MQ11ElderSarahConv endif
End
;MORE DLC03 SCRIPTING
Begin SaytoDone DLC03BS1RothchildMapLines
if ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep == 5 ) set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to 6 ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player ScribeRothchildRef.SayTo ScribeRothchildRef DLC03BS1RothchildMapLines DLC03PPMapOverlayRef.Enable endif
if ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep == 7 ) set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to 8 ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player ScribeRothchildRef.SayTo ScribeRothchildRef DLC03BS1RothchildMapLines DLC03RRMapOverlayREF.Enable endif
if ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep == 9 ) set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to 10 ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player ScribeRothchildRef.SayTo ScribeRothchildRef DLC03BS1RothchildMapLines DLC03RandomMapOverlayRef.Enable endif
if ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep == 11 ) set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to 12 ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player ScribeRothchildRef.SayTo ScribeRothchildRef DLC03BS1RothchildMapLines endif
if ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep == 13 ) set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to 14 ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player ScribeRothchildRef.SayTo ScribeRothchildRef DLC03BS1RothchildMapLines endif
if ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep == 15 ) set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to 16 ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player ScribeRothchildRef.SayTo ScribeRothchildRef DLC03BS1RothchildMapLines endif
if ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep == 17 ) set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to 18 ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player ScribeRothchildRef.SayTo ScribeRothchildRef DLC03BS1RothchildMapLines endif
if ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep == 19 ) set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to 20 ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player ScribeRothchildRef.SayTo ScribeRothchildRef DLC03BS1RothchildMapLines DLC03TunnelMapOverlayRef.Enable endif
if ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep == 21 ) set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to 22 ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player ScribeRothchildRef.SayTo ScribeRothchildRef DLC03BS1RothchildMapLines endif
if ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep == 23 ) set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to 24 ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player ScribeRothchildRef.SayTo ScribeRothchildRef DLC03BS1RothchildMapLines endif
if ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep == 25 ) set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to 26 ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player ScribeRothchildRef.SayTo ScribeRothchildRef DLC03BS1RothchildMapLines endif End

ScriptName DLC03SarahLyonsScript
;Script placed on DLC03SarahLyons
short Coma short TalkDone
Begin OnLoad
if ( Coma == 0 ) SetUnconscious 1 endif
End

ScriptName DLC03BS1QuestScript
short Init ;flag set when we run this for the first time
Short SarahDead ;flag set if Sarah died in MQ11 Short RunTimer ;flag set when we need to run a timer short DLC03TristanGreet ;flag set when player first talks to Tristan -- used to make sure player can't bypass him short DLC03TristanStep ;incremented as Tristan does his walk & talk Short DLC03PrimeDown ;flag set when Prime explodes; used for dialogue and stage updates Short DLC03TerminalUpdate ;flag set for updating terminal entries short DLC03PrimeLineInc ;flag incremented after each of Liberty Prime's lines during his scene short DLC03LyonsGreet ;flag set when player is done waking up, so Elder forcegreets short DLC03TristanFollow ;flag set when player passes through Prime trigger, used to keep Tristan following him short DLC03RothStep ;flag incremented as player deals with Rothchild short DLC03TristanPrimeFlag ;flag set to 1 when we start the timer at Prime's Death short DLC03PlayBink ;flag set when it's time to play the transition bink
Float Timer ;timer var Float DLC03PrimeDeathTimer float DLC03BinkTimer ;timer used to delay playing bink after sound call
Begin GameMode
;remove MQ11 script packages from followers and fire them all
if ( Init == 0 ) MQ08FawkesRef.RemoveScriptPackage MQ11FollowerWaitENDNoIdle DogmeatRef.RemoveScriptPackage MQ11FollowerWaitENDNoIdle CloverRef.RemoveScriptPackage MQ11FollowerWaitENDNoIdle Rl3Ref.RemoveScriptPackage MQ11FollowerWaitENDNoIdle ButchRef.RemoveScriptPackage MQ11FollowerWaitENDNoIdle CharonRef.RemoveScriptPackage MQ11FollowerWaitENDNoIdle JerichoRef.RemoveScriptPackage MQ11FollowerWaitENDNoIdle StarPaladinCrossRef.RemoveScriptPackage MQ11FollowerWaitENDNoIdle
;UPDATE: Move followers to citadel along with the player
if ( Followers.ButchHired == 1 ) if ( ButchRef.Waiting == 0 ) Set ButchRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) ButchREF.Moveto DLC03FollowerStartWaitMarkerREF ButchREF.EVP endif
endif if ( Followers.CharonHired == 1 ) if ( CharonRef.Waiting == 0 ) Set CharonRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) CharonREF.Moveto DLC03FollowerStartWaitMarkerREF CharonREF.EVP endif
endif if ( Followers.CloverHired == 1 )
if ( CloverRef.Waiting == 0 ) Set CloverRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) CloverREF.Moveto DLC03FollowerStartWaitMarkerREF CloverRef.EVP endif
endif if ( Followers.DogmeatHired == 1 )
if ( DogmeatRef.Waiting == 0 ) Set DogmeatRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.DogmeatWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) DogmeatRef.Moveto DLC03FollowerStartWaitMarkerREF DogmeatRef.EVP endif
endif if ( Followers.JerichoHired == 1 )
if ( JerichoRef.Waiting == 0 ) Set JerichoRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) JerichoREF.Moveto DLC03FollowerStartWaitMarkerREF JerichoRef.EVP endif
endif if ( Followers.FawkesHired == 1 ) if ( MQ08FawkesRef.Waiting == 0 ) Set MQ08FawkesRef.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) MQ08FawkesREF.Moveto DLC03FollowerStartWaitMarkerREF MQ08FawkesRef.EVP endif
endif if ( Followers.RL3Hired == 1 ) if ( RL3REF.Waiting == 0 ) Set RL3REF.Waiting to 1 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) RL3REF.Moveto DLC03FollowerStartWaitMarkerREF RL3REF.EVP endif
endif if ( Followers.StarPaladinCrossHired == 1 )
if ( StarPaladinCrossRef.Waiting == 0 ) Set StarPaladinCrossRef.Waiting to 1 StarPaladinCrossREF.Moveto DLC03FollowerStartWaitMarkerREF set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to ( GameDaysPassed + FollowerWaitTime ) StarPaladinCrossRef.EVP endif
endif
;remove all adverse medical effects, chems, etc from the player Player.Dispel Jet Player.Dispel Psycho Player.Dispel MS09UltraJet Player.Dispel Buffout Player.Dispel Mentats Player.Dispel Stealthboy Player.Dispel Morphine Player.Dispel MS15Mentat01 Player.Dispel MS15Mentat02 Player.Dispel MS15Mentat03 Player.Dispel MS04FireAntNectar Player.Dispel MS15Mentat02 Player.Dispel Beer Player.Dispel Vodka Player.Dispel Scotch Player.Dispel Whiskey Player.Dispel Wine Player.Dispel AntQueenPheromones Player.Dispel MS05NukaColaQtm Player.Dispel MS05NukalurkMeat Player.Dispel RadX Player.Dispel AntNectar Player.Dispel MS05FinNukaPie Player.Dispel YaoGuaiMeat Set Generic.Addicted to 0 Player.RestoreAV RadiationRads 1000 Player.ResetHealth
set Init to 1 endif
;Wait until player has loaded into Citadel before playing Bink audio
if ( DLC03PlayBink == 0 ) if ( Player.GetInCell CitadelBRing == 1 ) playSound QSTFadeToWhiteE set DLC03BS1.DLC03BinkTimer to 3 set DLC03BS1.DLC03PlayBink to 1 endif endif
;run a short delay between transition sound and bink playing
if ( DLC03PlayBink == 1 ) if ( DLC03BinkTimer >= 0 ) set DLC03BinkTimer to ( DLC03BinkTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) else PlayBink "2 weeks later.bik" 0 0 1 0 set DLC03PlayBink to -1 endif endif
;run timers where needed
if ( RunTimer == 1 ) if ( Timer <= 0 ) if ( GetStage DLC03BS1 == 0 ) SetStage DLC03BS1 1 elseif ( GetStage DLC03BS1 == 1 ) setStage DLC03BS1 2 endif else set Timer to ( Timer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif
if ( DLC03PrimeDown == 1 ) if ( DLC03TristanPrimeFlag == 0 ) Set DLC03TristanPrimeFlag to 1 Set DLC03PrimeDeathTimer to 32 elseif ( DLC03TristanPrimeFlag == 1 ) if ( DLC03PrimeDeathTimer <= 0 ) Set DLC03TristanPrimeFlag to -1 Set DLC03TristanFollow to -1 DLC03TristanRef.EVP else set DLC03PrimeDeathTimer to ( DLC03PrimeDeathTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif endif endif
End

ScriptName DLC03BS2QuestScript
short DLC03DeathclawControl short VallincourtFlag ;flag used to track optional objectives for quest short DLC03GhoulFlag ;flag set when Wint's done talking
Begin GameMode
if ( Player.GetItemCount DLC03SignalScrambler > 0 ) if ( DLC03DeathclawControl == 0 ) Set DLC03DeathclawControl to 1 Player.SetFactionRank DLC03EnclaveDeathclawFaction 0 endif endif
;clear optional objectives when player enters Olney Sewers
if ( GetStage DLC03BS2 == 20 ) if ( Player.GetInCell OldOlney01 == 1 ) if ( GetObjectiveCompleted DLC03BS2 60 == 0 ) SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC03BS2 60 0 endif
if ( GetObjectiveCompleted DLC03BS2 61 == 0 ) SetObjectiveCompleted DLC03BS2 61 1 endif endif endif
;Update quest stage when player is inside Powerworks
if ( GetStage DLC03BS2 == 20 ) if ( Player.GetInCell DLC03Powerworks01 == 1 ) SetStage DLC03BS2 30 endif endif
;Update quest stage when player picks up the Tesla Coil
if ( GetStage DLC03BS2 == 30 ) if ( Player.GetItemCount DLC03TeslaCoil > 0 ) SetStage DLC03BS2 40 endif endif
End

scn DLC03MetroTestSwitch01REFSCRIPT
short doOnce float timer
Begin onActivate if (doOnce == 0) player.moveto dlc03MetroTestStartREF DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 0 1 set timer to 2 set doOnce to 1 endif End
Begin gameMode if (doOnce == 1) if (timer <= 0) player.addscriptpackage DLC03MetroCameraPackage set timer to 5 set doOnce to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (doOnce == 2) if (timer <= 0) player.removescriptpackage ;player.moveto dlc03MetroTestEndREF ;player.addscriptpackage MQ08PlayerFallsDownPackage ;EnablePlayerControls set timer to 2 set doOnce to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (doOnce == 3) if (timer <= 0) ;player.removescriptpackage player.moveto dlc03MetroTestEndREF ;player.addscriptpackage MQ08PlayerFallsDownPackage ;EnablePlayerControls set doOnce to 0 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif End

ScriptName DLC03BS3QuestScript
short BS3Alarm ;1= Margot has set off the alarm inside the Presidential Metro short BS3GetSecurity ;1= Margot summoned security detail and activated her turrets short BS3Clear ;1= Margot has cleared the Player and will dialogue short BS3Senator ;1= Player possessed Senate ID for use in Margot's dialogue short BS3Breach ;1= Makes Security Breach dialogue available short BS3BreachMore ;1= Opens more options on the Security Breach dialogue sub-branch short BS3BreachDone ;1= The "breach" in the Metro has been secured short BS3Seal ;1= Player is aware of the sealed train blocking the way to Adams AFB short BS3StrikeTarget ;1= Player chose to blow up Enclave Base 2= Player chose to blow up Citadel short BS3ArrivedMetro ;1= Player has arrived at the Presidential Metro short BS3ArrivedAdams ;1= Player has arrived at Adams AFB short BS3ArrivedPlatform ;1= Player has arrived inside the Enclave Mobile Platform short BS3GhoulCount ;1= Number of Feral Ghouls slain in the Presidential Metro to contribute to completing optional objective short BS3Self ;1= Player went through the Self path of dialogue with Margot short BS3SecondChance ;1= Player used his second chance at Margot short BS3CrawlerRamp ;0= Crawler Ramp is Closed 1=Crawler Ramp is Open short BS3SetupEntourage ;1= Player has destroyed the Platform short BS3MargotUnlock ;1= Margot has unlocked the load door from her area short BS3SarahAtVertibird01 ;1= Sarah is outside of Vertibird01 near the Enclave Tower short BS3SarahAtVertibird02 ;1= Sarah is outside of Vertibird02 near the Air Traffic Control Tower short BS3SarahAtVertibird03 ;1= Sarah is outside of Vertibird03 outside the blown up Citadel short BS3Evil ;1= Starts the Evil Timer in case player avoids Forcegreet somehow short BS3QTFlip ;0= Player is on pre-ride side of train run 1= Player is on post-ride side of train run short BS3OptionCheck ;1= Player made it to Adams AFB without clearing the breach (for objective handling)
short DoOnce short DoOnceA short DoOnce1
float EvilTimer
begin gamemode
;This is a series of LD handshake blocks
if ( DoOnce == 0 ) if ( BS3Clear == 1 ) Set DLC03NQlvl.botsFriendly to 1 set DoOnce to 1 endif endif
if ( DoOnceA == 0 ) if ( BS3Alarm == 0 ) if ( DLC03NQlvl.PlayerHarmed == 1 ) set BS3Alarm to 1 set DoOnceA to 1 endif endif endif
;This block handles the objective handoff when the Player arrives at the Presidential Metro
if ( BS3ArrivedMetro == 0 ) if ( Player.GetInCell DLC03PresMetro01 == 1 ) if ( GetObjectiveDisplayed DLC03BS3 10 == 1 ) SetObjectiveCompleted DLC03BS3 10 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC03BS3 20 1 Set BS3ArrivedMetro to 1 endif endif endif
;This block handles the objective handoff when the Player arrives at Adams AFB
if ( BS3ArrivedAdams == 0 ) if ( Player.GetDistance DLC03AFBArrivalMarker < 400 ) if ( GetObjectiveDisplayed DLC03BS3 20 == 1 ) SetObjectiveCompleted DLC03BS3 20 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC03BS3 30 1 Set BS3ArrivedAdams to 1 endif endif endif
;This block checks the status of the Optional objective to clear the Metro once player hits Adams AFB
if ( BS3OptionCheck == 0 ) if ( BS3ArrivedAdams == 1 ) if ( GetObjectiveCompleted DLC03BS3 25 == 0 ) SetObjectiveCompleted DLC03BS3 25 1 Set BS3OptionCheck to 1 endif endif endif
;This block handles the objective handoff when the Player arrives at the Enclave Mobile Platform
if ( BS3ArrivedPlatform == 0 ) if ( Player.GetInCell DLC03EnclaveBase01 == 1 ) if ( GetObjectiveDisplayed DLC03BS3 50 == 1 ) SetObjectiveCompleted DLC03BS3 50 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC03BS3 60 1 Set BS3ArrivedPlatform to 1 endif endif endif
;This block signals the quest to advance if the requisite number of Feral Ghouls are slain in the Metro ;The computer will unseal the trains remotely as soon as it "detects" the breach being quelled
if ( BS3BreachDone == 0 ) if ( DLC03NQlvl.PlayerHelped == 1 ) SetObjectiveCompleted DLC03BS3 25 1 set BS3BreachDone to 1 endif endif
;This handles moving all of the Citadel NPCs to the welcome markers if Player was successful at the end ;Sarah and Vargas are optional of course (we check if they are alive)
if ( BS3SetupEntourage == 0 ) if ( DLC03PlatformBoom == 1 ) ScribeRothchildRef.MoveTo DLC03EndGameRothchildMarker ElderLyonsRef.MoveTo DLC03EndGameElderLyonsMarker DLC03TristanRef.MoveTo DLC03EndGamePaladinTristanMarker ;DLC03EndGameRandomBoS01Marker ;DLC03EndGameRandomBoS02Marker if (DLC03BS1.SarahDead == 0) DLC03SarahRef.MoveTo DLC03EndGameSarahLyonsMarker endif ScribeRothchildRef.Evp ElderLyonsRef.Evp DLC03TristanRef.Evp MQ01SarahRef.Evp Set BS3SetupEntourage to 1 endif endif
;If the Player elects to avoid the Forcegreet from the BoS Pilot at the conclusion of the "Evil" ending ;This block kicks off a timer that sets the BoS against the Player in 15 seconds as a failsafe
if ( DoOnce1 == 0 ) if ( BS3Evil == 1 ) && ( EvilTimer > 0 ) Set EvilTimer to ( EvilTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) elseif ( BS3Evil == 1 ) && ( EvilTimer <= 0 ) DLC03SarahRef.SayTo Player DLC03SarahAngry Player.RemoveFromFaction BrotherhoodSteelFactionDC Player.RemoveFromFaction MQPlayerBOSAllyFaction StarPaladinCrossREF.RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction StarPaladinCrossREF.SetFactionRank TeammateFaction -1 Set Followers.StarPaladinCrossFired to 1 StarPaladinCrossREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 SetEnemy BrotherhoodSteelFactionDC PlayerFaction 0 setEssential DLC03SarahLyons 0 Set DLC03PilotGreet to 1 SetStage DLC03BS3 200 Set DoOnce1 to 1 Set BS3Evil to 2 endif endif
end

scn DLC03FieldFXSCRIPT
short loadOnce
BEGIN ONLOAD
IF loadOnce == 0 Playgroup Forward 0 set loadOnce to 1 ENDIF
END

scn DLC03PrimeSCRIPT
ref mySelf
;//cliff scale timers short popSkip short popSkipTimerInit float popSkipTimer short cliffScaleTimerInit float cliffScaleTimer short vertibirdWaveOneADone short vertibirdWaveOneBDone short primeShootWave1A short primeShootWave1B short explodeWave1A short explodeWave1B short startWalk short factionWipe short fireSlide0 short fireSlide5 short fireSlide10 short fireSlide15 short fireSlide20 short fireSlide25 short fireSlide30 short fireSlide35 short fireSlide40 short fireSlide45 short fireSlide50 short fireSlide55 short fireSlide60 short vertiBirdStart short vertiBirdHit short vertiBirdExplode short vertiBirdShoot short vertiBirdHitCount
;// stomp timer short stompTimerInit float stompTimer short stompSplode
;//punch timer short punchTimerInit float punchTimer short rockDisableOnce
;//step back timer short stepBackTimerInit float stepBackTimer short faceFireAOnce short faceFireBOnce short faceFireCOnce short faceFireExplode short firstStrikeOnce
;//orbital strike timer short orbitalStrikeTimerInit float orbitalStrikeTimer short strikeAOnce short strikeBOnce short strikeCOnce short strikeDOnce short strikeEOnce
;//the pylon shake variables short hookPunchTimerInit float hookPunchTimer short hookPunchOnce short hookPunchExplosionOnce short primeScanOnce
;// the walk and shoot variables short walkShot05 short walkShot10 short walkShot15 short walkShot20 short walkShot25
;// torso enable short torsoEnable
;// timers for the shooting vertibirds short vertibirdWave1ATimerInit short vertibirdWave1ATimer short vertibirdWave1AStart
short vertibirdWave1BTimerInit short vertibirdWave1BTimer short vertibirdWave1BStart
;// the variables for talking short primeTalkPreScan short primeTalkPostScan short primeTalkTransmission short primeTalkFirstWarning short primeTalkFinalWarning
;// have the brotherhood flee at this time, run! short brotherhoodFollowersFlee
;// prime's nuke timer for hitting the wall short nukeThrowTimerInit float nukeThrowTimer
short primeBraceOnce short killTriggerOnce
BEGIN ONLOAD
set mySelf to getSelf
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;// run this every frame, just in case set mySelf to getSelf
;//************ ;//** track him walking down the cliff ;//************ IF getAV Variable01 == 1
IF popSkip == 0 IF popSkipTimerInit == 0 set popSkipTimerInit to 1 set popSkipTimer to 2 ENDIF
;// let prime get setup then freeze him for future use IF popSkipTimer > 0 set popSkipTimer to popSkipTimer - getSecondsPassed ELSE SetActorsAI 0 ENDIF
ELSEIF popSkip == 1
IF cliffScaleTimerInit == 0 set cliffScaleTimer to 11 set cliffScaleTimerInit to 1 DLC03PrimeWalkSmashedVertibird.playgroup fastleft 0 SetActorsAI 1 ENDIF
IF cliffScaleTimer > 0 set cliffScaleTimer to cliffScaleTimer - getSecondsPassed
;////////////////// ;// make the vertibird shoot a lot ;////////////////// IF vertiBirdShoot == 0 IF vertiBirdHitCount == 10 DLC03PrimeWalkSmashedVertibird.fireWeapon WeapGatlingLaser set vertiBirdHitCount to 0 ENDIF
set vertiBirdHitCount to (vertiBirdHitCount + 1)
ENDIF
;////////////////// ;// start the hovering bird + hit animation ;////////////////// IF cliffScaleTimer < 10.65 && vertiBirdStart == 0 ; DLC03PrimeWalkSmashedVertibird.playgroup backward 0 set vertiBirdStart to 1 ENDIF
;////////////////// ;// the lasers while running salvo 1 ;////////////////// IF cliffScaleTimer < 7.0 && fireSlide0 == 0 fireWeapon libertyPrimeLaser set fireSlide0 to 1 ENDIF
IF cliffScaleTimer < 6.5 && fireSlide5 == 0 fireWeapon libertyPrimeLaser set fireSlide5 to 1 ENDIF
IF cliffScaleTimer < 6.1 && fireSlide10 == 0 fireWeapon libertyPrimeLaser set fireSlide10 to 1 ENDIF
IF cliffScaleTimer < 5.5 && fireSlide15 == 0 fireWeapon libertyPrimeLaser set fireSlide15 to 1 ENDIF
;/////////////////// ;// blow up the bird ;/////////////////// IF cliffScaleTimer < 5.5 && vertiBirdExplode == 0 DLC03PrimeWalkSmashedVertibird.do 500000 set vertiBirdShoot to 1 set vertiBirdExplode to 1 ENDIF
;////////////////// ;// the lasers while running salvo 2 ;////////////////// IF cliffScaleTimer < 3.0 && fireSlide20 == 0 fireWeapon libertyPrimeLaser set fireSlide20 to 1 ENDIF
IF cliffScaleTimer < 2.5 && fireSlide25 == 0 fireWeapon libertyPrimeLaser set fireSlide25 to 1 ENDIF
IF cliffScaleTimer < 1.6 && fireSlide30 == 0 fireWeapon libertyPrimeLaser set fireSlide30 to 1 ENDIF
IF cliffScaleTimer < 1.0 && fireSlide35 == 0 fireWeapon libertyPrimeLaser set fireSlide35 to 1 ENDIF
ELSE ;// advance prime removeFromFaction playerFaction removeFromFaction enclaveFaction set popSkip to 2 setAV variable01 2 EVP ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
;//************ ;//** this is where the stomp action goes! ;//************ IF getAV Variable01 == 3
IF stompTimerInit == 0 addToFaction playerFaction 5 addToFaction enclaveFaction 5 stopCombat setAngle z -63 playIdle LooseDLC03PrimeStomp set stompTimer to 2.5 set stompTimerInit to 1 ENDIF
IF stompTimer > 0 set stompTimer to stompTimer - getSecondsPassed
IF stompTimer < 0.5 && stompSplode == 0 DLC03ElectricBoxBarrierRef0.do 5000 DLC03ElectricBoxBarrierRef0.placeAtMe LargeExplosion 1 DLC03PrimeWalk10ShotXMRK.disable set stompSplode to 1 ENDIF
ELSE removeFromFaction playerFaction removeFromFaction enclaveFaction setAV variable01 4 EVP ENDIF
ENDIF
;//************ ;//** the shooting that takes place while LPrime is walking ;//************ IF getAV Variable01 == 4
IF walkShot05 == 1 useWeapon DLC03LibertyPrimeWeapBombSPECIAL mySelf DLC03PrimeWalk05ShotXMRK 1 0 0 set walkShot05 to 0 ENDIF
;// shoot down the vertibirdie IF walkShot10 == 1 set walkShot10 to 0 ENDIF
ENDIF
;//************ ;//** the events that take place at the forcefield ;//************ IF getAV Variable01 == 5
;/////////////// ;// init the hook timer ;/////////////// IF hookPunchTimerInit == 0 addToFaction playerFaction 5 addToFaction enclaveFaction 5 stopCombat set hookPunchTimer to 14 set hookPunchTimerInit to 1 ENDIF
;/////////////// ;// the timer for the hook punch and scan dialogue ;/////////////// IF hookPunchTimer > 0 set hookPunchTimer to hookPunchTimer - getSecondsPassed
IF hookPunchTimer < 13.8 && hookPunchOnce == 0 setAngle z 0 playIdle DLC03LibertyPrimeHookPunch set hookPunchOnce to 1 ENDIF
IF hookPunchTimer < 12.75 && hookPunchExplosionOnce == 0 DLC03PrimeWalkHookPunchExplosionXMRK.placeAtMe largeExplosion 1 set hookPunchExplosionOnce to 1
;// kill the turrets DLC03PrimeWalkTowerBComTowerA.disable
DLC03PrimeWalkTowerBTurretD.kill DLC03PrimeWalkTowerBTurretD.disable DLC03PrimeWalkTowerBTurretDHulk.enable 0
DLC03PrimeWalkTowerBTurretE.kill DLC03PrimeWalkTowerBTurretE.disable DLC03PrimeWalkTowerBTurretEHulk.enable 0
DLC03PrimeWalkTowerBTurretF.kill DLC03PrimeWalkTowerBTurretF.disable DLC03PrimeWalkTowerBTurretFHulk.enable 0
DLC03PrimeWalkTowerBTurretG.kill DLC03PrimeWalkTowerBTurretG.disable DLC03PrimeWalkTowerBTurretGHulk.enable 0
DLC03PrimeWalkTowerBTurretA.setUnconscious 1 DLC03PrimeWalkTowerBTurretB.setUnconscious 1 DLC03PrimeWalkTowerBTurretC.setUnconscious 1
ENDIF
;////////// ;// prime's line before he starts the scan (06 - 8 seconds) ;////////// IF hookPunchTimer < 9 && primeTalkPreScan == 0 DLC03LibertyPrimeRef.SayTo DLC03LibertyPrimeRef DLC03BS1PrimeLines set primeTalkPreScan to 1 ENDIF
IF hookPunchTimer < 6.5 && primeScanOnce == 0 playIdle DLC03LibertyPrimeScan DLC03PrimeWalkScanFXRef.playGroup forward 0 set primeScanOnce to 1 ENDIF
;////////// ;// the line prime says after the scan (05 - 6 seconds) ;////////// IF hookPunchTimer < 3.5 && primeTalkPostScan == 0 DLC03LibertyPrimeRef.SayTo DLC03LibertyPrimeRef DLC03BS1PrimeLines set primeTalkPostScan to 1 ENDIF
ELSE setAV Variable01 6 EVP removeFromFaction playerFaction removeFromFaction enclaveFaction ENDIF ENDIF
;//************ ;//** prime walking to the station ;//************ IF getAV Variable01 == 6
IF ( walkShot15 == 1 ) useWeapon DLC03LibertyPrimeWeapBombSpecial mySelf DLC03PrimeTunnelFire 1 0 0 DLC03PrimeWalkFortSpawnXMRK.disable set walkShot15 to 2 ENDIF
;// he's ready to throw the nukery IF walkShot15 == 2
;// countdown to damage IF nukeThrowTimerInit == 0 set nukeThrowTimer to 7 set nukeThrowTimerInit to 1 ENDIF
;// time when the nuke should hit the wall and crackit IF nukeThrowTimer > 0 set nukeThrowTimer to nukeThrowTimer - getSecondsPassed ELSE DLC03PunchedRock.do 25000 set walkShot15 to 3 ENDIF
ENDIF
IF ( walkShot20 == 1 ) useWeapon DLC03LibertyPrimeWeapBombSpecial mySelf DLC03PrimeWalkFortSpawnXMRK 1 0 0 set walkShot20 to 0 ENDIF
ENDIF
;//************ ;//** play the punch animation when prime arrives at the wall ;//************ IF getAV Variable01 == 7 setAV Variable01 8 setAngle z 0 playIdle DLC03LibertyPrimePunchWall
ENDIF
;//************ ;//** after the punch, wait and then start the stumble ;//************ IF getAV Variable01 == 8
;/////////////// ;// init the punch timer ;/////////////// IF punchTimerInit == 0 set punchTimer to 5.5 set punchTimerInit to 1 ENDIF
;/////////////// ;// the punch timer and start of missile strike ;/////////////// IF punchTimer > 0 set punchTimer to punchTimer - getSecondsPassed
;// turn off the rock from the punch IF punchTimer < 2.95 && rockDisableOnce == 0 DLC03PunchedRock.do 75000 set rockDisableOnce to 1 ENDIF
;////////// ;// the line prime says right before the first missile (04 -- 8 seconds) ;////////// IF punchTimer < 1.5 && primeTalkTransmission == 0 DLC03LibertyPrimeRef.SayTo DLC03LibertyPrimeRef DLC03BS1PrimeLines DLC03PrimeWalkSatDishA.playgroup forward 1 DLC03PrimeWalkSatDishB.playgroup forward 1 DLC03PrimeWalkSatDishC.playgroup forward 1 addToFaction playerFaction 5 addToFaction enclaveFaction 5 set primeTalkTransmission to 1 ENDIF
ELSE setAV Variable01 9 playIdle DLC03LibertyPrimeStepsBack
ENDIF
ENDIF
;//************ ;//** after the stumble do the lookout now ;//************ IF getAV Variable01 == 9
IF stepBackTimerInit == 0 set stepBackTimer to 20 set stepBackTimerInit to 1 addToFaction playerFaction 5 addToFaction enclaveFaction 5 DLC03PrimeWalkFaceFireSpawnXMRK.enable ENDIF
IF stepBackTimer > 0 set stepBackTimer to stepBackTimer - getSecondsPassed
;// facefire A IF stepBackTimer < 19 && faceFireAOnce == 0 set faceFireAOnce to 1 fireWeapon libertyPrimeLaser fireWeapon libertyPrimeLaser ENDIF
;// facefire B IF stepBackTimer < 17 && facefireBOnce == 0 set faceFireBOnce to 1 fireWeapon libertyPrimeLaser fireWeapon libertyPrimeLaser
ENDIF
;// facefire C IF stepBackTimer < 15 && faceFireCOnce == 0 set faceFireCOnce to 1 fireWeapon libertyPrimeLaser fireWeapon libertyPrimeLaser
ENDIF
;// faceFireExplode throw guys IF stepBackTimer < 13 && faceFireExplode == 0 fireWeapon libertyPrimeLaser fireWeapon libertyPrimeLaser set faceFireExplode to 1 ENDIF
;//////////// ;// prime gives his get clear warning ( 02 - 16 seconds) ;//////////// IF stepBackTimer < 12 && primeTalkFirstWarning == 0 DLC03LibertyPrimeRef.SayTo DLC03LibertyPrimeRef DLC03BS1PrimeLines set primeTalkFirstWarning to 1 ENDIF
IF stepBackTimer < 6 && primeBraceOnce == 0 playIdle DLC03LibertyPrimePointBack
;// deal with the brotherhood set brotherhoodFollowersFlee to 1 DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSA.addToFaction EnclaveFaction 5 DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSA.addToFaction playerFaction 5 DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSA.removeScriptPackage DLC03PrimeWalkBoSFollowerPACKAGE DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSA.EVP DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSB.addToFaction EnclaveFaction 5 DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSB.addToFaction playerFaction 5 DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSB.removeScriptPackage DLC03PrimeWalkBoSFollowerPACKAGE DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSB.EVP DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSC.addToFaction EnclaveFaction 5 DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSC.addToFaction playerFaction 5 DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSC.removeScriptPackage DLC03PrimeWalkBoSFollowerPACKAGE DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSC.EVP DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSD.addToFaction EnclaveFaction 5 DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSD.addToFaction playerFaction 5 DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSD.removeScriptPackage DLC03PrimeWalkBoSFollowerPACKAGE DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSD.EVP
set primeBraceOnce to 1 ENDIF
ELSE setAV Variable01 10
ENDIF
ENDIF
;//************ ;//** the first strike has hit, call down the rest ;//************ IF getAV Variable01 == 10
IF orbitalStrikeTimerInit == 0 set orbitalStrikeTimerInit to 1 set orbitalStrikeTimer to 12 placeAtMe DLC03FXRelayStrikeParent01 1
;// kill the enclave DLC03PrimeWalkEnclaveFinalA.kill DLC03PrimeWalkEnclaveFinalB.kill DLC03PrimeWalkEnclaveFinalC.kill DLC03PrimeWalkEnclaveFinalD.kill ENDIF
IF orbitalStrikeTimer > 0 set orbitalStrikeTimer to orbitalStrikeTimer - getSecondsPassed
;// the first shot from the platform IF orbitalStrikeTimer < 5 &&strikeEOnce == 0 set strikeEOnce to 1 playIdle DLC03LibertyPrimeBrace DLC03OrbitalStrikeKillTriggerREF.enable
ENDIF
;// swap out the primes IF orbitalStrikeTimer < 3 && torsoEnable == 0 DLC03OrbitalStrikeKillTriggerREF.disable DLC03LibertyPrimeDebrisREF.enable DLC03LibertyPrimeTorsoREF.enable DLC03CraterPrimeExplosion0.placeAtMe DLC03OrbitalStrikeExplosion 1 set torsoEnable to 1 set DLC03PrimeTorsoTimerREF.trackVariable to 1 set DLC03BS1.DLC03PrimeDown to 1 DLC03LibertyPrimeREF.disable ENDIF
ELSE setAV variable01 11 DLC03OrbitalStrikeKillTriggerREF.disable ENDIF
ENDIF END

ScriptName DLC03BS1TristanTriggerScript
Begin OnTriggerEnter
if ( IsActionRef DLC03TristanRef == 1 ) Set DLC03BS1.DLC03TristanStep to ( DLC03BS1.DLC03TristanStep + 1 ) DLC03TristanRef.Say DLC03BS1TristanLines endif
if ( IsActionREF Player == 1 ) if ( DLC03BS1.DLC03TristanGreet == 0 ) Set DLC03BS1.DLC03TristanGreet to 1 DLC03TristanREF.EVP endif endif
End

scn DLC03AFBVertibirdBombingRun01SCRIPT
; This trigger enables it's linked ref (a vertibird) and calls its forward animation ; It also tells the vertibird when to fire its weapon
float timer float fireTimer short doOnce short firingFlag ;0 - not firing 1 - waiting to fire 2 - firing vertibirdgun 3 - firing fatman ref linkedRef
;*****************************************
Begin gameMode if linkedRef == 0 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef endif
if (doOnce == 1) if (linkedRef.HasLoaded3D != 0) linkedRef.playgroup Forward 1 set fireTimer to 1 set firingFlag to 1 set timer to 2.5 ;timer now becomes the master timer for the firing block set doOnce to 2 endif
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (linkedRef.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) linkedRef.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its forward animation set doOnce to 3 endif
if (timer <=0) set firingFlag to 0 else if (firingFlag == 1) if (fireTimer <=0) linkedRef.fireWeapon VertibirdBombGun set fireTimer to .5 set firingFlag to 2 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (firingFlag == 2) if (fireTimer <=0) linkedRef.fireWeapon VertibirdBombGun set fireTimer to .5 set firingFlag to 1 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed)
endif
endif
End
;***************************************** Begin onActivate if (doOnce == 0) linkedRef.enable 0 set timer to 1 set doOnce to 1 endif End

scn DLC03BoSEnclaveFight01SCRIPT
; This trigger enables BoS, Enclave soldiers and several vertibirds
float timer short doOnce short crashVertibird01 short missileFireFlag short battleFlag ; 0= end Fight 1=begin or continue Fight short BoS1Dead short BoS2Dead short BoS3Dead short Enclave1Dead short Enclave2Dead short Enclave3Dead
;*****************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) if (timer <= 0) DLC03AFBVertibirdBomber01REF.activate DLC03AFBVertibirdBomber01REF 1 set timer to 2 set doOnce to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (doOnce == 2) if (timer <= 0) DLC03AFBVertibirdBomber02REF.activate DLC03AFBVertibirdBomber02REF 1 set timer to 6 set doOnce to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (doOnce == 3) if (timer <= 0) DLC03AFBVertibirdStrafe01REF.activate DLC03AFBVertibirdStrafe01REF 1 set timer to 20 set missileFireFlag to 1 set doOnce to 4 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (doOnce == 4) ;handling the firing of missiles if ((timer <= 3) && (missileFireFlag == 1)) DLC03MissileSpawner01REF.fireWeapon DLC03WeapTeslaCannon set missileFireFlag to 2 elseif ((timer <= 2) && (missileFireFlag == 2)) DLC03MissileSpawner02REF.fireWeapon WeapMissileLauncher set missileFireFlag to 3 elseif ((timer <= 1) && (missileFireFlag == 3)) DLC03MissileSpawner03REF.fireWeapon DLC03WeapTeslaCannon set missileFireFlag to 0 endif
;handling the crashing vertibird if (crashVertibird01 == 0) if (timer <= 3) DLC03AFBVertibirdCrash01REF.activate DLC03AFBVertibirdCrash01REF 1 set crashVertibird01 to 1 endif endif
;handling the vertibird bomber if (timer <= 0) DLC03AFBVertibirdBomber03REF.activate DLC03AFBVertibirdBomber03REF 1 set timer to 20 set doOnce to 5 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 5) if (timer <= 0) DLC03AFBVertibirdStrafe02REF.activate DLC03AFBVertibirdStrafe02REF 1 DLC03AFBVertibirdStrafe03REF.activate DLC03AFBVertibirdStrafe03REF 1 set doOnce to 6 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
endif
End
;*****************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0) set timer to 5 set doOnce to 1 endif
if (battleFlag == 0) set battleFlag to 1 endif
;if the player leaves the trigger and then comes back, we want the fight to continue if (BoS1Dead == 1) DLC03AFBBoSGunFodder01SpawnREF.placeatme DLC03AFBBoSGunFodder01 1 set BoS1Dead to 0 endif
if (BoS2Dead == 1) DLC03AFBBoSGunFodder02SpawnREF.placeatme DLC03AFBBoSGunFodder02 1 set BoS2Dead to 0 endif
if (BoS3Dead == 1) DLC03AFBBoSGunFodder03SpawnREF.placeatme DLC03AFBBoSGunFodder03 1 set BoS3Dead to 0 endif
if (Enclave1Dead == 1) DLC03AFBEnclaveGunFodder01SpawnREF.placeatme DLC03AFBEnclaveGunFodder01 1 set Enclave1Dead to 0 endif
if (Enclave2Dead == 1) DLC03AFBEnclaveGunFodder02SpawnREF.placeatme DLC03AFBEnclaveGunFodder02 1 set Enclave2Dead to 0 endif
if (Enclave3Dead == 1) DLC03AFBEnclaveGunFodder03SpawnREF.placeatme DLC03AFBEnclaveGunFodder03 1 set Enclave3Dead to 0 endif
End
;*****************************************
Begin onTriggerLeave Player
if (battleFlag == 1) set battleFlag to 0 endif
End
;*****************************************

scn DLC03AFBBoSGunFodder03SCRIPT
;this script spawns in a new BoS soldier to take the spot of the dead one ;chance that a missile or minigun BoS will be spawned
short doOnce short spawner short cleanup float timer
;*****************************************************
Begin onDeath
if (DLC03AFBFight01TriggerREF.battleFlag == 1) set spawner to (1 + (0.06 * getRandomPercent)) set doOnce to 1 else set DLC03AFBFight01TriggerREF.BoS3Dead to 1 endif
set timer to 10 ;timer for corpse disabling set cleanup to 1 ;handles disabling of corpses
End
;*****************************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) if (spawner == 1) DLC03AFBBoSGunFodder03SpawnREF.placeatme DLC03AFBBoSMissileFodder03 1 elseif (spawner == 2) DLC03AFBBoSGunFodder03SpawnREF.placeatme DLC03AFBBoSMinigunFodder03 1 elseif (spawner == 3) DLC03AFBBoSGunFodder01SpawnREF.placeatme DLC03AFBBoSTeslaFodder03 1 else DLC03AFBBoSGunFodder03SpawnREF.placeatme DLC03AFBBoSGunFodder03 1 endif
set doOnce to 2 endif
if (cleanup == 1) if (timer <= 0) Disable ;corpse cleanup set cleanup to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
End
;*****************************************************
