scn DLC03AFBVertibirdLandingControlSCRIPT
; This trigger enables it's linked ref (a vertibird) and calls its forward animation
float timer short doOnce ref linkedRef ref vertibirdLinkedRef
short init
Begin onHitWith GenericVertibirdHitWithWeaponsList
linkedRef.do 100
End
;****************************************
Begin onActivate set doOnce to 1 End
;****************************************
Begin gameMode if init == 0 set init to 1 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef set vertibirdLinkedRef to linkedRef.getLinkedRef endif
if (doOnce == 1) linkedRef.enable 0 set timer to 1 set doOnce to 2
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (timer <= 0) if ( linkedRef.HasLoaded3D != 0 ) linkedRef.playgroup Forward 0 set doOnce to 3 endif else set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed endif
elseif (doOnce == 3) if (linkedRef.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) set timer to 3 ; 3 seconds while vertibird is on ground before it enables its xmarker set doOnce to 4 endif
elseif (doOnce == 4) if (timer <= 0) if (linkedRef.getDestroyed == 0) vertibirdLinkedRef.enable ;enables an xmarker whose children are the enclave lists set timer to 2 ; 2 seconds before vertibird will take off set doOnce to 5 else set doOnce to 7 endif
else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 5) if (timer <=0) if (linkedRef.getDestroyed == 0) linkedRef.playgroup backward 0 set doOnce to 6 else set doOnce to 7 endif else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (doOnce == 6) if (linkedRef.isAnimPlaying Backward == 0) && (getDestroyed == 0) linkedRef.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its backward animation set doOnce to 7 endif
endif
End

scn DLC03AFBVertibirdLandingSCRIPT
; This trigger just sets a variable flag on the control script if conditions are met. ; Used for the GenericVertibirdLandingControlSCRIPT
ref linkedRef short doOnce short init
;****************************************
Begin onLoad if (init == 0) set linkedRef to getLinkedRef set init to 1 endif End
;****************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player if (doOnce == 0) set linkedRef to getLinkedRef linkedRef.activate linkedRef 1 set doOnce to 1 endif
End
;*****************************************

scn DLC03VertibirdFlyover01SCRIPT
; This trigger enables three vertibirds and plays their forward animations
float timer short doOnce
;****************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0)
DLC03VertibirdEntrance01REF.enable 0 DLC03VertibirdEntrance02REF.enable 0 DLC03VertibirdEntrance03REF.enable 0
set timer to 1
set doOnce to 1 endif
End
;*****************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) if (timer <= 0) set DLC03VertibirdTakingOffControl01REF.doOnce to 4 ;tells the idle vertibird to take off DLC03VertibirdEntrance01REF.playgroup Forward 1 DLC03VertibirdEntrance02REF.playgroup Forward 1 DLC03VertibirdEntrance03REF.playgroup Forward 1 set doOnce to 2 else set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed endif
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (DLC03VertibirdEntrance01REF.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) DLC03VertibirdEntrance01REF.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its forward animation set doOnce to 3 endif elseif (doOnce == 3) if (DLC03VertibirdEntrance02REF.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) DLC03VertibirdEntrance02REF.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its forward animation set doOnce to 4 endif elseif (doOnce == 4) if (DLC03VertibirdEntrance03REF.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) DLC03VertibirdEntrance03REF.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its forward animation set doOnce to 5 endif endif
End

scn DLC03EncountersSCRIPT
short MegScene ; used to track progress of Megaton Scene ; set to 9 when combat starts ; set to 10 when one side is all dead
short MegDeadBOS short MegDeadSettlers short MegTalkToBOS ; set to 1 after talking to first BOS guy (used to conditionalize dialogue) short MegTalkToSettlers ; set to 1 after talking to first settler (used to conditionalize dialogue)
short TPScene ; used to track progress of Tenpenny scene
short FBScene ; used to track progress of Fort Bannister scene ; 1 = talked to player about attack ; 2 = start attack on exterior ; 3 = someone has reached the interior ; 4 = Jabsco dead short FBDeadBOS
short ENScene ; used to track progress of Evergreen Mills scene
short BTScene ; used to track progress of Big Town scene short BTDeadRC short BTDeadSlavers
short PPScene ; used to track progress of Project Purity scene short PPDeadRC ; how many caravaners have died
short ADScene ; used to track progress of Andale scene short ADDeadEnclave ; how many enclave guys are dead
begin gamemode ; trigger megaton scene if MegScene == 0 if DLC03EncountersMegatonMarker.GetDisabled == 0 if player.GetDistance DLC03EncounterMegSettler01REF < 1500 set MegScene to 1 DLC03EncounterMegSettler02REF.SayTo DLC03EncounterMegScavengerREF DLC03EncounterMegTopic endif endif endif
; trigger PP caravan scene if PPScene == 0 if player.GetDistance DLC03EncounterPPCBrotherhood1REF < 1500 set PPScene to 1 DLC03EncounterPPCBrotherhood1REF.SayTo DLC03EncounterPPCSecurity01REF DLC03EncounterPPCaravanTopic endif endif
end

scn DLC03EncounterMegDisableSCRIPT
short loadCount
begin OnDeath if getInFaction DLC03EncounterMegBOSFaction == 1 set DLC03Encounters.MegDeadBOS to DLC03Encounters.MegDeadBOS + 1 if DLC03Encounters.MegDeadBOS >= 2 set DLC03Encounters.MegScene to 10 endif elseif getInFaction DLC03EncounterMegSettlerFaction == 1 set DLC03Encounters.MegDeadSettlers to DLC03Encounters.MegDeadSettlers + 1 if DLC03Encounters.MegDeadSettlers >= 3 set DLC03Encounters.MegScene to 10 endif endif end
begin OnStartCombat ; if scene is interrupted, finish set DLC03Encounters.MegScene to 9 end
begin OnLoad set loadCount to loadCount + 1 if loadCount > 1 && DLC03Encounters.MegScene >= 9 DLC03EncountersMegatonMarker.disable endif end

scn DLC03EncounterTPBrotherhood01SCRIPT
begin OnLoad if DLC03Encounters.TPScene == 0 set DLC03Encounters.TPScene to 1 endif end

scn DLC03EncounterTPRaiderSCRIPT
begin OnStartCombat if getav variable01 == 0 Say Goodbye endif set DLC03Encounters.TPScene to 2 SetEnemy DLC03EncounterTPRaiderFaction DLC03EncounterBOSAllyFaction SetEnemy DLC03EncounterTPRaiderFaction PlayerFaction 1 0 end

scn DLC03FieldGlowSCRIPT ; ;
short fieldOff ref activateRef short init
Begin OnLoad if init == 0 Playgroup Forward 0 set init to 1 endif End
begin onActivate
;showWarning "Glow Activated" set activateRef to GetActionRef
if isActionRef player == 0 ; player can't get this activate if activateRef.GetDestructionStage >= 2 if fieldOff == 0 playgroup right 1 ;broken state endif else if fieldOff == 0 set fieldOff to 1 playgroup backward 1 ; fizzle out else set fieldOff to 0 playgroup forward 1 ; turn on placeatme FakeForce100r25 1 endif endif
endif
end

scn DLC03FieldImpactScript ref activateRef short fieldOff
;On hit cycles through different animations ; ;On Activate turns the field off and on ;if the terminal is destroyed, it will not turn back on. ;======================================================
begin onActivate
; showwarning "Impact Activated" set activateRef to getActionRef
if fieldOff == 0 set fieldOff to 1 disable else if activateRef.GetDestructionStage <= 1 set fieldOff to 0 enable endif endif
end
Begin OnHit
if IsAnimPlaying Right == 1 Playgroup Forward 0 Playsound OBJForceFieldImpact
elseif IsAnimPlaying Left == 1 Playgroup Right 0 Playsound OBJForceFieldImpact
elseif IsAnimPlaying Backward == 1 Playgroup Left 0 Playsound OBJForceFieldImpact
else Playgroup Backward 0 Playsound OBJForceFieldImpact
endif
End

scn DLC03NQlvlSCRIPT
int fieldDisarmSkillReq ;skill needed to use a panel to disable the force field int TRAPRadiationSkillReq ;skill needed to disarm radiation box, repair
;--------DLC03PresMetro-------- short botsFriendly ;If the bots in DLC03PresMetro are friendly to the player or not short playerHelped ;The player helped the robots short playerDidntHelp ;The player didn't help the robots short playerHarmed ;If the player fought with the robots after saying he'd help short powerFixed ;Gets set to 1 if the player fixes the metro power short killedAfterBreach ;Gets set to 1 if the player kills a robot after breaching security

scn DLC03FieldControllerSCRIPT
short detected ;check to see if the player has activated the trap. 1=activated, 0=not activated short button ;0 = don't disarm, 1 = disarm short doOnce short isDestroyed short fieldOff
ref self ref linkedRef ref activateref
short rewardXPOnce short XPForDisarm
;TODO: Currently the system doesn't fully take into account damaged state, particularly powering off and on. Perhaps it is best to not let a remote source ;power off and on a damaged panel ;========================================
begin onLoad set self to getSelf set linkedRef to getLinkedRef setStage DLC03NQlvl 1 end
;========================================
begin onActivate
set activateRef to getActionRef
if (IsActionRef player) || (activateRef.getIsID DLC03ForceFieldControlPanelDummy == 1)
if (activateRef.GetDestructionStage > 1) do 50 else if getDestructionStage <= 1 ;this is so the player can't mess with the control panel after it gets blown up. if fieldOff == 0 ShowMessage DLC03TrapFieldDisarmDetectMsg ;DLC03NQlvl.fieldDisarmSkillReq ;do you want to turn off the field? else ShowMessage DLC03TrapFieldArmDetectMsg DLC03NQlvl.fieldDisarmSkillReq ;do you want to turn on the field? endif set detected to 1; endif endif endif
if (activateRef.getIsID DLC03ForceFieldControlPanelDummy != 1) && (IsActionRef player != 1) if getDestroyed == 0 if fieldOff == 0 ;if field is off set fieldOff to 1 activate self ;ShowMessage DLC03FieldOffMSG ;field has been turned off linkedRef.disable ;showWarning "I've been turned off by non-player" else set fieldOff to 0 activate self ;ShowMessage DLC03FieldOnMSG ;field has been turned on linkedRef.enable endif endif endif
end
;============================================
begin onDestructionStageChange
set isDestroyed to 1
if fieldOff == 0 && GetDestructionStage == 3 activate self ; ShowWarning "Panel sending destruction signal" endif
end
;============================================
begin gameMode
if detected == 1 ;don't run stuff in game mode unless recently activated set button to getButtonPressed ;grab the button state, you don't know when this will be set if button > -1 ;if a valid response is received start doing stuff if button == 1 if fieldOff == 0 ;if field is off set fieldOff to 1 activate self ;ShowMessage DLC03FieldOffMSG ;field has been turned off linkedRef.disable else set fieldOff to 0 activate self ;ShowMessage DLC03FieldOnMSG ;field has been turned on linkedRef.enable endif
if rewardXPOnce == 0 if DLC03NQlvl.fieldDisarmSkillReq< getGS iLockLevelMaxVeryEasy set XPForDisarm to 0 elseif DLC03NQlvl.fieldDisarmSkillReq< getGS iLockLevelMaxEasy set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardVeryEasy elseif DLC03NQlvl.fieldDisarmSkillReq< getGS iLockLevelMaxAverage set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardEasy elseif DLC03NQlvl.fieldDisarmSkillReq< getGS iLockLevelMaxHard set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardAverage elseif DLC03NQlvl.fieldDisarmSkillReq< getGS iLockLevelMaxVeryHard set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardHard else set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardVeryHard endif
set rewardXPOnce to 1 rewardXP XPforDisarm endif endif if button == 2 do 50 do 30 playSound3D OBJMegatonBombTamperArm
if rewardXPOnce == 0 if 50< getGS iLockLevelMaxVeryEasy set XPForDisarm to 0 elseif 50< getGS iLockLevelMaxEasy set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardVeryEasy elseif 50< getGS iLockLevelMaxAverage set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardEasy elseif 50< getGS iLockLevelMaxHard set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardAverage elseif 50< getGS iLockLevelMaxVeryHard set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardHard else set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardVeryHard endif
set rewardXPOnce to 1 rewardXP XPforDisarm endif endif
if button == 3 do 50 do 50 do 20 endif
set detected to 0 ;stop running stuff endif endif
end

scn DLC03AFBVertibirdBombingRun02SCRIPT
; This trigger enables it's linked ref (a vertibird) and calls its forward animation ; It also tells the vertibird when to fire its weapon
float timer float fireTimer short doOnce short firingFlag ;0 - not firing 1 - waiting to fire 2 - firing vertibirdgun 3 - firing fatman ref linkedRef
;*****************************************
Begin gameMode if linkedRef == 0 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef endif
if (doOnce == 1) if (linkedRef.HasLoaded3D != 0) linkedRef.playgroup Forward 1 set fireTimer to 1 set firingFlag to 1 set timer to 3.5 ;timer now becomes the master timer for the firing block set doOnce to 2 endif
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (linkedRef.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) linkedRef.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its forward animation set doOnce to 3 endif
if (timer <=0) set firingFlag to 0 else if (firingFlag == 1) if (fireTimer <=0) linkedRef.fireWeapon vertibirdBombgun set fireTimer to .5 set firingFlag to 2 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (firingFlag == 2) if (fireTimer <=0) linkedRef.fireWeapon vertibirdBombgun set fireTimer to .5 set firingFlag to 1 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed)
endif
endif
End
;***************************************** Begin onActivate if (doOnce == 0) linkedRef.enable 0 set timer to 1 set doOnce to 1 endif End

scn DLC03AFBVertibirdCrash01SCRIPT
; This trigger enables it's linked ref (a vertibird) and calls its backward animation
float timer short doOnce ref linkedRef
;*****************************************
Begin gameMode if linkedRef == 0 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef endif
if (doOnce == 1) if (linkedRef.HasLoaded3D != 0) linkedRef.playgroup Backward 0 linkedRef.do 50 set timer to 5 set doOnce to 2 endif
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (linkedRef.isAnimPlaying Backward == 0) linkedRef.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its forward animation set doOnce to 3 elseif (timer <= 0) linkedRef.do 1000 set doOnce to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
endif
End
;***************************************** Begin onActivate if (doOnce == 0) linkedRef.enable 0 set timer to 1 set doOnce to 1 endif End

scn DLC03AFBVertibirdStrafing01SCRIPT
; This trigger enables it's linked ref (a vertibird) and calls its strafing animation ; It also tells the vertibird when to fire its weapon
float timer float fireTimer short doOnce short firingFlag ref linkedRef
;*****************************************
Begin gameMode if linkedRef == 0 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef endif
if (doOnce == 1) if (linkedRef.HasLoaded3D != 0) linkedRef.playgroup Forward 1 set fireTimer to .1 ;vertibird going to shoot for this long once in position set timer to 10 ;vertibird takes this long to get into position set doOnce to 2 endif
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (timer <=0) ;vertibird in position to start firing set timer to 2.5 ;vertibird is in position for this long before flying away set firingFlag to 1 set doOnce to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 3) if (linkedRef.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) linkedRef.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its forward animation set doOnce to 5 endif
if (timer <= 0) set doOnce to 4 else if (firingFlag == 1) if (fireTimer <=0) linkedRef.fireWeapon DLC03AFBVertibirdGun set fireTimer to .1 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 4) if (linkedRef.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) linkedRef.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its forward animation set doOnce to 5 endif
endif
End
;***************************************** Begin onActivate if (doOnce == 0) linkedRef.enable 0 set timer to 1 set doOnce to 1 endif End

End

scn DLC03EncounterFBBOSScript

scn DLC03TrapRadiationSCRIPT ; ;Functionality - starts open, remote activation will toggle it open and closed. ;Player skill pass will make it close or stay closed for good. ;Do not Enable Parent this trap. ;============================================
short skillPassed ;check to see if the player has activated the trap. 1=activated, 0=not activated short button ;0 = disarm, 1 = don't disarm short isOpen short isArmed short rewardXPOnce short XPForDisarm short init
ref lightRef ;second in the chain is the light. ref FXEmitRef ;first in the chain is the emitter ref ref FXRef ;third is the FX ref radRef ;fourth is the radiation marker ;========================================
begin onLoad
if init == 0 setStage DLC03NQlvl 1 set skillPassed to 0 set isArmed to 1 set isOpen to 0 set init to 1 ;daisy chain linked refs. set FXEmitRef to getlinkedref set lightRef to FXEmitRef.getlinkedref set FXRef to lightRef.getlinkedref set radRef to FXRef.getlinkedref
FXRef.disable FXEmitRef.playgroup backward 1 radRef.disable endif
end
;========================================
;========================================
begin onActivate
if isArmed == 1 if getActionRef == player if player.getAV repair >= DLC03NQlvl.TRAPRadiationSkillReq ;This var is set when the NQlvl stage is set to 1 ShowMessage DLC03TrapRadiationDetectMsg ;do you want to close the box forever? set skillPassed to 1; else ShowMessage TrapLowSkillRepairMsg DLC03NQlvl.TRAPRadiationSkillReq endif else if isOpen == 0 playgroup forward 1 ;open animation lightRef.playgroup forward 1 ;light on animation FXRef.enable ; FXEmitRef.playgroup forward 1 radRef.enable set isOpen to 1 else playgroup backward 1 lightRef.playgroup backward 1 ;light off animation FXRef.disable ; FXEmitRef.playgroup backward 1 radRef.disable set isOpen to 0 endif endIf endif
end
;============================================
begin gameMode
if skillPassed == 1 ;don't run stuff in game mode unless recently activated set button to getButtonPressed ;grab the button state, you don't know when this will be set if button > -1 ;if a valid response is received start doing stuff if button == 1 ShowMessage TrapDisarmMsg set isArmed to 0 ;disarm the trap
if isOpen == 1 playgroup backward 1 lightRef.playgroup backward 1 ;light off animation FXRef.disable ; FXEmitRef.playgroup backward 1 radRef.disable set isOpen to 0 endif
if rewardXPOnce == 0 if DLC03NQlvl.TRAPRadiationSkillReq< getGS iLockLevelMaxVeryEasy set XPForDisarm to 0 elseif DLC03NQlvl.TRAPRadiationSkillReq< getGS iLockLevelMaxEasy set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardVeryEasy elseif DLC03NQlvl.TRAPRadiationSkillReq< getGS iLockLevelMaxAverage set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardEasy elseif DLC03NQlvl.TRAPRadiationSkillReq< getGS iLockLevelMaxHard set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardAverage elseif DLC03NQlvl.TRAPRadiationSkillReq< getGS iLockLevelMaxVeryHard set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardHard else set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardVeryHard endif
set rewardXPOnce to 1 rewardXP XPforDisarm endif
endif set skillPassed to 0 ;stop running stuff endif endif
end

scn DLC03FXOrbitalStrikeScript
Short DoOnce
Begin OnLoad Set DoOnce to 0 imod DLC03OrbitIncomingISFX playgroup forward 0 End
Begin GameMode if DoOnce == 0 If isAnimPlaying Forward == 0 Placeatme DLC03OrbitalStrikeExplosion Playgroup Backward 0 Set DoOnce to 2 endif Elseif DoOnce == 2 If isAnimPlaying Backward == 0 Set DoOnce to 3 endif Elseif DoOnce == 3 Disable set DoOnce to 4 Elseif DoOnce == 4 MarkForDelete endif End

scn DLC03EncounterEMTriggerSCRIPT
short active ; set to 1 if encounter is enabled short triggered ; only trigger once
begin OnLoad ; only enable this encounter if Evergreen Mills is "active" -- use one of the respawning raiders as a proxy if EvergreenMillsRaiderCampfire01REF.GetDead == 0 && GetDisabled == 0 set active to 1 DLC03EncounterEMEnableMarker.enable endif
end
begin OnTriggerEnter player if triggered == 0 && active == 1 set triggered to 1 endif end

ScriptName DLC03CreatorQuestScript
short playerSleep short DLC03DeathClawControl short NukaCount short Quantums Short FEVaquaPuraCount Short NukaConverted Short DLC03MessageRan short ThirtyGood short ThirtyBad short ThirtyNeutral short PuppiesActive
float DLC03StartTimer
begin menumode ; player has the Deep Sleep perk and is sleeping if Player.HasPerk DLC03DeepSleep == 1 && IsPCSleeping == 1 set playerSleep to 2 endif
; player has the Puppies! perk If DogmeatRef.GetDead == 1 && Player.HasPerk DLC03Puppies If Player.GetDistance DogmeatRef > 8000 If PuppiesActive == 0 Set PuppiesActive to 1 DogmeatRef.SetActorFullName DLC03Freshmeat DogmeatREF.AddSpell DLC03PuppiesEffect EndIf DogmeatRef.Enable DogmeatRef.Resurrect DogmeatRef.AddToFaction FollowerFaction 0 Set Followers.PlayerHasFollower to 1 Set Followers.DogmeatHired to 1 Set DogmeatRef.Waiting to 1 Set DogmeatRef.IsFollowingDefault to 1 Set DogmeatRef.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set DogmeatRef.IsFollowingShort to 0 Set DogmeatRef.CombatStyleRanged to 0 Set DogmeatRef.CombatStyleMelee to 1 DogmeatRef.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleMelee DogmeatRef.SetPlayerTeammate 1 DogmeatRef.AddToFaction TeammateFaction 1 EndIf EndIf
end
begin gamemode
; if Enclave Radio ref has been enabled, it means the player is out of the vault, which means it's time to run the message box
if ( DLC03MessageRan == 0 ) if ( RadioEnclaveRef.GetDisabled == 0 )
Set DLC03MessageRan to 1 set DLC03StartTimer to 60 elseif ( GetStage MQ09 >= 60 ) Set DLC03MessageRan to 1 Set DLC03StartTimer to 60 endif elseif ( DLC03MessageRan == 1 ) if ( DLC03StartTimer <= 0 ) ShowMessage DLC03StartMessage Set DLC03MessageRan to 2 else set DLC03StartTimer to ( DLC03StartTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif
endif
if playerSleep == 2 ; player has actually slept in this bed ; give player Well-Rested spell and then clear variable player.CastImmediateOnSelf WellRestedSpell set playerSleep to 0 endif
; player has Quantum Chemist perk If Player.HasPerk DLC03QuantumChemist == 1 If Player.GetItemCount NukaCola > 9 Set NukaCount to Player.GetItemCount NukaCola Set Quantums to NukaCount / 10 Set NukaConverted to Quantums * 10 Player.RemoveItem NukaCola NukaConverted Player.AddItem MS05NukaColaQtm Quantums EndIf EndIf
;These are for the Level 30 Achievements
If ThirtyBad == 0 If Player.GetLevel >= 30 If Player.GetAv Karma < -250 AddAchievement 62 Set ThirtyGood to -1 Set ThirtyNeutral to -1 Set ThirtyBad to 1 endif endif endif
If ThirtyNeutral == 0 If Player.GetLevel >= 30 If Player.GetAv Karma >= -250 If Player.GetAv Karma <= 250 AddAchievement 63 Set ThirtyGood to -1 Set ThirtyNeutral to 1 Set ThirtyBad to -1 endif endif endif endif
If ThirtyGood == 0 If Player.GetLevel >= 30 If Player.GetAv Karma > 250 AddAchievement 64 Set ThirtyGood to 1 Set ThirtyNeutral to -1 Set ThirtyBad to -1 endif endif endif
end

scn DLC03PrimeTorsoSCRIPT
;// the tracking variable short trackVariable
;// the prime crawl timer short primeCrawlTimerInit float primeCrawlTimer short primeCrawlOnce short primeHeadPopOnce short headFadeIn
;// the new head short primeHeadEnable
short brotherhoodStopFlee
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;////////////////// ;// we've been hit, destroy prime, show the torso ;////////////////// IF trackVariable == 1
IF ( primeCrawlTimerInit == 0 ) set primeCrawlTimer to 20 DLC03PrimePiecesScatter.placeatme largeExplosion 1 set primeCrawlTimerInit to 1 ENDIF
IF ( primeCrawlTimer > 0 ) set primeCrawlTimer to primeCrawlTimer - getSecondsPassed
;// start prime crawling IF ( primeCrawlTimer < 19 && primeCrawlOnce == 0 ) set primeCrawlOnce to 1 DLC03LibertyPrimeTorsoREF.playgroup Backward 1
ENDIF
;// pop off the head IF ( primeCrawlTimer < 5 && primeHeadPopOnce == 0 ) DLC03LibertyPrimeTorsoREF.do 5000 DLC03LibertyPrimeTorsoREF.playgroup Forward 1 set primeHeadPopOnce to 1
ENDIF
IF ( primeCrawlTimer < 1 && headFadeIn == 0 ) DLC03PrimeHead.enable 1 set headFadeIn to 1
;// deal with the brotherhood set brotherhoodStopFlee to 1 DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSA.RemoveFromFaction EnclaveFaction DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSA.RemoveFromFaction playerFaction DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSA.removeScriptPackage DLC03PrimeWalkBoSFollowerStayAtLocPACKAGE DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSA.EVP DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSB.RemoveFromFaction EnclaveFaction DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSB.RemoveFromFaction playerFaction DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSB.removeScriptPackage DLC03PrimeWalkBoSFollowerStayAtLocPACKAGE DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSB.EVP DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSC.RemoveFromFaction EnclaveFaction DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSC.RemoveFromFaction playerFaction DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSC.removeScriptPackage DLC03PrimeWalkBoSFollowerStayAtLocPACKAGE DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSC.EVP DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSD.RemoveFromFaction EnclaveFaction DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSD.RemoveFromFaction playerFaction DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSD.removeScriptPackage DLC03PrimeWalkBoSFollowerStayAtLocPACKAGE DLC03PrimeFollowerBOSD.EVP
ENDIF
ELSE DLC03LibertyPrimeTorsoREF.playgroup left 1 set trackVariable to 2 ; Set DLC03BS1.DLC03TristanFollow to -1 ; DLC03TristanRef.EVP
;// unlock the door and let the player in the relay DLC03ExteriortoDLC03Relay01REF.unlock
ENDIF
ENDIF
END

scn DLC03AFBVertibirdStrafing02SCRIPT
; This trigger enables it's linked ref (a vertibird) and calls its strafing animation ; It also tells the vertibird when to fire its weapon
float timer float fireTimer short doOnce short firingFlag ref linkedRef
;*****************************************
Begin gameMode if linkedRef == 0 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef endif
if (doOnce == 1) if (linkedRef.HasLoaded3D != 0) linkedRef.playgroup Forward 1 set fireTimer to .5 ;vertibird going to shoot for this long once in position set timer to 12 ;vertibird takes this long to get into hovering position set doOnce to 2 endif
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (linkedRef.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) linkedRef.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its forward animation set doOnce to 4 endif
if (timer <=0) ;vertibird in position to start firing set timer to 4 ;vertibird hovers for this long before flying away set firingFlag to 1 set doOnce to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 3) if (timer <= 0) set doOnce to 4 else if (firingFlag == 1) if (fireTimer <=0) linkedRef.fireWeapon DLC03VertibirdMissileLauncher set fireTimer to .5 set firingFlag to 2 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (firingFlag == 2) if (fireTimer <=0) linkedRef.fireWeapon DLC03VertibirdMissileLauncher set fireTimer to .5 set firingFlag to 1 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed)
endif
endif
End
;***************************************** Begin onActivate if (doOnce == 0) linkedRef.enable 0 set timer to 1 set doOnce to 1 endif End

scn DLC03GenericVertibirdTakingOffControlSCRIPT
; This trigger enables it's linked ref (a vertibird) and calls its forward animation
float timer short doOnce ref linkedRef short init
;****************************************
Begin onHitWith GenericVertibirdHitWithWeaponsList
linkedRef.do 100
End
;****************************************
Begin onActivate set doOnce to 1 End
;****************************************
Begin gameMode if init == 0 set init to 1 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef endif
if (doOnce == 1) linkedRef.enable 0 set timer to .5 set doOnce to 2
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (timer <= 0) if ( linkedRef.HasLoaded3D != 0 ) linkedRef.playgroup Forward 0 set timer to .5 set doOnce to 3 endif else set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed endif
elseif (doOnce == 3) if (timer <= 0) linkedRef.playgroup Left 0 set timer to 5 set doOnce to 6 ;doOnce is set to 4 in another trigger else set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed endif
elseif (doOnce == 4) if (timer <= 0) if (linkedRef.getDestroyed == 0) linkedRef.playgroup backward 0 set doOnce to 5 else set doOnce to 6 endif else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 5) if (linkedRef.isAnimPlaying Backward == 0) && (linkedRef.getDestroyed == 0) linkedRef.disable set doOnce to 6 elseif (linkedRef.getDestroyed == 1) set doOnce to 6 endif endif
End
;****************************************

scn DLC03PresMetroRide01AnimSCRIPT
short doOnce short handleFollowers short charonIsFollower short butchIsFollower short cloverIsFollower short dogmeatIsFollower short jerichoIsFollower short fawkesIsFollower short rl3IsFollower short crossIsFollower short autosaveReady
ref actionRef float timer
;********************************************************
Begin onActivate
set actionRef to getActionRef
if (actionRef == Player) disablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1
;Alan added this to handle the Quest Target Set DLC03BS3.BS3QTFlip to 1
DLC03PresMetro02Console01REF.playgroup forward 1 set timer to 1 set doOnce to 1 endif
End
;********************************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) if (timer <= 0) DLC03PresMetro02TrainPopREF.enable DLC03PresMetro02ElectricLight01REF.enable 0 DLC03PresMetro02Rumble01REF.placeatme DLC03VertibirdRumble 1 playsound OBJMetroRide2D set doOnce to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPasseD) endif
elseif (doOnce == 2) ;disablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 imod DLC03MetroFadeInFromWhiteISFX02 set handleFollowers to 1 set timer to 1 set doOnce to 3
elseif (doOnce == 3) if (timer <= 0) player.moveto DLC03PresMetroRideStart01REF player.additem DLC03MetroCarArmor 1 1 player.equipitem DLC03MetroCarArmor 1 1 DLC03PresMetroRideCab01REF.disable DLC03PresMetro02Console01REF.disable player.dispel stealthboy set timer to .5 set doOnce to 4 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 4) if (timer <= 0) player.addscriptpackage DLC03MetroCameraPackage set timer to 18 set doOnce to 5 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 5) if (timer <= 0) imod DLC03FadeToBlackISFX set timer to 3 set doOnce to 6 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 6) if (timer <= 0) player.removeitem DLC03MetroCarArmor 1 1 player.removescriptpackage DLC03MetroCameraPackage set timer to 1 set doOnce to 7 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 7) if (timer <= 0) set doOnce to 0 set handleFollowers to 0
set charonIsFollower to 0 set butchIsFollower to 0 set cloverIsFollower to 0 set dogmeatIsFollower to 0 set jerichoIsFollower to 0 set fawkesIsFollower to 0 set rl3IsFollower to 0 set crossIsFollower to 0
set DLC03MetroSwitch02REF.autosaveReady to 1 DLC03PresMetroRideCab01REF.enable DLC03PresMetro02Console01REF.enable DLC03PresMetro02ElectricLight01REF.disable 0 enablePlayerControls player.moveto DLC03PresMetroRideEnd02REF else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
;now handle any followers if (handleFollowers == 1) if ( Followers.CharonHired == 1 ) && (CharonREF.Waiting == 0) CharonRef.Moveto DLC03PresMetro03Follower01Marker set charonIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.ButchHired == 1 ) && (ButchREF.Waiting == 0) ButchREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro03Follower01Marker set butchIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.CloverHired == 1 ) && (CloverREF.Waiting == 0) CloverREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro03Follower01Marker set cloverIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.DogmeatHired == 1 ) && (DogmeatREF.Waiting == 0) DogmeatREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro03Follower01Marker set dogmeatIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.JerichoHired == 1 ) && (JerichoREF.Waiting == 0) JerichoREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro03Follower01Marker set jerichoIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.FawkesHired == 1 ) && (MQ08FawkesREF.Waiting == 0) MQ08FawkesREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro03Follower01Marker set fawkesIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.RL3Hired == 1 ) && (RL3REF.Waiting == 0) RL3REF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro03Follower01Marker set rl3IsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.StarPaladinCrossHired == 1 ) && (StarPaladinCrossREF.Waiting == 0) StarPaladinCrossREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro03Follower01Marker set crossIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 endif elseif (handleFollowers == 2) if ( Followers.CharonHired == 1 ) && (CharonREF.Waiting == 0) && (charonIsFollower == 0) CharonRef.Moveto DLC03PresMetro03Follower02Marker set handleFollowers to 3 elseif ( Followers.ButchHired == 1 ) && (ButchREF.Waiting == 0) && (butchIsFollower == 0) ButchREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro03Follower02Marker set handleFollowers to 3 elseif ( Followers.CloverHired == 1 ) && (CloverREF.Waiting == 0) && (cloverIsFollower == 0) CloverREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro03Follower02Marker set handleFollowers to 3 elseif ( Followers.DogmeatHired == 1 ) && (DogmeatREF.Waiting == 0) && (dogmeatIsFollower == 0) DogmeatREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro03Follower02Marker set handleFollowers to 3 elseif ( Followers.JerichoHired == 1 ) && (JerichoREF.Waiting == 0) && (jerichoIsFollower == 0) JerichoREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro03Follower02Marker set handleFollowers to 3 elseif ( Followers.FawkesHired == 1 ) && (MQ08FawkesREF.Waiting == 0) && (fawkesIsFollower == 0) MQ08FawkesREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro03Follower02Marker set handleFollowers to 3 elseif ( Followers.RL3Hired == 1 ) && (RL3REF.Waiting == 0) && (rl3IsFollower == 0) RL3REF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro03Follower02Marker set handleFollowers to 3 elseif ( Followers.StarPaladinCrossHired == 1 ) && (StarPaladinCrossREF.Waiting == 0) && (crossIsFollower == 0) StarPaladinCrossREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro03Follower02Marker set handleFollowers to 3 endif endif
End
;********************************************************

scn DLC03FXRelayStrikeParentScript

Elseif DoOnce == 10 Disable set DoOnce to 11 Elseif DoOnce == 11 MarkForDelete endif
if Timer >= 0 set Timer to (Timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif End

scn testPhilCLightningVol1SCRIPT
ref triggerActor short triggerScriptOnce
;// disable timer short disableTimerInit float disableTimer
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;////////// ;// if we're active but havent hit a vertibird yet, wait a few seconds then disable ;////////// IF getDisabled == 0 IF disableTimerInit == 0 set disableTimer to 3 set disableTimerInit to 1
ENDIF
;// the cleanup timer, if we're around for X seconds without being triggered, disable IF disableTimer > 0 set disableTimer to disableTimer - getSecondsPassed ELSE disable fireWeapon weapLaserPistol triggerActor.setAV detectLifeRange 0 ENDIF ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER
;// store who triggered us set triggerActor to getActionRef
;// if its in the vertibird list, blow it up! IF triggerScriptOnce == 0 triggerActor.setAV detectLifeRange 1 placeatMe testPhilCLightningVol2 1
;// turn us to face the target! set triggerScriptOnce to 1 placeAtMe trapGasFire01 1
ENDIF
END

scn testPhilCLightningVol2SCRIPT
ref triggerActor ref myRef short disableTimerInit float disableTimer
short triggerScriptOnce
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;////////// ;// if we're active but havent hit a vertibird yet, wait a few seconds then disable ;////////// IF getDisabled == 0 IF disableTimerInit == 0 set disableTimer to 3 set disableTimerInit to 1
ENDIF
;// the cleanup timer, if we're around for X seconds without being triggered, disable IF disableTimer > 0 set disableTimer to disableTimer - getSecondsPassed ELSE disable ENDIF
ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER
;// store who triggered us set triggerActor to getActionRef set myRef to getSelf
;// if its in the vertibird list, blow it up! IF triggerActor.getAV detectLifeRange == 0 && triggerScriptOnce == 0 set triggerScriptOnce to 1 triggerActor.setAV detectLifeRange 1 placeatMe testPhilCLightningVol2 1 placeAtMe TrapGasFire01
ENDIF
END

scn DLC03ElectricBoxBarrierSCRIPT
short doAOnce short doBOnce
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF doAOnce == 0 IF DLC03ElectricBoxBarrierRef0.getDestroyed == 1
;// make the turrets not responsive DLC03PrimeWalkTowerATurretA.setUnconscious 1 DLC03PrimeWalkTowerATurretA.pms pulseDisableFXShader DLC03PrimeWalkTowerATurretB.setUnconscious 1 DLC03PrimeWalkTowerATurretB.pms pulseDisableFXShader DLC03PrimeWalkTowerATurretC.setUnconscious 1 DLC03PrimeWalkTowerATurretC.pms pulseDisableFXShader
;// kill the fields DLC03PrimeWalkField0A.playgroup backward 1 DLC03PrimeWalkImpact0A.disable DLC03PrimeWalkField0B.playgroup backward 1 DLC03PrimeWalkImpact0B.disable DLC03PrimeWalkField0ACollision.disable
;// only do once set doAOnce to 1
ENDIF ENDIF
IF doBOnce == 0 IF DLC03ElectricBoxBarrierRef1.getDestroyed == 1
;// kill the fields DLC03PrimeWalkField1A.playgroup backward 1 DLC03PrimeWalkImpact1A.disable DLC03PrimeWalkField1B.playgroup backward 1 DLC03PrimeWalkImpact1B.disable DLC03PrimeWalkField1Collision.disable DLC03SatRelayVertibirdWave1B.enable 0
;// only do once set doBOnce to 1
ENDIF ENDIF
END
scn DLC03WQScribeScript

scn DLC03WQScript
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ;Water Distribution HQ Scribes variables
;See DLC03WQScibesScript for more details -- these are used to get scribes to cue up in line outside Bigsley's office
;To which xMarker is the first scribe in cue to see Bigsley currently headed? short cueLeaderDestination short lastDestination ;essentially, how many xMarkers are there in the "circuit" the scribes make. This is used to determine when the leader has "wrapped around" to the back of the line ;The "back of the line" starts at 1, the front of the line at Bigsley's desk == LastDestination
short startDestination ;should be one less than the final destination, since the final destination is in front of Bigsley
;CUE VARIABLES OBSOLETE??? ;Holds references to each scribe and determines their "order" in the cue ref cueSlot0Ref ;which scribe is in the leader position ref cueSlot1Ref ;which scribe is in the second in line position ref cueSlot2Ref ;etc. ref cueSlot3Ref
short convStage short convNum
short whichScribeTalksNow
short BigsleyAnnoyed -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
short FEV ;did the player spike the water? Set in DLC03WQFunctions stage zero, based on MQA Stage 100 being set
short warDone ;War with the Enclave is finished (used to conditionalize dialog about it in the water quests)
short init
Begin GameMode
if init == 0
set whichScribeTalksNow to 1 set lastDestination to 7 set startDestination to lastDestination - 1 set cueLeaderDestination to startDestination
set init to 1
endif
if warDone == 0 if DLC03CitadelBoom == 1 || DLC03PlatformBoom == 1 set warDone to 1
endif
endif
End

scn DLC03CrDeathclawEnclaveCageSCRIPT
float timer short doOnce ref Link short Setup
;****************************************
Begin onPackageEnd DeathclawCAGE01a ;set timer to 20 ;give the Deathclaw enough time to finish his cageExit animation set doOnce to 1
End
;****************************************
Begin onPackageEnd DeathclawCAGE01b
;set timer to 8 ;give the Deathclaw enough time to finish his clawScrape animation set doOnce to 2
End
;****************************************
Begin gameMode
if ( Setup == 0 ) set Link to GetLinkedRef set Setup to 1 endif
if (doOnce == 1) ;if (isLastIdlePlayed DCageExit == 0) if (isIdlePlaying == 0) ;set timer to 20 ;give the Deathclaw enough time to finish his cageExit animation setav variable01 3 evp set doOnce to 3 endif
;if (timer <= 0) ;setav variable01 2 ;evp ;set doOnce to 3 ;else ;set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed ;endif endif
if (doOnce == 2) ;if (isLastIdlePlayed DClawScrape == 0) if (isIdlePlaying == 0) setav variable01 3 evp set doOnce to 3 endif
;if (timer <= 0) ; setav variable01 3 ; evp ; set doOnce to 3 ;else ; set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed ;endif endif
if ( DoOnce == 3 ) setav variable01 4 set DoOnce to 4 endif
if ( DLC03BS2.DLC03DeathclawControl == 1 ) if ( Setup == 1 ) if ( GetDistance Link > 1000 ) kill endif endif endif
endif
End
;***************

scn DLC03DeathclawPenDoor01SCRIPT
short doOnce ref actionRef
;****************************
Begin onActivate
set actionRef to getActionRef
if (actionRef == Player) activate endif
if (doOnce == 1) activate ;door has been unlocked endif
End
;****************************
Begin gameMode
; if the door is open, then remove factions from deathclaws so they become hostile ; if the door is closed, then check to see if deathclaws are inside the pen or not and change their facitons accordingly
if (getOpenState == 1) DLC03AFBDeathclaw01REF.removeFromFaction EnclaveFaction DLC03AFBDeathclaw01REF.removeFromFaction PlayerFaction ;DLC03AFBDeathclaw02REF.removeFromFaction EnclaveFaction ;DLC03AFBDeathclaw02REF.removeFromFaction PlayerFaction set doOnce to 1 endif
if (getOpenState == 3) if (DLC03DeathclawInPen01TriggerREF.deathclaw01NotInPen != 1) ;deathclaw is still in cage DLC03AFBDeathclaw01REF.stopcombat DLC03AFBDeathclaw01REF.addToFaction EnclaveFaction 1 DLC03AFBDeathclaw01REF.addToFaction PlayerFaction 1 endif
;if (DLC03DeathclawInPen01TriggerREF.deathclaw02NotInPen != 1) ;deathclaw is still in cage ;DLC03AFBDeathclaw02REF.stopcombat ;DLC03AFBDeathclaw02REF.addToFaction EnclaveFaction 1 ;DLC03AFBDeathclaw02REF.addToFaction PlayerFaction 1 ;endif endif
End

float timer short doOnce
;****************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player if (doOnce == 0) DLC03VertibirdTakingOffControl02REF.activate DLC03VertibirdTakingOffControl02REF 1 DLC03VertibirdTakingOffControl03REF.activate DLC03VertibirdTakingOffControl03REF 1 DLC03AFBEncBoard01REf.enable 0 ;DLC03AFBEncBoard02REf.enable 0 DLC03AFBEncBoard03REF.enable 0 DLC03AFBEncBoard04REF.enable 0 DLC03AFBSector2EnablerREF.enable 0 set timer to 3 set doOnce to 1 endif

scn DLC03BosEnclaveFight01bTriggerSCRIPT
short doOnce short vertibird01Destroyed short vertibird02Destroyed float timer
;**************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0) set doOnce to 1 endif
End
;**************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) ;tell first two enclave to run to vertibird DLC03AFBEncBoard01REf.setav variable01 1 DLC03AFBEncBoard01REf.evp
;DLC03AFBEncBoard02REf.setav variable01 1 ;DLC03AFBEncBoard02REf.evp
set timer to 4 set doOnce to 2
elseif (doOnce == 2) ;tell second two enclave to run to vertibird if (timer <= 0) DLC03AFBEncBoard03REF.setav variable01 1 DLC03AFBEncBoard03REF.evp
DLC03AFBEncBoard04REF.setav variable01 1 DLC03AFBEncBoard04REF.evp set timer to 15 set doOnce to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 3) if (timer <= 0) set DLC03VertibirdTakingOffControl02REF.doOnce to 4 ;tells first vertibird to take off set timer to 8 set doOnce to 4 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 4) if (timer <= 0) set DLC03VertibirdTakingOffControl03REF.doOnce to 4 ;tells second vertibird to take off set timer to 2 set doOnce to 5 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 5) if (timer <= 0 ) DLC03AFBEncBoard01REf.setav variable01 0 DLC03AFBEncBoard01REf.evp
;DLC03AFBEncBoard02REf.setav variable01 0 ;DLC03AFBEncBoard02REf.evp
DLC03AFBEncBoard03REF.setav variable01 0 DLC03AFBEncBoard03REF.evp
DLC03AFBEncBoard04REF.setav variable01 0 DLC03AFBEncBoard04REF.evp
set doOnce to 6 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
;check to see if either vertibird is destroyed and if so change packages on appropriate enclave soldiers if (vertibird01Destroyed == 0) if (DLC03AFBVertibirdBoard01REF.getDestroyed == 1) DLC03AFBEncBoard01REf.setav variable01 0 DLC03AFBEncBoard01REf.evp
;DLC03AFBEncBoard02REf.setav variable01 0 ;DLC03AFBEncBoard02REf.evp
set vertibird01Destroyed to 1 endif endif
if (vertibird02Destroyed == 0) if (DLC03AFBVertibirdBoard02REF.getDestroyed == 1) DLC03AFBEncBoard03REF.setav variable01 0 DLC03AFBEncBoard03REF.evp
DLC03AFBEncBoard04REF.setav variable01 0 DLC03AFBEncBoard04REF.evp set vertibird02Destroyed to 1 endif endif
End
;**************************************

scn DLC03SplitJackScript
short playerHitCount short anyoneHitCount
short duelWeapHitCount short anyWeapHitCount
short AllowCheatCount ;in case we decide to allow the player to accidentally hit him with something else, this will be the amount of times we allow that
Begin OnLoad
set AllowCheatCount to 0
if DLC03WQ01.gangLeave == 1 disable endif
End
Begin OnHit player if DLC03WQ01.duel >= 1 set playerHitCount to playerHitCount + 1 endif End
Begin OnHit if DLC03WQ01.duel >= 1 set anyoneHitCount to anyoneHitCount + 1 if playerHitCount > (anyoneHitCount + AllowCheatCount) || playerHitCount < (anyoneHitCount - AllowCheatCount) ;if the two blocks have run different amounts of times compared to each other then we can safely assume it is not the same event triggering these blocks
setStage DLC03WQ01 12 ;player broke rules to the duel endif endif End
Begin OnHitWith WeapKnifeCombat if DLC03WQ01.duel >= 1 && DLC03WQ01.duelType == 1 set duelWeapHitCount to duelWeapHitCount + 1 endif End
Begin OnHitWith WeapLeadPipe if DLC03WQ01.duel >= 1 && DLC03WQ01.duelType == 2 set duelWeapHitCount to duelWeapHitCount + 1 endif End
Begin OnHitWith WeapNailBoard if DLC03WQ01.duel >= 1 && DLC03WQ01.duelType == 3 set duelWeapHitCount to duelWeapHitCount + 1 endif End
Begin OnHitWith if DLC03WQ01.duel >= 1 set anyWeapHitCount to anyWeapHitCount + 1
if duelWeapHitCount > ( anyWeapHitCount + AllowCheatCount ) || duelWeapHitCount < ( anyWeapHitCount - AllowCheatCount ) ;if the two blocks have run different amounts of times compared to each other then we can safely assume it is not the same event triggering these blocks setStage DLC03WQ01 12 ;player broke rules to the duel endif
endif
End
Begin OnDeath
setstage DLC03WQ01 100
if DLC03WQ01.duel >= 1 && DLC03WQ01.brokeRules == 0 setStage DLC03WQ01 13 ;player won duel
endif
End

scn DLC03AFBVertibirdStrafing03SCRIPT
; This trigger enables it's linked ref (a vertibird) and calls its strafing animation ; It also tells the vertibird when to fire its weapon
float timer float fireTimer short doOnce short firingFlag ref linkedRef
;*****************************************
Begin gameMode if linkedRef == 0 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef endif
if (doOnce == 1) if (linkedRef.HasLoaded3D != 0) linkedRef.playgroup Forward 1 set timer to 7 set doOnce to 2 endif
elseif (doOnce ==2) if (timer <= 0) set firingFlag to 1 set fireTimer to .1 ;vertibird going to shoot lasers for this long set timer to 2.5 ;vertibird is laser shooting position for this long set doOnce to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 3) if (timer <=0) ;vertibird in position to start firing laser set timer to 2 ;vertibird takes this long to get into hovering position set doOnce to 4 else if (firingFlag == 1) if (fireTimer <= 0) linkedRef.fireWeapon DLC03AFBVertibirdGun set fireTimer to .1 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed)
endif
elseif (doOnce == 4) if (timer <= 0) set fireTimer to .5 ;vertibird going to shoot for this long once in position set timer to 2 ;vertibird is hovering for this long before flying away set doOnce to 5 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 5) if (timer <= 0) set doOnce to 6 else if (firingFlag == 1) if (fireTimer <= 0) linkedRef.fireWeapon DLC03VertibirdMissileLauncher set fireTimer to .5 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed)
endif
elseif (doOnce == 6) if (linkedRef.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) linkedRef.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its forward animation set doOnce to 7 endif endif
End
;***************************************** Begin onActivate if (doOnce == 0) linkedRef.enable 0 set timer to 1 set doOnce to 1 endif End

scn DLC03PresMetroRide02AnimSCRIPT
short doOnce short handleFollowers short charonIsFollower short butchIsFollower short cloverIsFollower short dogmeatIsFollower short jerichoIsFollower short fawkesIsFollower short rl3IsFollower short crossIsFollower short autosaveReady
ref actionRef float timer
;********************************************************
Begin onActivate
set actionRef to getActionRef
if (actionRef == Player) disablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1
;Alan added this to handle Quest Target flip Set DLC03BS3.BS3QTFlip to 0
DLC03PresMetro03Console01REF.playgroup forward 1 set timer to 1 set doOnce to 1 endif
End
;********************************************************
Begin gameMode if (doOnce == 1) if (timer <= 0) DLC03PresMetro02TrainPopREF.enable DLC03PresMetro03ElectricLight01REF.enable 0 DLC03PresMetro03Rumble01REF.placeatme DLC03VertibirdRumble 1 playsound OBJMetroRide2D set doOnce to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 2) ;disablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 imod DLC03MetroFadeInFromWhiteISFX02 set handleFollowers to 1 set timer to 1 set doOnce to 3
elseif (doOnce == 3) if (timer <= 0) player.moveto DLC03PresMetroRideStart02REF player.additem DLC03MetroCarArmor 1 1 player.equipitem DLC03MetroCarArmor 1 1 DLC03PresMetroRideCab03REF.disable DLC03PresMetro03Console01REF.disable player.dispel stealthboy set timer to .5 set doOnce to 4 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 4) if (timer <= 0) player.addscriptpackage DLC03MetroCameraPackage set timer to 18 set doOnce to 5 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 5) if (timer <= 0) imod DLC03FadeToBlackISFX set timer to 3 set doOnce to 6 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 6) if (timer <= 0) player.removeitem DLC03MetroCarArmor 1 1 player.removescriptpackage DLC03MetroCameraPackage set timer to 1 set doOnce to 7 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 7) if (timer <= 0) set doOnce to 0 set handleFollowers to 0
set charonIsFollower to 0 set butchIsFollower to 0 set cloverIsFollower to 0 set dogmeatIsFollower to 0 set jerichoIsFollower to 0 set fawkesIsFollower to 0 set rl3IsFollower to 0 set crossIsFollower to 0
set DLC03MetroSwitch01REF.autosaveReady to 1 DLC03PresMetroRideCab03REF.enable DLC03PresMetro03Console01REF.enable DLC03PresMetro03ElectricLight01REF.disable 0 enablePlayerControls player.moveto DLC03PresMetroRideEnd01REF else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
;now handle any followers if (handleFollowers == 1) if ( Followers.CharonHired == 1 ) && (CharonREF.Waiting == 0) CharonRef.Moveto DLC03PresMetro02Follower01Marker set charonIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.ButchHired == 1 ) && (ButchREF.Waiting == 0) ButchREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro02Follower01Marker set butchIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.CloverHired == 1 ) && (CloverREF.Waiting == 0) CloverREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro02Follower01Marker set cloverIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.DogmeatHired == 1 ) && (DogmeatREF.Waiting == 0) DogmeatREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro02Follower01Marker set dogmeatIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.JerichoHired == 1 ) && (JerichoREF.Waiting == 0) JerichoREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro02Follower01Marker set jerichoIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.FawkesHired == 1 ) && (MQ08FawkesREF.Waiting == 0) MQ08FawkesREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro02Follower01Marker set fawkesIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.RL3Hired == 1 ) && (RL3REF.Waiting == 0) RL3REF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro02Follower01Marker set rl3IsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.StarPaladinCrossHired == 1 ) && (StarPaladinCrossREF.Waiting == 0) StarPaladinCrossREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro02Follower01Marker set crossIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 endif elseif (handleFollowers == 2) if ( Followers.CharonHired == 1 ) && (CharonREF.Waiting == 0) && (charonIsFollower == 0) CharonRef.Moveto DLC03PresMetro02Follower02Marker set handleFollowers to 3 elseif ( Followers.ButchHired == 1 ) && (ButchREF.Waiting == 0) && (butchIsFollower == 0) ButchREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro02Follower02Marker set handleFollowers to 3 elseif ( Followers.CloverHired == 1 ) && (CloverREF.Waiting == 0) && (cloverIsFollower == 0) CloverREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro02Follower02Marker set handleFollowers to 3 elseif ( Followers.DogmeatHired == 1 ) && (DogmeatREF.Waiting == 0) && (dogmeatIsFollower == 0) DogmeatREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro02Follower02Marker set handleFollowers to 3 elseif ( Followers.JerichoHired == 1 ) && (JerichoREF.Waiting == 0) && (jerichoIsFollower == 0) JerichoREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro02Follower02Marker set handleFollowers to 3 elseif ( Followers.FawkesHired == 1 ) && (MQ08FawkesREF.Waiting == 0) && (fawkesIsFollower == 0) MQ08FawkesREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro02Follower02Marker set handleFollowers to 3 elseif ( Followers.RL3Hired == 1 ) && (RL3REF.Waiting == 0) && (rl3IsFollower == 0) RL3REF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro02Follower02Marker set handleFollowers to 3 elseif ( Followers.StarPaladinCrossHired == 1 ) && (StarPaladinCrossREF.Waiting == 0) && (crossIsFollower == 0) StarPaladinCrossREF.Moveto DLC03PresMetro02Follower02Marker set handleFollowers to 3 endif endif
End
;********************************************************

scn DLC03PowerworksTurretHallSCRIPT
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER PLAYER
IF DLC03PowerworksMain.turretHallOnline == 0 set DLC03PowerworksMain.turretHallOnline to 1 ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;/////////////////// ;// when we're turned on, start up the system ;/////////////////// IF ( DLC03PowerworksMain.turretHallOnline == 1 ) ;// enable the turrets DLC03PowerworksTurretHallTurretA.enable DLC03PowerworksTurretHallTurretB.enable
;// close and lock the doors DLC03PowerworksTurretHallDoorA.setOpenState 0 DLC03PowerworksTurretHallDoorA.lock 75
DLC03PowerworksTurretHallDoorB.setOpenState 0 DLC03PowerworksTurretHallDoorB.lock 75
DLC03PowerworksTurretHallDoorC.setOpenState 1 DLC03PowerworksTurretHallDoorC.unlock
;// start the klaxs DLC03PowerworksTurretHallKlaxonA.playgroup left 1 DLC03PowerworksTurretHallKlaxonB.playgroup left 1 DLC03PowerworksTurretHallKlaxonC.playgroup left 1 DLC03PowerworksTurretHallKlaxonSwitch.playgroup left 1
;// only do it once set DLC03PowerworksMain.turretHallOnline to 2
ENDIF
;/////////////////// ;// when we're turned off, shut it all down ;/////////////////// IF DLC03PowerworksMain.turretHallOnline == 3 ;// unlock and open the doors DLC03PowerworksTurretHallDoorA.setOpenState 1 DLC03PowerworksTurretHallDoorA.unlock
DLC03PowerworksTurretHallDoorB.setOpenState 1 DLC03PowerworksTurretHallDoorB.unlock
DLC03PowerworksTurretHallDoorC.setOpenState 0 DLC03PowerworksTurretHallDoorC.lock 100
;// kill the klaxs DLC03PowerworksTurretHallKlaxonA.playgroup backward 1 DLC03PowerworksTurretHallKlaxonB.playgroup backward 1 DLC03PowerworksTurretHallKlaxonC.playgroup backward 1 DLC03PowerworksTurretHallKlaxonSwitch.playgroup backward 1
;// the whole thing is done, shut it off set DLC03PowerworksMain.turretHallOnline to -1
;// make the turrets unconscious DLC03PowerworksTurretHallTurretA.setUnconscious 1 DLC03PowerworksTurretHallTurretB.setUnconscious 1
;// kill the trigger disable
ENDIF
END

scn DLC03PowerWorksTurretHallSwitch01SCRIPT
BEGIN ONLOAD
IF ( DLC03PowerworksMain.turretHallOnline == 0 ) .setOpenState 1 ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
;// emergency shut off for the turrets IF ( DLC03PowerworksMain.turretHallOnline == 2 )
set DLC03PowerworksMain.turretHallOnline to 3 .setOpenState 0
ENDIF
END

scn DLC03PowerWorksRadiationTrapSCRIPT
short loadOnce ref myLinkedRef
BEGIN ONLOAD
IF loadOnce == 0 ;// open the box, turn on the radiationios ; playgroup forward 1 set myLinkedRef to getLinkedRef myLinkedRef.playgroup forward 0 set loadOnce to 1 ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;// we've been flipped, turn it all down, set it to idle IF DLC03PowerworksMain.radiationHallOnline == 2
;// close the box, kill the escaping radiationios myLinkedRef.playgroup backward 0 playgroup backward 1
;// put us in the idle set DLC03PowerworksMain.radiationHallOnline to -1
ENDIF
END

scn DLC03AFBSector3ArtillerySwitch01SCRIPT
float timer float artilleryTimer ;if artillery hasn't been launched in this amount of time, then put enclave back to normal packages
ref actionRef ref target01 ref target02 ref target03 ref target04 ref target05 ref target06 ref target07 ref target08
short artilleryDice short artilleryStage short previousTarget short artilleryLaunched ;condition variable for Enclave package to start new patrol with weapons drawn short counter ;counts the number of times before the switch breaks short switchBroken ;0 - switch is not broken 1 - switch is broken short switchRepaired ;0 - switch is not repaired 1 - switch has been repaired short button short captureButton
;************************************
Begin onLoad
setstage NQlvl 1
End
;************************************
Begin onActivate
set actionRef to getActionRef if (actionRef == Player) if (switchBroken == 0) if (counter <= 4) || (switchRepaired == 1) if (artilleryStage == 0) set counter to (counter + 1) activate set timer to 2 set artilleryStage to 1 endif endif elseif (switchBroken == 1) showmessage TakomaArtillerySwitchMsg set captureButton to 1 endif endif
End
;************************************
Begin gameMode
if (captureButton == 1) set button to getButtonPressed if button > -1 set captureButton to 0 if (button == 1) ;Fix the switch if the player has high enough skill if (player.GetAV Science < NQlvl.artillerySwitchScienceSkillReq) showmessage TakomaArtillerySwitchLowSkillMsg NQlvl.artillerySwitchScienceSkillReq else showmessage TakomaArtillerySwitchFixMsg set switchRepaired to 1 set switchBroken to 0 DLC03AFBSector3ArtilleryArc01REF.disable endif endif endif endif
if (artilleryStage == 1) set artilleryStage to 2
;need to pick two markers as targets for the artillery strike set artilleryDice to (1 + (0.12 * getRandomPercent))
if (artilleryDice == previousTarget) if (artilleryDice == 12) set artilleryDice to 1 else set artilleryDice to (artilleryDice + 1) endif set previousTarget to artilleryDice else set previousTarget to artilleryDice endif
if (artilleryDice == 1) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector3Target01REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector3Target02REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector3Target03REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector3Target04REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector3Target05REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector3Target06REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector3Target07REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector3Target08REF elseif (artilleryDice == 2) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector3Target02REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector3Target03REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector3Target04REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector3Target05REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector3Target06REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector3Target07REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector3Target08REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector3Target09REF elseif (artilleryDice == 3) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector3Target03REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector3Target04REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector3Target05REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector3Target06REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector3Target07REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector3Target08REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector3Target09REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector3Target10REF elseif (artilleryDice == 4) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector3Target04REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector3Target05REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector3Target06REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector3Target07REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector3Target08REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector3Target09REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector3Target10REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector3Target11REF elseif (artilleryDice == 5) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector3Target05REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector3Target06REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector3Target07REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector3Target08REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector3Target09REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector3Target10REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector3Target11REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector3Target12REF elseif (artilleryDice == 6) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector3Target06REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector3Target07REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector3Target08REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector3Target09REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector3Target10REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector3Target11REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector3Target12REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector3Target01REF elseif (artilleryDice == 7) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector3Target07REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector3Target08REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector3Target09REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector3Target10REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector3Target11REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector3Target12REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector3Target01REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector3Target02REF elseif (artilleryDice == 8) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector3Target08REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector3Target09REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector3Target10REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector3Target11REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector3Target12REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector3Target01REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector3Target02REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector3Target03REF elseif (artilleryDice == 9) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector3Target09REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector3Target10REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector3Target11REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector3Target12REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector3Target01REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector3Target02REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector3Target03REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector3Target04REF elseif (artilleryDice == 10) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector3Target10REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector3Target11REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector3Target12REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector3Target01REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector3Target02REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector3Target03REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector3Target04REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector3Target05REF elseif (artilleryDice == 11) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector3Target11REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector3Target12REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector3Target01REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector3Target02REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector3Target03REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector3Target04REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector3Target05REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector3Target06REF elseif (artilleryDice == 12) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector3Target12REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector3Target01REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector3Target02REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector3Target03REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector3Target04REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector3Target05REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector3Target06REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector3Target07REF endif
elseif (artilleryStage == 2) if (timer <= 0) target01.placeatme FXArtilleryStrike01 1 set timer to .5 set artilleryStage to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (artilleryStage == 3) if (timer <= 0) target02.placeatme FXArtilleryStrike01 1 set timer to .5 set artilleryStage to 4 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (artilleryStage == 4) if (timer <= 0) target03.placeatme FXArtilleryStrike01 1 set timer to .5 set artilleryStage to 5 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (artilleryStage == 5) if (timer <= 0) target04.placeatme FXArtilleryStrike01 1 set timer to .5 set artilleryStage to 6 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (artilleryStage == 6) if (timer <= 0) target05.placeatme FXArtilleryStrike01 1 set timer to .5 set artilleryStage to 7 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (artilleryStage == 7) if (timer <= 0) target06.placeatme FXArtilleryStrike01 1 set timer to .5 set artilleryStage to 8 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (artilleryStage == 8) if (timer <= 0) target07.placeatme FXArtilleryStrike01 1 set timer to .5 set artilleryStage to 9 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (artilleryStage == 9) if (timer <= 0) set artilleryLaunched to 1
DLC03AFBSector3Enclave01REF.evp ;DLC03AFBSector3Enclave02REF.evp DLC03AFBSector3Enclave03REF.evp DLC03AFBSector3Enclave04REF.evp ;DLC03AFBSector3Enclave05REF.evp
set artilleryTimer to 20 target08.placeatme FXArtilleryStrike01 1 set timer to 2 activate ;turn switch back to red
if (switchRepaired == 0) if (counter > 4) ; player has pushed the button 4 times, switch is now "broken" and wont work until repaired DLC03AFBSector3ArtilleryArc01REF.enable set switchBroken to 1 endif endif
set artilleryStage to 0 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (artilleryLaunched == 1) if (artilleryTimer <= 0) set artilleryLaunched to 0 DLC03AFBSector3Enclave01REF.evp ;DLC03AFBSector3Enclave02REF.evp DLC03AFBSector3Enclave03REF.evp DLC03AFBSector3Enclave04REF.evp ;DLC03AFBSector3Enclave05REF.evp else set artilleryTimer to (artilleryTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
End
;************************************

scn DLC03VertibirdFlyover02SCRIPT
; This trigger enables three vertibirds and plays their forward animations
float timer short doOnce
;****************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0)
DLC03AFBSector3Vertibird01REF.enable 0 DLC03AFBSector3Vertibird02REF.enable 0 DLC03AFBSector3Vertibird03REF.enable 0
set timer to 1
set doOnce to 1 endif
End
;*****************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) if (timer <= 0) DLC03AFBSector3Vertibird01REF.playgroup Forward 1 DLC03AFBSector3Vertibird02REF.playgroup Forward 1 DLC03AFBSector3Vertibird03REF.playgroup Forward 1 set doOnce to 2 else set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed endif
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (DLC03AFBSector3Vertibird01REF.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) DLC03AFBSector3Vertibird01REF.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its forward animation set doOnce to 3 endif elseif (doOnce == 3) if (DLC03AFBSector3Vertibird02REF.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) DLC03AFBSector3Vertibird02REF.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its forward animation set doOnce to 4 endif elseif (doOnce == 4) if (DLC03AFBSector3Vertibird03REF.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) DLC03AFBSector3Vertibird03REF.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its forward animation set doOnce to 5 endif endif
End

scn DLC03EncounterADOutcastA2SCRIPT
begin OnLoad if DLC03Encounters.ADScene == 0 set DLC03Encounters.ADScene to 1 endif end
begin OnDeath ; failsafe setEnemy DLC03EncounterADOutcastFaction DLC03EncounterADEnclaveFaction end

scn DLC03EncounterADEnclaveSCRIPT
short doOnce
begin OnStartCombat ; put them back to normal if doOnce == 1 set doOnce to 2 setav aggression 2 addToFaction EnclaveFaction 0 endif end
begin OnLoad ; make sure I'm alive if getstage DLC03Encounters >= 10 && doOnce == 0 set doOnce to 1 resurrect setav aggression 0 removeFromFaction EnclaveFaction ; kill the officer FFEnclaveCamp24OfficerREF.kill endif end
begin OnDeath if DLC03Encounters.ADScene > 0 set DLC03Encounters.ADDeadEnclave to DLC03Encounters.ADDeadEnclave + 1 if DLC03Encounters.ADDeadEnclave >= 3 set DLC03Encounters.ADScene to 3 endif endif end

scn DLC03WQ03SCRIPT
;QUEST VARIABLES short MegatonDetonated ;Has Megaton been destroyed? 0 = no, 1 = destroyed during quest, 2 = already destroyed before quest short BeggarScene ;Is the beggar scene done? 0 = no, 1 = yes, 2 = yes and Rosa has spoken to the player
short WaitingForDrink ;1 = Gerard is waiting for player to drink holy water, set in GREETING results, checked and turned off in scripted spell effect of holy water
short prophet ;1 = player convinced them he is a prophet
short sermonStage
BEGIN Gamemode
;If Megaton is destroyed during the quest if megatonDestroyed == 1 if getQuestRunning DLC03WQ03 == 1 setStage DLC03WQ03 170
endif
endif
if GetStageDone DLC03WQ03 50 == 0 if player.getHasNote DLC03WQ03HolyWaterPamphlet == 1 SetStage DLC03WQ03 50 endif endif
END

scn DLC03AFBVertibirdCTTrigger01SCRIPT
; This trigger enables BoS, Enclave soldiers and two vertibirds that do a bombing run
float timer short doOnce short crashVertibird01 short missileFireFlag ;*****************************************
Begin gameMode if (doOnce == 1) if (timer <= 0) DLC03AFBCTVertibird02REF.activate DLC03AFBCTVertibird02REF 1 set timer to 6 set doOnce to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (doOnce == 2) if (timer <= 0) DLC03AFBCTVertibird01REF.activate DLC03AFBCTVertibird01REF 1 set timer to 6 ;set doOnce to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (doOnce == 3) if (timer <= 0) DLC03AFBVertibirdStrafe01REF.activate DLC03AFBVertibirdStrafe01REF 1 set timer to 20 set missileFireFlag to 1 set doOnce to 4 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (doOnce == 4) ;handling the firing of missiles if ((timer <= 3) && (missileFireFlag == 1)) DLC03MissileSpawner01REF.fireWeapon WeapMissileLauncher set missileFireFlag to 2 elseif ((timer <= 2) && (missileFireFlag == 2)) DLC03MissileSpawner02REF.fireWeapon WeapMissileLauncher set missileFireFlag to 3 elseif ((timer <= 1) && (missileFireFlag == 3)) DLC03MissileSpawner03REF.fireWeapon WeapMissileLauncher set missileFireFlag to 0 endif
;handling the crashing vertibird if (crashVertibird01 == 0) if (timer <= 3) DLC03AFBVertibirdCrash01REF.activate DLC03AFBVertibirdCrash01REF 1 set crashVertibird01 to 1 endif endif
;handling the vertibird bomber if (timer <= 0) DLC03AFBVertibirdBomber03REF.activate DLC03AFBVertibirdBomber03REF 1 set timer to 20 set doOnce to 5 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 5) if (timer <= 0) DLC03AFBVertibirdStrafe02REF.activate DLC03AFBVertibirdStrafe02REF 1 DLC03AFBVertibirdStrafe03REF.activate DLC03AFBVertibirdStrafe03REF 1 set doOnce to 6 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
endif
End
;***************************************** Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0) DLC03AFBCTVertibird03REF.activate DLC03AFBCTVertibird03REF 1 DLC03AFBCCEnabler01REF.enable 0 DLC03AFBEnclaveNapalmShooter01REF.setav variable01 1 DLC03AFBEnclaveNapalmShooter01REF.evp DLC03AFBEnclaveNapalmShooter02REF.setav variable01 1 DLC03AFBEnclaveNapalmShooter02REF.evp set timer to 2 set doOnce to 1 endif
End

scn DLC03AFBVertibirdStrafing03bSCRIPT
; This trigger enables it's linked ref (a vertibird) and calls its strafing animation ; It also tells the vertibird when to fire its weapon
float timer float fireTimer short doOnce short firingFlag ref linkedRef
;*****************************************
Begin gameMode if linkedRef == 0 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef endif
if (doOnce == 1) if (linkedRef.HasLoaded3D != 0) linkedRef.playgroup Forward 1 set timer to 7 set doOnce to 2 endif
elseif (doOnce ==2) if (timer <= 0) set firingFlag to 1 set fireTimer to .1 ;vertibird going to shoot lasers for this long set timer to 2.5 ;vertibird is laser shooting position for this long set doOnce to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 3) if (timer <=0) ;vertibird in position to start firing laser set timer to 4 ;vertibird takes this long to get into hovering position set doOnce to 4 else if (firingFlag == 1) if (fireTimer <= 0) linkedRef.fireWeapon DLC03AFBVertibirdGun set fireTimer to .1 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed)
endif
elseif (doOnce == 4) if (timer <= 0) set fireTimer to .5 ;vertibird going to shoot for this long once in position set timer to 2 ;vertibird is hovering for this long before flying away set doOnce to 5 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 5) if (timer <= 0) set doOnce to 6 else if (firingFlag == 1) if (fireTimer <= 0) linkedRef.fireWeapon DLC03VertibirdMissileLauncher set fireTimer to .5 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed)
endif
elseif (doOnce == 6) if (linkedRef.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) linkedRef.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its forward animation set doOnce to 7 endif endif
End
;***************************************** Begin onActivate if (doOnce == 0) linkedRef.enable 0 set timer to 1 set doOnce to 1 endif End

scn DLC03AFBControlTowerVertibirdTakingOffControlSCRIPT
float timer short doOnce short handleFollowers short charonIsFollower short butchIsFollower short cloverIsFollower short dogmeatIsFollower short jerichoIsFollower short fawkesIsFollower short rl3IsFollower short crossIsFollower ref actionRef
;****************************************
Begin onActivate
set actionRef to getActionRef
if (doOnce == 0) if (actionRef == DLC03AFBControlTowerVertibird01TrigREF) set doOnce to 1 endif endif
if (doOnce == 4) if (actionRef == Player) player.moveto DLC03Vertibird02Interior set handleFollowers to 1 set doOnce to 5 endif endif
End
;****************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) playgroup Forward 0 set timer to .5 set doOnce to 2
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (timer <= 0) playgroup Left 0 set doOnce to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (handleFollowers == 1) if ( Followers.CharonHired == 1 ) CharonRef.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower01REF set charonIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.ButchHired == 1 ) ButchREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower01REF set butchIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.CloverHired == 1 ) CloverREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower01REF set cloverIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.DogmeatHired == 1 ) DogmeatREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower01REF set dogmeatIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.JerichoHired == 1 ) JerichoREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower01REF set jerichoIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.FawkesHired == 1 ) MQ08FawkesREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower01REF set fawkesIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.RL3Hired == 1 ) RL3REF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower01REF set rl3IsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.StarPaladinCrossHired == 1 ) StarPaladinCrossREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower01REF set crossIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 endif elseif (handleFollowers == 2) if ( Followers.CharonHired == 1 ) && (charonIsFollower == 0) CharonRef.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 elseif ( Followers.ButchHired == 1 ) && (butchIsFollower == 0) ButchREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 elseif ( Followers.CloverHired == 1 ) && (cloverIsFollower == 0) CloverREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 elseif ( Followers.DogmeatHired == 1 ) && (dogmeatIsFollower == 0) DogmeatREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 elseif ( Followers.JerichoHired == 1 ) && (jerichoIsFollower == 0) JerichoREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 elseif ( Followers.FawkesHired == 1 ) && (fawkesIsFollower == 0) MQ08FawkesREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 elseif ( Followers.RL3Hired == 1 ) && (rl3IsFollower == 0) RL3REF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 elseif ( Followers.StarPaladinCrossHired == 1) && (crossIsFollower == 0) StarPaladinCrossREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 endif
endif
End

scn DLC03AFBControlTowerVertibird01TrigSCRIPT
short doOnce float timer
;****************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0) EnablePlayerControls DisablePlayerControls 0 0 1 0 0 0 1 DLC03AFBControlTowerVertibird01REF.enable 0 DLC03AFBControlTowerBoSEnabler.enable 0
if (DLC03BS1.SarahDead == 0) DLC03SarahREF.moveto DLC03AFBControlTowerSarahLyonsMarker set DLC03BS3.BS3SarahAtVertibird01 to 0 set DLC03BS3.BS3SarahAtVertibird02 to 1 set DLC03BS3.BS3SarahAtVertibird03 to 0 DLC03SarahREF.evp endif
EnableFastTravel 0 if NQlvl.fastTravelDisabled == 0 set NQlvl.fastTravelDisabled to 1 endif
set doOnce to 1 endif
End
;*****************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) if (DLC03AFBControlTowerVertibird01REF.HasLoaded3D != 0) DLC03AFBControlTowerVertibird01REF.activate DLC03AFBControlTowerVertibird01TrigREF 1 set timer to 10 set doOnce to 2 endif elseif (doOnce == 2) if (timer <= 0) set DLC03AFBOrbitalStrikeControlTriggerREF.startStrike to 1 set doOnce to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
End
;*****************************************

scn DLC03Vertibird01ControlTriggerSCRIPT
;Player has chosen to blow up the Enclave Base. He is now riding in the Vertibird ;that takes him to Air Traffic Control Tower in Adams AFB to watch the Oribital Strike.
short doOnce short doOnce02 float timer float rumbleTimer
;******************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce02 == 0) imod DLC03VertibirdFadeInFromBlackISFX ;Player has chosen to blow up the Enclave Base, so enable vertibird outside of Control Tower at the AFB DLC03AFBControlTowerVertibird01TrigREF.enable 0 ;enables trigger near control tower in Adams Air Force Base DLC03AFBEnclaveBaseVertibird01REF.disable ;disables the vertibird that landed on the Enclave Base DLC03AFBVertibird01BoSProtectors.disable ;disables the BoS soldiers on the Platform
;Get the player sitting the chair and disable controls DLC03Vertibird01PlayerChairREF.activate Player 1 DisablePlayerControls if (DLC03BS1.SarahDead == 0) DLC03SarahLyonsVertibird01REF.enable 0 else DLC03Vertibird01BoSGun02REF.enable 0 endif
DLC03Vertibird01BoSGun03REF.moveto DLC03Vertibird01BoSCrouchMarker DLC03Vertibird01BoSGun03REF.equipitem weaplaserrifle DLC03Vertibird01BoSGun03REF.setAlert 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionSwap01.enable 0 DLC03CrawlerTower01REF.disable 0
if (GetCurrentTime < 6) || (GetCurrentTime > 19) DLC03Vertibird01LightPlaneMarker.disable endif
set rumbleTimer to 1 set timer to 5 playsound OBJVertibirdPilotTakeoff set doOnce to 1 set doOnce02 to 1 endif
End
;******************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) if (timer <= 0) DLC03Vertibird01BoSPilot01REF.say DLC03BS3PilotTalkGoodEnd01 set timer to 10 set doOnce to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPasseD) endif
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (timer <= 0) playsound OBJVertibirdPilotLand set timer to 8 set doOnce to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPasseD) endif
elseif (doOnce == 3) if (timer <= 0) imod DLC03FadeToBlackISFX set timer to 4 set doOnce to 4 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 4) if (timer <= 0) ;Player decided to blow up Enclave Base, so load player to Air Traffic Control Tower player.moveto DLC03AFBControlTowerLoadMarker set doOnce to 5 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (rumbleTimer <= 0) && (doOnce <= 4) DLC03Vertibird01RumbleMarker01REF.placeatme DLC03VertibirdRumble 1 set rumbleTimer to 1 else set rumbleTimer to (rumbleTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
End
;******************************************

scn DLC03ChairVertibird01PlayerSCRIPT
ref actionRef
Begin onActivate
set actionRef to getActionRef
if (actionRef == Player) activate endif
End

DLC03AFBPlatformMarker01REF.disable DLC03AFBPlatformMarker02REF.disable DLC03AFBPlatformMarker03REF.disable DLC03AFBPlatformEnclaveMarker01REF.disable set DLC03AFBFight01TriggerREF.battleFlag to 0 DLC03AFBFight01TriggerREF.disable set DLC03AFBFight02TriggerREF.battleFlag to 0 DLC03AFBFight02TriggerREF.disable DLC03BoSEnclaveFight01bTriggerREF.disable DLC03BoSEnclaveFight01cTriggerREF.disable DLC03BoSEnclaveFight02bTriggerREF.disable DLC03AFBBoSEnabler01REF.disable DLC03AFBBoSEnabler02REF.disable DLC03AFBSector2EnablerREF.disable DLC03AFBSector3EnablerREF.disable
