scn DLC03AFBEnclaveBaseVertibirdTakingOffControlSCRIPT
;Player has made the decision to either blow up the Enclave Base or the Citadel. ;Vertibird lands and waits for the player to activate it. ;Depending on what the player decided, move him to the appropriate Vertibird Interior.
short doOnce short handleFollowers short charonIsFollower short butchIsFollower short cloverIsFollower short dogmeatIsFollower short jerichoIsFollower short fawkesIsFollower short rl3IsFollower short crossIsFollower ref actionRef
;****************************************
Begin onActivate
set actionRef to getActionRef
if (doOnce == 0) if (actionRef == DLC03AFBEnclaveBaseVertibird01TrigREF) set doOnce to 1 endif endif
if (doOnce == 4) if (actionRef == Player)
;Depending on player's decision on what to blow up then move him to the appropriate Vertibird Interior if (DLC03BS3.BS3StrikeTarget == 1) ;Player chose to blow up Enclave Base player.moveto DLC03Vertibird01Interior set handleFollowers to 1 elseif (DLC03BS3.BS3StrikeTarget == 2) ;Player chose to blow up Citadel player.moveto DLC03Vertibird03Interior set handleFollowers to 3 endif
set doOnce to 5 endif endif
End
;****************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) playgroup Forward 0
if (DLC03BS1.SarahDead == 0) set DLC03SarahREF.coma to -1 ;makes Sarah conscious DLC03SarahREF.additem ArmorPowerLyons 1 DLC03SarahREF.additem WithAmmoLaserRifleOutcast 1 DLC03SarahREF.additem ClipLaserRifle30 1 DLC03SarahREF.equipitem ArmorPowerLyons endif
set doOnce to 2
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) DLC03AFBVertibird01BoSProtectors.enable if (DLC03BS1.SarahDead == 0) set DLC03BS3.BS3SarahAtVertibird01 to 1 set DLC03BS3.BS3SarahAtVertibird02 to 0 set DLC03BS3.BS3SarahAtVertibird03 to 0 DLC03SarahREF.evp DLC03SarahREF.moveto DLC03AFBPlatformSarahLyonsMarker set doOnce to 3
else set doOnce to 4 ;vertibird has landed and now the player can activate it to get inside endif endif endif
if (handleFollowers == 1) if ( Followers.CharonHired == 1 ) CharonRef.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower01REF set charonIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.ButchHired == 1 ) ButchREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower01REF set butchIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.CloverHired == 1 ) CloverREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower01REF set cloverIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.DogmeatHired == 1 ) DogmeatREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower01REF set dogmeatIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.JerichoHired == 1 ) JerichoREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower01REF set jerichoIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.FawkesHired == 1 ) MQ08FawkesREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower01REF set fawkesIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.RL3Hired == 1 ) RL3REF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower01REF set rl3IsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 elseif ( Followers.StarPaladinCrossHired == 1 ) StarPaladinCrossREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower01REF set crossIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 2 endif elseif (handleFollowers == 2) if ( Followers.CharonHired == 1 ) && (charonIsFollower == 0) CharonRef.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 elseif ( Followers.ButchHired == 1 ) && (butchIsFollower == 0) ButchREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 elseif ( Followers.CloverHired == 1 ) && (cloverIsFollower == 0) CloverREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 elseif ( Followers.DogmeatHired == 1 ) && (dogmeatIsFollower == 0) DogmeatREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 elseif ( Followers.JerichoHired == 1 ) && (jerichoIsFollower == 0) JerichoREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 elseif ( Followers.FawkesHired == 1 ) && (fawkesIsFollower == 0) MQ08FawkesREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 elseif ( Followers.RL3Hired == 1 ) && (rl3IsFollower == 0) RL3REF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 elseif ( Followers.StarPaladinCrossHired == 1) && (crossIsFollower == 0) StarPaladinCrossREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelInsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 endif
elseif (handleFollowers == 3) if ( Followers.CharonHired == 1 ) CharonRef.Moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideFollower01REF set charonIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 4 elseif ( Followers.ButchHired == 1 ) ButchREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideFollower01REF set butchIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 4 elseif ( Followers.CloverHired == 1 ) CloverREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideFollower01REF set cloverIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 4 elseif ( Followers.DogmeatHired == 1 ) DogmeatREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideFollower01REF set dogmeatIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 4 elseif ( Followers.JerichoHired == 1 ) JerichoREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideFollower01REF set jerichoIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 4 elseif ( Followers.FawkesHired == 1 ) MQ08FawkesREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideFollower01REF set fawkesIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 4 elseif ( Followers.RL3Hired == 1 ) RL3REF.Moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideFollower01REF set rl3IsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 4 elseif ( Followers.StarPaladinCrossHired == 1 ) StarPaladinCrossREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideFollower01REF set crossIsFollower to 1 set handleFollowers to 4 endif elseif (handleFollowers == 4) if ( Followers.CharonHired == 1 ) && (charonIsFollower == 0) CharonRef.Moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 elseif ( Followers.ButchHired == 1 ) && (butchIsFollower == 0) ButchREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 elseif ( Followers.CloverHired == 1 ) && (cloverIsFollower == 0) CloverREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 elseif ( Followers.DogmeatHired == 1 ) && (dogmeatIsFollower == 0) DogmeatREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 elseif ( Followers.JerichoHired == 1 ) && (jerichoIsFollower == 0) JerichoREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 elseif ( Followers.FawkesHired == 1 ) && (fawkesIsFollower == 0) MQ08FawkesREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 elseif ( Followers.RL3Hired == 1 ) && (rl3IsFollower == 0) RL3REF.Moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 elseif ( Followers.StarPaladinCrossHired == 1 ) && (crossIsFollower == 0) StarPaladinCrossREF.Moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideFollower02REF set handleFollowers to 5 endif endif
End
;****************************************

scn DLC03Vertibird02ControlTriggerSCRIPT
;Player just watched the Orbital Strike on the Enclave Base and is now ;in the Vertibird that takes him back to the Citadel Courtyard.
short doOnce short doOnce02 float timer float rumbleTimer
;******************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce02 == 0) imod DLC03VertibirdFadeInFromBlackISFX ;Player has chosen to blow up the Enclave Base, so enable vertibird outside of Control Tower at the AFB DLC03CitadelVertibird01TrigREF.enable DLC03AFBControlTowerVertibird01REF.disable ;disables the vertibird that landed on the Control Tower DLC03AFBControlTowerBoSEnabler.disable ;disables the BoS soldiers on the Control Tower
;Get the player sitting the chair and disable controls DLC03Vertibird02PlayerChairREF.activate Player 1 DisablePlayerControls
if (DLC03BS1.SarahDead == 0) DLC03SarahLyonsVertibird02REF.enable 0 else DLC03Vertibird02BoS01REF.enable 0 endif
DLC03Vertibird02BoSGun03REF.moveto DLC03Vertibird02BoSCrouchMarker DLC03Vertibird02BoSGun03REF.equipitem weaplaserrifle DLC03Vertibird02BoSGun03REF.setAlert 1
enableFastTravel 1 if NQlvl.fastTravelDisabled == 1 set NQlvl.fastTravelDisabled to 0 endif
if (GetHasNote DLC03LDAFBEnclave02Holotape == 0) DLC03LDAFBEnclave02Holotape01REF.enable endif
if (GetCurrentTime < 6) || (GetCurrentTime > 19) DLC03Vertibird02LightPlaneMarker.disable endif
set rumbletimer to 1 set timer to 5 playsound OBJVertibirdPilotTakeoff set doOnce to 1 set doOnce02 to 1 endif
End
;******************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) if (timer <= 0) DLC03Vertibird02BoSPilot01REF.say DLC03BS3PilotTalkGoodEnd02 set timer to 20 set doOnce to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPasseD) endif
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (timer <= 0) playsound OBJVertibirdPilotLand set timer to 8 set doOnce to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPasseD) endif
elseif (doOnce == 3) if (timer <= 0) imod DLC03FadeToBlackISFX set timer to 4 set doOnce to 4 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 4) if (timer <= 0) ;Player now loads into the Citadel Courtyard DLC03AFBBoSMasterEnabler.enable ;enables BoS at Adams AFB DLC03CrawlerExplosionHelipad01.playgroup backward 1 DLC03CrawlerExPipes01REF.playgroup backward 1 player.moveto DLC03VertibirdPlayerLoadMarkerREF set DLC03Landed to 1 set doOnce to 5 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (rumbleTimer <= 0) && (doOnce <= 4) DLC03Vertibird02RumbleMarker01REF.placeatme DLC03VertibirdRumble 1 set rumbleTimer to 1 else set rumbleTimer to (rumbleTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
End
;******************************************

scn DLC03WQ02Script
short playerIsPoor ;condition on dialog, Griffon doesn't waste time with people without caps short GriffonBigsleyKnowledge ;the player knows about Bigsley selling water to Griffon short receivedAquaCura ;player recieved AquaCura short freeBottle ;1 = player recieved free bottle (used by stage 3 of DLC03WQFunctions) short priceKnown ;1 = player played the guessing game and knows the price short locationKnown ;player knows the location of the hideout from talking to Bigsley short discoveredHidehout ;player discovered the hideout where Griffons men are bottling the water short notInterested ;player isn't interested in Griffon's sales pitch
short convStage ;used to control DLC03WQ02GriffonSalesPitch conversation
short pitch1 ;0 unset, 1 = pitch1 was said, don't say it again until all pitches have been said short pitch2 short pitch3 short pitch4 short pitch5 short pitch6 short pitch7 short pitch8 short pitch9 short pitch10 short pitch11 short pitch12 short pitch13 short pitch14 short pitch15 short pitch16 short pitch17 short pitch18 short pitch19 short pitch20
short pitchCount ;how many pitches have been said already (used to reset to zero when all have been said) short pitchMax ;how many pitches possible are there
float blackmailPercentage ;set in dialog when confronting Griffon float blackmailDay ;day when player can collect blackmail short blackmailAmount ;base amount modified by blackMailPercentage the player should get short blackmailCount ;how many blackmail payments have accrued since player last took it
short confess ;1 = Griffon should confess short confessionStage short threaten ;1 = audience threatens Griffon by pulling out weapons
short realAquaPura ;1 = player convinced Griffon to sell real Aqua Pura
short GriffonDead ;1 = griffon is dead, used in Stage 255
Begin GameMode
;initialize blackmailAmount (remember this will be modified by blackMailPercentage) if blackmailAmount == 0 set blackmailAmount to 200 endif
if GameDaysPassed >= blackmailDay set blackmailCount to blackmailCount + 1 set blackmailDay to GameDaysPassed + 7
;add money to Griffon in case the player wants to steal or murder him if DLC03GriffonRef.getItemCount caps001 < 500 DLC03GriffonRef.additem caps001 blackmailAmount endif endif
;if people are buying real aqua pura, and the player spiked the purifier, then ghouls get sick and die if realAquaPura == 1 if DLC03WQ.FEV == 1 ;player spiked the purifier with FEV if getStageDone DLC03WQSick 10 == 0 ;Underworld sick if player.getInSameCell DLC03GriffonRef == 0 ;make sure this happens offscreen if player.getInCell Underworld == 0 if DLC03GriffonRef.getDead == 0 setStage DLC03WQSick 10 ;sets up Underworld to be sick
endif endif endif endif endif endif
End

scn DLC03WQ02DiscoveryTriggerScript
short doOnce
Begin OnTriggerEnter player
if doOnce == 0 set DLC03WQ02.discoveredHidehout to 1 setStage DLC03WQ02 40
set doOnce to 1
endif
End

scn DLC03Vertibird03ControlTriggerSCRIPT
;Player has chosen to blow up the Citadel and is now in the Vertibird ;that will take him to outside the Citadel.
short doOnce short doOnce02 float timer float rumbleTimer
;******************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce02 == 0) imod DLC03VertibirdFadeInFromBlackISFX ;Player has chosen to blow up the Citadel, so enable vertibird outside of Citadel DLC03CitadelVertibirdTrigger02REF.enable DLC03AFBEnclaveBaseVertibird01REF.disable ;disables the vertibird that landed on the Enclave Base DLC03AFBVertibird01BoSProtectors.disable ;disables the BoS soldiers on the Platform
;Get the player sitting the chair and disable controls DLC03Vertibird03PlayerChairREF.activate Player 1 DisablePlayerControls
if (DLC03BS1.SarahDead == 0) DLC03SarahLyonsVertibird03REF.enable 0 else DLC03Vertibird03BoS01REF.enable 0 endif
DLC03Vertibird03BoSGun03REF.moveto DLC03Vertibird03BoSCrouchMarker DLC03Vertibird03BoSGun03REF.equipitem weaplaserrifle DLC03Vertibird03BoSGun03REF.setAlert 1
enableFastTravel 1 if NQlvl.fastTravelDisabled == 1 set NQlvl.fastTravelDisabled to 0 endif
DLC03CitadelRuinsMarkerREF.enable ;master enable marker for the Citadel ruins
set DLC03CitadelDestroyedWeatherChance to 100 set DLC03CitadelNormalWeatherChance to 0
if (GetCurrentTime < 6) || (GetCurrentTime > 19) DLC03Vertibird03LightPlaneMarker.disable endif
set rumbleTimer to 1 set timer to 5 playsound OBJVertibirdPilotTakeoff set doOnce to 1 set doOnce02 to 1 endif
End
;******************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) if (timer <= 0) DLC03Vertibird03BoSPilot01REF.say DLC03BS3PilotTalkBadEnd01 set timer to 30 set doOnce to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPasseD) endif
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (timer <= 0) playsound OBJVertibirdPilotLand set timer to 8 set doOnce to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPasseD) endif
elseif (doOnce == 3) if (timer <= 0) imod DLC03FadeToBlackISFX set timer to 4 set doOnce to 4 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 4) if (timer <= 0) ;Player chose to blow up the Citadel, so move player here, also move pilot to patrol marker outside vertibird DLC03Vertibird03BoSPilot01REF.moveto DLC03CitadelOutsidePilotLoadMarker DLC03Vertibird03BoS02REF.moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideBoS02LoadMarker DLC03Vertibird03BoSGun03REF.moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideBoS03LoadMarker
;Alan added these to handle BoS aggro just in case Player "gets out of" forcegreet Set DLC03BS3.EvilTimer to 15 Set DLC03BS3.BS3Evil to 1
if (DLC03BS1.SarahDead == 0) DLC03Vertibird03BoS01REF.moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideBoS01LoadMarker endif
DLC03AFBBoSMasterEnabler.enable ;enables BoS at Adams AFB player.moveto DLC03CitadelOutsidePlayerLoadMarker set doOnce to 5 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (rumbleTimer <= 0) && (doOnce <= 4) DLC03Vertibird03RumbleMarker01REF.placeatme DLC03VertibirdRumble 1 set rumbleTimer to 1 else set rumbleTimer to (rumbleTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
End
;******************************************

scn DLC03CitadelVertibird02TakingOffControlSCRIPT
float timer short doOnce ref actionRef
;****************************************
Begin onActivate
set actionRef to getActionRef
if (doOnce == 0) if (actionRef == DLC03CitadelVertibirdTrigger02REF) set doOnce to 1 endif endif
End
;****************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) playgroup Forward 0 set timer to .5 set doOnce to 2
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (timer <= 0) playgroup Left 0 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 3) ;this is set in the control trigger next to the vertibird playgroup Backward 0 set doOnce to 4
elseif (doOnce == 4) if (isAnimPlaying Backward == 0) disable set doOnce to 5 endif
endif
End
;****************************************

scn DLC03CitadelVertibird02TrigSCRIPT
short doOnce float timer
;****************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0) EnablePlayerControls
enableFastTravel 1 if NQlvl.fastTravelDisabled == 1 set NQlvl.fastTravelDisabled to 0 endif
DLC03CitadelVertibird02REF.enable 0
if (DLC03BS1.SarahDead == 0) DLC03SarahREF.moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideSarahLyonsMarker set DLC03BS3.BS3SarahAtVertibird01 to 0 set DLC03BS3.BS3SarahAtVertibird02 to 0 set DLC03BS3.BS3SarahAtVertibird03 to 1 DLC03SarahREF.evp else DLC03Vertibird03BoS01REF.moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideBoS01LoadMarker DLC03Vertibird03BoS01REF.resetAI endif
DLC03Vertibird03BoSPilot01REF.moveto DLC03CitadelOutsidePilotLoadMarker DLC03Vertibird03BoS02REF.moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideBoS02LoadMarker DLC03Vertibird03BoSGun03REF.moveto DLC03CitadelOutsideBoS03LoadMarker
DLC03Vertibird03BoS02REF.resetAI DLC03Vertibird03BoSPilot01REF.resetAI DLC03Vertibird03BoSGun03REF.resetAI
setstage DLC03WQFunctions 255 ;handles water quests for Citadel being blown up
set doOnce to 1 endif
End
;****************************************
Begin onTriggerLeave Player
if (doOnce == 2) ;player has left the trigger and now we need to make the vertibird take off set DLC03CitadelVertibird02REF.doOnce to 3 set doOnce to 3 endif
End
;*****************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) if (DLC03CitadelVertibird02REF.HasLoaded3D != 0) DLC03CitadelVertibird02REF.activate DLC03CitadelVertibirdTrigger02REF 1 set timer to 10 set doOnce to 2 endif endif
End
;*****************************************

scn DLC03CitadelVertibird01TakingOffControlSCRIPT
float timer short doOnce ref actionRef
;****************************************
Begin onActivate
set actionRef to getActionRef
if (doOnce == 0) if (actionRef == DLC03CitadelVertibird01TrigREF) set doOnce to 1 endif endif
End
;****************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) playgroup Forward 0 set timer to .5 set doOnce to 2
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (timer <= 0) playgroup Left 0 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 3) ;this is set in the control trigger next to the vertibird playgroup Backward 0 set doOnce to 4
elseif (doOnce == 4) if (isAnimPlaying Backward == 0) disable set doOnce to 5 endif
endif
End
;****************************************

scn DLC03CitadelVertibird01TrigSCRIPT
short doOnce float timer
;****************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0) DisablePlayerControls
enableFastTravel 1 if NQlvl.fastTravelDisabled == 1 set NQlvl.fastTravelDisabled to 0 endif
DLC03CitadelVertibird01REF.enable 0
if (DLC03BS1.SarahDead == 0) DLC03SarahREF.moveto DLC03EndGameSarahLyonsMarker set DLC03BS3.BS3SarahAtVertibird01 to 0 set DLC03BS3.BS3SarahAtVertibird02 to 0 set DLC03BS3.BS3SarahAtVertibird03 to 0 DLC03SarahREF.evp endif set doOnce to 1 endif
End
;****************************************
Begin onTriggerLeave Player
if (doOnce == 2) ;player has left the trigger and now we need to make the vertibird take off set DLC03CitadelVertibird01REF.doOnce to 3 set doOnce to 3 endif
End
;*****************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) if (DLC03CitadelVertibird01REF.HasLoaded3D != 0) DLC03CitadelVertibird01REF.activate DLC03CitadelVertibird01TrigREF 1 set timer to 10 set doOnce to 2 endif endif
End

scn DLC03RelayStatBoSCommandoSCRIPT
short phase05Once short phase10Once short phase15Once short phase20Once short phase25Once short phase30Once short phase35Once short phase40Once short phase45Once short phase50Once short phase55Once short phase60Once short phase65Once short phase70Once short phase75Once short phase80Once
;// regen variable short regen
BEGIN ONLOAD
set regen to 100
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;////////// ;// phase 05 ;////////// IF DLC03RelayStatMain.commandoPhase == 5 && phase05Once == 0 setAv Variable01 5 restoreAV Health regen EVP set phase05Once to 1 ENDIF
;////////// ;// phase 10 ;////////// IF DLC03RelayStatMain.commandoPhase == 10 && phase10Once == 0 setAv Variable01 10 restoreAV Health regen EVP set phase10Once to 1 ENDIF
;////////// ;// phase 15 ;////////// IF DLC03RelayStatMain.commandoPhase == 15 && phase15Once == 0 setAv Variable01 15 restoreAV Health regen EVP set phase15Once to 1 ENDIF
;////////// ;// phase 20 ;////////// IF DLC03RelayStatMain.commandoPhase == 20 && phase20Once == 0 setAv Variable01 20 restoreAV Health regen EVP set phase20Once to 1 ENDIF

scn DLC03TriggerDamagedFieldSCRIPT ;This detects if the action ref is destroyed. If so, it goes into shock mode. ; ; ; ; ;================================================
short shockMode float timer short justShocked short triggered ;so you can't stand inside the trigger box and then blow it up without damage
ref triggerRef ref activateRef
short init
begin OnLoad if init == 0 set init to 1 disable endif end
begin onTrigger
if triggered == 0 set triggerRef to GetActionRef set triggered to 1 endif
if shockMode == 1 && justShocked == 0 set justShocked to 1 if triggerRef == player player.damageAV health 40 player.say Hit playSound3D TRPToilet if player.getDead == 0 imod TrapToiletShockISFX endif player.placeatme fakeforce100r100 player.cios DLC03TrapFieldShockEffect else triggerRef.damageAv health 7 triggerRef.say hit triggerRef.do 40 triggerRef.PlaySound3D TRPToilet triggerRef.placeatme fakeforce100r100 triggerRef.cios DLC03TrapFieldShockEffect endif endif end
begin OnTriggerLeave set triggered to 0 end
begin OnActivate
set activateRef to GetActionRef
if activateRef.GetDestructionStage > 1 set shockMode to 1 enable ;showWarning "Shock Mode on" endif
set timer to 0.6 set triggered to 0
end
begin GameMode
if justShocked == 1 if timer > 0 set timer to timer - getSecondsPassed else set justShocked to 0 set timer to 0.9 endif endif
end

scn DLC03ChairVertibird01aSCRIPT

scn DLC03BoSEnclaveFight02SCRIPT
; This trigger enables BoS, Enclave soldiers and two vertibirds that do a bombing run
float timer short doOnce short crashVertibird01 short missileFireFlag short battleFlag ; 0= end Fight 1=begin or continue Fight short BoS1Dead short BoS2Dead short BoS3Dead short Enclave1Dead short Enclave2Dead short Enclave3Dead
;*****************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) if (timer <= 0) DLC03AFBFight02VertibirdStrafe01REF.activate DLC03AFBFight02VertibirdStrafe01REF 1 set timer to 10 set doOnce to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (doOnce == 2) if (timer <= 0) DLC03AFBFight02VertibirdStrafe02aREF.activate DLC03AFBFight02VertibirdStrafe02aREF 1 set timer to 3 set doOnce to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (doOnce == 3) if (timer <= 0) DLC03AFBFight02VertibirdStrafe02bREF.activate DLC03AFBFight02VertibirdStrafe02bREF 1 set timer to 3 set doOnce to 4 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (doOnce == 4) if (timer <= 0) DLC03AFBFight02VertibirdStrafe02cREF.activate DLC03AFBFight02VertibirdStrafe02cREF 1 set missileFireFlag to 1 set timer to 20 set doOnce to 5 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (doOnce == 5) ;handling the firing of missiles if (missileFireFlag == 1) if (timer <= 18) DLC03AFBFight02MissileSpawner01REF.fireWeapon DLC03WeapTeslaCannon set missileFireFlag to 2 endif elseif (missileFireFlag == 2) if (timer <= 17) DLC03AFBFight02MissileSpawner02REF.fireWeapon WeapMissileLauncher set missileFireFlag to 3 endif elseif (missileFireFlag == 3) if (timer <= 16) DLC03AFBFight02MissileSpawner03REF.fireWeapon DLC03WeapTeslaCannon set missileFireFlag to 4 endif elseif (missileFireFlag == 4) if (timer <= 14) DLC03AFBFight02MissileSpawner01REF.fireWeapon DLC03WeapTeslaCannon set missileFireFlag to 5 endif elseif (missileFireFlag == 5) if (timer <= 12) DLC03AFBFight02MissileSpawner03REF.fireWeapon WeapMissileLauncher DLC03AFBFight02VertibirdCrash01REF.do 200 set missileFireFlag to 6 endif elseif (missileFireFlag == 6) if (timer <= 11) DLC03AFBFight02MissileSpawner02REF.fireWeapon DLC03WeapTeslaCannon set missileFireFlag to 7 endif elseif (missileFireFlag == 7) if (timer <= 10) DLC03AFBFight02MissileSpawner01REF.fireWeapon WeapMissileLauncher set missileFireFlag to 0 endif endif
;handling the crashing vertibird if (crashVertibird01 == 0) if (timer <= 7.5) DLC03AFBFight02VertibirdCrash01REF.do 1000 set crashVertibird01 to 1 endif endif
;handling the vertibird bomber if (timer <= 0) ;DLC03AFBVertibirdBomber03REF.activate DLC03AFBVertibirdBomber03REF 1 set timer to 20 set doOnce to 6 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
endif
End
;*****************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0)
set timer to 5
set doOnce to 1 endif
if (battleFlag == 0) set battleFlag to 1 endif
;if the player leaves the trigger and then comes back, we want the fight to continue if (BoS1Dead == 1) DLC03AFBFight02BoSGunFodder01MarkerRef.placeatme DLC03AFBFight02BoSGunFodder01 1 set BoS1Dead to 0 endif
if (BoS2Dead == 1) DLC03AFBFight02BoSGunFodder02MarkerRef.placeatme DLC03AFBFight02BoSGunFodder02 1 set BoS2Dead to 0 endif
if (BoS3Dead == 1) DLC03AFBFight02BoSGunFodder03MarkerRef.placeatme DLC03AFBFight02BoSGunFodder03 1 set BoS3Dead to 0 endif
if (Enclave1Dead == 1) DLC03AFBFight02EnclaveGunFodder01SpawnREF.placeatme DLC03AFBFight02EnclaveGunFodder01 1 set Enclave1Dead to 0 endif
if (Enclave2Dead == 1) DLC03AFBFight02EnclaveGunFodder02SpawnREF.placeatme DLC03AFBFight02EnclaveGunFodder02 1 set Enclave2Dead to 0 endif
if (Enclave3Dead == 1) DLC03AFBFight02EnclaveGunFodder03SpawnREF.placeatme DLC03AFBFight02EnclaveGunFodder03 1 set Enclave3Dead to 0 endif
End
;*****************************************
Begin onTriggerLeave Player
if (battleFlag == 1) set battleFlag to 0 endif
End
;*****************************************

scn DLC03BosEnclaveFight02bTriggerSCRIPT

;**************************************

scn DLC03AFBFight02EnclaveGunFodder01SCRIPT
;this script spawns in a new Enclave soldier to take the spot of the dead one ;chance that a missile or minigun BoS will be spawned
short doOnce short spawner short cleanup float timer
;*****************************************************
Begin onDeath
if (DLC03AFBFight02TriggerREF.battleFlag == 1) set spawner to (1 + (0.06 * getRandomPercent)) set doOnce to 1 else set DLC03AFBFight02TriggerREF.Enclave1Dead to 1 endif
set timer to 10 ;timer for corpse disabling set cleanup to 1 ;handles disabling of corpses
End
;*****************************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) if (spawner == 1) DLC03AFBFight02EnclaveGunFodder01SpawnREF.placeatme DLC03AFBFight02EnclaveMissileFodder01 1 elseif (spawner == 2) DLC03AFBFight02EnclaveGunFodder01SpawnREF.placeatme DLC03AFBFight02EnclaveGatlingFodder01 1 elseif (spawner == 3) DLC03AFBFight02EnclaveGunFodder01SpawnREF.placeatme DLC03AFBFight02EnclaveNapalmFodder01 1 else DLC03AFBFight02EnclaveGunFodder01SpawnREF.placeatme DLC03AFBFight02EnclaveGunFodder01 1 endif
set doOnce to 2 endif
if (cleanup == 1) if (timer <= 0) Disable ;corpse cleanup set cleanup to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
End
;*****************************************************

scn DLC03EnclaveRipperConfrontSCRIPT ; ; ;When activated, this guy will enable and walk to his linkedRef ;================================
ref activateRef

if activateRef.getDestructionStage > 1 enable endif
end

scn DLC03EnclaveBaseScript
short Squad01Control ;0 = squad sandbox (stage 10) ;1 = squad goes downstairs (stage 11) ;2 = squad searches for weapons(stage 12) ;3 = squad gets the talk(stage 13) ;5 = squad goes outside(stage 15)
short investigatorControl ;0 = go to panel ;1 = Sandbox, with startCombat player on begin.
short robotControl ;0 = normal behavior (stage 30) ;1 = frenzy (stage 31) ;2 = player friendly/allied (stage 32) ;3 = recuperate (stage 33) ;4 = shut down (stage 34)
short DeathclawFollow ;1 = follow
short StiggsState ;1 = Dialog Package ;else = sandbox ;2 = leave
short Zone01 ;this is to tell whether or not to shoot rockets, and other things ;0 = player not in Zone01 ;1 = player in Zone01
short Zone02 ;is player in top part of tower? ;0 = player not in Zone02 ;1 = player in Zone02

scn DLC03TriggerBaseDownstairsScript

if doOnce != 1 DLC03SquadAEnableMarker.enable DLC03EMBEnableMarker.enable set myself to getself activate myself set doOnce to 1 setstage DLC03EnclaveBase 11 ;tell squad 1 to go downstairs. playsound3d MQ08FireAlarmKlaxonTypeB endif end

endif

set doOnce to 1

ScriptName DLC03PresMetroPowerBoxScript
short botActivated short doOnce
Begin OnActivate
if (DLC03NQlvl.powerFixed == 0) if (IsActionRef player == 1) if ( Player.GetItemCount DLC03PresMetroFuse > 0 ) Player.RemoveItem DLC03PresMetroFuse 10 DLC03PresMetroPowerFuseREF.enable 0 DLC03PresMetroBoxSparksREF.disable 0 DLC03PresMetroLightsREF.disable DLC03PresMetroDoor02REF.Unlock DLC03PresMetroPowerupSoundREF.PlaySound3D AMBElevatorMonumentPowerUp DLC03PresMetro02ConsoleBACK01OFFREF.disable DLC03PresMetro02Console01OFFREF.disable DLC03PresMetro02ConsoleBACK01REF.enable 0 DLC03PresMetro02Console01REF.enable 0 set DLC03NQlvl.powerFixed to 1 set doOnce to 1 else ShowMessage DLC03CantUseMsg endif endif else ;Do Nothing endif
End
Begin GameMode
if (botActivated == 1) DLC03PresMetroLvlRobotBossREF.RemoveItem DLC03PresMetroFuse 10 DLC03PresMetroPowerFuseREF.enable 0 DLC03PresMetroBoxSparksREF.disable 0 DLC03PresMetroLightsREF.disable DLC03PresMetroPowerupSoundREF.PlaySound3D AMBElevatorMonumentPowerUp DLC03PresMetro02ConsoleBACK01OFFREF.disable DLC03PresMetro02Console01OFFREF.disable DLC03PresMetro02ConsoleBACK01REF.enable 0 DLC03PresMetro02Console01REF.enable 0 set DLC03NQlvl.powerFixed to 1 DLC03PresMetroDoor02REF.Unlock set doOnce to 1 set botActivated to 2 endif
End

scn DLC03PresMetroDoDamage01SCRIPT
; This trigger does X damage to it's linked ref on load
ref target short doOnce
Begin onLoad if doOnce == 0 set target to getLinkedRef target.damageAV Health 20 set doOnce to 1 ;Trigger is only set off one time endif End

scn DLC03PresMetroGhoulWave01SCRIPT
short doOnce1 short doOnce2 short doOnce3 short doOnce4
short doLoadOnce
short botNumber ;Current number of bots in Wave01 alive short wave ;The wave the the feral ghouls are currently on float timer ;Timer between waves short maxBots ;Max bots that can respawn during Wave01
short requiredGhouls ;The amount of ghouls the player is supposed to kill to have "helped" the bots short ghoulsKilled ;Overall ghouls killed by bots and player short ghoulsPlayerKilled ;The amount of ghouls the player has actually killed
short killedEnoughGhouls ;Has the player killed enough ghouls? short feralAttackEnded ;Has the feral attack ended?
short ghoulsDead
Begin OnLoad if (doLoadOnce == 0) ;Place initial bots for wave 01 DLC03PresMetroBotWave01Start01REF.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC03PresMetroLvlRobotWave01 2 DLC03PresMetroBotWave01Start02REF.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC03PresMetroLvlRobotWave01 2 DLC03PresMetroBotWave01Start03REF.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC03PresMetroLvlRobotWave01 2 ; DLC03PresMetroBotWave01Start04REF.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC03PresMetroLvlRobotWave01 2
;Place initial feral ghouls for wave 01 DLC03PresMetroGhoulWave01Start01REF.PlaceAtMe DLC03PresMetroFeralGhoul03 1 DLC03PresMetroGhoulWave01Start02REF.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC03PresMetroFeralGhoul03 1 DLC03PresMetroGhoulWave01Start03REF.PlaceAtMe DLC03PresMetroFeralGhoul03 1 DLC03PresMetroGhoulWave01Start04REF.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC03PresMetroFeralGhoul03 2 DLC03PresMetroGhoulWave01Start05REF.PlaceAtMe DLC03PresMetroFeralGhoul03 1
set wave to 1 set timer to 6 set botNumber to 4 set requiredGhouls to 3 set doLoadOnce to 1 endif End
Begin GameMode
;Has the player killed enough ghouls? if (doOnce1 == 0) if (ghoulsPlayerKilled >= requiredGhouls) set killedEnoughGhouls to 1 set doOnce1 to 1 endif endif
;Has the player, and bots, killed enough ghouls to end the assault? if (doOnce2 == 0) if (ghoulsKilled >= 21) set feralAttackEnded to 1 set doOnce2 to 1 endif endif
;Has the player killed enough ghouls, and has the attack ended? if (doOnce3 == 0) if (killedEnoughGhouls == 1) && (feralAttackEnded == 1) set DLC03NQlvl.playerHelped to 1 ;Player has helped the bots set doOnce3 to 1 endif endif
;Has the player not killed enough ghouls, and has the attack ended? ;if (doOnce4 == 0) ; if (killedEnoughGhouls == 0) && (feralAttackEnded == 1) ; set DLC03NQlvl.playerDidntHelp to 1 ;Player didnt help the bots ; set DLC03NQlvl.botsFriendly to 0 ;so make them enemies again ; set doOnce4 to 1 ; endif ;endif
;if the botNumber falls below X spawn a new bot if (botNumber <= 3) && (maxBots < 1) DLC03PresMetroBotSpawnWave01REF.PlaceAtMe DLC03PresMetroLvlRobotWave01 1 set botNumber to (botNumber + 1) set maxBots to (maxBots +1) endif
if (wave == 1) if (timer <= 0) && (ghoulsDead > 3) DLC03PresMetroGhoulSpawnWave01REF.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC03PresMetroFeralGhoul03 0 DLC03PresMetroGhoulSpawnWave01REF.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC03PresMetroFeralGhoul03 1 DLC03PresMetroGhoulSpawnWave01REF.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC03PresMetroFeralGhoul03 0 DLC03PresMetroGhoulSpawnWave01REF.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC03PresMetroFeralGhoul03 2 set timer to 10 set wave to 2 endif if (timer > 0) set timer to timer - getSecondsPassed endif endif
if (wave == 2) if (timer <= 0) && (ghoulsDead > 6) DLC03PresMetroGhoulSpawnWave01REF.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC03PresMetroFeralGhoul03 1 DLC03PresMetroGhoulSpawnWave01REF.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC03PresMetroFeralGhoul03 2 set timer to 20 set wave to 3 endif if (timer > 0) set timer to timer - getSecondsPassed endif endif
if (wave == 3) if (timer <= 0) && (ghoulsDead > 9) DLC03PresMetroGhoulSpawnWave01REF.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC03PresMetroFeralGhoul03 1 DLC03PresMetroGhoulSpawnWave01REF.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC03PresMetroFeralGhoul03 2 DLC03PresMetroGhoulSpawnWave01REF.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC03PresMetroFeralGhoul03 0 set timer to 10 set wave to 4 endif if (timer > 0) set timer to timer - getSecondsPassed endif endif
if (wave == 4) if (timer <= 0) && (ghoulsDead > 11) DLC03PresMetroGhoulSpawnWave01REF.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC03PresMetroFeralGhoul03 0 DLC03PresMetroGhoulSpawnWave01REF.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC03PresMetroFeralGhoul03 3 DLC03PresMetroGhoulSpawnWave01REF.PlaceLeveledActorAtMe DLC03PresMetroFeralGhoul03 2 set timer to 10 set wave to 5 endif if (timer > 0) set timer to timer - getSecondsPassed endif endif
End

scn DLC03PresMetroLvlRobotWave01SCRIPT
short doOnce short doOnce2
Begin OnDeath
if (IsKiller Player == 1)
if (DLC03BS3.BS3GetSecurity == 1) ;If a bot is killed by the player and security has been called set DLC03NQlvl.killedAfterBreach to 1 ;set this variable to 1 endif
if (DLC03NQlvl.botsFriendly == 1) set DLC03NQlvl.playerHarmed to 1 endif
set DLC03NQlvl.botsFriendly to 0 endif
set DLC03PresMetroGhoulWave01TrigREF.botNumber to (DLC03PresMetroGhoulWave01TrigREF.botNumber - 1)
End
Begin GameMode
;If player talks to computer and chooses to help make the bots friendly if (DLC03NQlvl.botsFriendly == 1) if (doOnce == 0) AddToFaction DLC03PresMetroRobotFaction 1 StopCombat set doOnce to 1 endif endif
;If player goes back on his offer to help and shoots one of the bots they will become enemies if (DLC03NQlvl.botsFriendly == 0) if (doOnce == 1) RemoveFromFaction DLC03PresMetroRobotFaction StopCombat set doOnce to 2 endif endif
;If the player chose to help, and didn't actually help, the bots will become enemies if (DLC03NQlvl.playerDidntHelp == 1) if (doOnce2 == 0) RemoveFromFaction DLC03PresMetroRobotFaction StopCombat set doOnce2 to 1 endif endif
End

scn DLC03PresMetroTurretWave01SCRIPT short doOnce short doOnce2
Begin OnDeath
if (IsKiller Player == 1)
if (DLC03BS3.BS3GetSecurity == 1) ;If a bot is killed by the player and security has been called set DLC03NQlvl.killedAfterBreach to 1 ;set this variable to 1 endif
if (DLC03NQlvl.botsFriendly == 1) ;If a bot is killed by the player and the bots are friendly set DLC03NQlvl.playerHarmed to 1 ;set this variable to 1 endif
set DLC03NQlvl.botsFriendly to 0
endif
End
Begin GameMode
;If player talks to computer and chooses to help make the bots friendly if (DLC03NQlvl.botsFriendly == 1) if (doOnce == 0) AddToFaction DLC03PresMetroRobotFaction 1 StopCombat set doOnce to 1 endif endif
;If player goes back on his offer to help and shoots one of the bots they will become enemies if (DLC03NQlvl.botsFriendly == 0) if (doOnce == 1) RemoveFromFaction DLC03PresMetroRobotFaction StopCombat set doOnce to 2 endif endif
;If the player chose to help, and didn't actually help, the bots will become enemies if (DLC03NQlvl.playerDidntHelp == 1) if (doOnce2 == 0) RemoveFromFaction DLC03PresMetroRobotFaction StopCombat set doOnce2 to 1 endif endif
End

scn DLC03PresMetroFeralGhoul03SCRIPT
Begin OnDeath
if (IsKiller Player == 1) set DLC03PresMetroGhoulWave01TrigREF.ghoulsPlayerKilled to (DLC03PresMetroGhoulWave01TrigREF.ghoulsPlayerKilled + 1) endif
set DLC03PresMetroGhoulWave01TrigREF.ghoulsKilled to (DLC03PresMetroGhoulWave01TrigREF.ghoulsKilled + 1)
set DLC03PresMetroGhoulWave01TrigREF.ghoulsDead to (DLC03PresMetroGhoulWave01TrigREF.ghoulsDead + 1)
End

scn DLC03PresMetroLvlRobotBossSCRIPT
short doOnce short doOnce2 short doOnce3
Begin OnLoad
additem DLC03PresMetroFuse 1
End
Begin OnDeath
if (IsKiller Player == 1)
if (DLC03BS3.BS3GetSecurity == 1) ;If a bot is killed by the player and security has been called set DLC03NQlvl.killedAfterBreach to 1 ;set this variable to 1 endif
if (DLC03NQlvl.botsFriendly == 1) set DLC03NQlvl.playerHarmed to 1 endif
set DLC03NQlvl.botsFriendly to 0 endif
set DLC03PresMetroGhoulWave01TrigREF.botNumber to (DLC03PresMetroGhoulWave01TrigREF.botNumber - 1)
End
Begin GameMode
;If player has helped the robots, and is within a certain distance of the boss. ; the boss will go and repair the power if (DLC03NQlvl.playerHelped == 1) if (GetDistance player <= 600) if (doOnce3 == 0) SetAV Variable05 1 evp set doOnce3 to 1 endif endif endif
;If player talks to computer and chooses to help make the bots friendly if (DLC03NQlvl.botsFriendly == 1) if (doOnce == 0) AddToFaction DLC03PresMetroRobotFaction 1 StopCombat set doOnce to 1 endif endif
;If player goes back on his offer to help and shoots one of the bots they will become enemies if (DLC03NQlvl.botsFriendly == 0) if (doOnce == 1) RemoveFromFaction DLC03PresMetroRobotFaction StopCombat set doOnce to 2 endif endif
;If the player chose to help, and didn't actually help, the bots will become enemies if (DLC03NQlvl.playerDidntHelp == 1) if (doOnce2 == 0) RemoveFromFaction DLC03PresMetroRobotFaction StopCombat set doOnce2 to 1 endif endif
End

scn DLC03BosEnclaveFight01cTriggerSCRIPT

;**************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player

scn DLC03AFBSector2ArtillerySwitch01SCRIPT
float timer float artilleryTimer ;if artillery hasn't been launched in this amount of time, then put enclave back to normal packages
ref actionRef ref target01 ref target02 ref target03 ref target04 ref target05 ref target06 ref target07 ref target08
short artilleryDice short artilleryStage short previousTarget short artilleryLaunched ;condition variable for Enclave package to start new patrol with weapons drawn short counter ;counts the number of times before the switch breaks short doOnce
;************************************
Begin onLoad
setstage NQlvl 1
End
;************************************
Begin onActivate
set actionRef to getActionRef if (actionRef == Player) if (artilleryStage == 0) activate set counter to (counter + 1) set timer to 2 set artilleryStage to 1 endif endif
End
;************************************
Begin gameMode
if (artilleryStage == 1) set artilleryStage to 2
;need to pick two markers as targets for the artillery strike set artilleryDice to (1 + (0.12 * getRandomPercent))
if (artilleryDice == previousTarget) if (artilleryDice == 12) set artilleryDice to 1 else set artilleryDice to (artilleryDice + 1) endif set previousTarget to artilleryDice else set previousTarget to artilleryDice endif
if (artilleryDice == 1) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector2Target01REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector2Target02REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector2Target03REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector2Target04REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector2Target05REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector2Target06REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector2Target07REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector2Target08REF elseif (artilleryDice == 2) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector2Target02REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector2Target03REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector2Target04REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector2Target05REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector2Target06REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector2Target07REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector2Target08REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector2Target09REF elseif (artilleryDice == 3) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector2Target03REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector2Target04REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector2Target05REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector2Target06REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector2Target07REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector2Target08REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector2Target09REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector2Target10REF elseif (artilleryDice == 4) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector2Target04REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector2Target05REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector2Target06REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector2Target07REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector2Target08REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector2Target09REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector2Target10REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector2Target11REF elseif (artilleryDice == 5) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector2Target05REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector2Target06REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector2Target07REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector2Target08REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector2Target09REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector2Target10REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector2Target11REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector2Target12REF elseif (artilleryDice == 6) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector2Target06REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector2Target07REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector2Target08REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector2Target09REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector2Target10REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector2Target11REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector2Target12REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector2Target01REF elseif (artilleryDice == 7) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector2Target07REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector2Target08REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector2Target09REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector2Target10REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector2Target11REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector2Target12REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector2Target01REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector2Target02REF elseif (artilleryDice == 8) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector2Target08REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector2Target09REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector2Target10REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector2Target11REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector2Target12REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector2Target01REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector2Target02REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector2Target03REF elseif (artilleryDice == 9) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector2Target09REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector2Target10REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector2Target11REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector2Target12REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector2Target01REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector2Target02REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector2Target03REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector2Target04REF elseif (artilleryDice == 10) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector2Target10REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector2Target11REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector2Target12REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector2Target01REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector2Target02REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector2Target03REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector2Target04REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector2Target05REF elseif (artilleryDice == 11) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector2Target11REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector2Target12REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector2Target01REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector2Target02REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector2Target03REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector2Target04REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector2Target05REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector2Target06REF elseif (artilleryDice == 12) set target01 to DLC03AFBSector2Target12REF set target02 to DLC03AFBSector2Target01REF set target03 to DLC03AFBSector2Target02REF set target04 to DLC03AFBSector2Target03REF set target05 to DLC03AFBSector2Target04REF set target06 to DLC03AFBSector2Target05REF set target07 to DLC03AFBSector2Target06REF set target08 to DLC03AFBSector2Target07REF endif
elseif (artilleryStage == 2) if (timer <= 0) target01.placeatme FXArtilleryStrike01 1 set timer to .5 set artilleryStage to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (artilleryStage == 3) if (timer <= 0) target02.placeatme FXArtilleryStrike01 1 set timer to .5 set artilleryStage to 4 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (artilleryStage == 4) if (timer <= 0) target03.placeatme FXArtilleryStrike01 1 set timer to .5 set artilleryStage to 5 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (artilleryStage == 5) if (timer <= 0) target04.placeatme FXArtilleryStrike01 1 set timer to .5 set artilleryStage to 6 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (artilleryStage == 6) if (timer <= 0) target05.placeatme FXArtilleryStrike01 1 set timer to .5 set artilleryStage to 7 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (artilleryStage == 7) if (timer <= 0) target06.placeatme FXArtilleryStrike01 1 set timer to .5 set artilleryStage to 8 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (artilleryStage == 8) if (timer <= 0) target07.placeatme FXArtilleryStrike01 1 set timer to .5 set artilleryStage to 9 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (artilleryStage == 9) if (timer <= 0) set artilleryLaunched to 1
DLC03AFBSector2Enclave01REF.evp DLC03AFBSector2Enclave02REF.evp DLC03AFBSector2Enclave03REF.evp DLC03AFBSector2Enclave04REF.evp
set artilleryTimer to 20 target08.placeatme FXArtilleryStrike01 1 set timer to 2 activate ;turn switch back to red
set artilleryStage to 0 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (GetQuestRunning DLC03BS3 == 1) if (doOnce == 0) if (counter >= 2) ;enable a vertibird that strafes the artillery launch position DLC03AFBSector2VertibirdStrafe01REF.activate DLC03AFBSector2VertibirdStrafe01REF 1 set doOnce to 1 endif elseif (doOnce == 1) if (counter >= 10) ;enable a vertibird that bombs the artillery launch position DLC03AFBSector2VertibirdBomber01REF.activate DLC03AFBSector2VertibirdBomber01REF 1 set doOnce to 2 endif endif endif
if (artilleryLaunched == 1) if (artilleryTimer <= 0) set artilleryLaunched to 0 DLC03AFBSector2Enclave01REF.evp DLC03AFBSector2Enclave02REF.evp DLC03AFBSector2Enclave03REF.evp DLC03AFBSector2Enclave04REF.evp else set artilleryTimer to (artilleryTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
End
;************************************

scn DLC03AFBSector2VertibirdBombingTrigger01SCRIPT
; This trigger enables it's linked ref (a vertibird) and calls its forward animation ; It also tells the vertibird when to fire its weapon
float timer float fireTimer short doOnce short firingFlag ;0 - not firing 1 - waiting to fire 2 - firing vertibirdgun 3 - firing fatman ref linkedRef
;*****************************************
Begin gameMode if linkedRef == 0 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef endif
if (doOnce == 1) if (linkedRef.HasLoaded3D != 0) linkedRef.playgroup Forward 1 set fireTimer to 2.5 set firingFlag to 1 set timer to 3.5 ;timer now becomes the master timer for the firing block set doOnce to 2 endif
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (linkedRef.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) linkedRef.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its forward animation set doOnce to 3 endif
if (timer <=0) set firingFlag to 0 else if (firingFlag == 1) if (fireTimer <=0) linkedRef.fireWeapon vertibirdBombgun set fireTimer to .5 set firingFlag to 2 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (firingFlag == 2) if (fireTimer <=0) linkedRef.fireWeapon vertibirdBombgun set fireTimer to .5 set firingFlag to 1 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed)
endif
endif
End
;***************************************** Begin onActivate if (doOnce == 0) linkedRef.enable 0 set timer to 1 set doOnce to 1 endif End

scn DLC03WQ01FinScript
;Note: payment to player is handled in quest stage 1
short cutAmount ;how many caps per payment the player is due float moneyDay ;the day the next payment will be available short paymentCount ;how many payments have accrued since the player's last visit (reset in dialog)
short playerLuck short playerGotLucky ;the player got lucky, so he can get a dialog option to more caps when he gets his cut
Begin GameMode
;initialize the cutAmount (we are using a variable in case we want to change the amount later) if cutAmount == 0 set cutAmount to 50 ;each week the player will receive this amount in caps if he visits the gang endif
if moneyDay != 0
;payment day has arrived increment paymentCount if GameDaysPassed >= moneyDay set paymentCount to paymentCount + 1 set moneyDay to GameDaysPassed + 7
;did the player get lucky? set playerLuck to player.getAV Luck if getRandomPercent <= playerLuck * 10 set playerGotLucky to 1
else set playerGotLucky to 0
endif
;add money to other gang members if they aren't already rich if DLC03WQ01BanditBodyGuardRefA.getDead == 0 if DLC03WQ01BanditBodyGuardRefA.getItemCount caps001 < 500 DLC03WQ01BanditBodyGuardRefA.addItem caps001 cutAmount + 10 endif endif if DLC03WQ01BanditBodyGuardRefB.getDead == 0 if DLC03WQ01BanditBodyGuardRefB.getItemCount caps001 < 500 DLC03WQ01BanditBodyGuardRefB.addItem caps001 cutAmount + 10 endif endif if DLC03WQ01BanditBodyGuardRefC.getDead == 0 if DLC03WQ01BanditBodyGuardRefC.getItemCount caps001 < 500 DLC03WQ01BanditBodyGuardRefC.addItem caps001 cutAmount + 10 endif endif endif
endif
End

ScriptName DLC03PresMetroTrain1DoorSCRIPT
short doOnce
Begin OnActivate
if IsActionRef player == 1 if (DLC03PresMetroPowerBoxREF.doOnce == 0) ShowMessage DLC03PresMetroDoorNoUse else ;Do Nothing endif endif
End
Begin GameMode
if (doOnce == 0) if (DLC03PresMetroPowerBoxREF.doOnce == 1) SetOpenState 1 set doOnce to 1 endif endif
End

scn DLC03PowerWorksZMachineMasterSCRIPT
;// the stages of the machine(on/off) short machineStage
;// the pylons stop working when shut down ;// 0 = Dormant ;// 1 = Activated ;// 2 = Off short pylonAH short pylonAHLooped short pylonBC short pylonBCLooped short pylonDE short pylonDELooped short pylonFG short pylonFGLooped
;// the timer short pylonShockTimerInit float pylonShockTimer
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;// check to see if we're all done IF pylonBC == 2 && pylonDE == 2 && pylonFG == 2 DLC03PowerworksEffectMain.disable DLC03PowerworksGlowFillMain.disable DLC03PowerworksLightMain.disable
;// red light fills DLC03PowerworksRedFillA.enable DLC03PowerworksRedFillB.enable DLC03PowerworksRedFillC.enable DLC03PowerworksRedFillD.enable DLC03PowerworksRedFillE.enable DLC03PowerworksRedFillF.enable DLC03PowerworksRedFillG.enable DLC03PowerworksRedFillH.enable
DLC03PowerworksRedFillMain.enable ENDIF
END

scn DLC03TriggerMBP02SCRIPT
; This trigger is triggered by the player only and enables its Linked ref. ; This trigger only gets triggered once.
ref target short doOnce
Begin onTriggerEnter Player if doOnce == 0 set target to getLinkedRef target.enable set doOnce to 1 ;Trigger is only set off one time DLC03MBPVTrigger01.activate DLC03MBPVTrigger01 1 DLC03MBPVTrigger02.activate DLC03MBPVTrigger02 1 ;DLC03MBPVTrigger03.activate DLC03MBPVTrigger03 1 endif End

SCN DLC03TriggerZone01Script
begin OnTriggerEnter Player set DLC03EnclaveBase.Zone01 to 1 setstage DLC03EnclaveBase 99 end
begin OnTriggerLeave Player set DLC03EnclaveBase.Zone01 to 0 setstage DLC03EnclaveBase 99 end

scn DLC03MBPVertibirdStrafing03bSCRIPT
; This trigger enables it's linked ref (a vertibird) and calls its strafing animation ; It also tells the vertibird when to fire its weapon ;Only fires if player is in Zone 1
float timer float fireTimer short doOnce short firingFlag ref linkedRef
;*****************************************
Begin gameMode if linkedRef == 0 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef endif
if (doOnce == 1) if (linkedRef.HasLoaded3D != 0) linkedRef.playgroup Forward 1 set timer to 7 set doOnce to 2 endif
elseif (doOnce ==2) if (timer <= 0) set firingFlag to 1 set fireTimer to .1 ;vertibird going to shoot lasers for this long set timer to 2.5 ;vertibird is laser shooting position for this long set doOnce to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 3) if (timer <=0) ;vertibird in position to start firing laser set timer to 4 ;vertibird takes this long to get into hovering position set doOnce to 4 else if (firingFlag == 1) if (fireTimer <= 0) linkedRef.fireWeapon DLC03AFBVertibirdGun set fireTimer to .1 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed)
endif
elseif (doOnce == 4) if (timer <= 0) set fireTimer to .5 ;vertibird going to shoot for this long once in position set timer to 2 ;vertibird is hovering for this long before flying away set doOnce to 5 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 5) if (timer <= 0) set doOnce to 6 else if (firingFlag == 1) if (fireTimer <= 0) if DLC03EnclaveBase.Zone01 == 1 linkedRef.fireWeapon DLC03VertibirdMissileLauncher endif set fireTimer to .5 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed)
endif
elseif (doOnce == 6) if (linkedRef.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) linkedRef.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its forward animation set doOnce to 7 endif endif
End
;***************************************** Begin onActivate if (doOnce == 0) linkedRef.enable 0 set timer to 1 set doOnce to 1 endif End

scn DLC03WQ03MonasteryScript
short DoOnce
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter
if IsActionRef player == 1
if DoOnce == 0 if GetStage DLC03WQ03 < 100 if DLC03WQ03BrotherGerardREF.getDead == 1 && DLC03WQ03BrotherGerardREF.IsKiller Player SetStage DLC03WQ03 105 else SetStage DLC03WQ03 100 endif endif
setObjectiveCompleted DLC03WQ03 57 1
setObjectiveDisplayed DLC03WQ03 100 1
set DoOnce to 1 endif
endif
END

scn DLC03TeslaCoil01SCRIPT
short damageCount short doOnce short loadOnce
BEGIN ONLOAD
;// make sure it starts at 0 IF loadOnce == 0 set damageCount to 0 set loadOnce to 1 ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
;******************** ;** if its the player activating us ;******************** IF IsActionRef player == 1
set damageCount to 0
;///////// ;// figure out how much damage to do ;///////// IF DLC03PowerWorksZMachineMain.pylonAH != 2 set damageCount to damageCount + 1 ENDIF
IF DLC03PowerWorksZMachineMain.pylonBC != 2 set damageCount to damageCount + 1 ENDIF
IF DLC03PowerWorksZMachineMain.pylonDE != 2 set damageCount to damageCount + 1 ENDIF
IF DLC03PowerWorksZMachineMain.pylonFG != 2 set damageCount to damageCount + 1 ENDIF
;///////// ;// give the player the item and damage them ;///////// IF damageCount == 1 player.say Hit playSound3D TRPToilet imod TrapToiletShockISFX player.damageAV health 50 player.pms pulseDisableFXShader ELSEIF damageCount == 2 player.say Hit playSound3D TRPToilet imod TrapToiletShockISFX player.damageAV health 100 player.pms pulseDisableFXShader ELSEIF damageCount == 3 player.say Hit playSound3D TRPToilet imod TrapToiletShockISFX player.damageAV health 200 player.pms pulseDisableFXShader ELSEIF damageCount == 4 player.say Hit playSound3D TRPToilet imod TrapToiletShockISFX player.damageAV health 300 player.pms pulseDisableFXShader ENDIF
;// shock them every time but quest item once IF doOnce == 0 ;// add the item to the player's inventory DLC03PowerWorksTeslaCoilMain.playgroup forward 0 DLC03PowerworksEffectMain.disable Player.additem dlc03teslacoil 1
;// do it once set doOnce to 1 ENDIF
ENDIF
END

scn DLC03PowerWorksZMachineFailSwitchSCRIPT
short damageCount short doOnce short loadOnce short switchBCOnce short switchDEOnce short switchFGOnce
BEGIN ONLOAD
;// make sure it starts at 0 IF loadOnce == 0 set damageCount to 0 set loadOnce to 1 ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
;******************** ;** if its the player activating us ;******************** IF IsActionRef player == 1
;/////////// ;// flip the appropriate switch to off ;/////////// IF getSelf == DLC03PowerWorksZMachineFailSwitchBC && switchBCOnce == 0 set DLC03PowerWorksZMachineMain.pylonBC to 2 DLC03PowerworksEffectSideBCA.disable DLC03PowerworksEffectSideBCB.disable playgroup forward 0 set switchBCOnce to 1
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC03PowerWorksZMachineFailSwitchDE && switchDEOnce == 0 set DLC03PowerWorksZMachineMain.pylonDE to 2 DLC03PowerworksEffectSideDEA.disable DLC03PowerworksEffectSideDEB.disable playgroup forward 0 set switchDEOnce to 1
ELSEIF getSelf == DLC03PowerWorksZMachineFailSwitchFG && switchFGOnce == 0 set DLC03PowerWorksZMachineMain.pylonFG to 2 DLC03PowerworksEffectSideFGA.disable DLC03PowerworksEffectSideFGB.disable set switchFGOnce to 1 playgroup forward 0
ENDIF
;// check to see if we're all done IF DLC03PowerWorksZMachineMain.pylonBC == 2 && DLC03PowerWorksZMachineMain.pylonDE == 2 && DLC03PowerWorksZMachineMain.pylonFG == 2 DLC03PowerworksEffectMain.disable DLC03PowerworksGlowFillMain.disable DLC03PowerworksLightMain.disable
;// red light fills DLC03PowerworksRedFillA.enable DLC03PowerworksRedFillB.enable DLC03PowerworksRedFillC.enable DLC03PowerworksRedFillD.enable DLC03PowerworksRedFillE.enable DLC03PowerworksRedFillF.enable DLC03PowerworksRedFillG.enable DLC03PowerworksRedFillH.enable
DLC03PowerworksRedFillMain.enable ENDIF
ENDIF
END

scn DLC03PresMetroComputerAlarmSCRIPT
short doOnce
Begin GameMode if doOnce == 0 if (DLC03BS3.BS3GetSecurity == 1) DLC03PresMetroAlarmTurret01REF.RemoveFromFaction DLC03PresMetroRobotFaction DLC03PresMetroAlarmTurret02REF.RemoveFromFaction DLC03PresMetroRobotFaction DLC03PresMetroAlarmKlaxon01REF.enable DLC03PresMetroAlarmLight01REF.enable DLC03PresMetroAlarmLight02REF.enable DLC03PresMetroAlarmLightMesh01REF.PlayGroup Forward 1 DLC03PresMetroAlarmLightMesh02REF.PlayGroup Forward 1 DLC03PresMetroAlarmBot01REF.enable set doOnce to 1 endif endif
if doOnce == 1 if (DLC03BS3.BS3GetSecurity == 0) DLC03PresMetroAlarmTurret01REF.AddToFaction DLC03PresMetroRobotFaction 1 DLC03PresMetroAlarmTurret02REF.AddToFaction DLC03PresMetroRobotFaction 1 DLC03PresMetroAlarmTurret01REF.StopCombat DLC03PresMetroAlarmTurret02REF.StopCombat DLC03PresMetroAlarmKlaxon01REF.disable DLC03PresMetroAlarmLight01REF.disable DLC03PresMetroAlarmLight02REF.disable DLC03PresMetroAlarmLightMesh01REF.PlayGroup Backward 1 DLC03PresMetroAlarmLightMesh02REF.PlayGroup Backward 1 set DLC03NQlvl.botsFriendly to 1 set doOnce to 2 endif endif
End

scn DLC03PresMetroAlarmTurretSCRIPT short doOnce short doOnce2
Begin OnLoad
AddToFaction DLC03PresMetroRobotFaction 1
End
Begin OnDeath
if (IsKiller Player == 1)
if (DLC03NQlvl.botsFriendly == 1) set DLC03NQlvl.playerHarmed to 1 endif
set DLC03NQlvl.botsFriendly to 0
endif
End
Begin GameMode
;If player talks to computer and chooses to help make the bots friendly if (DLC03NQlvl.botsFriendly == 1) if (doOnce == 0) AddToFaction DLC03PresMetroRobotFaction 1 StopCombat set doOnce to 1 endif endif
;If player goes back on his offer to help and shoots one of the bots they will become enemies if (DLC03NQlvl.botsFriendly == 0) if (doOnce == 1) RemoveFromFaction DLC03PresMetroRobotFaction StopCombat set doOnce to 2 endif endif
;If the player chose to help, and didn't actually help, the bots will become enemies if (DLC03NQlvl.playerDidntHelp == 1) if (doOnce2 == 0) RemoveFromFaction DLC03PresMetroRobotFaction StopCombat set doOnce2 to 1 endif endif
End

scn DLC03EnclaveBaseRobotControlSCRIPT ; ;This script will look for a quest variable to be set, at which point the robot will join the player faction, shut down, or do other things. ; ; ;=============================================
short runBlock short lastControl ;Guide for DLC03EnclaveBase.robotControl ;0 = normal behavior (stage 30) ;1 = frenzy (stage 31) ;2 = player friendly/allied (stage 32) ;3 = recuperate (stage 33) ;4 = shut down (stage 34)
begin GameMode
if lastControl != DLC03EnclaveBase.robotControl set lastControl to DLC03EnclaveBase.robotControl set runBlock to 1 endif
if runBlock == 1 set runBlock to 0
if DLC03EnclaveBase.robotControl == 0 ;return to normal behavior restoreAV braincondition 100 setUnconscious 0 stopCombat endif
if DLC03EnclaveBase.robotControl == 1 ;frenzy damageAV braincondition 100 setUnconscious 0 endif
if DLC03EnclaveBase.robotControl == 2 ;friend/ally stopCombat restoreAV braincondition 100 setUnconscious 0 endif
if DLC03EnclaveBase.robotControl == 4 ;shut down stopCombat setUnconscious 1 endif
endif
end

scn DLC03AFBLoDTowerSwapTrigger01SCRIPT
;This script handles swapping of the LOD tower and the regular tower in Adams AFB
short doOnce float timer
;******************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0) DLC03CrawlerTower01REF.enable 0 ;enable regular tower set timer to 3 set DLC03AFBLoDTowerSwapTrigger02aREF.doOnce to 0 ;reset swap trigger vars set DLC03AFBLoDTowerSwapTrigger02bREF.doOnce to 0 ;reset swap trigger vars
set doOnce to 1 endif
End
;******************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) if (timer <= 0) DLC03CrawlerTower02REF.disable ;disable LOD tower set doOnce to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPasseD) endif endif
End
;******************************************

scn DLC03AFBLoDTowerSwapTrigger02SCRIPT
;This script handles swapping of the LOD tower and the regular tower in Adams AFB
short doOnce float timer
;******************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0) DLC03CrawlerTower02REF.enable 0 ;enable LOD tower set timer to 3 set DLC03AFBLoDTowerSwapTrigger01aREF.doOnce to 0 ;reset swap trigger vars set DLC03AFBLoDTowerSwapTrigger01bREF.doOnce to 0 ;reset swap trigger vars set DLC03AFBLoDTowerSwapTrigger01cREF.doOnce to 0 ;reset swap trigger vars
set doOnce to 1 endif
End
;******************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) if (timer <= 0) DLC03CrawlerTower01REF.disable ;disable regular tower set doOnce to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPasseD) endif endif
End
;******************************************

scn DLC03LepelletierScript
short talking short attackPlayer
Begin OnActivate
if IsActionRef player == 1

else activate
endif
End
Begin OnDeath
set DLC03WQ01.LepelletierDead to 1 setStage DLC03WQ01 255 ;handles messagebox and possibly failing quest
End
Begin SayToDone
set talking to 0
if DLC03WQ01.LepelletierWillAttack == 1 sendAssaultAlarm
endif
End

scn DLC03ProjectPurityNavmeshTriggerSCRIPT
;This script handles the navmesh around project purity exterior for DLC03
short doOnce short doOnce02
;******************************************
Begin onLoad
if (doOnce == 0) ;disable correct navmeshes DisableNavMesh 010094CD ;disables navmesh ProjectPurityNavmesh01b DisableNavMesh 010094D2 ;disables navmesh ProjectPurityNavmesh02b DisableNavMesh 010094D3 ;disables navmesh ProjectPurityNavmesh03b DisableNavMesh 010094D5 ;disables navmesh ProjectPurityNavmesh06b DisableNavMesh 010094D7 ;disables navmesh ProjectPurityNavmesh07b ;enabling/disabling of navmeshes for DLC03 is handled in DLC03BS1 quest set doOnce to 1 endif
if (doOnce02 == 0) if (getQuestRunning DLC03BS1 == 1) DisableNavMesh 010094CC ;disables navmesh ProjectPurityNavmesh01a DisableNavMesh 010094CE ;disables navmesh ProjectPurityNavmesh02a DisableNavMesh 010094CF ;disables navmesh ProjectPurityNavmesh03a DisableNavMesh 010094D0 ;disables navmesh ProjectPurityNavmesh04a DisableNavMesh 010094D1 ;disables navmesh ProjectPurityNavmesh05a DisableNavMesh 010094D4 ;disables navmesh ProjectPurityNavmesh06a DisableNavMesh 010094D6 ;disables navmesh ProjectPurityNavmesh07a EnableNavMesh 010094CD ;enables navmesh ProjectPurityNavmesh01b EnableNavMesh 010094D2 ;enables navmesh ProjectPurityNavmesh02b EnableNavMesh 010094D3 ;enables navmesh ProjectPurityNavmesh03b EnableNavMesh 010094D5 ;enables navmesh ProjectPurityNavmesh06b EnableNavMesh 010094D7 ;enables navmesh ProjectPurityNavmesh07b set doOnce02 to 1 endif endif
End
;******************************************

scn DLC03MainDoorOpenSCRIPT
ref myLinked short openCheck
BEGIN ONLOAD
set myLinked to getLinkedRef END
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
IF openCheck == 0 ;// unlock and open the door myLinked.setOpenState 1
;// play the switch's anim setOpenState 1
;// check to see if we should be looking for close set openCheck to 1
ELSEIF openCheck == 1 myLinked.setOpenState 0
;// play the switch's anim setOpenState 0
;// check to see if we should be looking for close set openCheck to 0 ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF openCheck == 1 IF myLinked.getOpenState == 3 setOpenState 0 set openCheck to 0 ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC03DialoguePresMetroScript
short IntercomTalk float IntercomTimer
;This is the timer and reset for the intercom announcements from MARGoT in the Presidental Metro
begin gamemode

if ( IntercomTalk == 2 ) && ( IntercomTimer > 0 ) Set IntercomTimer to ( IntercomTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) elseif ( IntercomTalk == 2 ) && ( IntercomTimer <= 0 ) set IntercomTalk to 0 endif
end

scn testPhilSwitchSequenceSCRIPT
short resetAll
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
;////////////////// ;// hit the appropriate switch ;//////////////////
;// switch A (never true) IF getSelf == testPhilSwitchA set resetAll to 1
;// switch B (if F is already true) ELSEIF getSelf == testPhilSwitchB
;// check if F is done IF testPhilControl.switchFVar == 1 set testPhilControl.switchBVar to 1 testPhilLightB.playgroup Forward 0 setOpenState 1 ELSE set resetAll to 1 ENDIF
;// switch C (never true) ELSEIF getSelf == testPhilSwitchC set resetAll to 1
;// switch D (never true) ELSEIF getSelf == testPhilSwitchD set resetAll to 1
;// switch E (if F && B are already true) ELSEIF getSelf == testPhilSwitchE
;// check if F and B are done IF testPhilControl.switchFVar == 1 && testPhilControl.switchBVar == 1 set testPhilControl.switchEVar to 1 setOpenState 1 testPhilLightE.playgroup Forward 0 ELSE set resetAll to 1 ENDIF
ELSEIF getSelf == testPhilSwitchF set testPhilControl.switchFVar to 1 testPhilLightF.playgroup Forward 0 setOpenState 1
ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;////////////////// ;// the reset function ;////////////////// IF resetAll == 1
;// reset the variables set testPhilControl.switchAVar to 0 set testPhilControl.switchBVar to 0 set testPhilControl.switchCVar to 0 set testPhilControl.switchDVar to 0 set testPhilControl.switchEVar to 0 set testPhilControl.switchFVar to 0
;// reset the switches testPhilSwitchA.setOpenState 0 testPhilSwitchB.setOpenState 0 testPhilSwitchC.setOpenState 0 testPhilSwitchD.setOpenState 0 testPhilSwitchE.setOpenState 0 testPhilSwitchF.setOpenState 0
;// the lights testPhilLightF.playgroup backward 0 testPhilLightB.playgroup backward 0 testPhilLightE.playgroup backward 0
set resetAll to 0 ENDIF
END

endif

endif

scn DLC03PrMetroColTrainTrigSCRIPT
; This trigger controls the spawning, and animation, of the train hitting the ghoul scene
ref lookTarget
float timer
short playerLooked short doOnceA short doOnceB
Begin OnLoad
set timer to 2.5
End
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
;Spawn the Ghouls so they can wait until they die if (doOnceA == 0) DLC03PrMetroGhoulHit01REF.enable DLC03PrMetroGhoulHit02REF.enable set doOnceA to 1 ;Enable the ghoul(s) only once set doOnceB to 1 ;Enable the lookTrigger part of the script endif
End
Begin GameMode
if (doOnceB == 1) if (Player.getLOS DLC03PresMetroTrainColLookREF == 1) || (Player.getLOS DLC03PresMetroTrainColLook02REF == 1) DLC03TrainSoundMarkerREF.PlaySound OBJTrainBy3D Player.PlaySound OBJTrainBy2D set playerLooked to 1 set doOnceB to 0 endif endif
if (playerLooked == 1) if (timer < 0) DLC03ColTrainActivatorREF.PlayGroup Forward 1 set playerLooked to 0 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
End

End
Begin OnTriggerEnter DLC03PrMetroGhoulHit02REF
if (doOnceB == 0) DLC03PrMetroGhoulHit02REF.PlaceAtMe DLC03FakeForce100r1000 DLC03PrMetroGhoulHit02REF.killactor DLC03PrMetroGhoulHit02REF 1 DLC03PrMetroGhoulHit02REF.killactor DLC03PrMetroGhoulHit02REF 3 DLC03PrMetroGhoulHit02REF.killactor DLC03PrMetroGhoulHit02REF 7 DLC03PrMetroGhoulHit02REF.killactor DLC03PrMetroGhoulHit02REF 10 DLC03PrMetroGhoulHit02REF.killactor DLC03PrMetroGhoulHit02REF 5 set doOnceB to 1 endif
End

scn DLC03PostQuestScript
short DLC03PQSuperMutant ;1= Super Mutants are now huntable by the Player for their ears to turn into Tristan for Caps and XP short DLC03PQNumber ;x= Number of Blood Samples turned in short DLC03PQGoBlood ;1= Start the Blood Buying Process (in dialogue) short DLC03PQCashGive short DLC03PQXPGive short DLC03PQCamNumber ;x= Number of Cameras turned in short DLC03PQGoCamera ;1= Start the Camera Buying Process (in dialogue) short DLC03PQCameraCashGive short DLC03PQCameraXPGive short DLC03PQScrapNumber ;x= Number of Sensor Modules turned in short DLC03PQGoScrap ;1= Start the Sensor Module Buying Process (in dialogue) short DLC03PQScrapCashGive short DLC03PQScrapXPGive
begin gamemode
;This block handles the removal of the Blood from the Player's inventory as well as awarding cash and XP
if ( DLC03PQGoBlood == 1 ) ;This flag is set in dialog with Tristan if ( Player.GetItemCount DLC03SuperMutantBlood >= 1 ) Set DLC03PQNumber to ( Player.GetItemCount DLC03SuperMutantBlood ) ;Set the temporary variable to the number of samples player has Set DLC03PQGoBlood to 2 ;Advance the flag endif endif
if ( DLC03PQGoBlood == 2 ) ;From the above block if ( Player.GetItemCount DLC03SuperMutantBlood >= 1 ) Player.RemoveItem DLC03SuperMutantBlood DLC03PQNumber ;Remove the number of samples equal to amount tallyed/carried Set DLC03PQCashGive to ( DLC03PQNumber * 50 ) ;Calculate Cash given Set DLC03PQXPGive to ( DLC03PQNumber * 10 ) ;Calculate XP given Player.AddItem Caps001 DLC03PQCashGive ;Add 50 caps per sample turned in RewardXP DLC03PQXPGive ;Reward Player 25XP for each sample turned in set DLC03PQGoBlood to 0 ;Reset the flag set DLC03PQNumber to 0 ;Reset the temporary variable set DLC03PQCashGive to 0 set DLC03PQXPGive to 0 endif endif
;Rothchild Post-Quest Activities ;This block handles the removal of the Camera from the Player's inventory as well as awarding cash and XP
if ( DLC03PQGoCamera == 1 ) ;This flag is set in dialog with Rothchild if ( Player.GetItemCount Camera >= 1 ) Set DLC03PQCamNumber to ( Player.GetItemCount Camera ) ;Set the temporary variable to the number of cameras player has Set DLC03PQGoCamera to 2 ;Advance the flag endif endif
if ( DLC03PQGoCamera == 2 ) ;From the above block if ( Player.GetItemCount Camera >= 1 ) Player.RemoveItem Camera DLC03PQCamNumber ;Remove the number of cameras equal to amount tallyed/carried Set DLC03PQCameraCashGive to ( DLC03PQCamNumber * 100 ) ;Calculate Cash given Set DLC03PQCameraXPGive to ( DLC03PQCamNumber * 25 ) ;Calculate XP given Player.AddItem Caps001 DLC03PQCameraCashGive ;Add 100 caps per camera turned in RewardXP DLC03PQCameraXPGive ;Reward Player 25XP for each camera turned in set DLC03PQGoCamera to 0 ;Reset the flag set DLC03PQCamNumber to 0 ;Reset the temporary variable set DLC03PQCameraCashGive to 0 set DLC03PQCameraXPGive to 0 endif endif
;This block handles the removal of the Sensor Modules from the Player's inventory as well as awarding cash and XP
if ( DLC03PQGoScrap == 1 ) ;This flag is set in dialog with Rothchild if ( Player.GetItemCount SensorModule >= 1 ) Set DLC03PQScrapNumber to ( Player.GetItemCount SensorModule ) ;Set the temporary variable to the number of scrap player has Set DLC03PQGoScrap to 2 ;Advance the flag endif endif
if ( DLC03PQGoScrap == 2 ) ;From the above block if ( Player.GetItemCount SensorModule >= 1 ) Player.RemoveItem SensorModule DLC03PQScrapNumber ;Remove the number of scrap equal to amount tallyed/carried Set DLC03PQScrapCashGive to ( DLC03PQScrapNumber * 75 ) ;Calculate Cash given Set DLC03PQScrapXPGive to ( DLC03PQScrapNumber * 10 ) ;Calculate XP given Player.AddItem Caps001 DLC03PQScrapCashGive ;Add 75 caps per scrap turned in RewardXP DLC03PQScrapXPGive ;Reward Player 10XP for each scrap turned in set DLC03PQGoScrap to 0 ;Reset the flag set DLC03PQScrapNumber to 0 ;Reset the temporary variable set DLC03PQScrapCashGive to 0 set DLC03PQScrapXPGive to 0 endif endif
end
