scn DLC03AFBOrbitalStrikeControlTriggerSCRIPT
; This script handles the orbital strike on the enclave mobile base.
float timer short stage short startStrike short doOnce ref vertibirdExplosionToScale ;*****************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 0) if (stage == 1) imod DLC03OrbitIncomingISFX02 DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike01.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike01 1 DLC03CCBoS01REF.playidle LooseCheering2HA set timer to 1
elseif (stage == 2) if (DLC03BS1.SarahDead == 0) DLC03SarahREF.playIdle LooseCheeringOneArmUp endif DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike02.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike02 1 set timer to 1
elseif (stage == 3) DLC03OrbitalStrikeRumble01TriggerREF.activate DLC03OrbitalStrikeRumble01TriggerREF 1 DLC03CrawlExplodeSeq01.playgroup forward 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionHelipad01.playgroup forward 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionPipes01.playgroup forward 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionTower.playgroup forward 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionTanks01.playgroup forward 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionTanks02.playgroup forward 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionTanks03.playgroup forward 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike03.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike03 1 set timer to .5
elseif (stage == 4) DLC03CCBoS02REF.playidle LooseDLC032HRCrouchIdle DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike04.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike04 1 set timer to .5
elseif (stage == 5) DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike05.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike05 1 set timer to .2
elseif (stage == 6) DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike02a.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike02a 1 DLC03FakeShakeExplosion02REF.placeatme DLC03OrbitalStrikeShakeExplosionSmall 1 set timer to .2
elseif (stage == 7) DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike03a.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike03a 1 set timer to .1
elseif (stage == 8) DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike04a.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike04a 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike06.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike06 1 set timer to .2
elseif (stage == 9) DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike07.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike07 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike02b.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike02b 1 DLC03FakeShakeExplosion02REF.placeatme DLC03OrbitalStrikeShakeExplosionSmall 1 set timer to .2
elseif (stage == 10) DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike04b.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike04b 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike08.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike08 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionDestroy01.disable 0 DLC03CrawlerExplosionBaseREF.do 100000 DLC03FXOrbitalStrikeStray01.activate DLC03FXOrbitalStrikeStray01 1 DLC03FakeShakeExplosion02REF.placeatme DLC03OrbitalStrikeShakeExplosionSmall 1 set timer to .2
elseif (stage == 11) DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike11.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike11 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike07a.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike07a 1 set timer to .2
elseif (stage == 12) DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike20.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike20 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike06a.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike06a 1 DLC03FakeShakeExplosion02REF.placeatme DLC03OrbitalStrikeShakeExplosionSmall 1 set timer to .2
elseif (stage == 13) DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike08a.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike08a 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike13.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike13 1 set timer to .2
elseif (stage == 14) DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike07b.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike07b 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike04c.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike04c 1 set timer to .2
elseif (stage == 15) DLC03CrawlwerPlacedExplosionBall01.placeatme VertibirdExplosion
DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike06b.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike06b 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike21.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike21 1 DLC03FakeShakeExplosion02REF.placeatme DLC03OrbitalStrikeShakeExplosionMed 1 set timer to .2
elseif (stage == 16) DLC03CrawlerPlacedExplosionLandPad01.placeatme VertibirdExplosion
DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike12.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike12 DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike02c.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike02c 1 set timer to .2
elseif (stage == 17) DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike04d.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike04d 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike08b.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike08b 1 DLC03FakeShakeExplosion02REF.placeatme DLC03OrbitalStrikeShakeExplosionSmall 1 set timer to .2
elseif (stage == 18) DLC03CrawlerPlacedExplosionTank01.placeatme VertibirdExplosion DLC03FakeShakeExplosion02REF.placeatme DLC03OrbitalStrikeShakeExplosionSmall 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike11a.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike11a 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike05a.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike05a 1 set timer to .2
elseif (stage == 19) DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike21a.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike21a 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike04e.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike04e 1 if (DLC03BS1.SarahDead == 0) DLC03SarahREF.playIdle LooseCheeringOneArmUp endif set timer to .2
elseif (stage == 20) DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike10.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike10 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike03b.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike03b 1 DLC03FakeShakeExplosion02REF.placeatme DLC03OrbitalStrikeShakeExplosionSmall 1 set timer to .2
elseif (stage == 21) DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike05b.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike05b 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike07c.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike07c 1 DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike20a.activate DLC03CrawlerExplosionOrbStrike20a 1 DLC03FakeShakeExplosion02REF.placeatme DLC03OrbitalStrikeShakeExplosionSmall 1 set timer to 1
elseif (stage == 22) DLC03FakeShakeExplosion02REF.placeatme DLC03OrbitalStrikeShakeExplosionMed 1 set timer to 1
elseif (stage == 23) DLC03FakeShakeExplosion02REF.placeatme DLC03OrbitalStrikeShakeExplosionSmall 1 set timer to 4
; End orbital strike stages. Begin crawler detonation
elseif (stage == 24) DLC03CrawlerPlacedExplosionBig02.placeatme VertibirdExplosion DLC03CrawlerMeshBlast01.playgroup forward 1 DLC03CrawlerMeshBlast02.playgroup forward 1 DLC03CrawlerMeshBlast03.playgroup forward 1 PlaySound FXExplosionCrawlerA DLC03FakeShakeExplosion02REF.placeatme DLC03OrbitalStrikeShakeExplosionMed 1 set timer to 1.8
elseif (stage == 25) set vertibirdExplosionToScale to DLC03CrawlerPlacedExplosionBig01.placeatme VertibirdExplosion vertibirdExplosionToScale.SetScale 5 DLC03CrawlerDustExplosion01.playgroup forward 1 PlaySound FXExplosionCrawlerB DLC03CrawlerExplosionShockWave01.playgroup forward 1 DLC03FakeShakeExplosion02REF.placeatme DLC03OrbitalStrikeShakeExplosionLarge 1 set timer to .75
elseif (stage == 26) if (DLC03BS1.SarahDead == 0) DLC03SarahREF.playIdle MS11ShieldsEyes endif DLC03CCBoS01REF.playIdle MS11MTHitHeadA DLC03CCBoS02REF.playIdle MS11MTHitHeadA DLC03FakeShakeExplosion02REF.placeatme DLC03OrbitalStrikeShakeExplosionSmall 1 set timer to .5
elseif (stage == 27) DLC03FakeShakeExplosion02REF.placeatme DLC03OrbitalStrikeShakeExplosionSmall 1 set timer to 2.25
; Play resulting FX at player's position
elseif (stage == 28) DLC03CrawlerDustLoop01REF.enable ;enables looping dust cloud PlaySound FXExplosionCrawlerDebris DLC03FXExplosionFallingDebris01.playgroup forward 1 DLC03FXExplosionFallingDebris02.playgroup forward 1 DLC03FXExplosionFallingDebris03.playgroup forward 1
set DLC03AFBControlTowerVertibird01REF.doonce to 4 set timer to 1.5
elseif (stage == 29) DLC03CCBoS01REF.playidle LooseCheeringBothArmsUp set timer to 1.5
elseif (stage == 30) ;DLC03CCBoS02REF.playidle LooseCheering2HA set timer to .5
elseif (stage == 31) if (DLC03BS1.SarahDead == 0) DLC03SarahREF.playIdle LooseCheeringOneArmUp endif
set timer to 6.5
endif
; Cleanup meshes
elseif (stage == 32) DLC03CrawlerMeshBlast01.Disable DLC03CrawlerMeshBlast01.MarkForDelete DLC03CrawlerMeshBlast02.Disable DLC03CrawlerMeshBlast02.MarkForDelete DLC03CrawlerMeshBlast03.Disable DLC03CrawlerMeshBlast03.MarkForDelete DLC03CrawlExplodeSeq01.Disable DLC03CrawlExplodeSeq01.MarkForDelete
DLC03CrawlerExplosionShockWave01.Disable DLC03CrawlerExplosionShockWave01.MarkForDelete
set startStrike to 0 endif
set doOnce to 1
endif
if (timer <=0) && (startStrike == 1) set stage to (stage + 1) set doOnce to 0 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
End
;*****************************************

scn DLC03Powerworks03Vertibird01SCRIPT
; This script makes the vertibird stay grounded using its idle animation and if damaged, takes off and explodes
float timer short doOnce short damaged ref linkedRef
short init
Begin onHitWith GenericVertibirdHitWithWeaponsList
linkedRef.do 100
End
;****************************************
Begin onActivate set doOnce to 1 End
;****************************************
Begin gameMode if init == 0 set init to 1 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef endif
if (doOnce == 1) linkedRef.enable 0 set timer to .5 set doOnce to 2
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (timer <= 0) if ( linkedRef.HasLoaded3D != 0 ) linkedRef.playgroup Forward 0 set timer to .5 set doOnce to 3 endif else set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed endif
elseif (doOnce == 3) if (timer <= 0) linkedRef.playgroup Left 0 set timer to 5 set doOnce to 6 ;doOnce is set to 4 in another trigger else set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed endif
elseif (doOnce == 4) if (timer <= 0) if (linkedRef.getDestroyed == 0) linkedRef.playgroup backward 0 set timer to 2 set doOnce to 5 else set doOnce to 6 endif else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 5) if (timer <= 0) linkedRef.do 1000 set doOnce to 6 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
if (DLC03Powerworks03Vertibird01aREF.getDestructionStage > 0) && (damaged == 0) set damaged to 1 DLC03Powerworks01VertibirdDisableTriggerREF.disable DLC03Powerworks02VertibirdDisableTriggerREF.disable DLC03Powerworks01VertibirdDisableTriggerREF.disable DLC03Powerworks02VertibirdDisableTriggerREF.disable set doOnce to 4
endif
End

scn DLC03PresMetroBackDoorSCRIPT

if (DLC03PresMetroDoor02REF.GetLocked == 1) ShowMessage DLC03PresMetroDoorNoUse else activate endif
end

scn DLC03AFBCrawlerVertibirdBombing01SCRIPT
; This trigger enables it's linked ref (a vertibird) and calls its forward animation ; It also tells the vertibird when to fire its weapon
float timer float fireTimer short doOnce short firingFlag ;0 - not firing 1 - waiting to fire 2 - firing vertibirdgun 3 - firing fatman short endBombFlag short doOnce02 ref linkedRef
;*****************************************
Begin gameMode if linkedRef == 0 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef endif
if (doOnce == 1) if (linkedRef.HasLoaded3D != 0) linkedRef.playgroup Forward 1 set fireTimer to 1 set firingFlag to 1 set timer to 2.5 ;timer now becomes the master timer for the firing block set doOnce to 2 endif
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (linkedRef.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) linkedRef.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its forward animation set doOnce to 3 endif
if (timer <=0) if (doOnce02 == 0) set endBombFlag to 1 set firingFlag to 0 set fireTimer to .5 set doOnce02 to 1 endif else if (firingFlag == 1) if (fireTimer <=0) linkedRef.fireWeapon VertibirdBombGun set fireTimer to .5 set firingFlag to 2 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (firingFlag == 2) if (fireTimer <=0) linkedRef.fireWeapon VertibirdBombGun set fireTimer to .5 set firingFlag to 1 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed)
endif
endif
;this part handles the nuke explosions going off on platform if (endBombFlag == 1) if (fireTimer <= 0) DLC03EnclavePlatformEndExplosionMarker01.placeatme FatManNukeExplosion 1 set fireTimer to .2 set endBombFlag to 2 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (endBombFlag == 2) if (fireTimer <= 0) DLC03EnclavePlatformEndExplosionMarker02.placeatme FatManNukeExplosion 1 set fireTimer to .1 set endBombFlag to 3 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (endBombFlag == 3) if (fireTimer <= 0) DLC03EnclavePlatformEndExplosionMarker03.placeatme FatManNukeExplosion 1 set fireTimer to .5 set endBombFlag to 4 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (endBombFlag == 4) if (fireTimer <= 0) DLC03EnclavePlatformEndExplosionMarker04.placeatme FatManNukeExplosion 1 set fireTimer to .3 set endBombFlag to 5 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (endBombFlag == 5) if (fireTimer <= 0) DLC03EnclavePlatformEndExplosionMarker05.placeatme FatManNukeExplosion 1 set fireTimer to .2 set endBombFlag to 6 else set fireTimer to (fireTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
End
;***************************************** Begin onActivate if (doOnce == 0) linkedRef.enable 0 set timer to 1 set doOnce to 1 endif End

EnablePlayerControls set DLC03EnclaveTowerNPCManagerTrig02REF.doOnce to 0 set doOnce to 1 DLC03EnclaveTowerTopDoorREF.enable DLC03EnclaveTowerNPCManagerTrig02REF.enable Disable endif

scn DLC03EnclaveTowerNPCManagerTrig02SCRIPT

Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0) if (terminalAccessed == 1) DisablePlayerControls 0 0 1 0 0 0 1 EnableFastTravel 0 if NQlvl.fastTravelDisabled == 0 set NQlvl.fastTravelDisabled to 1 endif endif DLC03EnclaveTowerMasterMarkerREF.disable DLC03AFBPlatformMarker01REF.disable DLC03AFBPlatformMarker02REF.disable DLC03AFBPlatformMarker03REF.disable DLC03AFBPlatformEnclaveMarker01REF.disable
set DLC03EnclaveTowerNPCManagerTrig01REF.doOnce to 0 set doOnce to 1 DLC03EnclaveTowerTopDoorREF.disable DLC03EnclaveTowerNPCManagerTrig01REF.enable Disable endif
End

scn DLC03VertibirdFlyover03SCRIPT
; This trigger enables three vertibirds and plays their forward animations
float timer float bombTimer short doOnce short bombStage
;****************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0)
DLC03VertibirdEnclaveTower01REF.enable 0 DLC03VertibirdEnclaveTower02REF.enable 0 DLC03VertibirdEnclaveTower03REF.enable 0
set timer to 1
set doOnce to 1 endif
End
;*****************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) if (timer <= 0) DLC03VertibirdEnclaveTower01REF.playgroup Forward 1 DLC03VertibirdEnclaveTower02REF.playgroup Forward 1 DLC03VertibirdEnclaveTower03REF.playgroup Forward 1 set bombStage to 1 set bombTimer to 4 set doOnce to 2 else set timer to timer - GetSecondsPassed endif
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (DLC03VertibirdEnclaveTower01REF.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) DLC03VertibirdEnclaveTower01REF.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its forward animation set doOnce to 3 endif elseif (doOnce == 3) if (DLC03VertibirdEnclaveTower02REF.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) DLC03VertibirdEnclaveTower02REF.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its forward animation set doOnce to 4 endif elseif (doOnce == 4) if (DLC03VertibirdEnclaveTower03REF.isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) DLC03VertibirdEnclaveTower03REF.disable ;disable the vertibird when it's done playing its forward animation set doOnce to 5 endif endif ;------------------------------------------------ if (bombStage == 1) if (bombTimer <= 0) DLC03VertibirdEnclaveTowerExplosion01REF.placeatme FakeMediumExplosion 1 set bombTimer to .3 set bombStage to 2 else set bombTimer to (bombTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (bombStage == 2) if (bombTimer <= 0) DLC03VertibirdEnclaveTowerExplosion01REF.placeatme FakeLargeExplosion 1 set bombTimer to .5 set bombStage to 3 else set bombTimer to (bombTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (bombStage == 3) if (bombTimer <= 0) DLC03VertibirdEnclaveTowerExplosion01REF.placeatme FakeLargeExplosion 1 set bombTimer to .5 set bombStage to 4 else set bombTimer to (bombTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (bombStage == 4) if (bombTimer <= 0) DLC03VertibirdEnclaveTowerExplosion01REF.placeatme FakeMediumExplosion 1 set bombTimer to 1 set bombStage to 5 else set bombTimer to (bombTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (bombStage == 5) if (bombTimer <= 0) DLC03VertibirdEnclaveTowerExplosion01REF.placeatme FakeMediumExplosion 1 set bombTimer to .3 set bombStage to 6 else set bombTimer to (bombTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (bombStage == 6) if (bombTimer <= 0) DLC03VertibirdEnclaveTowerExplosion01REF.placeatme FakeLargeExplosion 1 set bombStage to 7 else set bombTimer to (bombTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
End
;*****************************************

scn DLC03EnclaveCarTunnelDeadWorkBenchScript
float startX float startY float startZ
float currentX float currentY float currentZ
float deltaX float deltaY float deltaZ
short distanceToMove
short moved
Begin OnLoad
if startX == 0 set startX to getPos X set startY to getPos Y set startZ to getPos Z
set distanceToMove to 40
endif
End
Begin GameMode
if moved == 0
if getEquipped ArmorEnclave == 0 set moved to 1 endif
set currentX to getPos X set currentY to getPos Y set currentZ to getPos Z
set deltaX to currentX - startX set deltaY to currentY - startY set deltaZ to currentZ - startZ
if abs deltaX > distanceToMove || abs deltaY > distanceToMove || abs deltaZ > distanceToMove set moved to 1 endif
if moved == 1 DLC03ZCarTunnelScribeBRef.evp endif
endif
End

short DoOnce

scn DLC03OrbitalStrikeRumble01TriggerSCRIPT
;this script handles the control rumble for the orbital strike
short doOnce
;*************************************************************
Begin onActivate
if (doOnce == 0) ;set up rumble "quest script parameters" set ControlRumble.stage1FireOnTimerValue to .5 set ControlRumble.stage1RumbleLeft to .1 set ControlRumble.stage1RumbleRight to .2 set ControlRumble.stage1Duration to .5
set ControlRumble.stage2FireOnTimerValue to 1 set ControlRumble.stage2RumbleLeft to .15 set ControlRumble.stage2RumbleRight to .2 set ControlRumble.stage2Duration to 2
set ControlRumble.stage3FireOnTimerValue to 3 set ControlRumble.stage3RumbleLeft to .25 set ControlRumble.stage3RumbleRight to .2 set ControlRumble.stage3Duration to 2
set ControlRumble.stage4FireOnTimerValue to 5 set ControlRumble.stage4RumbleLeft to .3 set ControlRumble.stage4RumbleRight to .35 set ControlRumble.stage4Duration to 1
set ControlRumble.stage5FireOnTimerValue to 6 set ControlRumble.stage5RumbleLeft to .6 set ControlRumble.stage5RumbleRight to .6 set ControlRumble.stage5Duration to 1
set ControlRumble.stage6FireOnTimerValue to 7 set ControlRumble.stage6RumbleLeft to 1 set ControlRumble.stage6RumbleRight to 1 set ControlRumble.stage6Duration to 2
set ControlRumble.stage7FireOnTimerValue to 9 set ControlRumble.stage7RumbleLeft to .6 set ControlRumble.stage7RumbleRight to .65 set ControlRumble.stage7Duration to 1
set ControlRumble.stage8FireOnTimerValue to 10 set ControlRumble.stage8RumbleLeft to .2 set ControlRumble.stage8RumbleRight to .2 set ControlRumble.stage8Duration to 1.75
set ControlRumble.stage9FireOnTimerValue to 11.75 set ControlRumble.stage9RumbleLeft to .8 set ControlRumble.stage9RumbleRight to .85 set ControlRumble.stage9Duration to 3.25
set ControlRumble.stage10FireOnTimerValue to 15 set ControlRumble.stage10RumbleLeft to .1 set ControlRumble.stage10RumbleRight to .1 set ControlRumble.stage10Duration to 4
set ControlRumble.timerMaxValue to 19
;see gamemode block for "setStage ControlRumble 1" which gets rumbling
set doOnce to 1 endif
End
;*************************************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) setStage ControlRumble 1 set doOnce to 2 endif
End
;*************************************************************

scn DLC03OrbitalStrikeKillTriggerSCRIPT
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER PLAYER player.kill END

scn DLC03FXOrbitalStrike03Script
short DoOnce
;****************************************
Begin GameMode
if (doOnce == 1) playgroup forward 0 set doOnce to 2
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (isAnimPlaying Forward == 0) placeatme DLC03OrbitalStrikeExploPrime playgroup Backward 0 set doOnce to 3 endif
elseif (doOnce == 3) if (isAnimPlaying Backward == 0) Disable set doOnce to 4 endif endif
End
;****************************************
Begin onActivate
set doOnce to 1
End
;****************************************

scn DLC03TriggerStiggsTalkSCRIPT
int doOnce
begin OnTriggerEnter Player
if doOnce == 0 set DLC03EnclaveBase.StiggsState to 1 DLC03StiggsRef.evp set doOnce to 1 endif
end

scn DLC03PresMetroWithinSecurityRangeSCRIPT
short playerWithinRange
float timer
short securityCalled short securityStage
short doOnceA short doOnceB short doOnceC
Begin GameMode
;If Player is within range, the power has been fixed, and the bots are enemies ; call security if (doOnceC == 0) if (playerWithinRange == 1) if (DLC03NQlvl.powerFixed == 1) if (DLC03NQlvl.botsFriendly == 0) set securityCalled to 1 set doOnceC to 1 endif endif endif endif
;Right away sound the alarm, and turn on the security lights if (securityCalled == 1) if (securityStage == 0) DLC04PresMetro02AlarmSound01REF.Enable DLC04PresMetro02AlarmSound02REF.Enable DLC04PresMetro02AlarmLite01REF.Enable DLC04PresMetro02AlarmLite02REF.Enable DLC04PresMetro02AlarmLiteMesh01REF.PlayGroup Forward 1 DLC04PresMetro02AlarmLiteMesh02REF.PlayGroup Forward 1 set timer to 2 set securityStage to 1 endif
;Two seconds later open the doors and enable the security bots if (securityStage == 1) if (timer < 0) DLC04PresMetro02AlarmDoor01REF.SetOpenState 1 DLC04PresMetro02AlarmDoor02REF.SetOpenState 1 DLC04PresMetro02AlarmBot01REF.Enable 0 DLC04PresMetro02AlarmBot02REF.Enable 0 set securityStage to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif endif
End
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnceA == 0) set playerWithinRange to 1 set doOnceA to 1 set doOnceB to 0 endif
End
Begin onTriggerLeave Player
if (doOnceB == 0) set playerWithinRange to 0 set doOnceA to 0 set doOnceB to 1 endif
End

scn DLC03Powerworks01VertibirdDisabling02SCRIPT
short doOnce
;****************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0) DLC03Powerworks01VertibirdDisableTriggerREF.disable DLC03Powerworks02VertibirdDisableTriggerREF.disable DLC03Powerworks03VertibirdTakingOff01TrigREF.disable DLC03Powerworks03VertibirdTakingOff01bTrigREF.disable DLC03Powerworks03Vertibird01REF.disable DLC03Powerworks03Vertibird01aREF.disable set doOnce to 1 endif
End
;*****************************************

scn DLC03TeslaChainEffectScriptBACKUP
Short DoOnce Short Init Float randVal
Begin OnLoad if Init == 0 Set DoOnce to 0 Set randVal to getRandomPercent Set randVal to randVal * 3.6 SetAngle z, randVal playgroup forward 0 Set Init to 1 endif End
Begin OnTrigger if DoOnce == 0 If GetDestructionStage < 1 Do 50 Set DoOnce to 1 endif elseif DoOnce == 1 FireWeapon DLC03WeapTeslaChainEffect Set DoOnce to 4 endIf End
Begin GameMode
if DoOnce == 0 If isAnimPlaying Forward == 0 Set DoOnce to 2 endif EndIf
If DoOnce == 2 Disable set DoOnce to 3 endif
if DoOnce == 3 MarkForDelete endif End

scn DLC03Hangar01TrigPlayerEnableSCRIPT
; This trigger is triggered by the player only and enables its Linked ref. ; This trigger only gets triggered once.
ref target short doOnce
Begin onTriggerEnter Player ;if doOnce == 0 set target to getLinkedRef target.enable ;set doOnce to 1 ;Trigger is only set off one time ;endif End

scn DLC03Hangar01TrigPlayerDisableSCRIPT
; This trigger is triggered by the player only and disables its Linked ref. ; This trigger only gets triggered once.
ref target short doOnce
Begin onTriggerEnter Player ;if doOnce == 0 set target to getLinkedRef target.disable ;set doOnce to 1 ;Trigger is only set off one time ;endif End

scn DLC03TeslaChainEffectVTwo01Script
Short DoOnce Short DeleteMe Short Init Float Timer
float zAngle float thisX float thisY float targetX float targetY float deltaX float deltaY float tanZAngle
float distance float triggerZCoord float targetZCoord float deltaZ float AimAngleX float RatioDist
;// vars for vertibird ref TriggerObject ref triggerActor
Begin OnLoad if Init == 0 Set Timer to (0.5 + getRandomPercent * 0.003) Set DeleteMe to 0 Set DoOnce to 0 Set Init to 1 endif end
;/////////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// VERTIBIRD EXPLOSION STUFF ;//////////////////////////////////////////////////////// BEGIN ONTRIGGEREnter
;// store who triggered us set TriggerObject to getActionRef
;// if its in the vertibird list, blow it up! IF TriggerObject.isInList DLC03TeslaExplosionList TriggerObject.do 50000 ENDIF
if TriggerObject.isActor == 1 if TriggerObject.GetDead == 0 set triggerActor to getActionRef endif endif
END
Begin GameMode
If DeleteMe == 1 MarkForDelete endif
If Timer <= 0 Disable set DeleteMe to 1 endif
if timer < 0.3 if DoOnce == 0 if triggerActor.isActor == 1 if triggerActor.GetDead == 0 set distance to GetDistance triggerActor if distance > 100 Set thisX to GetPos X Set thisY to GetPos Y Set targetX to triggerActor.GetPos X Set targetY to triggerActor.GetPos Y Set deltaX to (targetX - thisX) Set deltaY to (targetY - thisY)
if deltaX < 0 if deltaY < 0 Set tanZAngle to (deltaY / deltaX) Set zAngle to Tan tanZAngle 1 Set zAngle to 270 - zAngle else Set tanZAngle to (deltaY / -deltaX) Set zAngle to Tan tanZAngle 1 Set zAngle to zAngle - 90 endif else if deltaY < 0 Set tanZAngle to (-deltaY / deltaX) Set zAngle to Tan tanZAngle 1 Set zAngle to zAngle + 90 else Set tanZAngle to (deltaY / deltaX) Set zAngle to Tan tanZAngle 1 Set zAngle to 90 - zAngle endif endif
set triggerZCoord to GetPos Z ;;// you want the z component of the trigger抯 location set targetZCoord to triggerActor.GetPos Z ;;// you want the z component of the target抯 location
set targetZCoord to targetZCoord + 64 ;; Aim for the middle of the target (fudge)
set deltaZ to (triggerZCoord - targetZCoord) set RatioDist to (deltaZ / distance) set AimAngleX to Sin RatioDist 1 ;// the extra 1 is what tells the script to use arcsine and not sine
if deltaY < 0 Set AimAngleX to (0 - AimAngleX) endif SetAngle X AimAngleX
setangle z zAngle
FireWeapon DLC03WeapTeslaChainEffect set DoOnce to 1 endIf endIf endif endIf endif
Set Timer to (Timer - GetSecondsPassed) End

scn DLC03TeslaChainEffectVTwo02Script

;/////////////////////////////////////////////////////// ;// VERTIBIRD EXPLOSION STUFF ;//////////////////////////////////////////////////////// BEGIN ONTRIGGEREnter

if deltaX < 0 if deltaY < 0 Set tanZAngle to (deltaY / deltaX) Set zAngle to Tan tanZAngle 1 Set zAngle to 270 - zAngle else Set tanZAngle to (deltaY / -deltaX) Set zAngle to Tan tanZAngle 1 Set zAngle to zAngle - 90 endif else if deltaY < 0 Set tanZAngle to (-deltaY / deltaX) Set zAngle to Tan tanZAngle 1 Set zAngle to zAngle + 90 else Set tanZAngle to (deltaY / deltaX) Set zAngle to Tan tanZAngle 1 Set zAngle to 90 - zAngle endif endif

scn DLC03WQ03ApostleScript
;prevent them from getting into dialog with player
Begin OnActivate
if IsActionRef player == 1 if player.isSneaking == 1 activate elseif getDead == 1 activate
else ;do nothing
endif
else activate
endif
End

DLC03AFBEnclaveBaseVertibird01TrigREF.enable 0 DLC03AFBPlatformDeadEnclaveMarker.enable 0 set DLC03BS3.BS3StrikeTarget to 2
if ( GetObjectiveDisplayed DLC03BS3 60 == 1 ) SetObjectiveCompleted DLC03BS3 60 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC03BS3 70 1 endif RewardKarma -1000 set DLC03CitadelBoom to 1 if (DLC03BS1.SarahDead == 0) DLC03SarahREF.enable 0 set DLC03SarahREF.coma to 1 DLC03SarahREF.setUnconscious 0 DLC03SarahREF.evp endif set DLC03TermLock to 1 set DLC03EnclaveTowerNPCManagerTrig02REF.terminalAccessed to 1 DLC03EnclaveTowerDoor01REF.lock 255 DLC03EnclaveTowerDoor01bREF.lock 255 DLC03EnclaveTowerAlarmTrig01REF.activate DLC03EnclaveTowerAlarmTrig01REF 1 DLC03EnclaveTowerDoorNPCREF.enable DLC03EnclaveTowerDoorNPC02REF.enable ForceTerminalBack
Fire Control
ESP.TRADUIT: 消防终端

ESP.ORIGINAL: Satellite Fire Control System +TARGET ACQUIRED: Adams AFB Mobile Platform+ ++FINAL WARNING: This target is for self-destruct purposes only! Final Approval required!++
ESP.TRADUIT: 卫星轨道炮火控系统 +目标确认: 亚当斯空军基地机动要塞+ ++最后警告: 该目标仅作为自毁用途! 请求最终确认!++

ESP.ORIGINAL: Confirm
ESP.TRADUIT: 确认

ESP.ORIGINAL:
DLC03AFBEnclaveBaseVertibird01TrigREF.enable 0 DLC03AFBPlatformDeadEnclaveMarker.enable 0 set DLC03BS3.BS3StrikeTarget to 1
if ( GetObjectiveDisplayed DLC03BS3 60 == 1 ) SetObjectiveCompleted DLC03BS3 60 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC03BS3 70 1 endif
RewardKarma 500 set DLC03PlatformBoom to 1 if (DLC03BS1.SarahDead == 0) DLC03SarahREF.enable 0 set DLC03SarahREF.coma to 1 DLC03SarahREF.setUnconscious 0 DLC03SarahREF.evp endif set DLC03EnclaveTowerNPCManagerTrig02REF.terminalAccessed to 1 set DLC03TermLock to 1 DLC03EnclaveTowerDoor01REF.lock 255 DLC03EnclaveTowerDoor01bREF.lock 255 DLC03EnclaveTowerAlarmTrig01REF.activate DLC03EnclaveTowerAlarmTrig01REF 1 DLC03EnclaveTowerDoorNPCREF.enable DLC03EnclaveTowerDoorNPC02REF.enable ForceTerminalBack

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sector 2 Artillery Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 2区炮兵通知

ESP.ORIGINAL:
From Enclave High Command Artillery Order #553 Sector 2
The Brotherhood of Steel have cleared the outer perimeter of the base. Clearance has been given to use artillery strikes on Sector 2 if, and only if, all other resources have been exhausted and targets are clearly visible. Exercise extreme caution.
ESP.TRADUIT:
自 英克雷最高指挥部 炮兵命令 #553 第2战区
钢铁兄弟会已经消灭了基地的外围。对第2战区使用炮击的清除令已被下达。假如，只是假如，在所有其他可用物资耗尽且各目标均清晰可见时发动。务必慎重。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deathclaw Officer's Report
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于死亡爪的军官报告

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our detachment established basecamp outside Olney. The township's been given a wide berth, and we deployed our detainment units behind a slope to avoid being caught upwind of the deathclaw population. We're not sure if these things use pheromones or any other kind of communication, but I'm not taking a chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们分队在奥尔尼郊外设立了营地。与小镇保持了较大的距离，我们将捕获单位部署在一个斜坡后面以避免处于定为捕获目标的死亡爪族群的上风处。我们不确定这些生物是否通过信息素或是其他任何方式来进行沟通，但我不想发生意外。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deathclaw Outpost Orders
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于死亡爪的前哨指令

ESP.ORIGINAL:
RRD-HA23-P WELCOME:
1. Establish a perimiter around township of Olney.
2. Verify reports of DEATHCLAW population in township and debrief superiors on your findings.
3. Acquire DEATHCLAW specimens as opportunity allows, minimizing casualties to local DEATHCLAW population and Enclave personnel.
ESP.TRADUIT:
RRD-HA23-P 欢迎：
1. 在小镇奥尔尼附近建立一个大本营。
2. 核实关于小镇中死亡之爪群落的报告然后在你的调查报告中询问长官任务。
3. 在情况允许的情况下抓获一只死亡之爪作为标本，尽量减少当地死亡之爪和人员伤亡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holy Water Pamphlet
ESP.TRADUIT: 圣水宣传单

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Good people of Megaton, your salvation is at hand!
We are the Apostles of Eternal Light. To heal this wounded city, we are willing to provide any and all supplicants with cleansing holy water.
Come to our monastery in Springvale, and Brother Gerard will minister to your every need.
We will give unto him that is athirst of the fountain of the Water of Light.
ESP.TRADUIT:
核弹镇善良的人们, 你们的救赎即将到来!
我们是永恒之光的使者。我们将提供一切可能的设备的神圣的清水来治疗这座受伤的城市。
来我们春之谷的教堂，加拉德兄弟会满足大家的一切需求。
光明之泉的圣水将会无偿的提供给需要的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alpha Cell Entry 01
ESP.TRADUIT: 阿尔法电池记录01

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Project Code: AC-PPE-47 Report: GATS2
Project Entry 01: Deconstruction
Upon first look after dismantling of the Alpha cell, we noticed a structure similar to one of our standard voltaic cells. After further investigation we noticed that the fluid being used as the electrolyte is of indeterminate origin and have sent samples off to our sister lab under Task: AC-PPE-47-N.
ESP.TRADUIT:
项目代号：AC-PPE-47 报告：GATS2
项目目录 01：解构
在首次观察分解阿尔法细胞时，我们发现一个结构类似于我们的标准细胞。经过进一步研究，我们注意到，流体被用来作为电解液的来源不明，根据任务我们把样本送往了我们的姐妹实验室： AC-PPE-47-N。

ESP.TRADUIT: 命令

ESP.ORIGINAL: Griffon's Bottling Instructions
ESP.TRADUIT: 格里芬的装瓶指导

ESP.ORIGINAL: Item 908774

Item 908774
Addition/Removal: Addition Item Type: Mini Nuke Shells Number: 3 Authorized: Knight Lazarus
Source/Receiver: Recovered by patrol in D.C. Ruins. Items recovered from overturned army truck being used as ambush point by Talon Company. Shells were in a locked ammo crate; we don't believe the Talon Company was aware what was inside.
ESP.TRADUIT:
物品 908774
入库/出库：入库 物品类型：微型核弹 数量：3 申报人：骑士拉扎勒斯
缘由/接收人： 于华盛顿特区遗址巡逻中回收。此物品回收于被鹰爪公司作为伏击点的倾覆的军用卡车中。这些弹药就锁在一个弹药箱里面；我们不认为当时鹰爪公司清楚里头装的是什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Item 908775

Item 908775
Addition/Removal: Removal Item Type: Gatling Laser Number: 1 Authorized: Paladin Tristan
Source/Receiver: Weapon assigned to Squad 7 by Paladin Tristan for Adams Air Force Base operational mission. Assigned to Knight Marcus.
ESP.TRADUIT:
物品 908775
入库/出库：出库 物品类型: 镭射多管机枪 数量：1 申报人：圣骑士特里斯坦
缘由/接收人： 圣骑士特里斯坦配备给第七小队的武器,用以进行亚当斯空军基地作战任务。分配予骑士马库斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Item 908776

Item 908776
Addition/Removal: Removal Item Type: Fragmentation Grenades Number: 12 Authorized: Paladin Tristan
Source/Receiver: Weapons assigned to Squad 7 by Paladin Tristan for Adams Air Force Base operational mission. Weapons distributed equally across entire squad.
ESP.TRADUIT:
物品 908776
入库/出库：出库 物品类型：手榴弹(破片) 数量：12 申报人：圣骑士特里斯坦
缘由/接收人： 圣骑士特里斯坦配备给第七小队的武器,用以进行亚当斯空军基地作战任务。这些武器被平均分配给了整个小队。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Item 908776

Item 908777
Addition/Removal: Addition Item Type: Tesla Cannon Number: 4 Authorized: Scribe Vallincourt
Source/Receiver: Weapons being created by Scribe Vallincourt's team are being stored in several armory locations for safety. Scribe Vallincourt ordered 4 of the Tesla Cannons be placed in this armory and locked down in secure area.
ESP.TRADUIT:
物品 908777
入库/出库：入库 物品类型：特斯拉加农炮 数量：4 申报人：文员瓦林考特
缘由/接收人： 为安全起见,由文员瓦林考特的研究小组研制的武器已被若干军械库妥善保管。文员瓦林考特下令将这其中4门特斯拉加农炮置于本军械库中并锁在下方的安全区内。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Incident Report 08-07-07

Incident Report 08-07-77
Reporting Officer: Harold Callahan
Fire alarm was sounded at approximately 10:05 A.M. in the vending area near Cafeteria B3. I immediately rushed to the location and encountered General Robert Dobbs kicking a Nuka-Cola machine repeatedly. General Dobbs ignored my order to stand down from his actions and drew his sidearm. He then proceeded to fire 7 shots into the machine, rupturing several bottles and piercing the coin box. After the coins began pouring to the floor, he picked up one of them and exclaimed "Stealing from a superior officer? Are you out of your MIND, soldier?" He holstered his sidearm and looked at me, then back at the machine and simply stated, "Well don't just stand there, I believe this soldier needs a medic, son." The general was relieved of his sidearm and placed in our lockup facility until Metro D.C. Police arrived to pick him up.
ESP.TRADUIT:
事件报告08-07-77
报告警官：哈罗德·克拉汉
火警大约是在上午10:05响起的，地点在B3自助餐厅附近的外卖区。我马上赶赴事发地点，在那里正看到罗伯特·多博斯将军正在不停地踢一台核子可乐贩售机。多博斯将军无视我制止他的命令还拔出了随身武器。接着他连续向贩售机射了7枪，打碎了几个瓶子还射穿了投币箱。硬币倾泄了一地，他捡起了其中的一个大喊道：“敢偷高级军官的钱？你“疯了”么，士兵？”他收起他的佩枪并看着我，而后背对着贩售机轻描淡写的说，“别光在那站着，我认为这个士兵需要个医生，孩子。” 将军被缴械了佩枪并被安置在我们的紧闭室直到地铁特区警方到达并将其带走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Incident Report 08-16-07

Incident Report 08-16-77
Reporting Officer: Harold Callahan
Secretary Maybel Meyers from Accounting Division called us down here and reported an altercation between two other secretaries. Sergeant Deke DaSilva and I arrived at the scene to find two female secretaries, Carol Wallace and Isabelle Franks, scuffling on the floor. We broke up the altercation and took their statements. Ms. Wallace was accusing Ms. Franks of being a "...spy for those damn Red bastards!" and stating that she overheard "...secret conversations between Isabelle and her Chinese conspirators!" Ms. Franks simply stated she was "Speaking to her husband about weekend plans." Both ladies were given a warning and sent home for the day by their supervisors.
Tensions have been running high lately ever since the incidents in Alaska, and this is just one example of the effect it is having on everyone.
ESP.TRADUIT:
事件报告 08-16-77
报告警官：哈罗德·卡拉汉
会计部门的梅伯尔·迈尔斯秘书叫我们来这里，并报告了另外两个秘书之间的争吵事件。得克·德索瓦警官和我到达现在时发现两个女秘书，卡罗尔·华莱士和伊莎贝尔·弗兰克斯，正在地板上扭打。我们将她们拉开并停她们陈述。华莱士女士责难弗兰克斯女士说她是“该死的共匪特务！”并叙述了她偶然听到的“伊莎贝尔和她的中共阴谋家之间的秘密会谈。”弗兰克斯女士则反驳说她只是“在和她的丈夫讨论关于周末的计划。”两位女士都受到了警告并由他们的监督者送回了家。
自从发生军事冲突发生以来阿拉斯加的局势越来越紧张，这只是对所有人产生的影响中的一个例子而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Incident Report 08-22-07

Incident Report 08-22-77
Reporting Officer: Harold Callahan
A silent alarm tripped on Stairwell 117, and I immediately responded. As I approached the stairwell entrance, I heard noises as if someone was in duress. I drew my weapon and entered by kicking open the door. I discovered Ronald Bales from Intelligence and Analysis in a compromising position with Wilma Firestone, a secretary from the Accounting Division. I gave them both a warning, and told Mr. Bales that this is his fifth and final one... the next time he is discovered performing this type of activity on Pentagon property, he'll be fined and disciplinary action will be recommended.
ESP.TRADUIT:
事件报告 08-22-77
报告警官：哈罗德·卡拉汉
一个无声警报在第117楼梯井响了起来，我立即就去处理它。当我接近楼梯井时，我听到某人似乎遭到威胁的声音。我抽出武器并踢开门冲了进去。我发现情报和分析处的罗纳德·巴莱斯正在从威胁威尔玛·费尔斯通, 一个会计部门的秘书。我给了他们一人一个警告，并告诉巴莱斯先生这是他第五个并且是最后一个警告了......下次他再被发现对五角大楼财产做出此类行为时，他将被罚款而且纪律处分并被上报有关部门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Museum Authority Log MA-0089
ESP.TRADUIT: 博物馆管理处日志 MA-0089

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Museum Authority Log MA-0089
Remmings over at the Museum of Technology is complaining again about the Planetarium system malfunctioning. I've replaced the playback unit on that thing 3 times now. Seems like the system keeps crashing and trying to restart itself, then crashes again... keeps repeating that cycle until it's completely rebooted. I suggest that we acquire a new type of system in next year's budget. The cost of replacing it now and fitting a new system is cheaper than the amount we've spent shoving in replacement parts.
ESP.TRADUIT:
博物馆管理处日志 MA-0089
在科学博物馆的游客又在抱怨天文馆系统失灵了。我已经把那个回放单元替换过三次了。看来似乎系统依然会崩溃，并试图自动重启，然后再次崩溃...不断重复这种循环直到它完全重新启动。我建议在明年的预算里加入一项购买新系统的费用。相对于更换它重新安装一个新系统会便宜不少。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Museum Authority Log MA-0089
ESP.TRADUIT: 博物馆管理处日志 MA-0089

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Museum Authority Log MA-0086
Brantseg over at the National Archives is requesting a new brain software package for their "TJEFF002 Thomas Jefferson" Protectron. The original software was wiped and replaced with a radio uplink and frequency scanning software package which is simply receiving and broadcasting local radio stations. I suggest we encrypt the next brain package so this type of software purchase is not necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT:
博物馆管理处日志 MA-0086
国家档案馆的布兰特赛格正在申请一个新的脑波软件包给他们的"TJEFF002 托马斯·杰斐逊"型自动护卫。原有的软件被删除并替换上了一个无线电上行链接及频率扫描软件包用以取代单向接收和发送本地的无线电站点的功能。我建议我们对以后的脑波数据包加密，所以这类软件是没有必要购买的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Museum Authority Log MA-0089
ESP.TRADUIT: 博物馆管理处日志 MA-0089

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Museum Authority Log MA-0085
We've logged a fourth request from Dr. Gillian Taylor over at the National Aquarium regarding a new tank she wishes to be constructed for her whale exhibition. I've already spoken to Director Barnicky, and he maintains that a new exhibit is out of the question and the current one is becoming far too expensive to maintain. Director Barnicky has already spoken to the San Francisco Aquarium, and they have agreed to begin construction of an appropriately sized tank and viewing area for Dr. Taylor's whales. He's also negotiated with that facility to have Dr. Taylor transferred, and I support this decision.
ESP.TRADUIT:
博物馆管理处日志 MA-0085
我们已经记录第四个关于吉莉安·泰勒博士在国家水族馆建造新型水箱的要求了，她希望能进行鲸鱼展览。我已经和巴尼金主任谈过 ，他坚持认为，进行一个新的展览是不可能的因为当前的维护已经过于昂贵了。巴尼金主任已经和旧金山水族馆交涉过，他们已经同意开始建造一个适当大小的水箱用于展览泰勒博士的鲸。他已经工厂达成协议并移交泰勒博士，我支持这个决定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, My Darling
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，爱人

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lag-Bolt's Note
ESP.TRADUIT: “惯犯”螺钉的便条

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hey Lags!
This your big bro! Hope you got the package. I had two of these things specially made for us in Virginia by The Tailor. He's a master at this stuff. I know you and your chick will love it. Try not to wear her out too fast, if you catch my drift.
Hugs, Lug-Nut
ESP.TRADUIT:
嘿！兄弟！
是我啊，你的好弟兄！希望你已经收到包裹了。我有两个特制的这东西，是我们在弗吉尼亚州的裁缝做的。他可是做这个的大师！我知道你和你的“女友”会爱上这个的。千万不要太快穿上它，如果你懂我的意思的话。
来抱抱 “笨蛋”螺母

ESP.ORIGINAL: Big Town Mission Report
ESP.TRADUIT: 大镇任务报告

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Big Town Mission Report:
Mission failure. Ambushed by Mutants. Lost one initiate, caravan driver, and mule. Survivor in critical condition at Citadel.
ESP.TRADUIT:
大镇任务报告:
任务失败。被超级变种人伏击。损失一名新兵、一名商人以及一匹牲口。在大本营的幸存者情况危险。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Megaton Mission Report
ESP.TRADUIT: 核弹镇任务报告

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Megaton Mission Report:
Mission successful. Met a local wandering outside the city, a Mother Curie. Dropped off the goods with instructions to distribute.
ESP.TRADUIT:
核弹镇任务报告:
任务成功。遇到一个在城外游荡的当地人-居里老妈。根据指示卸载并分发货物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rivet City Mission Report
ESP.TRADUIT: 铆钉城任务报告

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Rivet City Mission Report:
Mission successful.
[We ought to just build a pipeline. - B.]
ESP.TRADUIT:
铆钉城任务报告:
任务完成。
[我们本来仅仅只是来建条管道的。 - B.]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Entry 1
ESP.TRADUIT: 记录1

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place is a total disaster. Hopefully I抣l get this distribution system set up soon and I can get back to the Citadel. Shouldn抰 take more than two weeks. I抳e already been in consultation with the Rivet City Council. They have tentatively agreed to take over the Water Distribution Network for us once we抳e worked out the kinks. Something tells me there抯 going to be more than a few of those.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方彻底的悲剧了。所幸我很快就能建立好配送系统然后回到五角大本营。完成这件事应该不会用到超过两周的时间。我已经和铆钉城议会开始磋商。他们初步决定在我们解决这个问题后接管供水管网，但是我感觉问题可不止这一点点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Entry 2
ESP.TRADUIT: 记录2

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think Rothchild is really upset with me this time. He sent me Scribes who apparently failed their Cartography training. I don抰 have time for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想罗斯查得这次是真对我失望了. 他送来的书记官明显连制图学都没过关. 我可没时间为这个磨叽.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Entry 3
ESP.TRADUIT: 记录3

ESP.ORIGINAL: I抦 getting practically no cooperation. Rothchild ignores my messages. And the Knights stuck with delivery duties are more than a little resentful. I don抰 want to have to send them out anymore than they want to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在几乎得不到任何人的合作。罗斯查德根本就无视我的报告。而骑士们则坚持责任比一点不满更重要。我可不想再放任让他们想去哪就去哪了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Entry 4
ESP.TRADUIT: 记录4

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. Li left today. Went up north to the Commonwealth. What a bitch. She couldn抰 handle the fact that even these morons Rothchild sent me were capable of improving upon her work. It抯 no wonder she never got the thing working without help in the first place. Anyway, to hell with Dr. Li. Good riddance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李博士今天离开了。往北去了联邦。这个烂婊子。事实上她连罗斯查德送来的白痴都可以改善的工作都处理不了。所以毫无疑问如果没有别人的帮助她都无法让这个东西工作起来。无论如何，去他娘的李博士。老子解放了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Entry 5
ESP.TRADUIT: 记录5

ESP.ORIGINAL: First casualty reported today. I know compared to the death tolls of the war it will barely register back at the Citadel. But still?I hate being responsible, even indirectly, for another man抯 death. It brings back unpleasant memories.
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天第一份伤亡报告。我明白相比在战争中的死去的人数，这点伤亡几乎不会登记回五角大本营。但是我依然厌恶背负这责任，即使是间接的。它唤起了我不愉快的回忆。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Entry 6
ESP.TRADUIT: 记录6

ESP.ORIGINAL: So many caravans missing in action. The Rivet City escorts I can understand. They haven抰 had much blooding, holed up in that boat of theirs. Sure, I抳e gotten more Initiates than full fledged Knights, since it抯 all hands in the war. But still, even a couple of heavily armed Initiates should be able to handle escorting a mule and driver across the wastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么多运输队在行动中失踪了。我能理解铆钉城的押运队。躲在船里头的他们从来没见过那么多鲜血。当然，鉴于这种全面战争的状态，我手上的新兵比老练的骑士还多。但是即使是一队武装过的新兵也应该可以处理这点护送一队牲口和车夫穿越废土的小事啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Entry 7
ESP.TRADUIT: 记录 7

ESP.ORIGINAL:
So this Ghoul from Underworld, Griffon, offered to pay me for shipments of water. Lyons wouldn抰 approve, but I don抰 care. We need the caps and the technology he抯 offering. I can use it to fund the other deliveries.
One day Lyons will come to his senses and agree that selling the water is the smartest thing. Let supply and demand fuel the delivery system. This bleeding heart charity of his is going to bring down the Brotherhood. We抮e at war! We shouldn抰 be expending resources on delivering water. At any rate, we can do that after we wipe out the Enclave. Sometimes I wonder if Lyons has gone senile.
I should delete this entry in case someone important audits my files. Ah, screw it. It might be time for me to leave the Brotherhood, anyway. Not sure where抎 I go, though.
ESP.TRADUIT:
于是这个地下城的僵尸格里芬，出钱雇我运水。里昂斯不同意，不过我才不在乎。我们需要他提供的瓶盖还有科技。我可以用它来筹建另一支运输队。
终有一天里昂斯会明白并同意贩卖纯净水是最明智的买卖。让供求来给运输系统增添动力。他的妇人之仁最终将会断送兄弟会。我们正处在战争时期！我们不该在送水的事情上耗费资源。至少，在我们可以在打垮英克雷之后再做。有时我纳闷里昂斯是不是老糊涂了。
我应该删除这个条目以防万一有什么大人物查我的帐。啊，该死的的。总之，或许是我该离开兄弟会的时候了。尽管我不知道自己该何去何从。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Entry 8
ESP.TRADUIT: 记录 8

ESP.ORIGINAL: I dno抰 rember teh last time I slept for more than tihrty minutes. I抦 so damn tired jkhkjkjsdfg sdfgssdfgsd ha. apparently I just nodded off and hit my face on the keyboard. I can抰 take this anyomre!!!!11!!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我都不记得上次我睡够30分钟是哪辈子的事了。我真他妈的累死了jkhkjkjsdfgsdfgssdfgsd 哈。看来我是打了个盹脸摔在键盘上了。我再也受不了啦!!!!11!!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Entry 9
ESP.TRADUIT: 记录 9

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where the hell is everyone? So many caravans still MIA.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个家伙都死到哪里去了？如此多的商队依然音讯全无。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Entry 10
ESP.TRADUIT: 记录 10

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lepelletier keeps sending me dispatches requesting additional resources. I don抰 have anything for her. Not sure they抣l be able to handle this water distribution after all. Great. I抣l be stuck here forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里贝里蒂尔不断送信来向我索要额外的资源。我已经没什么东西好给她了。不知道他们到底能不能处理好这次供水计划。棒呆了。我要永远困死在这儿了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Entry 11
ESP.TRADUIT: 记录 11

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ignoring Megaton's requests for more water until I can determine what the hell happened. The caravan reported in, successful. I have no reason to doubt the report.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在搞清楚到底发生了什么活见鬼的破事之前我不会理睬核弹镇要求更多水的要求。商队都报告过的,事办成了。我没有理由去怀疑这份报告。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Entry 12
ESP.TRADUIT: 记录 12

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard that the kid who helped start the Purifier finally woke up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说那个帮助开启净水设施的孩子终于醒来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Entry 13
ESP.TRADUIT: 记录 13

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think Lyons suspects something. He must have a plant here. How the hell would he know about the 搈issing?water shipments? I抳e been stonewalling him. How the hell does he have time to worry about us with that war going on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为里昂斯在怀疑着什么。他必须得在这有个工厂。他到底是怎么知道运水货物失踪的破事的？我一直被他碍手碍脚。到底要怎么搞才能让那老鬼有时间去继续操心我们和战争的事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Entry 14
ESP.TRADUIT: 记录 14

ESP.ORIGINAL: I抦 seriously considering murdering these Project Purity lab coats. Ungrateful, whining, good-for-nothing, bothersome ingrates the lot of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经考虑过干掉所有参与净水工程的研究员。这群忘恩负义，牢骚满腹，又没出息，又烦死人的白痴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Entry 15
ESP.TRADUIT: 记录 15

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish somebody would fix that damn leak! The dripping is driving me crazy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望有人能去修修那个漏洞! 滴水声都快把我逼疯了!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Entry 16
ESP.TRADUIT: 记录 16

ESP.ORIGINAL: I give up. This is hopeless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我放弃。没希望了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Entry 17
ESP.TRADUIT: 记录 17

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow?Megaton抯 gone. I know I was complaining about them?but, all those people! Erased in a single moment in time?I can't imagine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇噢，核弹镇消失了。我记得我曾经埋怨过他们？但是，所有人! 一瞬间全被核谐了!真是无法想象。

可获奖赏:
1把电浆步枪 2套动力装甲 4把突击步枪 1挺多管机枪 1把火箭弹发射器 (包含3枚火箭弹) 6套医疗包 20多份化学药物(数种)

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mechanic: D.T.
We're still having a bit of trouble getting the new SYL-02 Xoted Mainframe adapted to our train drive systems down here. It's going to take another 72 hours to get it fully up and running. I've been pulling triple shifts for the last two days already AND the supervisors are constantly on our backs blaming us for the delays when THEY bought an incompatible system. I wish that I could get to sleep and just get this over with...this is only high school bullshit. I'm lost, I'm freaking and everybody knows... everybody's watching.
ESP.TRADUIT:
机修工：D.T.
我们还有一些麻烦的新SYL- 02 Xoted中央处理器在我们的列车驱动系统进行调试。他们需要再花72小时才能完全启动和运行。过去两天我带了三轮班，但主管不断责怪我们拖延工程当他们购买了根本不兼容的系统时。我希望能一劳永逸地解决这件事然后去睡觉...这简直是高中生的废话。我失败了，每个人都知道我该死…每个人都看到了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mechanic: D.T.
The switch track over between Adams Air Force Base and the White House main line is sticking again. I've dispatched a crew to repair it. I expect the line to be down no more than maybe a day. We can shunt all the trains to the alternate inbound line and just run them on half schedule or something for now. Just a suggestion.
ESP.TRADUIT:
机修工：D.T.
亚当斯空军基地和白宫主干线之间的轨道转换又出问题了了。我派了一组工作人员去修理。我预期线路将在一天之内恢复通畅。现在我们可以分流所有列车入站的备用线并让他们按照列车时刻表的半数运行或诸如此类的临时举措。这只是我的一个建议。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mechanic: D.T.
After debating for a few days, the powers that be have decided to change out the vocal interface on the Xoted Mainframe from male to female. Why? So they can give it a cute acronym and name it "Margot." Then they can trot it around for the press so we can all see where our hard-earned taxpayer dollars went. Wow, what a colossal waste of my time. Now I have to pull the mainframe's circuit array and flush the memory all to get a new voice installed... great, just great.
ESP.TRADUIT:
机修工：D.T.
经过了几天的争论，当局决定将主机的音频界面从男性改为女性。 因为这样他们就可以给它一个可爱的代号并将其命名为“玛格特”。然后，他们就能逃开舆论的压力，我们都可以看到我们这些纳税人辛苦挣来的钱去哪儿了。哇哦，多么浪费我的时间啊！现在，我不得不抽出主机电路阵列并清除内存以安装新的音频界面…太棒了，真是太棒了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mechanic: D.T.
Oh, today was a beauty. I was called up to the Senatorial Lounge near the White House station and someone decided to make a political statement by spray painting graffiti all over the walls inside the Lounge containing more than a fair share of Chinese racial slurs. They must have broken in while it was closed and did the damage. Hooray for security... they really dropped the ball on this one. Never send a robot to do a man's job I say. I spent the better part of the day scrubbing walls clean of that filth and installing new fixtures. Joy.
ESP.TRADUIT:
机修工：D.T.
噢，今天真是美丽的一天。我被传唤因为在白宫车站附近的参议员休息室有人用喷漆在墙壁上喷了一个份政治声明，参议员休息室的墙壁上被喷得到处都是对中国的种族歧视和辱骂。他们必须有突破当被关闭并造成损害时。安全万岁…他们真的放弃了这一个球。我说他们永远都不会派一个机器人做这个工作。我花了一天里最好的时间擦洗干净的墙壁上的污物和安装新设备。真高兴。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mechanic: D.T.
We got the new Sentinel Unit up and running today. Pretty bad-ass. Not only does it have maintenance capability, so I can remote command it to do repairs, but it also is a great riot suppression unit... we can use it if we ever have any protesters break in down here again. Finally, a worthwhile addition to the robot fleet.
ESP.TRADUIT:
机修工：D.T.
今天我们得到的岗哨单位已经开始运行了。漂亮的坏家伙。它不但有维修能力，我能远程操作它进行维修工作，而且还是一个强大的镇暴单位…如果我们再遇到任何的抗议我们就能用这个单位彻底粉碎它。终于，一个有价值的单位加入机器人队伍中了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hey downstairs -
This new guy you sent to help out is awful. I mean, he can barely tie his shoes. This is advanced technical equipment up here, and I can't have him work on it. He'll probably end up accidentally calling an orbital strike down on the base or something.
Here's an idea - how about you send the guy that cleans the toilets up here and I can give him the job instead. Is it really that hard to find decent help?
ESP.TRADUIT:
嘿，楼下的 -
你派来的那个新伙计真是太糟糕了。我的意思是，他甚至都没办法绑好自己的鞋带。我这儿是先进技术部门，我可不能让他继续在这儿工作。他很可能一不小心就搞出像让卫星轨道炮发射摧毁这儿或者别的类似的事情。
我有个主意 - 不如你派他去扫厕所怎样?而你再给我再找个能工作的人来替代。这是个两全其美的法子吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hey downstairs, it's me again -
Are we ever going to get a tech up here to work on this satellite tracking equipment? I swear it's offline every couple of days, and then it's literally hours of work before I have the system online and linked up to the satellite again.
This is ridiculous.
ESP.TRADUIT:
嘿，楼下的，又是我 -
到底什么时候在这个卫星追踪设施里我们才能得到一个真正的技术人员？我发誓这玩意儿每两三天就自动离线一次，然后我就得把所有的工作时间花在把系统重新联线到卫星上。
真是荒谬。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Guys -
Strike two. This is the second dimwit you've sent up here, and I'm getting tired of it. I thought he was ok at first, but by lunchtime his Mentats had worn off and he could barely hold a conversation let alone work on a satellite control terminal. I can't have a junkie up here spacing out as soon as his pills wear off.
Fix this.
ESP.TRADUIT:
伙计 -
俩混球了。这已经是你扔到这里的第二个蠢蛋了, 我已经开始烦这套了。一开始我还觉得他蛮不错的，没想到还没等到吃午饭他的曼他特药效就过了，之后他连正常说话都办不到更别说一个人好好待在卫星通讯终端上工作了。我不能忍受一个瘾君子待在我这里，在他的药瘾彻底戒掉前把他带了滚。
快搞定这破事。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
ROBOTS ARE FREAKING OUT! -
About fifteen minutes ago, all of the robots in the place just went haywire and started attacking everyone. The guards and the new guy managed to lock them in the storage area, but we need someone up here to sort them out immediately.
What's going on down there anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT:
该死的机器人！ -
大约十五分钟前，所有位置上的机器人突然出现故障并开始攻击所有人。警卫和新来的伙计设法把他们锁在了储藏区，但我们需要有人马上把机器人问题彻底解决掉。
究竟发生了什么事情？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dunbar's Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 邓巴的便条

ESP.ORIGINAL:
If you're reading this, it's because you might be able to help.
We're thinking about branching out. Underworld was a good start, but we've found an even safer place for us to set up a new place to call home.
Old Olney.
No one ever goes there. No one would ever think to look for us there. There's tons of space under the town. So we're looking for a few strong backs to help knock down some walls, clear some space underground, and help get things up and running.
-S
ESP.TRADUIT:
如果你正在阅读这份笔记，那是因为你能为我们提供一些帮助。
我们正在考虑关于扩大活动范围的事情。地下世界是个好的开始，但我们不得不为我们自己建立一个更安全的场所去安置一个我们能称之为家的地方。
老奥尔尼。
没人去过那里。没人会想到去那里寻找我们。在镇子的地底下有大量的空间。我们正在寻找一些强有力的支持，以协助我们打通一些墙壁，清除地下的空间，帮我们让这件事运作起来。
-S

ESP.ORIGINAL: Missile
ESP.TRADUIT: 导弹

ESP.ORIGINAL: Laser Beam
ESP.TRADUIT: 脉冲束

ESP.ORIGINAL: Radioactive Gore
ESP.TRADUIT: 辐射血块

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03LibertyPrimeBombProjectileSpecial
GREETING
ESP.TRADUIT: 问好

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing to see here, outsider.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这没什么好看的，外来人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\genericbro_greeting_000b172c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing to report.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有异常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\genericbro_greeting_000b172d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep moving, Wastelander.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要停下来，游民。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\genericbro_greeting_000b1755_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Move along, outsider.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一边去，外来人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\genericbro_greeting_000b1757_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything's above board.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一切都是光明正大的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\genericbro_greeting_0000bb98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're all clear here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里解决了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\genericbro_greeting_0000bb99_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got this area locked down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这片区域已经被封锁了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\genericbro_greeting_0000bb9a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can get all the water you want for free. The Brotherhood's giving it away at the Purifier. Hadn't you heard?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以免费弄到水。兄弟会在净化器那儿白送呢。你没听说吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03 Encounter RC dialogue faction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00001d0e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, bud, this water's for Rivet City. Go get your own from the Purifier if you want some.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，哥们儿，这水是属于铆钉城如果你也想要谁的话可以自己去净化器那儿随便取。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03 Encounter RC dialogue faction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00001d0f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back off. I'm not looking for any trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 退后。我不想惹麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03 Encounter RC dialogue faction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : evenly EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00001d10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The purified water's killing all the mirelurks living in the Basin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 净水正在杀死池子中的蟹人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00001d11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lucky me, I get to pull out the floaters and roast them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真走运，我得把这些残骸弄上来都烤了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00001d11_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may want to stand back, unless you've got a strong stomach.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好靠后站，除非你能忍住不恶心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00001d11_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I gotta finish burning these floaters before they foul up the water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得赶紧烧掉这些残骸免得它们污染水源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00001d12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Funny how the purified water is actually killing them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真有趣，净水是怎么杀掉他们的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00001d13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never realized how many of these things were living down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没意识到这里居然有这么多这种东西？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00001d14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, feel free to take a shot at any lurks you see in the Basin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，下次再看到池子里有蟹人的话，尽管开枪吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3E] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00001d15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're all dying -- don't like the clean water, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们正濒临死亡 -- 我猜，它们不喜欢清洁的水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3E] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00001d15_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easier to just pop 'em in the head. Otherwise they die on the bottom and don't float up until they're good and ripe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 射它们的头会更容易些。否则它们会死水底，要多很久才会浮上来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3E] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00001d15_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not the most exciting job I ever had, but you gotta admit, it beats pulling the floaters out of the Basin. Ha ha ha.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这工作说不上有意思，但是你得承认，把漂浮物从池子的水里弄出来可真恶心啊。哈哈哈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3E] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : amused to think of his poor buddy pulling rotting mirelurks out of the water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00001d16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me know if you see any live ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你看到有活着的话就告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3E] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00001d17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3E] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterMegBOSFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : irritated EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00002679_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you believe these Brotherhood assholes? They won't give us enough water to last until the next shipment!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能相信那些兄弟会的混蛋么？在下一批货之前他们不打算提供我们水了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3E] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterMegSettlerFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : trying to convince himself that this is true EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_0000267a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're not going to let them leave with that water though. We need it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不会让他们带走水的。我们需要它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3E] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterMegSettlerFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : trying to convince himself that this is true EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_0000267a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are they going to do, anyway? Kill us for stealing some free water?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们想怎么样？为了得到些免费的水而把我们杀了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3E] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterMegSettlerFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : trying to convince himself that this is true EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_0000267a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whew! I didn't think they'd just open up on us like that. Trigger happy bastards!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿呦！我可没想到他们会对我们这么直接。干掉那些活蹦乱跳的混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3E] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterMegSettlerFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : becoming aware of the disaster that he's perpetrated by attacking the Brotherhood EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_0000267b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, if the Citadel hears about this... we gotta clean up this mess before word gets around...
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，如果五角大本营知道了这件事……我们必须在事情传开之前赶紧清理掉这个烂摊子……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3E] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterMegSettlerFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : becoming aware of the disaster that he's perpetrated by attacking the Brotherhood EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_0000267b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm kinda busy here, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在有点忙，行行好可以吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3E] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterMegSettlerFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_0000267c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you realize by now, you'll get nothing from me, you damn dirty merc!
ESP.TRADUIT: 到现在你还不明白吗，从我这里你什么也得不到，你这肮脏的佣兵！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00002df9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait a minute... who are you? Hey, help me out of here! These Talon apes nabbed me while I was scouting the place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等……你是谁？嘿，快救我出去！这群鹰爪的畜生在我侦察这片区域的时候抓住了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00002df9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could probably free myself in a few more minutes, but why don't you save me the trouble and just let me loose?
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实在给我一点时间的话我自己也能逃出去，但你为何不帮个忙，现在就给我松绑？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00002dfa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks, friend. But I've still got work to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，朋友。但我还有工作要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00002dfb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that's what I call a good day's work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这才是我说的大买卖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00002dfc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talon Company's been ambushing our water caravans. I guess they thought we wouldn't figure out who was doing it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鹰爪公司持续地伏击我们的运水商队。我猜他们以为我们查不出是谁在捣鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterFBBOSFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00002dfd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As soon as Paladin Jensen gets back from scouting the base, we're going to level the place. Kill every last one of those scumbag mercs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一等詹森圣骑士侦查完基地回来，我们就踏平这里。把这些该死的佣兵都杀光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterFBBOSFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00002dfd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; now the player knows about the situation set DLC03Encounters.FBScene to 1
Talon Company's going to be sorry they messed with the Brotherhood. Now what the hell is taking Jensen so long?
ESP.TRADUIT: 鹰爪公司将会对招惹兄弟会感到后悔的。不过说起来詹森怎么他妈的去了那么久？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterFBBOSFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00002dfe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; now the player knows about the situation set DLC03Encounters.FBScene to 1
Come on, it's gonna be fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来啊，一定会很有趣的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterFBBOSFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00002dff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think there's still some more Talon boys hiding around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这儿仍然有很多鹰爪的小崽子藏在附近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterFBBOSFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00002e00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See if Talon Company messes with the Brotherhood again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看鹰爪公司还敢不敢再来招惹兄弟会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterFBBOSFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00002e01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is what happens to people who fuck with the Brotherhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是跟兄弟会作对的下场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterFBBOSFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00002e02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn slavers! Just what we need, another pissed off gang of wasters gunning for our water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的奴隶贩子！正好，又一伙讨厌的暴徒来抢水了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterBTCaravanFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00003724_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've taken over some of the water caravans from the Brotherhood. I thought we could handle it, but ... we'll be lucky to make it back alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们从兄弟会那里接了几只运水商队。我想我们能应付，但是 ……能不能平安回来就要看运气了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterBTCaravanFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00003724_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just want to get back to Rivet City without getting my head blown off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只希望能够平平安安地回到铆钉城。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterBTCaravanFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00003725_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you going our way? We sure could use some extra firepower.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你跟我们同路么？多支枪总是好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterBTCaravanFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00003726_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I gotta find a less dangerous line of work, like Yao Guai wrangling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得找份不那么危险的工作，像是与妖怪争辩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterBTCaravanFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : sarcastically EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00003727_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to kill Lepelletier if I ever get back to Rivet City alive. This is a damn suicide mission!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我还有命回铆钉城的话我一定要杀了莱佩莱捷。这任务简直是他妈的自杀！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterPPCFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : terrified Lepelletier: La-Pell-a-Teer EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_greeting_000039bd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're all going to die. They all want to kill us. It's hopeless, you understand? Hopeless!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都会死的。他们全都想杀了我们。这根本毫无希望，你知道吗？毫无希望！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterPPCFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : terrified EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_greeting_000039be_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why the hell did I ever sign up for caravan duty?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈的是怎么想的签了那该死的运水合同的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterPPCFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : terrified EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_greeting_000039bf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, we don't need whatever you're selling. This caravan is on a tight schedule.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我们不需要你卖的任何东西。这只商队的行程很紧凑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterPPCFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : brusque EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_greeting_000039c0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're running water caravans for the Brotherhood, hadn't you heard? Rivet City is bringing water to the Wasteland!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们是替兄弟会运水的商队，你还没听说？铆钉城正给废土带去净水！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterPPCFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_greeting_000039c1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The water's not for sale. All spoken for already. Don't mess with us if you know what's good for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这水是非卖品。早就说过了。如果你识相点就不要惹我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterPPCFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : brusque EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_greeting_000039c2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got nothing to say to wastelander scum like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟你这种废土游民没话可说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterADEnclaveFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegroupenclavedc\dlc03encounters_greeting_00004c14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please pardon our dust; we are currently experiencing maintenance issues within the Presidential Metro system.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请原谅这里尘埃遍地; 我们正在总统专用地铁内进行维修工作
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : Dialogue Faction for Pres Metro Bots Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotsentrybotdc\dlc03dialo_greeting_00008175_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you require event information or directions, please speak to an information kiosk officer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如想获取事件信息或方位，请询问信息处官员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : Dialogue Faction for Pres Metro Bots Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotsentrybotdc\dlc03dialo_greeting_0000819a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you have any questions regarding the Presidential Metro, please speak to an information kiosk officer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如有任何与总统专用地铁系统有关的问题，请询问信息处官员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : Dialogue Faction for Pres Metro Bots Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotsentrybotdc\dlc03dialo_greeting_00008176_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Move along please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 情走开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : Dialogue Faction for Pres Metro Bots Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotsentrybotdc\dlc03dialo_greeting_00008177_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please note that the use of firearms within this facility is a direct violation of 17 federal laws. Have a good day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请注意，在本设施内使用武力，将被视为违反第17好联邦法令。祝您愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : Dialogue Faction for Pres Metro Bots Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotsentrybotdc\dlc03dialo_greeting_00008178_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please continue along. If you have any questions, seek an information kiosk officer at any one of the stations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请通过。如有任何问题，请与站内信息处官员联系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : Dialogue Faction for Pres Metro Bots Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotsentrybotdc\dlc03dialo_greeting_00008179_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Interfering with a Presidential Metro Automated Unit is a crime. Please move along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干扰总统专用地铁内自动化单位的工作，将被视为犯罪行为。清走开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : Dialogue Faction for Pres Metro Bots Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotsentrybotdc\dlc03dialo_greeting_0000817a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have a good day, and thank you for riding the Presidential Metro.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎乘坐总统专用地铁，祝您愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : Dialogue Faction for Pres Metro Bots Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotsentrybotdc\dlc03dialo_greeting_0000817b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This access point is now locked. Have a good day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该进入点现已关闭。祝您愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_greeting_00009592_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: America will never fall to Communist invasion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 美国永远不会因共产主义者的入侵而覆灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Liberty Prime [09002DC6] (mod) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Death is a preferable alternative to Communism.
ESP.TRADUIT: 宁死不做共产主义者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Liberty Prime [09002DC6] (mod) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tactical assessment: Red Chinese victory... impossible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作战评估: 中国红军胜利……不可能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Liberty Prime [09002DC6] (mod) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Freedom is the sovereign right of every American.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有点忙于保持这个地方团结一致。我想自由将是可以更容易的达成这一目标的手段……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Liberty Prime [09002DC6] (mod) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh man, don't hurt me! I just work here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢老兄！别伤害我！我只是个在这儿干活的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest Comment (NAM2) : Said after running up to the player and starting dialog EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03enclavebase_greeting_00009acd_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 哦, 嗨。你回来了，你还需要什么吗？
