ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156ED] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03dialo_greeting_0000b39d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah yes, is there something you wished to discuss?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦对了，你有什么想跟我商量吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03postquest_greeting_0000a66f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha! I told those bastards you could do it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！我告诉过那些混蛋你能做到的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03postquest_greeting_0000a670_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, there were doubters inside the Citadel to be certain, but Lyons was behind you all the way and that was good enough for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，毫无疑问在五角大本营内仍有人对你抱有怀疑，但是里昂斯一直很支持你，而这对我来说已经足够。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03postquest_greeting_0000a670_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't think of a better compliment but to simply say the Brotherhood would be almost nothing without you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我实在不知道该如何表达我的感激之情， 我只能说如果没有你兄弟会将一事无成。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03postquest_greeting_0000a670_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, from all of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我代表所有人，谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03postquest_greeting_0000a670_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something else on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么话要说？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03postquest_greeting_0000a671_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I first saw you long ago in that alley in Chevy Chase, I thought you were just some trashy Wastelander. I'm glad I was wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回想不久前当我第一次在彻维彻斯的小路上看到你时，我还以为你是个一文不值的废土游民。但很高兴我错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03postquest_greeting_0000a672_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My father thinks the world of you... and so do I. If things were different, maybe we could have had time to become friends...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我父亲很欣赏你……我也是。如果不是在这种环境下的话，也许我们能有时间交个朋友……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03postquest_greeting_0000a672_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway... I wish you the best of luck and I hope you stick around for a while. We need people like you to help us finish what we've started here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么说啦……我还是希望你能平安无事，还有……我希望你能在这里多呆几天。我们需要你这样的人来帮助我们完成未尽的事业！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03postquest_greeting_0000a672_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there. What did you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，你好。你需要点什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03postquest_greeting_0000a673_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I suppose we have you to thank for the sudden influx of equipment pouring in from the ruins you left behind at Adams Air Force Base.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么说呢，完全是多亏了你扫平了亚当空军基地，我们才能从那儿的废墟里源源不断地弄来这么多有用的设备 。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postquest_greeting_0000ad91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These items will help keep us one step ahead of our enemies in the Wasteland and hopefully start my reconstruction effort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些物资能够帮助我们在废土中保持对敌人的优势，与此同时还可让我开始重建计划
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postquest_greeting_0000ad91_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mark my words, Prime will walk again. It may take months or even years, but we'll get him back together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住我的话吧，先锋一定会重新站起来的。这可能需要数月甚至数年，但是我们大家一定会把它修好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postquest_greeting_0000ad91_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're inclined to help us with that effort, just let me know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想要帮我们干这个，尽管说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postquest_greeting_0000ad91_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes? I'm quite busy, so please be brief.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有事么？我很忙，所以请长话短说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did it! You actually did it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做到了！你真的做到了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03postquest_greeting_0000ad93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any idea how famous you're gonna be? You're being inscribed in all of our records as, well... as a hero!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知不知道你将会变得多有名吗？我们已将你作为一个英雄载入我们的史册！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03postquest_greeting_0000ad93_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, if there's anything you ever need, I'm your gal!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，如果你需要什么，尽管说！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03postquest_greeting_0000ad93_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03postquest_greeting_0000ad94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, but I'm busy, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉，但是我现在很忙，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [090064FE] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_greeting_00006ea8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What should I do? He asked for water, and I thought I was helping him, not killing him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能做什么？他祈求给他一点水，而我觉得我是在帮他，而不是杀他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [090064FE] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : Panicked because she just accidentally killed someone EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_greeting_00006ea9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ03.BeggarScene to 2
I can't handle this. Just leave me alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这我管不了。请别来烦我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [090064FE] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_greeting_00006eaa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I didn't mean to kill him, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我没想杀了他，明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [090064FE] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_greeting_00006eab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walk in Atom's Holy Glow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 徜徉在原子的荣光下吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_greeting_0000b814_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Weary traveler, welcome to the monastery of the Apostles of the Eternal Light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 疲惫的旅行者啊，欢迎来到永恒之光使徒们的修道院。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_greeting_000071da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, but you must be parched from your travels! Please, accept this gift: holy water, blessed by our order.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，但在长途跋涉后你一定口干舌燥了！请接受这份馈赠: 我主赐予我们的圣水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_greeting_000071da_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We must drink deep of the Water of Light, so that it may sanctify our tongues, and render us purified for discourse!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应痛饮这圣光之水，这样可以洗净我们的喉舌，让我们能够表达纯洁的思想！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_greeting_000071da_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage DLC03WQ03 55
Ah, I can see the glint of Atom's Light in your eyes! You have purified your tongue with the holy water, so now we may speak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，我看见了你眼中的原子之光在闪烁！你已用圣水洗净了你的喉舌，现在我们可以谈话了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_greeting_0000b36b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How may this servant of the Eternal Light serve you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这个永恒之光的仆人能为你做些什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_greeting_0000b36b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQ03 57
You must cleanse your tongue of unseemly speech by drinking deep of the holy water. Then we may speak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须用圣水清洗掉你口中的无礼言辞。之后我们才能开始谈话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_greeting_0000b36a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: if player.getItemCount DLC03WQ03WaterHoly == 0 player.additem DLC03WQ03WaterHoly 1 endif
Cleanse your tongue with the holy water. For we must speak with seemly tongues when we make mention of Atom's Light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用圣水洗净你的喉舌。因为在我们谈论原子之光的时候必须言辞得体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_greeting_0000b369_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: if player.getItemCount DLC03WQ03WaterHoly == 0 player.additem DLC03WQ03WaterHoly 1 endif
May Atom light your path, traveler.
ESP.TRADUIT: 愿原子为你指引前路，旅行者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_greeting_000071db_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to our monastery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到我们的修道院。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_greeting_000071dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, my! I wasn't expecting a pilgrim to our shrine! We're hardly prepared for casual visitors, I'm afraid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，天哪！我真没想到会有朝圣者来到我们的圣地！我真担心我们会对突然到访的客人招呼不周啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_greeting_000071dd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must have made quite an impression on Brother Gerard. He's a lovely boy, but rather strident. I hope he wasn't a bother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你已经给杰拉德兄弟留下了深刻的印象。他蛮可爱的，就是太吵了。希望他没有打扰到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_greeting_000071dd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But where are my manners? I'm Mother Curie the Third, and I lead the Apostles of the Eternal Light. What can I do for you, my dear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我竟然忘了我的礼仪？我是圣母居里三世，我负责领导永恒之光的使徒们。我能为你做些什么，亲爱的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_greeting_000071dd_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, my! I wasn't expecting a pilgrim to our shrine! We're hardly prepared for visitors, I'm afraid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，天哪！我真没想到会有朝圣者来到我们的圣地！我真担心我们会对突然到访的客人招呼不周啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_greeting_0000816f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you didn't come here with peaceful intentions, did you? Oh, poor Brother Gerard. He was rather too strident, but he deserved better than that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而你并非本着平和至善意前来的，不是吗？哦，可怜的杰拉德兄弟啊。他确实是个吵闹的人，那即便如此他也不该遭如此对待。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_greeting_0000816f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that's no excuse for rudeness, now is it? I'm Mother Curie the Third, and I lead the Apostles of the Eternal Light. Why have you come to us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这并不能作为粗鲁的借口，不是吗？我是圣母居里三世，我负责领导永恒之光的使徒们。请问阁下来此地目的何在？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_greeting_0000816f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My Lord. I can not bear to look upon your shining face... I am unworthy...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的主啊。我简直无法直视你那光芒万丈的脸庞……我不配……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : humbled EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_greeting_0000b40a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We will spread our word without this holy water. The Light of Atom need not be spread through deceit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们将不会再用这圣水来传诵我们的教义。原子之光不需要靠欺诈来传播。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_greeting_000071de_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, my child?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么事，我的孩子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_greeting_000071df_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have something you wish to say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么想要说的么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_greeting_000071e0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our veins flow with Atom's Eternal Glow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的血液中流淌着原子那永恒的光芒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Novice [09007E34] (mod) NPC : Wastelander [09007E35] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : brain washed EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grrrr...
ESP.TRADUIT: 呜啊啊啊……

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you well, dear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还好吗，亲爱的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_greeting_00008170_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The water she gave me... it... there's something... wrong...
ESP.TRADUIT: 她给我的水……里面……有点……不对…劲……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Water Beggar [09006517] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : dying painfully EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_greeting_0000b2fa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Arrrggghhhh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊呃呃呃！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Water Beggar [09006517] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : dying painfully EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_greeting_0000b2fa_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ03.BeggarScene to 1 kill
We came to Megaton to preach of the Eternal Glow...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来到核弹镇是为了宣讲原子的光辉……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [0900B823] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : excited and delirious EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq03_greeting_0000b81a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw Atom's Holy Light. I TOUCHED Atom himself! I felt his warm embrace!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到了原子的圣光。我亲手触摸得到了原子！我感受到了它的温暖！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [0900B823] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : excited and delirious EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq03_greeting_0000b81a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mother Curie she... she changed... I changed, too, but I'm still myself. Poor Mother Curie... she saw the face of Atom and it drove her mad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 圣母居里她……她变了……我也变了，但我仍是我自己。可怜的圣母居里……她看到了原子的真实面目，这令他疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [0900B823] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : excited and delirious EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq03_greeting_0000b81a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what to do! I think I'll stay here; pray to Atom. Pray for his guidance, for he has made me of the Eternal. The undying. I am his now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道该怎么办！我认为我要呆在这; 向原子祈祷。祈求它的指引，因为是他让我获得了永恒。如今我已经是永恒而不朽的了。我现在完全属于他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [0900B823] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : excited and delirious EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq03_greeting_0000b81a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have been created anew by Atom's transmuting fire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已被原子的转生之火重新塑造了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [0900B823] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : delirious EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq03_greeting_0000b81b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I must stay here. Pray and think. Think and pray. It will come to me. What must be done. Soon Atom will reveal his plan to me. Yes. Yes. Yeeeees!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我必须留在这里。祈祷和沉思。沉思和祈祷。它终将来到我面前。此乃我必须完成的使命。不就原子就将向我揭示它的宏伟蓝图。是的。是的。是—的—！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [0900B823] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : delirious EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq03_greeting_0000b81c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Atom in my head. Atom in my heart. Atom is in all things. Atom is all things. Atom... Atom... Atom...
ESP.TRADUIT: 原子在我身。原子在我心。原子在万事万物中。原子即是一切。原子……原子……原子……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [0900B823] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : delirious EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq03_greeting_0000b81d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any progress on the Megaton situation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 核弹镇的情况有什么进展么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq03_greeting_000071d9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you heard about that new cult? They took our water! Here, read this. It's one of their pamphlets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说那所谓的新兴的邪教了么？他们抢走了我们的水！来，看看这个。这是他们的小册子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wq03_greeting_0000bd06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.addnote DLC03WQ03HolyWaterPamphlet
I don't have your money yet. Once a week, remember?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在没钱给你。每周一次，记住了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_00008195_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back in a few days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 过几天再来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_00008195_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I hadn't seen you in so long. I thought you died. Um... I stopped setting aside money for you... um, here. Take this. It's all I have to spare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，很久不见啊。我还以为你死啦。呃……所以我就没留你那份儿……嗯，给你。拿着这些。我只剩这些了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_00008196_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now get out of here before my customers take notice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在在我的顾客们发现之前快点离开吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_00008196_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;give player blackmail money - modify the count so he doesn't get the full amoung set DLC03WQ02.blackmailCount to 4 setstage DLC03WQFunctions 4
You're really going to blackmail me? <sigh>
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真想敲诈我啊？<叹气>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : being blackmailed EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_00008197_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here. Take it. I'll see you next week. Now get out of here before my customers notice what's going on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你。拿着。下周再见。现在在我的顾客发现之前赶紧离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : being blackmailed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_00008197_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;give player blackmail money: setstage DLC03WQFunctions 4
Is it that time already? Fine. Here's your money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么快就到日子了？好吧。这是你的钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_00008198_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now get out of here. I'm trying to earn some money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在快离开吧。我正在拼命挣钱呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_00008198_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;give player blackmail money: setstage DLC03WQFunctions 4
I believe our business is concluded, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为我们的买卖已经结束了，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : snake oil sales pitch EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_0000b2fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See here folks: another happy customer. A great day to you, too, sir! Thank you for stopping by!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看吧乡亲们: 又有一位顾客满意而归啦。这位先生，同样地，祝您愉快，！感谢您的光临！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : snake oil sales pitch EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_0000b2fb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe our business is concluded, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为我们的买卖已经结束了，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : snake oil sales pitch EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_0000b2fc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See here folks: another happy customer. A great day to you, too, ma'am! Thank you for stopping by!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看吧乡亲们: 又有一位顾客满意而归啦。这位美女，同样地，祝您愉快，！感谢您的光临！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : snake oil sales pitch EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_0000b2fc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, hello there Smoothskin! Step right up. Have you come to savor the great taste of the Amazing Aqua Cura?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦，你好光皮肤的！上这儿来。请问你品尝过沌浄水那美妙绝伦的滋味了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic, snake-oil sales pitch EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_00003b7c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage DLC03WQ02 5
Did you manage to scrounge up the 10 caps? It's a small price indeed for the Amazing Aqua Cura!
ESP.TRADUIT: 手头有10个瓶盖吗？对于神奇的沌浄水来说这实在是太便宜了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic snake oil salesman EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_000056eb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back! I trust you've changed your mind and have come for your very own bottle of the Amazing Aqua Cura?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来！我就知道你改变主意啦，想给自己买上一瓶神奇的沌浄水？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic snakeoil sales pitch EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_000056ec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, I hope there's nothing wrong with your Aqua Cura. Remember, all sales are final... um, now how can I help you, dear returning customer of mine?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，希望你的沌浄水没什么问题。记住，一经售出概不退货……嗯，那么我能帮你什么忙吗，我亲爱的常客？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : worried he's got a disgruntled customer EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_00005e1f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back. What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎你回来。我能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic snake oil salesman EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_000056ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He lied to us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他对我撒了谎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQ02AudienceFaction Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : justifying murder EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_0000b2fd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He got exactly what he deserved.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他绝对是罪有应得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQ02AudienceFaction Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : justifying murder EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_0000b2fe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't sucker anyone else now, can he?
ESP.TRADUIT: 再也不能对任何人摇尾乞怜了，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQ02AudienceFaction Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : justifying murder EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_0000b2ff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believed his lies... but now he's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经相信过他的谎言……但现在他死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQ02AudienceFaction Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : justifying murder EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_0000b300_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的无法相信。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQ02AudienceFaction Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : dreadfully shocked EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_0000b301_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道该说什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQ02AudienceFaction Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : dreadfully shocked EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_0000b302_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Little busy at the moment, smoothskin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在有点忙，光皮肤的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQ02AudienceFaction Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : not wanting to be bothered EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_0000b303_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shhh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘘！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQ02AudienceFaction Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : not wanting to be bothered EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_greeting_0000b304_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They came out of nowhere. I need to get back to report to Lepelletier. She'll want to know what happened. Thanks for the help!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们来路不明。我得赶回去向莱佩莱捷报告。她一定想知道发生了什么事。谢谢你的帮助！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Davis [09003B3B] (mod) NPC : Officer Lorin [09003B38] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : shell shocked. Lepelletier: la-Pell-a-Teer EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01_greeting_0000884b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I warned you not to come around. I will not be extorted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我警告过你不要回来的。我不吃这套。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_greeting_00006b20_1.ogg
NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quit wasting my time. If you're here to help with the caravan, great. Otherwise, get out of here before I have you arrested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别再浪费我的时间了。如果你是来帮助商队的，那很好。否则，在我把你给抓起来之前滚蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : pissed EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_greeting_00006292_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ01.LepelletierUpset to -1
I'm not interested in playing games with you. So unless you're here to offer a hand: GO - A - WAY!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没兴趣跟你玩。所以如果你不是来帮忙的: 给- 我 - 滚！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : pissed EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_greeting_00006293_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ01.LepelletierUpset to -1
Look buddy, I'm a very busy woman. I don't have time for your bullshit. I'm busy coordinating a military operation here. So if you don't mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着伙计，我很忙。我没工夫听你那些废话。所以如果你不介意的话？我正忙着领导一次军事行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : getting angry EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_greeting_00006294_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ01.LepelletierUpset to -1
Look missy, I'm a very busy woman. I don't have time for your bullshit. I'm busy coordinating a military operation here. So if you don't mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着小姐，我很忙。我没工夫听你那些废话。所以如果你不介意的话，我正忙着调节一次军事行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : getting angry EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_greeting_00006295_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ01.LepelletierUpset to -1
If you're here looking for water, I'm afraid I can't help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是来这儿找水的话，我恐怕帮不了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : curt EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_greeting_00003b2b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All the water is at Project Purity. If you want a hand out, head over to the Jefferson Memorial and ask for Scribe Bigsley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有的水都在净化工程那儿。如果你想要水，去杰斐逊纪念馆找比格斯利文员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : curt EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_greeting_00003b2b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, if you'll excuse me, I'm busy coordinating military operations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，如果你不介意的话，我正忙着调节一次军事行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : curt EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_greeting_00003b2b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have nothing to give you. Go speak with Bigsley at Project Purity if you need a reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有东西可给你。如果你想要奖赏去跟净化工程的比格斯利谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_greeting_00006296_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, did you take care of whoever's behind the attacks on the caravans?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你搞定来袭击商队的幕后真凶了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : hopeful, but not expecting it EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_greeting_00006297_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, did you find out who's behind the attacks on the caravans?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你查到到底是谁在幕后指使袭击商队了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : hopeful, but not expecting it EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_greeting_00006298_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shouldn't you be out there, dealing with the attacks on the caravans?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在是不是应该在外面，处理针对商队的袭击事件啊？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_greeting_00006299_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damnit, I'm too pissed to talk now. Got to blow off some steam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，我现在气得都说不出话来了。我得放松放松。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : pissed off EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_greeting_000062f6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damnit boy! Like I told you, just one rule: "Do what the hell I say." We're a gang. We all wear Metal Armor. So put it on already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的，小子！我跟你说过，只有一条规矩 "我说什么，你就他妈的做什么。"我们是一个帮派。我们都穿金属装甲。所以赶紧给我把它穿上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : angry EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_greeting_000062f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damnit girl! Like I told you, just one rule: "Do what the hell I say." We're a gang. We all wear Metal Armor. So put it on already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的，小妞！我跟你说过，只有一条规矩 "我说什么，你就他妈的做什么。"我们是一个帮派。我们都穿金属装甲。所以赶紧给我把它穿上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : angry EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_greeting_000062f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it? Take a seat and relax already. You're making me nervous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么？快坐下放松，你搞的我很紧张。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_greeting_000062f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're one of the new recruits, eh? And look at that. Already wearing the gang uniform.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个新兵，是吗？快看看那边那个。已经穿上了帮派的统一制服了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : deadly threat EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_greeting_000062fa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You best know the pass phrase though, or you're dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好知道通行口令，否则你就死定了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : deadly threat EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_greeting_000062fa_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the hell are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : smiling while yelling EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_greeting_00003b2d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Killed the boss fair an' square. Good job kid. Normally that'd make you the new boss, but we're all tired of bosses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 光明正大地杀掉了老板。干的好孩子。按理说你现在是新老板了，但是我们现在已经受够了老板什么的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : Lepelletier: La-Pell-a-Teer EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01_greeting_00006738_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, we liked Split Jack's plan. So if you can get that bitch at Rivet City to buy into our "protection services" we'll split the take with ya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，我们觉得斯普利特·杰克的计划不错。所以如果你能让铆钉城那个婊子继续购买我们的"安全服务"的话，我们就算你一份。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : Lepelletier: La-Pell-a-Teer

ESP.ORIGINAL: So we don't need ya to be our leader. But we will cut you in on the protection racket. IF you can get Lepelletier to sign on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我们不需要你当我们的老板。但是如果你能让莱佩莱捷签合同的话，我们会算你一份。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : Lepelletier: La-Pell-a-Teer EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01_greeting_00006738_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ01.congratulated to 1 setStage DLC03WQ01 101
We got nothing to talk about until you've gotten Lepelletier to give us the protection contract. Now, git!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你从莱佩莱捷那儿给我们争取来安保合同之前，我们没什么好谈的。现在，滚吧白痴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : annoyed. Lepelletier: La-Pell-a-Teer EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01_greeting_0000884c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Another new recruit? Quit bothering me. Talk to the boss. Split Jack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又是一个新兵？别来烦我。去跟老板说。他是斯普利特·杰克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01_greeting_00008cb3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get out of my face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 立刻从我眼前消失。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01_greeting_00008cb4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're looking for Davis and Lorin, they're already on their way north. Follow the River from Project Purity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你在找大卫和洛林，他们早已向北走了。沿着Project Purity的这条河走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQ01RCGuardsEncounterFaction Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_greeting_00008851_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;This is for Kurt's encounters with Rivet City escorts, in case the player thinks these are the guys he's supposed to meet with
Got to hand it to you kid. That was a brave thing you did, risking your life to start the Purifier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该把这个给你。你很勇敢，你冒着生命危险启动了净化器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_greeting_00003804_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, do you know you've made my life a living hell? I'm guessing not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，你知道你把我的生活搞得一团糟了吗？我猜你不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_greeting_00003804_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The hero of the Wasteland probably has more important things to worry about. Don't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我们的废土英雄还有更重要的是要担心。 不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_greeting_00003804_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't say I blame you kid-o. I wouldn't have risked it either. That Sarah on the other hand, she's got a bleeding heart like her old man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到不能说我是在埋怨你。换作是我我也不会冒险。但是莎拉就不同了，他跟他家老爷子一样是个软心肠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_greeting_00003805_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and bravo for giving her that code to the Purifer. Since then, my life's been a living hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，还给了她净化器的密码，。从那之后，我的生活就乱了套了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_greeting_00003805_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I have YOU to thank for that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而这一切都是拜你所赐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_greeting_00003805_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did Lyons give you a little congratulatory speech? Then, you won't mind if I don't offer you one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里昂斯对你宣读什么感谢致辞了吗？那么，如果我不那么做你不会介意吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_greeting_00003806_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks to you and that little friend of yours cranking up the Purifier, my life's become a living hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多亏了你和你那小朋友启动了净化器啊，我的生活现在简直成了个地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_greeting_00003806_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the heroes of the Wasteland probably don't care about THAT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是咱们废土的大英雄好像不会在乎这些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_greeting_00003806_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did Lyons give you a little congratulatory speech? Then, you won't mind if I don't offer you one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里昂斯对你宣读什么感谢致辞了吗？那么，如果我不那么做你不会介意吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_greeting_00003807_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks to you helping get the Purifier up and running, my life's become a living hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多谢你帮助启动了净水器，我的生活现在变得活像个地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_greeting_00003807_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you probably don't care about THAT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是你应该不会关心这等闲事吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_greeting_00003807_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;this is a catch all safety, there is more flavored greetings above the stack based on player action in MQ11
Look, kid. I really don't have time for your games. If you're here to help, great. If not, then I really need you to find someone else to pester.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，孩子。我真的没空跟你玩。如果你是来这儿帮忙的，很好。如果不是，那我真的希望你另找个人去烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and losing it EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_greeting_00009533_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.BigsleyAnnoyed to 0
What?! I've got a bagillion things to deal with at the moment, and wasting my time with you is not one of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？！我还有一堆一堆的重要事情要处理呢，而跟你在这儿闲扯可不在此列。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : upset he keeps being bothered EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_greeting_00003808_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.BigsleyAnnoyed to 0
Is there something else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么别的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and annoyed he keeps being bothered EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_greeting_00003809_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There isn't someone else you could bother?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就不可以去烦其他人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and annoyed he keeps being bothered EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_greeting_0000380a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it this time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这次又是怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and annoyed he keeps being bothered EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_greeting_0000380b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and annoyed he keeps being bothered EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_greeting_0000380c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't bother Bigsley. He's not having a very good day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别去劳烦比格斯利了。他今天过得不怎么样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : mildly sarcastic EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_greeting_0000380d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Sigh>
ESP.TRADUIT: <叹气>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : mildly sarcastic EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_greeting_0000380e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it's not one thing, it's another. Well, got to run.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不是这一件事，就是另一件事。总之，得走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Scribe [090091D5] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : mildly sarcastic EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_greeting_0000380f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This water delivery business is a complex affair.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这运水生意可是个复杂的买卖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Scribe [090091D5] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : mildly sarcastic EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_greeting_00003810_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So much to do, so little time to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事儿太多，时间又太少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Scribe [090091D5] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : mildly sarcastic EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_greeting_00003811_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No use talking to me. No use talking to the boss either. Oh well. Guess you're out of luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说没用。跟老板说也没用。好吧。看上去你运气不佳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Scribe [090091D5] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : mildly sarcastic EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_greeting_00003812_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm so glad I got drafted to be part of Lyons' little Water Delivery Team. No really, I can't tell you what a wonderful opportunity this all is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我非常“荣幸”能成为里昂斯的运水队伍的一员。不仅如此，我都没法跟你形容这是多么千载难逢的“大好机会”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Scribe [090091D5] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_greeting_00003813_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd stay away from the boss. He's in one of his moods again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得离老板远点。他看上去又不爽了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Scribe [090091D5] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : mildly sarcastic EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_greeting_00003814_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, good to see you! I heard you had a bit of a problem getting the purifier started... Sorry about that. We're looking into exactly what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，很高兴见到你！我听说你在启动净化器遇到了点麻烦……深表同情。我们正调查到底发生了什么事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex Dargon [0601CCA3] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03wq_greeting_0000b7f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, it's great to see you on your feet again. We wouldn't be here now without you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么说，看到你能康复可真好。如果不是你我们此刻就不会站在了里了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex Dargon [0601CCA3] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03wq_greeting_0000b7f3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If there's anything you need, just let me know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有什么需要，尽管说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex Dargon [0601CCA3] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03wq_greeting_0000b7f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just can't stay away, can you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就离我远一点，行不行？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex Dargon [0601CCA3] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03wq_greeting_0000b7f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I guess it's good you're not dead. And I guess I should say thanks for getting us running.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我想看到你没死我该高兴。而且我想我该谢谢你帮了我们大忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex Dargon [0601CCA3] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03wq_greeting_0000b7f5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I'm busy. Can we do this some other time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我现在很忙。我们能不能等会儿再管它？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daniel Agincourt [0601CCA1] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wq_greeting_0000b7f6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, can't stop to chat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，实在没有时间停下来聊天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daniel Agincourt [0601CCA1] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScientistFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : kind, but busy EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_greeting_000072a0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since Dr. Li left, we've all had so much more to do. Who knew she did so much?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从李博士走了以后，我们总是有太多工作要做。这之前谁意识到她如此不可或缺？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daniel Agincourt [0601CCA1] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScientistFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : kind, but busy EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_greeting_000072a1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish those Scribes would leave us alone. They just get in the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望那些文员们别来烦我们。他们一直在帮倒忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daniel Agincourt [0601CCA1] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScientistFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed, but busy EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_greeting_000072a2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bigsley's making this more complicated than it needs to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比格斯利把一切搞得越来越复杂了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daniel Agincourt [0601CCA1] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScientistFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_greeting_000072bc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So much to do... so much to do...
ESP.TRADUIT: 太忙了……太忙了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daniel Agincourt [0601CCA1] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScientistFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : kind, but busy EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_greeting_000072c3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A yup. We'll get on outa here soon as we're done drinking up this free booze. Driving water is dangerous. Want to get liquored up first. Ahaha.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对头。等我们喝完了我们就上路。运水可是很危险的。上路之前怎么也得来个一醉方休啊。啊哈哈哈哈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Water Caravan Driver [0900BB31] (mod) NPC : Water Caravan Driver [0900BB32] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : jovial EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wq_greeting_0000bb2b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't beat free booze. I was gonna drive my Brahmin up that way anyway. That Rivet City chick's giving me an escort to boot!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁能拒绝免费畅饮呢。反正我都要带着我的双头牛上路的。而且那个铆钉城的鸡崽子托我护送一批货！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Water Caravan Driver [0900BB31] (mod) NPC : Water Caravan Driver [0900BB32] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : jovial EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wq_greeting_0000bb2c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard more than a few of these water caravans go missing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说有不少这样的运水商队都有去无回了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Water Caravan Driver [0900BB31] (mod) NPC : Water Caravan Driver [0900BB32] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : a bit nervous EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wq_greeting_0000bb2d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once we exhaust this supply of free beer, then we'll get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我们喝完了这些啤酒，我们就走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Water Caravan Driver [0900BB31] (mod) NPC : Water Caravan Driver [0900BB32] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : jovial EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wq_greeting_0000bb2e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope those security guards know what they're doing. The last group to leave here seemed a little young to be guarding anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望那些保安知道他们在做什么。最后要离开的那一批人年纪有点小，真的很难胜任护卫的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Water Caravan Driver [0900BB31] (mod) NPC : Water Caravan Driver [0900BB32] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : a bit nervous EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wq_greeting_0000bb2f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sit down. Grab a beer. It's free!
ESP.TRADUIT: 请坐。来瓶啤酒。免费的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Water Caravan Driver [0900BB31] (mod) NPC : Water Caravan Driver [0900BB32] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : jovial EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wq_greeting_0000bb30_1.ogg
