What the hell? The whole place... it's... it's gone!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这他妈的怎么回事？这儿整个地方……全……全完了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [09005C42] (ID) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03bs3_greeting_00008bcb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was you... you did this! You goddamn murderer! You've killed them all!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你……是你干的！你这可恶的凶手！你把他们都杀了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [09005C42] (ID) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03bs3_greeting_00008bcb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill this traitor! Kill him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀了这叛徒！杀了他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [09005C42] (ID) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03bs3_greeting_00008bcb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveFromFaction BrotherhoodSteelFactionDC Player.RemoveFromFaction MQPlayerBOSAllyFaction SetEnemy BrotherhoodSteelFactionDC PlayerFaction 0 setEssential DLC03SarahLyons 0 Set DLC03PilotGreet to 1 Set DLC03BS3.BS3Evil to 2 StarPaladinCrossREF.RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction StarPaladinCrossREF.SetFactionRank TeammateFaction -1 set Followers.StarPaladinCrossFired to 1 StarPaladinCrossREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 DLC03SarahRef.SayTo Player DLC03SarahAngry
SetStage DLC03BS3 200
When I first met you some time ago, I was leery of your motivations and even more concerned with your methods.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从我第一次见到你起，我就怀疑你的动机还有你的行事作风。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs3_greeting_00008c6f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At the battle for Project Purity, you proved yourself... and any doubt that I had about you dissipated on that day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在净化工程争夺战中，你证明了你自己……而我对你的所有怀疑都在那天烟消云散了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs3_greeting_00008c6f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, with the Enclave in ruins and with you to thank for it, I'm almost at a complete loss for words.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如今，英克雷已覆灭，我们也要感谢你为我们所作的一切。然而此刻我却不知道该说什么好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs3_greeting_00008c6f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I feel proud to call you one of our own, and I promise that what you've done here today will be recorded by our scribes as a historic moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你当成我们中的一员我感到十分骄傲，而我向你保证你今天所做的一切将会被我们的文员们作为一件重大的历史时刻而记录下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs3_greeting_00008c6f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On behalf of the Brotherhood of Steel and on behalf of the free people of this Wasteland, I thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我代表钢铁兄弟会，代表生活在这片废土上的人民，感谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs3_greeting_00008c6f_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03PostQWeapons.Enable SetStage DLC03BS3 200
Come on, soldier. Move like you've got a purpose and get aboard!
ESP.TRADUIT: 动作快，士兵们。雷厉风行，马上登机！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03bs3_greeting_0000aea0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Move, move. Get on the Vertibird!
ESP.TRADUIT: 快，快。快上飞鸟！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03bs3_greeting_0000aea1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surprised to see me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到我很意外？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03bs3_greeting_0000aea2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you're ready for your next assignment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你已经准备好接下一趟活了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_greeting_00005681_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You found a Tesla Coil?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你找到了一个特斯拉线圈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_greeting_000068b5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent. I'll see to it that this reaches the scribes immediately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了。我会确保它立即被送达文员那。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_greeting_000068b5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've done good work, soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你干得很好，士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_greeting_000068b5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you ready for your next assignment? We don't have time to spare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备好接受下一个任务了么？我们时间紧迫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_greeting_000068b5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem DLC03TeslaCoil 1
If we're going to have any chance of taking down their vertibirds, we need a Tesla Coil. Report back immediately if you locate one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 若我们想要在对付飞鸟的时候取得优势，那我们就需要一个特斯拉线圈。如果你找到的话立刻向我报告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_greeting_0000b17d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice work back there. Let's hope the scribes can do something useful with the information you retrieved.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得漂亮。真希望文员们能用得上你带回来的这些宝贵的信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_greeting_00005682_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, we don't have time to sit around and wait for the analysis.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很遗憾，我们没时间悠闲的坐在这里等分析结果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_greeting_00005682_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Based on what I've seen of you so far, there's an assignment I believe you're well suited for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 介于迄今为止你的表现，我这里有份我认为非常适合你的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_greeting_00005682_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the interest of time, we'll skip the congratulations and get to work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 时间关系，我们还是省掉庆祝继续工作吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_greeting_00005683_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've gotten yourself through some pretty rough spots before, and I'm hoping you can do it again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经完成了一系列艰巨的任务，我希望你能再帮一次忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_greeting_00005683_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I requested you specifically for this assignment. I think you're well suited for it, and I need someone I can count on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我特别指定你来完成这个任务。我认为你是非常合适的人选，而我需要一个能靠得住的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_greeting_00005683_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we're going to have any chance of taking down their vertibirds, we need a Tesla Coil. Report back immediately if you locate one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 若我们想要在对付飞鸟的时候取得优势，那我们就需要一个特斯拉线圈。如果你找到的话立刻向我报告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_greeting_0000bd5d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, talk to Wint, okay? I'm just following his lead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，去跟温特谈，行吗？我只是服从他的命令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kidd [0900B39F] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_greeting_0000bb9d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not even supposed to be here! Just talk to Wint.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我压根就不该在这儿！去跟温特谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kidd [0900B39F] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_greeting_0000bb9e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just want to get out of here. You feel like chatting, you talk to Wint.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想离开这儿。你想聊天，找温特聊去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kidd [0900B39F] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_greeting_0000bb9f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这他妈……？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_greeting_0000bba0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How the hell'd you get in here, smoothskin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的是怎么进来的，光皮肤的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_greeting_0000bba0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you around, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再会了，小子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_greeting_0000bcbe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope the scrambler is useful for you. If not, I hope you can run very, very fast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望这个扰频器能够起作用。否则的话，我希望你能跑得很快，很快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03bs2_greeting_0000bd5b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm still very, very busy. Is this important, or can it wait?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我仍然非常，非常忙。这事儿很重要吗，等一下好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03bs2_greeting_0000bd5c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you're awake! All right! Paladin Tristan is just inside. He's waiting for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，你醒了！太好了！特里斯坦圣骑士就在里面。他在等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Knight [09002DC0] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03bs1_greeting_0000b17e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Head on in. Tristan is waiting for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快请进。特里斯坦正在等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Knight [09002DC0] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03bs1_greeting_0000b17f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, I'm very busy right now. Far too much to analyze. Perhaps one of the other Scribes could help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉，我现在很忙。还有很多东西要分析。也许其他的文员可以帮助你？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03bs1_greeting_0000b7f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, speak with Elder Lyons. I have enough to deal with right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，有事请找里昂斯长老。我现在够忙的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_greeting_00003889_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, well. Look who's back amongst the living.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好啊，好啊。看看这是谁啊，终于没事啦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_greeting_00001fc8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of us were starting to wonder if you and Sarah were going to pull through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还在想你和Sarah到底能不能康复呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_greeting_00001fc8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03BS1.DLC03TristanGreet to 2
Well, well. Look who's back amongst the living.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好啊，好啊。看看这是谁啊，终于没事啦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_greeting_00002db8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't expect to see you. After dragging your ass back to the Citadel, I thought you might be comatose forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真没想到还能再看到你。在把你拖回五角大本营后，我还以为你会永远昏迷不醒呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_greeting_00002db8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kind of surprising that you managed to survive, but with all her training, Sarah didn't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到你能活过来真有点惊讶，但是尽管受过专业训练，莎拉还仍在昏迷当中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_greeting_00002db8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03BS1.DLC03TristanGreet to 2
Tell me you've got something, anything we can use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定知道些什么，有什么我们可以用得上的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_greeting_00003208_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless you've got something, get inside there and get me some information! We need to know what the hell they just pulled on us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你还有什么有用的消息，不然回去给我挖些有用的信息出来！我们需要知道我们到底他妈的遇到什么鬼事儿了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_greeting_0000388a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to find out what the hell just happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要弄明白到底他妈的发生什么事了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_greeting_00003209_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no time to talk - get your ass inside that base, and help the troops locate the source of their transmission. Now solider, NOW!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没时间闲聊了 - 给我到那个基地去，帮部队找到他们的信号源的所在。现在，士兵。开始行动！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_greeting_00003209_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC03BS1 30
What the hell...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这他妈的……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_greeting_0000320a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I trust you've spoken with Rothchild? I hope he can make some headway with the data you recovered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信你跟罗斯查德谈过？我希望他能从你收到的数据中获得些许进展。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_greeting_0000392b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With our primary weapon destroyed, we risk losing our momentum and jeopardizing the entire campaign.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我们的主要武器被毁了，这使得我们正在失去大好的局势，甚至有可能危及整个战役。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_greeting_0000392b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I must admit, I now wonder whether moving ahead with this operation was an error in judgment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我必须承认，我现在开始怀疑这一行动是不是判断有误。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_greeting_0000392b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Paladin Tristan sent word that you'd be returning with something useful for us. Please, find Scribe Rothchild before you do anything else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 特里斯坦圣骑士说你会带回来对我们有利用价值的东西。请马上去和文员罗斯查德谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_greeting_0000392c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd hoped that you would be off assisting Paladin Tristan. What do you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你最好去帮助下特里斯坦圣骑士。你需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_greeting_0000388b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you haven't yet done so, please see Rothchild soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还没去见罗斯查德，现在请快去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_greeting_00009a4b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Careful now, careful. Don't move too quickly. Everything's fine. You're safe... You're in the Citadel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在当心，当心。别走得太快。一切都好。你现在很安全……你现在在五角大本营。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above Comment (NAM2) : trying hard to sound happy EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_greeting_00000906_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was starting to think you might never wake up, despite assurances to the contrary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我都开始以为你再也醒不过来了，尽管人们都说不会的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above Comment (NAM2) : trying hard to sound happy EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_greeting_00000906_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been coming down here every day to see both you and my daughter. It's good that at least one of you has recovered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我几乎每天都过来探望你和我的女儿。令人感到欣慰的是你们中的一人终于康复了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above Comment (NAM2) : trying hard to sound happy EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_greeting_00000906_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03BS1.DLC03LyonsGreet to -1
Easy now, take it slow. Don't move too quickly. It's all right, you're in the Citadel now. Relax.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放轻松，慢点。别走得太快。一切都过去了，你现在已经在五角大本营了。放松。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above Comment (NAM2) : trying hard to sound happy EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_greeting_00000afb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was starting to think you might never wake up, despite assurances to the contrary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我都开始以为你再也醒不过来了，尽管人们都说不会的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above Comment (NAM2) : trying hard to sound happy EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_greeting_00000afb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's good to see you on your feet again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到你能康复可真高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above Comment (NAM2) : trying hard to sound happy EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_greeting_00000afb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03BS1.DLC03LyonsGreet to -1
Good to see you. We can use all the help we can get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴见到你。我们可以利用任何可能的援助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [09009442] (ID) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03bs1_greeting_0000943e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad to see you're back on your feet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴看到你康复了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [09009442] (ID) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03bs1_greeting_0000943f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's hope this goes as smoothly as the last few operations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们祈祷这次的实验和以前的几次一样顺利吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [09009442] (ID) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03bs1_greeting_00009440_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry. Tristan's done a great job so far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心。目前为止特雷斯坦做得很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [09009442] (ID) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03bs1_greeting_00009441_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, let's keep this tin can rolling. Fire support, people! Stay on it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，让这铁家伙狂飙起来。火力支援，所有人！注意啦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_greeting_00009805_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your eyes on the robot! Take out anything it doesn't!
ESP.TRADUIT: 睁大眼睛关照下机器人！有什么它没打着的就帮它给清理掉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_greeting_00009806_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Prime will do most of the heavy work. Just don't get in his way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先锋 会顶在前面。别挡它的道就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_greeting_00009807_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's hope whatever the hell that is, it's actually useful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管那是什么东西，但愿它能真正派上用场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Paladin [09005732] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03bs1_greeting_000097fc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Scribes need to see what you've got. Get back to the Citadel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 文员们得看看你搞到了什么。把它带回五角大本营去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Paladin [09005731] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03bs1_greeting_000097fd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get that data back to the Citadel now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，赶紧带着那数据回五角大本营！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Paladin [09005730] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03bs1_greeting_000097fe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't interrupt my flow here. Just pay attention.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别在打乱我的节奏。你保持警惕就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_greeting_0000bd5e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just... I can't believe it. All those years of work. All of it, for what? One botched operation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是……我不敢相信。这么多年来的付出。所有的一切，都是为了什么？就这么一场搞砸了的行动？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_greeting_0000b7f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm still waiting on the debriefing from Tristan, but I'm not sure it even matters. With Prime gone...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还在等特雷斯坦的任务简报，我都不知道还等它干嘛。先锋都不在了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_greeting_0000b7f8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna burn every one of these devil-headed bastards to the ground for what they did to Liberty Prime!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把这帮邪恶的渣滓烧成灰烬，一个不留以报“自由先锋”被毁之仇！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Paladin [09005730] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03bs1_greeting_000097ff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You just find something we can use. I'll take care of the rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只需要找些我们能用的东西。剩下的我来解决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Paladin [09005730] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03bs1_greeting_00009800_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They knew we were coming.... How did they know we were coming?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们知道我们要来了……。可他们是怎么知道的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Paladin [09005730] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03bs1_greeting_00009801_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see anything? There's got to be something in here we can take back to the Citadel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你发现什么了吗？这儿肯定有什么东西值得我们带回五角大本营的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Paladin [09005731] (mod) NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Paladin [09005732] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03bs1_greeting_00009802_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got to find out what they just attacked us with. Keep your eyes peeled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们必须弄清楚他们刚刚是用什么攻击我们的。给我把眼睛睁大点了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Paladin [09005731] (mod) NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Paladin [09005732] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03bs1_greeting_00009803_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch yourself in here. Who knows what they're gonna throw at us next.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保持警惕。天知道他们还会用什么来对付我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Paladin [09005731] (mod) NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Paladin [09005732] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03bs1_greeting_00009804_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right in front of the map, if you please. I'd like you to get a good look at it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在地图的前面，如果你不介意的话，我想让你好好看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_greeting_00009a49_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it's good to see that you're on your feet again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼，看到你终于康复了可真好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_greeting_00009a4a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I assume Lyons is immediately throwing you to the wolves?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得里昂斯是在把你往火坑里推？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_greeting_00009a4a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Has he told you what's been going on while you've been resting?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他告诉你在你昏迷这段时间都发生什么事了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_greeting_00009a4a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If there's anything else you'd like to know, I'll tell you what I can. Otherwise, Paladin Tristan will be waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果还有什么你想知道的，我知道的话一定会告诉你的。没事的话， 特里斯坦圣骑士正在等着你呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_greeting_0000a0f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll alert him that you're on your way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会通知他你已经在路上了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_greeting_0000a0f9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC03BS1 20
Hey, it's you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，是你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Knight [09002DC0] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03bs1_greeting_0000a507_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Paladin Tristan is just inside. You should report to him right away; he's been waiting for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 特里斯坦圣骑士就在里面。你最好现在就向他报告; 他正等着你呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Knight [09002DC0] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03bs1_greeting_0000a507_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're going to have him start the purifier, hurry up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想让他启动净水器，那就快点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [0601D430] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\mq11_greeting_00001017_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This better work...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他能干得更好...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [0601D430] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\mq11_greeting_0000b908_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Cough.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <咳嗽。>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : People sick with FEV Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : dying and in pain EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wqsick_greeting_0000b305_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aaaaggghhh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊啊啊啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : People sick with FEV Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : dying and in pain EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wqsick_greeting_0000b306_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It hurts... burns... inside... all over...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好痛……像火烧……在身体里……到处……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : People sick with FEV Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : dying and in pain EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wqsick_greeting_0000b307_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't... breathe... right... my chest... huuuuurts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能……呼吸……在……胸口……痛……。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : People sick with FEV Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : dying and in pain EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wqsick_greeting_0000b308_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's happening... to me. <Cough.>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这是……怎么了。<咳嗽。>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : People sick with FEV Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : dying and in pain EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wqsick_greeting_0000b309_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doc Barrows says I'm crazy, but I think it's that damn Aqua Cura making everybody sick. Myself, I ain't touching the stuff again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 巴罗斯医生说我疯了，但我觉得就是那该死的沌浄水让大家都病了。我绝对不会再碰那玩意了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wqsick_greeting_0000bca6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may want to clear out of Megaton if you can. Lots of folks in town are sick, and nobody knows what's causing it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好离核弹镇远点。镇上很多人都病了，没人知道是怎么回事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03EncounterMegSettlerFaction Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wqsick_greeting_0000bca7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Backstabbed us and sold us out, did ya?
ESP.TRADUIT: 陷害我们，把我们全都出卖了，是不是？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09006B28]DLC03WQ01Fin) 09006B28 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : deadly anger EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01fin_greeting_0000b30a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're gonna pay for that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会为此付出代价的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09006B28]DLC03WQ01Fin) 09006B28 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : deadly anger EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01fin_greeting_0000b30a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage DLC03WQ01Fin 200
Backstabbed us and pocketed the money yourself, did ya?
ESP.TRADUIT: 陷害我们还把钱独吞了，是不是？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09006B28]DLC03WQ01Fin) 09006B28 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : deadly anger EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01fin_greeting_00006e94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're gonna pay for that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会为此付出代价的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09006B28]DLC03WQ01Fin) 09006B28 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : deadly anger EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01fin_greeting_00006e94_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage DLC03WQ01Fin 200
What? We thought you died or something. You haven't been around in so long... we divvied up your cut already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？我们还以为你八成是死了呢。你很久没到这来了……我们早把你那份儿给分摊了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09006B28]DLC03WQ01Fin) 09006B28 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : nervous EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01fin_greeting_00006b27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, sorry 'bout that. We'll start holding your cut for you again. But you got to come see us at least once a month. Or we'll assume your dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，对此我很抱歉。我们会重新替你存着你的那份。但是你必须至少每月来取一次。不然我们就会当是你已经挂了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09006B28]DLC03WQ01Fin) 09006B28 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : nervous EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01fin_greeting_00006b27_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ01Fin.paymentCount to 0
You're here for your cut?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来这要你的那份？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09006B28]DLC03WQ01Fin) 09006B28 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : making a lame joke EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01fin_greeting_00006c38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here ya go. Don't spend it all in one place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你，别一次花个精光了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09006B28]DLC03WQ01Fin) 09006B28 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : making a lame joke EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01fin_greeting_00006c38_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQ01Fin 1
It ain't time to cut you in yet. We're still collecting the caps. Come back in a few days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在还不是拿你那份的时候。我们还在筹钱呢。过几天再来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09006B28]DLC03WQ01Fin) 09006B28 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01fin_greeting_00006c39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I warned you not to come around. I will not be extorted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我警告过你不要再来了。我可不是个任人敲诈的软柿子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09006B28]DLC03WQ01Fin) 09006B28 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : about to start shooting EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01fin_greeting_000091dd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've helped me so much, it seems wrong to ask, but can you spare any more water?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你帮了我这么多，这样要求似乎不太对，但你能再给我点水吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll never forget you. Thank you for your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我永远不会忘记你的，感谢你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\waterbeggars_greeting_000c6e78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate to ask but... do you have any more water?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想问，但...你还有水吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\waterbeggars_greeting_000c6e78_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've saved my life. Thank you, stranger. I hate to ask you this, but times are hard...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你救了我的命，谢谢你，陌生人。我很不想问你这个，但时局艰难...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\waterbeggars_greeting_000c6e79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you spare any more water?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还能腾出更多的水吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\waterbeggars_greeting_000c6e79_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, so much for celebrating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 庆典结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [0601D430] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\mq11_greeting_000381b6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of us is going to have to go in there and turn the damned thing on. And whoever does it isn't coming back out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们其中一人必须进去打开那该死的东西。无论是谁，必定有去无回。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [0601D430] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\mq11_greeting_000381b6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not exactly how I imagined going out, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实我可不是这么想的，你懂吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [0601D430] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\mq11_greeting_000381b6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what should we do? Draw straws?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那，我们应该怎么办？抽签？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [0601D430] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\mq11_greeting_000381b6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: MQ08FawkesRef.AddScriptPackage MQ11FollowerWaitENDNoIdle DogmeatRef.AddScriptPackage MQ11FollowerWaitENDNoIdle CloverRef.AddScriptPackage MQ11FollowerWaitENDNoIdle Rl3Ref.AddScriptPackage MQ11FollowerWaitENDNoIdle ButchRef.AddScriptPackage MQ11FollowerWaitENDNoIdle CharonRef.AddScriptPackage MQ11FollowerWaitENDNoIdle JerichoRef.AddScriptPackage MQ11FollowerWaitENDNoIdle StarPaladinCrossRef.AddScriptPackage MQ11FollowerWaitENDNoIdle Set MQ11.EndTimerInit to 1 Set MQ11.EndTimer to 180
You're reporting to Sarah from here on out. Don't let her down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从现在起你向萨拉报告，别让她失望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\mq11_greeting_0002e1fe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get that airlock cycled, soldier, before we're all blown to kingdom come!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们被炸上天国之前，士兵，切换空气联锁阀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant RL-3 [0009426E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotmistergutsydc\mq11_greeting_00001018_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So this is it? You just quit, give up on Uncle Sam and America? You make me puke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以就这样了？你就这么退出了，放弃了山姆大叔和美国？你真令我作呕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant RL-3 [0009426E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotmistergutsydc\mq11_greeting_00001019_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is where the hard decisions are made, soldier. Where history is written.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个该做出艰难抉择的时刻，这一刻将载入史册，士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant RL-3 [0009426E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotmistergutsydc\mq11_greeting_00000d72_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't cycle the airlock, I can't start the purifier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你若不切换空气联锁阀我就无法启动净水器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charon [060156F6] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\mq11_greeting_00000d6e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is an unpleasant situation to find ourselves in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的情形真令人不愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charon [060156F6] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\mq11_greeting_00000d73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I find your refusal to act to be in conflict with my sense of self-preservation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你拒绝采取行动和我的自我保护的感觉相冲突。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charon [060156F6] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\mq11_greeting_00000b0a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurry and cycle the airlock, so I can start the purifier!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把净水机打开了,你快点把空气阀关掉!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fawkes [0003D34E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\creaturesupermutantdc\mq11_greeting_00000d6f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a dire predicament. What shall we do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个可怕的困境。我们应该做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fawkes [0003D34E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\creaturesupermutantdc\mq11_greeting_00000d70_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you think someone should start the purifier, after coming all this way? Letting ourselves be blown up seems... Irrational.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都走到这一步，你不觉得该有个人去启动净水器？让我们被崩飞这.... 没什么道理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fawkes [0003D34E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\creaturesupermutantdc\mq11_greeting_00000d71_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose this is goodbye, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们应该说再见了,朋友
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fawkes [0003D34E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\creaturesupermutantdc\mq11_greeting_0000b909_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This appears to be the point where we part ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我们在这点有些分歧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charon [060156F6] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\mq11_greeting_0000bd60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got a job to do, soldier. No time for chit-chat!
ESP.TRADUIT: 干你的活去。没时间闲聊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant RL-3 [0009426E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotmistergutsydc\mq11_greeting_0000bd5f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The time for talk is over. Now, you must act. Go to the purifier. Make your father proud!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谈话时间结束。现在，你必须行动。去找净化器。让你父亲为你自豪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dialoguecitadel_greeting_000bcc02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For Elder Lyons!
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了里昂斯长老！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dialoguecitadel_greeting_000bcc04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好运。 !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dialoguecitadel_greeting_000bcc05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Project Purity is as good as ours!
ESP.TRADUIT: 净化工程已经是我们的了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dialoguecitadel_greeting_000bcc06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to the Citadel. Just remember -- you're a guest in our home. I expect you to behave yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到五角大本营。请记住 — 你是我们的客人。我希望你遵守规矩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad to see you and that egghead Li made it here in one piece. I heard what happened at that purifier. Hell of thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴见到你和书呆子李安全到了这。我听说净化器那的事。真是见鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E9] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dialoguecitadel_greeting_00019491_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hrm? Yes, hello. I've heard about you. We don't get many strangers here in the Citadel, especially those who walk about unescorted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？啊，你好。我听说过你。我们五角大本营没什么陌生人，特别是那些没护卫到处走的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156EC] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am Scribe Bowditch. If you require something, simply ask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是文员鲍蒂奇。如果你要什么，就请说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156EC] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Knowledge is the beginning of wisdom, not the end of it." One of my favorite quotes. Its author has been lost to us.
ESP.TRADUIT: “知识是智慧的开始，而不是结束。”这是我最喜欢的引述。其作者已经无从考证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06025FD0] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can I help you, outsider?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么可以帮助你的，外来者？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06025FD0] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want, outsider?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要什么，外来者？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhm... I don't think that Paladin Gunny would be very happy if he saw me talking to an outsider.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯……我不觉得圣骑士甘尼看见我和外来人说话会很高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stand down, civilian.
ESP.TRADUIT: 退下，平民。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060B8758] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Paladin Bael. What do you need, civilian?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是圣骑士贝尔。你需要什么，平民？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060B875B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What aid can I offer you, outsider?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能提供你什么帮助，外来人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dialoguecitadel_greeting_00024133_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shh. Not too loud. I don't really want people to know that we're doin' business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘘，小声点。我不希望让别人知道我们在做买卖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060824AB] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There rest of these guys around here might not want anything to do with you, but I got no problem with you... well, not with your caps at least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的其他人是不怎么想和你扯上关系，但我对你倒是没什么偏见……嗯，至少是对你的瓶盖没有偏见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060824AB] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, good to see you again. What do you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，真高兴又见到你了。你需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060824AB] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not in the mood for you, asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没心情搭理你，你这混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060824AB] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femalegroupraiderdc\genericraider_greeting_00048353_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: PLAYER KNOCK OVER OBJECTS
Pardon the mess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 乱七八糟的，请原谅。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic, someone knocked over a stack of papers on his messy desk EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_playerknockoverobj_00009a74_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I really need to clean this place up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真该把这地方打扫一下了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic, someone knocked over a stack of papers on his messy desk EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_playerknockoverobj_00009a75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn. I hope I can find that again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死。但愿我能再找到它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic, someone knocked over a stack of papers on his messy desk EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_playerknockoverobj_00009a76_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic, someone knocked over a stack of papers on his messy desk EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_playerknockoverobj_00009a77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: HELLO
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09006B28]DLC03WQ01Fin) 09006B28 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : abrupt, dismissive EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01fin_hello_0000bba5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got a problem?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09006B28]DLC03WQ01Fin) 09006B28 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : abrupt, dismissive EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01fin_hello_0000bba6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you looking at?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在看什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09006B28]DLC03WQ01Fin) 09006B28 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : abrupt, dismissive EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01fin_hello_0000bba7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay away from me! I don't want whatever you smoothskins are infecting us with!
ESP.TRADUIT: 离我远点！我不想被你们光皮肤给传染了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wqsick_hello_0000bca0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The one advantage of being a Ghoul was never getting sick. I guess they've taken that away from us too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为僵尸的一个好处就是从来不会生病。就连这点好处他们也要从我们身上剥夺走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : glumly, resigned EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wqsick_hello_0000bca1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you seen the Chop Shop? Full of sick Ghouls... I wonder who's next?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看见排骨店了吗？全都是生病的僵尸……我不知道下一个会是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wqsick_hello_0000bca2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No offense, but I don't want whatever's going around. So just keep your distance, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有冒犯你的意思，但是我不想让任何人靠近。所以请保持你的距离,好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wqsick_hello_0000bca3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought things were finally starting to get better around here. But now everyone's getting sick and nobody knows what to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还以为情况终于好转了呢。但是现在每个人都病了而没有人知道该怎么办。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wqsick_hello_0000bca4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You better stay away from me. I think I may be sick. It's like a... burning in my guts. Damn, it hurts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好离我远点。我想我病了。就好像……我的内脏在着火。该死，真疼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wqsick_hello_0000bca5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you feel you're getting sick, quarantine yourself at the clinic, immediately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你觉得你病了，立刻到门诊来进行隔离，一刻也不要耽搁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wqsick_hello_0000bd02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's do this just like the last time. Nobody needs to try and prove anything out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们就像上次那样做吧。没必要尝试或证明什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_hello_00009439_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everybody goes home after this, you understand? I don't want any screw-ups out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这之后大家都回家去，你明白了吗？我不想有什么麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_hello_0000943a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything should be in place by now. Even if they know we're coming, it won't matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这会儿一切都应该就位了。就算他们知道我们要来了，也没关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_hello_0000943b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's good to see you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴再次见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_hello_0000a0fa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brother...
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convcitadel_hello_00006fa6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, have you got a second?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，有时间吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convcitadel_hello_00006fa7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, uhh...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，嗯……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convcitadel_hello_00006fa8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, I've got a question.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我有个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convcitadel_hello_00006fa9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I talk to you for a moment?
ESP.TRADUIT: 能和你聊两句吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convcitadel_hello_00006faa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scribe Rothchild is going to need an update on your progress. Have you sent a report recently?
ESP.TRADUIT: 文员罗斯查德想要知道你的工作进度。你最近发过报告了么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03convcitadel_hello_000075dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was wondering when you'd show up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚才还在想你什么时候才能出现呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : under his breath, annoyed he is being bothered again. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_hello_00003797_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just when I thought I had a moment to think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在我以为我能静静的呆会儿想想问题的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : under his breath, annoyed he is being bothered again. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_hello_00003798_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This better be good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好找个像样点的借口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : under his breath, annoyed he is being bothered again. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_hello_00003799_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : under his breath, annoyed he is being bothered again. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_hello_0000379a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。

ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃哼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : mildly sarcastic EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_hello_0000379d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whew. Long day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呼。漫长的一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_hello_0000379e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The boss is in one of his moods again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老板看上去又不爽了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_hello_0000379f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think I caught the boss napping at his desk again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜是我又碰到老板在桌上打盹了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_hello_000037a0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, I didn't sign up with the Brotherhood to be an errand boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，我来兄弟会工作可不是为了当跑腿儿的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_hello_000037a1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, I didn't sign up with the Brotherhood to be an errand girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，我来兄弟会工作可不是为了当跑腿儿的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_hello_000037a2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gah! One more day of this and I'm gonna eat a bullet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃啊！在这样下去我早晚得玩儿完。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_hello_000037a3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Has Lyons forgotten about the war with the Enclave? What the hell are we doing here, really? We have better things to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里昂斯忘了我们和英克雷之间的战争了么？说真的，我们他妈的到底在这儿干什么？我们有更有用的事情要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_hello_000037a4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not 100% sure it's safe to go in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道去那儿是不是百分之百安全。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, these chairs aren't very comfortable.

ESP.TRADUIT: 我想找你帮个忙。有空的时候来找我。

ESP.TRADUIT: 这是铆钉城的水，小崽子。现在给我滚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want some water, go get it from the Purifier yourself. This is ours now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想要点水，自己去净化器那儿弄去。这些是我们的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03 Encounter RC dialogue faction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_hello_00001d19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not for sale. Every drop is for Rivet City residents only.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这水是非卖品。每一滴都只属于铆钉城居民。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03 Encounter RC dialogue faction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_hello_00001d1a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Move it, bud. Can't you see I'm busy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚蛋，小崽子。没看见我很忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03 Encounter RC dialogue faction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_hello_00001d1b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate to complain about free water, but the Brotherhood are being damn stingy with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢整天挑免费水的刺儿，但是兄弟会越来越抠门了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03 Encounter RC dialogue faction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_hello_00001d1c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know why they don't just build a pipeline. Schlepping bottles of water back and forth is the worst kind of stupid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真搞不明白为什么他们不直接建根水管呢。装在瓶子里一车一车地运来运去简直是我见过的最蠢的主意了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03 Encounter RC dialogue faction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_hello_00001d1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stand back, unless you want mirelurk crud all over your boots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 退后，除非你想被蟹人的渣滓弄得你满脚都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encounters_hello_00001d1e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just my luck to pull mirelurk duty three days in a row...
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是我幸运的连续三天负责这蟹人的工作了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encounters_hello_00001d1f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shh. If you spook the lurks I'll never get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘘。如果你惊吓了蟹人，那我就再也出不去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3E] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encounters_hello_00001d20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The lurks get real shy when they're sick. You gotta wait for 'em to poke their noses up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蟹人生病的时候会非常的胆小。你得等他们浮出水面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3E] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encounters_hello_00001d21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dammit! If I could just twist my wrists a little more...
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死！只要能再转一下手腕……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : talking to himself while struggling to free himself EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encounters_hello_00002df3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Almost got it... damn it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 就差一点……该死！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : talking to himself while struggling to free himself EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encounters_hello_00002df4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what the Council was thinking. The Brotherhood should be delivering this water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道委员会怎么想的。兄弟会应该负责运水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterBTCaravanFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_hello_00003717_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're getting our asses kicked out here. I don't know why we have to do the Brotherhood's scut work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在这儿简直是自找苦吃。我真想不明白为什么要我们来做兄弟会的倒霉工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterBTCaravanFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_hello_00003718_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a damn suicide mission...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这任务简直就是他妈的自杀……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterPPCFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_hello_000039c3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's that? Don't you see it -- right over there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是什么？你没看见么 -- 就在那儿！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterPPCFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : terrified, paranoid EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_hello_000039c4_1.ogg

Did you hear that? Dammit, they're everywhere!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听见了么？该死，它们到处都是！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterPPCFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : terrified, paranoid EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_hello_000039c5_1.ogg

Rivet City is providing water to the Wasteland. Spread the word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 铆钉城 现正向整个废土提供水源。放话出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterPPCFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_hello_000039c6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anybody messes with this caravan, gets the business end of my gun. Got it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有谁胆敢惹这只商队，我这把枪就是他最后的归宿。听到了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterPPCFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : blustering EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encounters_hello_000039c7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't want any trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不想惹麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Faction : DLC03EncounterADEnclaveFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : cautiously EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegroupenclavedc\dlc03encounters_hello_00004c15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outsiders in the Citadel. Such a pleasure...
ESP.TRADUIT: 五角大本营里的外来人。幸会……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dialoguecitadel_hello_00024140_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brother...
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\convcitadel_hello_000b9987_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been meaning to ask you...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直想问你……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\convcitadel_hello_000b9988_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got a second?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有空吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\convcitadel_hello_000b9989_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\convcitadel_hello_000b998a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, let me ask you something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，让我问你些问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\convcitadel_hello_000b998b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rothchild, a word please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 罗斯查德，借一步说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you have a moment, Scribe Rothchild...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有时间，文员罗斯查德……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw that you completed your tests. What results are you seeing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看见你完成你的测试了。你期待得几分？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\convcitadel_hello_00025517_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scribe Rothchild wants a report on your tests. Have your results posted?
ESP.TRADUIT: 文员罗斯查德想要你的测试报告。你的结果出来了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\convcitadel_hello_0002612a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Switches are showing green. Ambulatory systems look good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 开关显示绿色。流动系统看上去正常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\convcitadel_hello_0002612b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The weapons systems are showing red on startup. We'll have to spend the rest of the day scrubbing the system before we can try again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 武器系统启动显示为红色。在我们再次尝试之前，我们必须把剩余的时间都花在清理系统上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\convcitadel_hello_0002612c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's been a shutdown in the port shoulder systems -- looks like the gyros are locked up again. It'll take a few hours to clean it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 舱门轴臂系统关闭了 — 看上去像是仪器又被锁住了。看来需要几个小时来清除故障。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\convcitadel_hello_0002612d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I made a little bit of progress with Prime's locomotion capacitor, but now his IFF system is, um... unpredictable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在质数普莱姆的运动电容方面略有建树，但是他的敌我识别系统，嗯……不可预知啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\convcitadel_hello_0002612f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to go now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please be careful. I would hate to lose you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请小心点。我可受不了再一次失去你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_goodbye_0000b39b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get that data!
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到那些数据！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_goodbye_0000bd58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心你自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_goodbye_0000bd5a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be waiting for that Tesla coil, if you can find one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会在此恭候你的特斯拉线圈，如果你真能找到一个的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_goodbye_0000bd56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck, and please be careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运，路上小心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03bs2_goodbye_0000bd57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Logging out. Have a good day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 退出登陆。祝你愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_goodbye_00008bcc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is it... let's make this one count.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是它……让我们把这个也算上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs3_goodbye_00008c91_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都和你在一起.注意安全.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好运。

ESP.TRADUIT: 明白。

ESP.TRADUIT: 再见！

ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会阻止你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have a nice day... or is it nighttime? Can't tell. Think they put me in an office without windows on purpose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你今天一切顺利……现在已经是晚上了？说不准。总觉得他们是故意给我安排了一件没窗户的办公室的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_goodbye_0000b7f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. Hopefully that's the last distraction for awhile.

ESP.ORIGINAL: No kidding.

ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。但是坐下然后老老实实把嘴闭上。你在这儿晃来晃去弄的我很是心烦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. I was tired of your yapping.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bye.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back before supplies run out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 记得再来啊，我们就快断货啦！

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic snake oil salesman EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_goodbye_000056e0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye. Please come back if you find anything interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。如果你找到什么有趣的东西请不要忘了回来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postquest_goodbye_0000ae6a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be a stranger around here... you better come back and visit the Citadel once in a while!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这儿不要见外……你最好常回五角大本营来看看！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03postquest_goodbye_0000ae6b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, we'll see you later. Keep your eyes peeled for Muties.

Well, now that little distraction is over. Back to work.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_combattonormal_00009a82_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woops. That got out of hand quick. They shot first, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 糟糕。那么快就一发不可收拾了。他们先动手的，对吧？

I'll find you eventually!

Well, that's that.

There you are!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这儿！
