ESP.ORIGINAL: SpeechChallengeFailure
Nice try asshole. Come back in a week, you'll get your next cut of the take then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干的不错混球。下礼拜再来拿你的分红。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09006B28]DLC03WQ01Fin) 09006B28 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : mildly annoyed EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01f_speechchallenge_00006e93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fluctuations in your vocal tones indicate your statements are fallacious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你发音中的起伏表明你的陈述有所隐瞒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_speechchallengefa_00002e8b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Further attempts at deception will result in immediate response by security forces.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如若发现有任何进一步欺骗的企图，安保系统将立刻采取行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_speechchallengefa_00002e8b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Repeating query: Please identify yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次提问:请上报身份。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_speechchallengefa_00002e8b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I did, I wouldn't tell you. I'm just doing what I'm told to do by Lyons. Even if I don't like doing it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我做了，我是不会告诉你的。我只是在做里昂斯叫我做的。即使我不愿意这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : hiding something EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_speechchallengefai_00003766_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely not. Any more stupid questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 完全不是，还有什么愚蠢的问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : angrily EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_speechchallengef_00003b1f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the boss of this gang. We do what I say. Don't forget that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别忘了，我是这个帮的老大。在这儿我说的算。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : angry EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_speechchallengef_0000bd67_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh I'm sorry! I'm fresh out of free samples. Try again tomorrow!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦不好意思！免费样品已经送光了。明天再来吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : lying, snakeoil sales man EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_speechchallengef_000056fa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know kid, you really ought to have proof before you go around insulting people like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，孩子，你真的应该先找到真凭实据再在这儿到处辱骂别人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_speechchallengef_000056fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, if you don't mind, why don't you take your baseless accusations elsewhere. I have important business to conduct.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，如果你不介意的话，为什么不带着你那些毫无根据的罪名上别出去闹呢。我还有很重要的工作要做呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_speechchallengef_000056fb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My business arrangements are private.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的商务计划是保密的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : hiding something EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_speechchallengef_00005e21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you kidding?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是在开玩笑吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : angry he is being blackmailed EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_speechchallengef_00005e22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No way. Try again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没门。有种再试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : angry he is being blackmailed EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_speechchallengef_00005e23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid not. 20% seems more than fair to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看恐怕不行。20%在我看来已经够多的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : angry he is being blackmailed EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_speechchallengef_00005e24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your Light is strong, but only the truly Luminescent may enter our monastery. Please return when you are closer to Atom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的光芒的确很强，但事实只有真正的光芒才能进入我们的修道院。请等你与原子更加接近时再来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_speechchallengef_000071e2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I enter the monastery?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以进入教堂吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You judge what you do not understand. By introducing them to Atom's Light, we are saving them from a life of misery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在对你不懂的事物妄加评判。通过将他们引领向原子之光，我们正将他们从苦难的人生中拯救出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_speechchallengef_000071e3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't trick people into enlightenment. They have to accept it knowingly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能诱骗人民获得启示。他们必须诚心诚意地接受它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My orders are to deliver the rest of this water to Big Town, and I'm damn well going to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的任务是把剩下的水送到大镇，而我正想动身呢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03EncounterMegBOSFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : irritated EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encou_speechchallenge_00002675_1.ogg

I don't think so. They're giving the water away -- why would they make trouble over us taking a little extra?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不这么认为。他们正把水白送出去-- 为什么他们仅仅为了这么做就如此这般地找我们麻烦呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03EncounterMegSettlerFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : dismissively EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03encou_speechchallenge_00002676_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: LostIdle
I'll find you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会找到你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : losing sight of a threat EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_lostidle_00009a80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're here somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你跑不了的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : losing sight of a threat EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_lostidle_00009a81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: RadioHello
GNR. Three Dog. All you need to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 银河新闻电台。三狗。你们知道这些就够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiohello_000657d1_1.ogg

What's up Wastelanders? This is Three Dog, and you're listening to GNR! That's Galaxy News Radio, in case you forgot...
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了，废土人民？这是三狗，你正在收听的是GNR！也就是银河新闻电台，如果你忘了的话……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiohello_000657e0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.LastGreeting2 to RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.LastGreeting set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.LastGreeting to 12
I found a Brotherhood Holotag. What should I do with it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现了一个兄弟会全息军牌。怎么处理？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to Scribe Jameson. She is our keeper of the Scrolls. She will want to know what you have found.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去和文员詹姆森谈谈，她是我们的史官，她会对你找到的东西有兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06025FD0] (ID) NPC : [060B875B] (ID) NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) NPC : Star Paladin Cross [060156E5] (mod) NPC : [0002131F] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: DeathResponse
Not just yet. I wanted to talk to you about something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还没。我想和你谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <aroo?>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0606A772] (mod) Comment (NAM2) : The sound of a curious dog EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on, boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，狗肉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <aroo?>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0606A772] (mod) Comment (NAM2) : The sound of a curious dog EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on, Dogmeat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下, 狗肉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <aroo?>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0606A772] (mod) Comment (NAM2) : The dog is confused. EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's too dangerous here, pup. Go wait for me at Vault 101.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗肉，这太危险了。去101号避难所等我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <aroo?>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0606A772] (mod) Comment (NAM2) : The dog is confused. EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's too dangerous here, Dogmeat. Go wait for me at Vault 101.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗肉，这里太危险了。你还是去101避难所等我吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: <吠叫！>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0606A772] (mod) Comment (NAM2) : excited, playful bark EmotionType : Happy

Come on, Dogmeat. Let's go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗肉，我们走！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just kidding! The code is 2-1-6.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是开玩笑！密码是2-1-6。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your sense of humor sucks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的幽默感可真糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [0601D430] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\mq11_mq11sarahendcodekiddi_00037816_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, 2-1-6. I got it. Guess I'll see you around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，2-1-6。我知道了。我想我能看到你在附近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [0601D430] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\mq11_mq11sarahendcodekiddi_00037816_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set MQ11.Code to 2
set EndingBinks.EndDeath to 2 SetStage MQ11 61
There must be some other way...
ESP.TRADUIT: 一定有其他办法……

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish that were true. Really, I do. But you heard Doctor Li. We have to do this right now, or who knows how bad it'll be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望有，真的。不过你听到李博士说的了。我们必须立刻这么做，没人知道后果会多严重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [0601D430] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\mq11_mq11sarahendotherway_00037811_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of us has to go in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们中的一个必须进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [0601D430] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\mq11_mq11sarahendotherway_00037811_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The hell with this. This is crazy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真是见鬼了。太疯狂了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not arguing, believe me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是在讨论，相信我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [0601D430] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\mq11_mq11sarahendfuckit_00037813_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But one of us has to go in there now. We don't have time to stand around and talk about it. Who's it going to be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我们中的一个必须立刻进去。我们没有时间站着讨论了。谁去做？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [0601D430] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\mq11_mq11sarahendfuckit_00037813_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: RadioGNRNewsLink
Here's the latest news. Unemployment is down, stocks are up, and the U.N. has just declared global peace forever! Now the real news. *Sigh*
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是最新的新闻。失业率下降,股票上涨,联合国宣布世界永远和平!现在是真正的新闻。<叹气>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrnewslin_00008b2f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone ready for the Capital Wasteland's latest news? Me neither, but it's that time again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个人都想知道废土最新消息？我也没有，只好再重复一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrnewslin_00008b30_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What rhymes with "shoes" and often gives you the blues? That's right, it's time for the cashews! Okay, that doesn't really rhyme. How 'bout?news?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么“鞋”经常给你内幕消息？没错，这是时代周刊！好吧,这并不真正的说法。精彩的报道？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrnewslin_00008b31_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me ask you something, children. You hungry for some 200-year old Salisbury steak, or you hungry for some news? I'm guessing news. Here ya go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来问你一点事情,孩子们。你希望得到索尔兹伯里牛排还是一些消息?我猜是消息。来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrnewslin_00008b32_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: RadioGNRPlayerKarmaTitles
Don't lose hope, children. Don't ever lose hope! The kid from Vault 101, the Wasteland's one true Messiah, still walks among us! Just listen to this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请不要放弃,孩子们。永远不要绝望!101小子,一个真正废土英雄,仍然在我们中间!听听这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b49_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, that kid from Vault 101. Only a true Mortal could get involved in so many adventures, make so many damn caps! Behold, the latest tribulation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊,来自101的小子。一个凡人经历了这么多的冒险,创造了那么多的该死的事迹!看哪,最新的磨难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b4a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Devil walks among us, children. Oh, she may look like us, but she calls Hell home. She is legion, and her deeds are legend. Like this one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 魔鬼,走在我们的身边,孩子们。啊,她看起来像我们,但她的家在地狱。她是基督。她是唯一的传说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b4b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Devil walks among us, children. Oh, he may look like us, but he calls Hell home. He is legion, and his deeds are legend. Like this one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 魔鬼,走在我们的身边,孩子们。啊,他看起来像我们,但她的家在地狱。他是基督。他是唯一的传说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b4c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We may never get to Heaven, children, but at least we've got our own Earthly Angel walking among us. And I've got her latest exploits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可能永远都不会去天堂,孩子,但至少我们有我们自己的天使在我们身边。而且我有她最新的事迹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b4d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We may never get to Heaven, children, but at least we've got our own Earthly Angel walking among us. And I've got his latest exploits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可能永远都不会去天堂,孩子,但至少我们有我们自己的天使在我们身边。而且我有他最新的事迹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b4e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Neither light, nor dark, not good nor bad, there's one who truly walks down the middle of life's road. Here's an update on that Gray Stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有光明,也没有黑暗,不好也不坏,这是一个真正中庸的人生。这是一个现代灰色陌生人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b4f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's gotten to the point where that piece of shit from Vault 101 can't even be considered human. Am I right? Here's the latest on that Demon's Spawn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直说吧，这就是一堆狗屎，101小子甚至不能被认为是人类。我说的对吗?这是最新恶魔报道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only one person can bring a hint of sunshine to this dim and dreary Wasteland. Children, I bring you an update on?the Lightbringer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有一个人能给这个昏暗沉闷的废土带来一丝阳光。孩子们,我为你带来最新的光明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: By now everyone knows that the kid from Vault 101 is a no-good, selfish Moneygrubber, but who knew she was keeping so busy? Listen to this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在大家知道,来自101的小子是没有用的、自私的财迷,但谁知道她的另一面吗?听听这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: By now everyone knows that the kid from Vault 101 is a no-good, selfish Moneygrubber, but who knew he was keeping so busy? Listen to this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在大家知道,来自101的小子是没有用的、自私的财迷,但谁知道他的另一面吗?听听这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think you'll rest when you're dead, children? Not if that refugee from Vault 101 has anything to say about it. Here's the latest on the Soultaker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为你死了就会安息,孩子们?来自101避难所的避难者不这么认为。这是最新的灵魂狩猎者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Call her the Herald of Tranquility, that kid from Vault 101, usually righting any wrongs that cross her path. Here's a new update.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呼叫她的宁静使者,来自101避难所的孩子,经常在旅途中与邪恶对抗。这里是最新报道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Call him the Herald of Tranquility, that kid from Vault 101, usually righting any wrongs that cross his path. Here's a new update.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呼叫他的宁静使者,来自101避难所的孩子,经常在旅途中与邪恶对抗。这里是最新报道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like ol' 101 has become quite the Person of Refinement, mostly by taking people's hard-earned caps in exchange for... anything. Take a listen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来自101的小子看来不可思议的精明，什么都可以换取大家辛苦赚来的瓶盖。接着收听。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you've been wondering if that Instrument of Ruin from Vault 101 has been wreaking any new havoc, let me give you the latest scoop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你一直想知道从101避难所到废墟的任何东西，让我给你最新独家新闻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our Wasteland might be a frigging' mess (hence the name), but there's one person we've come to know as a Symbol of Order, and she's been busy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的废土可能是一个该死的食堂(因此得名),但有一个人让我们已经看到秩序,她一直都很忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our Wasteland might be a frigging' mess (hence the name), but there's one person we've come to know as a Symbol of Order, and he's been busy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的废土可能是一个该死的食堂(因此得名),但有一个人让我们已经看到秩序,他一直都很忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b5a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're tired of nobody giving a crap, I'm afraid you've come to the wrong place. Remember ol' 101? The very Model of Apathy? She's at it again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你厌倦了没有人可说,恐怕你错了。记得的不可思议101小子如何?不够精彩?她又上路了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b5b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're tired of nobody giving a crap, I'm afraid you've come to the wrong place. Remember ol' 101? The very Model of Apathy? He's at it again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你厌倦了没有人可说,恐怕你错了。记得的不可思议101小子如何?不够精彩?他又上路了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b5c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We all know the Capital Wasteland is an anarchist's wet dream, and a certain Agent of Chaos doesn't help matters much. Here's an update.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都知道废土是无政府主义者的乐园，而且没有人管这种混乱。现在有了一个开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b5d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We may not have superheroes - those two wackos near Canterbury Commons don't count - but we do have our very own Champion of Justice. Listen up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可能没有英雄——坎特伯雷附近那两个古怪,不算数。但是我们有我们的战士。听着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b5e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It shouldn't surprise anyone that the Capital Wasteland's most notorious Hero for Hire is in the headlines once again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不应该使人感到讶异,首都废土最臭名远扬的英雄再一次上了头版头条。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b5f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you have trouble sleeping, maybe it's because that kid from Vault 101 has become the Stuff of Nightmares, and is out there, walking among us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你失眠,也许是因为那个101小子已成为噩梦的精粹,就在那里,走在我们的身边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In today's vicious Yao Guai eat Yao Guai world, the exploits of a certain Friend of the People are usually cause for rejoicing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在今天堕落混乱的世界,一个朋友的英勇事迹通常会带来欢乐的日子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you'd think that Loner from Vault 101 would stay out of the spotlight, but I guess some people just can't help themselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你会以为他自己从101避难所走到聚光灯下,但是我想有些人是身不由己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now I know you're sick to death of hearing my horror stories, but what's a Three Dog to do when that Consort of Discord keeps causing so much mayhem?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我知道你腻烦死了我的恐怖故事,但不知道为什么三狗会故意说这么多不和谐的故事?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fear not, my poor lost flock! For the Shepherd of Vault 101 has come to guide you to the promised land! Maybe. Listen to this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要惧怕,我可怜的羔羊!让101小子来引导你!也许吧。听这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b64_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got new reports in on that wayward soul from Vault 101, the Capital Wasteland's infamous Egocentric. Check this out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有新报道说那任性的灵魂从101避难所,只为自己的事来到声名狼藉的首都废土。来看看这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you've run into her, you know you just can't trust that despicable little Deceiver from Vault 101. And now, she's at it again. Take a listen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你碰到她时,你要知道,你不能相信这卑鄙的小骗子来自101避难所。现在,她又来了。接着收听。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you've run into him, you know you just can't trust that despicable little Deceiver from Vault 101. And now, he's at it again. Take a listen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你碰到他时,你要知道,你不能相信这卑鄙的小骗子来自101避难所。现在,他又来了。接着收听。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b67_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just when you thought there was no charity, no good, no decency left in this world, everyone's favorite Model of Selflessness surprises ya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 刚刚得到的消息，我的朋友们。看起来我们得到了一个新消息：他就是人类最后最好的希望 — 来自101号避难所的那孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\fallout3.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_0005807f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes, in this cold, crazy world, you just want to make a buck. Like that penny-pinching Profiteer from Vault 101. Here's the latest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时,在这寒冷而疯狂的世界,你只是想赚点小钱的。就像这个来自101的小气鬼。这是最新报道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think you're sad now, children? Just wait till you hear the latest on the Capital Wasteland's very own Bringer of Sorrow. Cue the crying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为你现在是最伤心时候，孩子们?只要你听到废土传来的最新的悲伤。你会痛哭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the matter, kids? Feeling down? Low on vim, vigor, and the simple will to live? What you need is the latest news on the Restorer of Faith!
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了,孩子?感觉到了吗?低调、充满活力、简单的生活?你需要的是最新的新闻重修你的信心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b6a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So here's the question. How's that smooth-operating Soldier of Fortune from Vault 101 getting along these days? Business, it would seem, is booming?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以这是个问题。让我们看看来自101的雇佣兵最近几天怎么样？可以，看来，还受欢迎？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b6b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what's new with that master of disaster, that duke of destruction, that bad to the bone?Architect of Doom? Here's what.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以有什么新鲜的坏事，毁灭公爵，彻底毁灭？建筑师的末日？就这么回事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayerk_00008b6c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This just in, my friends. Looks like we've got an update on the Last, Best Hope of Humanity herself, the kid from Vault 101.
ESP.TRADUIT: 刚传来的消息，各位朋友。最后我们得到我们人类最美好的希望那个来自提供101避难所的孩子的消息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This just in, my friends. Looks like we've got an update on the Last, Best Hope of Humanity himself, the kid from Vault 101.
ESP.TRADUIT: 刚刚得到的消息，我的朋友们。看起来我们得到了一个新消息：有关人性楷模 — 来自101号避难所的那个孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This just in, my friends. Looks like we've got an update on that Paradigm of Humanity, the kid from Vault 101.
ESP.TRADUIT: 刚刚得到的消息，我的朋友们。看起来我们得到了一个新消息：有关人性灾难 — 来自101号避难所的那个孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This just in, my friends. Looks like we've got an update on that Scourge of Humanity, the kid from Vault 101.
ESP.TRADUIT: 提问：有上帝么？如果真的有的话，他在乎我们这帮人么？我很怀疑，但这是在某个来自101号避难所的圣人出来之前…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: FollowersPPurity
<whine>
ESP.TRADUIT: <哀鸣声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0606A772] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it's time for us to say goodbye, old buddy. Take care of yourself, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 老兄，我们该说再见了。好好照顾你自己，好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck that. Do your own dirty work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的，做你的脏活就好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jericho [06000A71] (mod) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jericho, I need you to go into that chamber and turn on the purifier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 耶利哥，我需要你进入房间开启净化器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I抦 sorry, my companion, but no. We all have our own destinies, and yours culminates here. I would not rob you of that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我们各有自己的命运，今天是你的终点，我不想改变你的命运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fawkes [0003D34E] (mod) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\creaturesupermutantdc\followers_followersppurity_00070fa5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fawkes, I need you to go into that chamber and turn on the purifier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 福克斯，我需要你进入房间开启净化器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soldier, you ought to be ashamed of yourself. This is your fight! You gotta finish what your daddy started! Stand strong and get your ass in there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 士兵，你应该为自己感到羞耻，这是你的战斗！你应该完成父亲未完的使命，坚强地爬起来战斗吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant RL-3 [0009426E] (mod) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotmistergutsydc\followers_followersppurity_00070fa6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Emergency directive, sergeant. Go into that chamber and turn on the purifier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 紧急指示，中士。进入房间开启净化器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honey, you are out of your mind if you think I'm going in there. Find yourself another guinea pig.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲爱的，要是你认为我会去那的话你就真是疯了，你重新找个实验品吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Clover [060156A2] (mod) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult04dc\followers_followersppurity_00070fab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clover, I need you to go into that chamber and turn on the purifier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可萝尔，我需要你进入房间开启净化器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My friend... It's been my pleasure accompanying you, but we both know this is your fight to finish. Stay strong, and honor your father's memory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很乐意能与你为伴，但我们都知道这是你的战斗，继承你父亲的遗志坚强地战斗下去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Star Paladin Cross [060156E5] (mod) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\followers_followersppurity_00070fac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Star Paladin Cross, I need you to go into that chamber and turn on the purifier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 星骑士 克罗丝，我需要你进入房间开启净化器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That chamber? Right there? With all the radiation? Man, no way. I'll end up dead. Or worse. I could be one of them Ghouls! Ain't gonna happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说那充满着高辐射的房间吗？没门，我会死掉的，或者是变成僵尸！我是不会去的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Butch [06027F65] (mod) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquebutch\followers_followersppurity_00070faf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Butch, I need you to go into that chamber and turn on the purifier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布奇，我需要你进入房间开启净化器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and I both know that's not going to happen. I've saved your sorry ass enough. This one's all you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对你已经仁至义尽了，这次我不会帮你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charon [060156F6] (mod) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\followers_followersppurity_00070fb0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Charon, I need you to go into that chamber and turn on the purifier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡隆，我需要你进入房间开启净化器。

set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.LastNews to 13

Good boy, Dogmeat!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好孩子，狗肉！

ESP.ORIGINAL: <pant> <pant>
ESP.TRADUIT: <喘气><喘气>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0001CF9C] (ID) NPC : Dogmeat [0606A772] (mod) Comment (NAM2) : Appreciative panting EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good boy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好孩子，狗肉！

ESP.ORIGINAL: <pant> <pant>
ESP.TRADUIT: <喘气><喘气>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0001CF9C] (ID) NPC : Dogmeat [0606A772] (mod) Comment (NAM2) : Appreciative panting EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good boy, Dogmeat!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好孩子，狗肉！

<whimper>
ESP.TRADUIT: <呜咽>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, pup. I don't have any Stimpaks for you right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，狗肉。我现在没治疗针治疗你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <whimper>
ESP.TRADUIT: <呜咽>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0606A772] (mod) Comment (NAM2) : Sad whimper EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, Dogmeat. I don't have any Stimpaks for you right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，狗肉。我现在没有治疗针给你用了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: DogmeatScold
<whine> <whine>
ESP.TRADUIT: <哀鸣声><哀鸣声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0606A772] (mod) Comment (NAM2) : Hurt whining EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bad puppy! Very bad!
ESP.TRADUIT: 坏孩子，狗肉！坏孩子！

ESP.ORIGINAL: <whine> <whine>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0606A772] (mod) Comment (NAM2) : Hurt whining EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bad, Dogmeat! Very bad!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不好哦，坏狗狗。非常不好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dogmeat, I need you to find something for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗肉，我要你帮我找些东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <bark>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0606A772] (mod) Comment (NAM2) : Affirmative bark EmotionType : Happy

Stop searching, pup.
ESP.TRADUIT: 停止搜索，狗肉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <bark>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0606A772] (mod) Comment (NAM2) : Affirmative bark EmotionType : Happy

Stop searching, Dogmeat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 停止搜索，狗肉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <bark>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0606A772] (mod) Comment (NAM2) : Affirmative bark EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey pup, I need you to find something for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿~小狗，我想要你去帮我找点东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <bark>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0606A772] (mod) Comment (NAM2) : Affirmative bark EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: RadioGNRPlayerExploitsRELAY
Anything you can tell me about the Super Mutants?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于超级变种人的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My child, you seem to have learned more in your brief time than I have in twenty years!
ESP.TRADUIT: 孩子，你过去一周了解到的好像超过我二十年了解到的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dialoguebo_bossupermutants_000b4176_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything more you can tell me about the Super Mutants?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能再说些超级变种人的情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you know about the Enclave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于英克雷你知道些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: More than anyone else, I dare say. Certainly enough to know they're the greatest threat the Capital Wasteland has ever faced.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢说没人知道得比我多。当然只要明白他们是首都废土所面对的最大的威胁就够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dialoguebosback_bosenclave_000b4169_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood of Steel has encountered the Enclave before, you see. Over thirty years ago, back in California.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，时间倒退30年，在加利福尼亚，钢铁兄弟会就已经和英克雷打过交道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dialoguebosback_bosenclave_000b4169_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then, they were led by a President Richardson. Now we've got this Eden to contend with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们当时由理查兹总统领导，现在是伊登。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dialoguebosback_bosenclave_000b4169_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It matters not -- now, as before, they seek to control and destroy, all in the guise of restoring order. Your father, I fear, was just the beginning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在也一样，事情没什么变化。他们热衷控制和毁灭，却打着恢复秩序的幌子。恐怕，你父亲只是一个开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dialoguebosback_bosenclave_000b4169_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you make of the Enclave, Squire?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你了解英克雷吗，侍从？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Y... You're asking me what I think of the Enclave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你……你问我对英克雷的看法？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E2] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... The Brotherhood of Steel has actually faced the Enclave before. Back West. More than thirty years ago, according to our chronicles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯……根据我们的编年史，早在30年前，钢铁兄弟会事实上就已经在西部和英克雷打交道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E2] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Judging from those records, I'd say their soldiers are outfitted in Advanced Power Armor Mark II. It's... pretty strong. Better than our Power Armor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从那些记录来看，我得说他们的士兵配备了先进的二型动力装甲。它……相当坚固，比我们的动力装甲要好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E2] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And some of their technology is amazing! Vertibirds! Plasma weapons that can turn a man to goo!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的一些技术令人称奇！飞鸟！电浆武器能把人变成灰烬！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E2] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does... that help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些……有用吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E2] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... Any thoughts on the Enclave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么……对英克雷有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: As if we didn't have enough to worry about. Their weapons are better; their Power Armor is better. Is their training better? We'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好像我们的麻烦还不够似的……他们武器更好；他们的动力装甲更好。他们的训练更好吗？我们等着瞧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0601937D] (ID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dialogueci_tlcitadelenclav_000b7f41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So they have Plasma weapons! Bah! It's strong technology, I'll give you that, but limited in modability.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，他们有电浆武器！呸！我承认那是强悍的技术，但功能有限。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156ED] (ID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dialogueci_tlcitadelenclav_000b7f42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've already started removing the compensators on our laser weapons to cut through the black devil Power Armor of theirs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经拔掉了我们激光武器上的调相器，让它能刺穿他们黑色而邪恶的动力装甲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156ED] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dialogueci_tlcitadelenclav_000b7f42_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll drop them like any other meat, don't you worry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会把他们像其它的肉一样打倒，你别担心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156ED] (ID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dialogueci_tlcitadelenclav_000b7f42_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're sporting some pretty impressive Power Armor, I'll give them that. The Advanced Mark II.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们穿着给人印象相当深的动力装甲。先进的二型动力装甲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156EC] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dialogueci_tlcitadelenclav_000b7f43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that's all right. With a few modifications, our own armor will more than handle anything they throw at it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这也不过如此。等做些改进后，我们自己的装甲就能轻松应付他们的攻击了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156EC] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dialogueci_tlcitadelenclav_000b7f43_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quite a few, but most are distinctly unladylike, and unworthy of discussion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相当多，但大多数人显然不像淑女，这也不值得讨论。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06025FD0] (ID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dialogueci_tlcitadelenclav_000b7f44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will tell you that the Brotherhood has encountered the Enclave before, and their motives were just as sinister then as they are now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉你，兄弟会以前就与英克雷遭遇过，而他们的图谋和现在的一样险恶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06025FD0] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dialogueci_tlcitadelenclav_000b7f44_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're men. They're born, they live, they die. End of story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是人，他们出生、活着、死去，故事结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E8] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dialogueci_tlcitadelenclav_000b997a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's meat under that armor, and meat can be ground?
ESP.TRADUIT: 穿着装甲的肉，也是能被打倒的肉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E6] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dialogueci_tlcitadelenclav_000b997b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, I don't know. Fighting Uglies is one thing, but we've never gone up against anyone that well trained or organized. Even their tech is better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老兄，我不知道。跟丑八怪战斗是一回事，但我们从未和如此训练有素、组织严密的对手对抗过。他们的技术甚至也比我们好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E9] (ID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dialogueci_tlcitadelenclav_000b997c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't get me wrong. The Pride's in it to win it, and I'll go down shooting if I have to. I just hope I don't have to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别理解错了。“里昂斯的骄傲”既然加入战斗，那就必须获得胜利。如果有必要，我会一直战斗。我只是希望不必这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E9] (ID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dialogueci_tlcitadelenclav_000b997c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Killing unarmed civilians... Makes me sick. Come over here, try fighting someone who shoots back. Fucking cowards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀害手无寸铁的平民……真无耻。到这来，和拿枪的人打啊。他妈的胆小鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06026C57] (ID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dialogueci_tlcitadelenclav_000b997d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honestly? I can't wait to see if one of those helmets can stop a hollow-point round at 100 yards. I'm thinking... not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说真的？我等不及看那些头盔是否可以阻止100码外的空心弹射击了。我想……不可能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E7] (ID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dialogueci_tlcitadelenclav_000ba3fe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you in charge of the um... the robot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你负责这个，嗯……机器人的事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am, and have been since we first found him, well over twenty years ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是，而且自从我们第一次发现他后一直如此，大约在20年前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dialoguecitadel_tlrobot_000b879f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Liberty Prime" is the designation we found on file for him. Magnificent, don't you think? At least he will be, once all systems are operational.
ESP.TRADUIT: “自由先锋”的设定出自我们发现的相关文件。多么宏伟啊，对吧？会是的，等所有系统都正常运作起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dialoguecitadel_tlrobot_000b879f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the energy consumption. Something that big, with such advanced weapons systems... we just don't have the means to power him. Not yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它的能量消耗很大，这样大的玩意，如此先进的武器系统……我们只是没有办法提供动力，至少目前还没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dialoguecitadel_tlrobot_000b879f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DialogueCitadel.RothchildRobot to 1
Ah yes. Everyone asks about the robot. Hard not to, I admit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，是的，每个人都会问这机器人。好像不问会嘴痒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dialoguecitadel_tlrobot_000b87a0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: His name is "Liberty Prime." Very patriotic. Built by a very proud nation, during a very desperate time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他叫“自由先锋”，非常爱国。在混乱的时期，由一个高傲的国家建造。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dialoguecitadel_tlrobot_000b87a0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've had about as much success getting him working as they did. You should speak with Scribe Rothchild. He can tell you more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经做了许多工作以便他能成功运作。你应当和罗斯查德文员谈谈，他能告诉你更多情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dialoguecitadel_tlrobot_000b87a0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what's the deal with the robot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 该怎么处理这个机器人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: CitTalkShortGeneric
Enclave strength is at 100%. They're getting reinforcements from somewhere, but we still haven't determined the location of their headquarters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 英克雷的兵力达到了100%，他们显然从其他地方获得了增援，但我们始终没法确定他们的总部位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E2] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\convcitade_cittalkshortgen_000ba731_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enclave troops have fortified the purifier complex. With those vertibirds, they're able to transport personnel at a remarkable rate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 英克雷军队加强了净化器的防守力度。利用那些飞鸟，他们能高效率地运送人员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E2] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\convcitade_cittalkshortgen_000ba733_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I insist, my friend. It's the least I can do to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收下吧，我的朋友。这是起码该做的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Thank you. You're the first person willing to actually give me any of that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？谢谢。你是第一个愿意给我水喝的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\waterbegga_waterbeggargree_00002780_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: float beggarkarma Player.RemoveItem DLC03AquaPura 1 AddItem DLC03AquaPura 1 SetAV Variable10 1 if GetStage MQA == 100 ; poisoned RewardKarma DLC03WaterBeggarKarmaPenalty else ; not poisoned RewardKarma FFWaterBeggarKarmaReward endif
Thank you... I'm starting to think Aqua Pura is even better than normal purified water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你.... 我开始觉得药水要比一般的纯净水好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\waterbegga_waterbeggargree_00002781_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: float beggarkarma Player.RemoveItem DLC03AquaPura 1 AddItem DLC03AquaPura 1 SetAV Variable10 1 if GetStage MQA == 100 ; poisoned RewardKarma DLC03WaterBeggarKarmaPenalty else ; not poisoned RewardKarma FFWaterBeggarKarmaReward endif
Goodbye, Fawkes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见，福克斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shouldn't someone be starting the purifier in order to prevent our imminent demise?
ESP.TRADUIT: 难道没人能在我们完蛋前启动净化工程吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fawkes [0003D34E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\creaturesupermutantdc\mq11_dlc03mq11followernotg_00000908_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never mind, Fawkes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，福克斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That seems incredibly juvenile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那看起来幼稚得不可思议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fawkes [0003D34E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\creaturesupermutantdc\mq11_dlc03mq11followernotg_0000b90d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nope, not doing it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不行，不要这么做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Farewell, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保重，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fawkes [0003D34E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\creaturesupermutantdc\mq11_dlc03mq11followernotg_00000d52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Standing by for further orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等待进一步指令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant RL-3 [0009426E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotmistergutsydc\mq11_dlc03mq11followernotg_00000b0c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll see to it that your posthumous awards are polished daily, soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我预见你死后的荣光将会永存,士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant RL-3 [0009426E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotmistergutsydc\mq11_dlc03mq11followernotg_00000d53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会去的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This seems an illogical solution to our dilemma.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于我们的困境，这似乎是个荒唐的方案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charon [060156F6] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\mq11_dlc03mq11followernotg_00000d54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget it. Never mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了。没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: After everything, this is how you let it end?
ESP.TRADUIT: 经历了那么多，你打算让这事就这么了结？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charon [060156F6] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\mq11_dlc03mq11followernotg_0000b90f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, but this is how it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，不过就是如此。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a disgrace to the service.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对这项使命是一个耻辱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant RL-3 [0009426E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotmistergutsydc\mq11_dlc03mq11followernotg_0000b90e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, but this is how it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，不过就是如此。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That would seem impossible, given what you are about to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这看来根本不可能办到，不论你想做什么, 放弃吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charon [060156F6] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\mq11_dlc03mq11followernotg_00000d55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll see you around, Charon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见，卡隆。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fawkes, I need you to start the purifier. The code is 2-1-6.
ESP.TRADUIT: 福克斯，我要你去启动净水器。密码是2-1-6。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't recall that being part of the plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不记得计划里有这个部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charon [060156F6] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\mq11_dlc03mq11sendfollower_00000905_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to start the purifier, Charon. The code is 2-1-6.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去启动净水器，卡隆。密码是2-1-6。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't recall that being part of the plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不记得计划里有这个部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charon [060156F6] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\mq11_dlc03mq11sendfollower_0000b90a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, then go turn the thing on yourself. The code is 2-1-6.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你去启动净水器。密码是2-1-6。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is contrary to what you just asserted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这与你断言的正相反。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charon [060156F6] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\mq11_dlc03mq11sendfollower_00000b06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No parting of ways necessary. You're going to start the purifier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有别的途径可以选择了.你去启动净水计划.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that's more like it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在那更加像它了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant RL-3 [0009426E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotmistergutsydc\mq11_dlc03mq11sendfollower_00000b07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This unit is more than equipped to handle the harsh combat environment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这支部队为处理严酷的战况而特别配置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant RL-3 [0009426E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotmistergutsydc\mq11_dlc03mq11sendfollower_00000b07_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cycle that airlock, soldier, and we'll end this war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关上气闸舱，士兵，我们将要终结这场战争。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant RL-3 [0009426E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotmistergutsydc\mq11_dlc03mq11sendfollower_00000b07_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set MQ11.DLC03FollowTalk to -1 SetObjectiveCompleted MQ11 65 1 SetStage MQ11 61 set MQ11.Code to 2 set MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode to 3 set EndingBinks.EndDeath to 2 RL3REF.EVP MQ01SarahRef.EVP
Fine. You do it then. The code is 2-1-6.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。你去。密码是2-1-6。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, of course. My immunity to radiation makes me a far better candidate for surviving in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊,当然.我是这里抵抗辐射能力最好的人.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fawkes [0003D34E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back!

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would say that your destiny lies within that chamber, but you have already altered mine. The least I can do is return the favor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想说的是,这是你人生的最高点.但你却要把它推给我,不过这却是我报恩的机会.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fawkes [0003D34E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\creaturesupermutantdc\mq11_dlc03mq11sendfollower_00000d50_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cycle the airlock, and we'll put an end to this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把空气阀关闭后,然后我会把一切结束掉.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fawkes [0003D34E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\creaturesupermutantdc\mq11_dlc03mq11sendfollower_00000d50_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set MQ11.DLC03FollowTalk to -1 SetObjectiveCompleted MQ11 65 1 SetStage MQ11 61 set MQ11.Code to 2 set MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode to 1 set EndingBinks.EndDeath to 2 MQ08FawkesREF.EVP MQ01SarahRef.EVP
But... you said...
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是... 你说...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fawkes [0003D34E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\creaturesupermutantdc\mq11_dlc03mq11sendfollower_0000b90b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, of course. My immunity to radiation makes me a far better candidate for surviving in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊,当然.我是这里抵抗辐射能力最好的人.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fawkes [0003D34E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\creaturesupermutantdc\mq11_dlc03mq11sendfollower_0000b90b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would say that your destiny lies within that chamber, but you have already altered mine. The least I can do is return the favor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想说的是,这是你人生的最高点.但你却要把它推给我,不过这却是我报恩的机会.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fawkes [0003D34E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\creaturesupermutantdc\mq11_dlc03mq11sendfollower_0000b90b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cycle the airlock, and we'll put an end to this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把空气阀关闭后,然后我会把一切结束掉.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fawkes [0003D34E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\creaturesupermutantdc\mq11_dlc03mq11sendfollower_0000b90b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set MQ11.DLC03FollowTalk to -1 SetObjectiveCompleted MQ11 65 1 SetStage MQ11 61 set MQ11.Code to 2 set MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode to 1 set EndingBinks.EndDeath to 2 MQ08FawkesREF.EVP MQ01SarahRef.EVP
That would be fine. I'd be more than willing to take the responsibility, if it means surviving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。我会心甘情愿地承担责任的，如果这样能活命的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fawkes [0003D34E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\creaturesupermutantdc\mq11_dlc03mq11sendfollower_00000d51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just cycle the airlock for me, and I'll enter the code.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要帮我关上气闸舱，然后我会输入密码。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Fawkes [0003D34E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\creaturesupermutantdc\mq11_dlc03mq11sendfollower_00000d51_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set MQ11.DLC03FollowTalk to -1 SetObjectiveCompleted MQ11 65 1 SetStage MQ11 61 set MQ11.Code to 2 set MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode to 1 set EndingBinks.EndDeath to 2 MQ08FawkesREF.EVP MQ01SarahRef.EVP
I'm not about to kill myself in there. Why don't you do it? The code is 2-1-6.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不准备进去自杀。为什么你不去？密码是2-1-6。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sir, yes sir!
ESP.TRADUIT: 长官，遵命长官！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant RL-3 [0009426E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotmistergutsydc\mq11_dlc03mq11sendfollower_0000b177_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My superior construction and programming will outlast your frail human form in that hostile environment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我高超的结构和程序将比你脆弱的人类存在形态在那个恶劣危险的环境中存活更久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant RL-3 [0009426E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotmistergutsydc\mq11_dlc03mq11sendfollower_0000b177_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'll be a battlefield commendation for sure. Cycle that airlock, soldier, and we'll put an end to this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是实实在在的战地表彰。关上气闸舱，士兵，我们将为这划上一个句号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant RL-3 [0009426E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotmistergutsydc\mq11_dlc03mq11sendfollower_0000b177_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set MQ11.DLC03FollowTalk to -1 SetObjectiveCompleted MQ11 65 1 SetStage MQ11 61 set MQ11.Code to 2 set MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode to 3 set EndingBinks.EndDeath to 2 RL3REF.EVP MQ01SarahRef.EVP
Emergency Directive: Get that purifier running on the double! Code 2-1-6!
ESP.TRADUIT: 紧急指令: 立刻启动净水器！密码2-1-6！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sir, yes sir!
ESP.TRADUIT: 长官，遵命长官！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant RL-3 [0009426E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotmistergutsydc\mq11_dlc03mq11sendfollower_0000b90c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My superior construction and programming will outlast your frail human form in that hostile environment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我高超的结构和程序将比你脆弱的人类存在形态在那个恶劣危险的环境中存活更久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant RL-3 [0009426E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotmistergutsydc\mq11_dlc03mq11sendfollower_0000b90c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'll be a battlefield commendation for sure. Cycle that airlock, soldier, and we'll put an end to this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是实实在在的战地表彰。关上气闸舱，士兵，我们将为这划上一个句号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sergeant RL-3 [0009426E] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\robotmistergutsydc\mq11_dlc03mq11sendfollower_0000b90c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set MQ11.DLC03FollowTalk to -1 SetObjectiveCompleted MQ11 65 1 SetStage MQ11 61 set MQ11.Code to 2 set MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode to 3 set EndingBinks.EndDeath to 2 RL3REF.EVP MQ01SarahRef.EVP
Emergency Directive: Get that purifier running on the double! Code 2-1-6!
ESP.TRADUIT: 紧急指令: 立刻启动净水器！密码2-1-6！

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened? How did I get here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么回事？我怎么来这儿了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, relax. Everything is fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请放松。一切都好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1eldergree_00000af8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were brought back to the Citadel after some sort of energy spike in the purifier. You and Sarah were both knocked unconscious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在净化器发生某些类型的能量泄漏后，你被带回五角大本营。你和莎拉两个都晕了过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1eldergree_00000af8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quite a bit has happened since then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从那时起发生过不少次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1eldergree_00000af8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, relax. Everything is fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请放松。一切都好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1eldergree_00000d43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were found unconscious in the purifier control room, and brought back here for treatment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你被发现时，晕倒在净化器控制室内，然后被带回这里来治疗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1eldergree_00000d43_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quite a bit has happened since then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从那时起发生过不少次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1eldergree_00000d43_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's going on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's all right, you're safe now. You're in the Citadel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，你现在安全了。你在五角大本营。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1eldergree_00000af9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was some sort of energy spike as the purifier started. You and Sarah were knocked unconscious, and brought here to the infirmary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当净化器开启时，产生了某些类型的能量泄漏。你和莎拉都晕了过去，然后就被送来这个医务室。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1eldergree_00000af9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've been watching over the two of you for days. I'm glad to see it's paid off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经看护了你们两个好几天了。我很高兴这有了回报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1eldergree_00000af9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's all right, you're safe now. You're in the Citadel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，你现在安全了。你在五角大本营。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1eldergree_00000afa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was an explosion as the purifier started. You were knocked unconscious, and brought here to the infirmary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当净化器开启时发生了爆炸。你晕了过去，然后就被送来这个医务室。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1eldergree_00000afa_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've been watching over you for days. I am glad to see that our efforts weren't in vain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经看护了你们两个好几天了。我很高兴我们的努力没有白费。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1eldergree_00000afa_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where's Sarah? Is she okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莎拉在哪？她还好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, yes. She's fine. Or, she will be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。她很好。至少，她会好起来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1eldergree_00000af6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I appreciate your concern for her, but really, don't worry. You've been through enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴你这么关心她，不过说真的，不用担心。你已经做得够好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1eldergree_00000af6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's all right, I understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，我能理解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1eldergree_00000af7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no doubt she refused to allow you to put yourself in harm's way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想毫无疑问，她不会让你投身于危机之中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1eldergree_00000af7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We all owe her a great debt. And I... I could not be prouder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们欠她的太多了。而且我…我一点也自豪不起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1eldergree_00000af7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: About Sarah...
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于莎拉…

ESP.ORIGINAL: Charon, please do this for me. The code is 2-1-6.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡隆，请你为我这么做。密码是2-1-6。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As my employer, I am obliged to honor your request. Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你作为我的雇主，我乐意为您效劳。很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charon [060156F6] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\mq11_dlc03mq11charonplease_00000b05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set MQ11.DLC03FollowTalk to -1 SetObjectiveCompleted MQ11 65 1 SetStage MQ11 61 set MQ11.Code to 2 set MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode to 2 set EndingBinks.EndDeath to 2 CharonREF.EVP MQ01SarahRef.EVP
Just forget it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you wish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如你所愿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charon [060156F6] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\mq11_dlc03mq11charonforget_00000b0b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This contract says you're going. The code is 2-1-6. Now get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的合约说了，你必须这么做。密码是2-1-6。现在进去吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you insist...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你坚持……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charon [060156F6] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\mq11_dlc03mq11charonemploy_00000b04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set MQ11.DLC03FollowTalk to -1 SetObjectiveCompleted MQ11 65 1 SetStage MQ11 61 set MQ11.Code to 2 set MQ11.DLC03FollowerCode to 2 set EndingBinks.EndDeath to 2 CharonREF.EVP MQ01SarahRef.EVP
Wow. Well, thanks for taking care of me. I'm out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇噢。那么，谢谢你们照顾我。我要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder if you might be willing to aid us a bit further.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在想你可否能再多帮我们一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1tha_0000320d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While we've had a decisive victory, the Enclave threat hasn't been removed yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管我们取得了决定性的胜利，英克雷的威胁还是没有解除。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1tha_0000320d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what happens now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那现在怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's really up to you, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个，那可是取决于你了，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1sow_00001096_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood has a clear plan of action: the remnants of the Enclave must be swept away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会有着明确的行动计划: 英克雷的余党必须被扫除干净。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1sow_00001096_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Pride has been working to this end ever since we took the purifier back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从我们把净化装置带回来，“骄傲”就一直在研究这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1sow_00001096_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only remaining question is whether we can count on you to help us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后的问题就是不知你是否能帮助我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1sow_00001096_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where is Sarah? Is she okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莎拉在哪？她还好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's right here. Unresponsive, but stable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她在这儿。虽然还没有清醒，但情况稳定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1whe_00000d42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To see that you've recovered gives me hope...
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到你恢复过来给了我希望…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1whe_00000d42_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I appreciate that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常感谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above Comment (NAM2) : sad EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1whe_0000bb97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a soldier and a leader, I know that losses are unavoidable in times of war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为军人和领袖，我知道在战争中损失是无可避免的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above Comment (NAM2) : sad EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1whe_0000bb97_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But as a father...
ESP.TRADUIT: 但作为父亲…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above Comment (NAM2) : sad EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1whe_0000bb97_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry about Sarah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于莎拉…我很抱歉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about the purifier? Did it work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 净化器怎么样？有效吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Indeed it did. The Tidal Basin is full of fresh, clean water now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它真的很有效。潮汐港湾现在流淌着清洁干净的水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1did_00000d47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've been working to see that it's distributed to as many people as possible across the Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一直在努力把水分发给废土上尽可能多的人们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1did_00000d47_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In fact, I'm hopeful that soon we won't be referring to "the Wasteland" any longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，我希望我们很快就不会再提起"废土"一词了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1did_00000d47_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: None of this would have been possible without the efforts of both you and your father. I doubt we shall ever be able to truly repay you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有你和你父亲的努力，这一切都无法实现。恐怕我们永远也无法好好的报答你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1did_00000d47_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, it did. We've been distributing the water as best we can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，它成功了。我们正竭尽所能的分配这些纯水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1did_00001095_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There have been reports of some... problems, but we're dealing with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在出现了一些…问题，不过我们正在处理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1did_00001095_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without your assistance, this never would have been possible. We all owe both you and your father a great deal of thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有你的帮助，这一切都不会成功。我们欠你和你父亲太多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1did_00001095_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did we win? Did we beat the Enclave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们赢了吗？我们打败英克雷了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, we most certainly did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，我们就快胜利了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1did_00000d40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Between your help in destroying their headquarters, and their subsequent defeat at the purifier, the Enclave was thrown into disarray.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先是在你的帮助下摧毁了他们的总基地，其后又是在抢夺净化器上击败了他们，英克雷现在已经陷入了一片混乱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1did_00000d40_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Liberty Prime has been assisting our forces in removing any remaining Enclave forces.
ESP.TRADUIT: “自由先锋”正在协助我们消灭英克雷的残余势力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1did_00000d40_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, we most certainly did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，我们就快成功了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1did_0000943c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After securing the purifier, our forces were sent to deal with the Enclave in full.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在保护了净化器后，我们的军力全都被派去对付英克雷了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1did_0000943c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Pride and Liberty Prime made short work of their base of operations, and have since been cleaning up pockets of resistance.
ESP.TRADUIT: “骄傲”以及 自由先锋 在短暂地维护了他们基地的运作后，接着又开始清扫小股的抵抗力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1did_0000943c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No thanks. I've had enough of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了。我已经受够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a shame. We could use your assistance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真可惜。我们需要你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder2not_00001094_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And since you have done so much to aid our cause, and proven yourself more than capable, you have been named a Knight of the Brotherhood of Steel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于你帮了我们那么多忙，证明你的能力出众，现在我任命你为钢铁兄弟会的骑士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder2not_00001094_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should you change your mind, Scribe Rothchild can brief you on what's been going on these last few weeks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你该改变主意，文员罗斯查德，简述一下前几个星期的情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage MQ11 200 Set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC03BS1 10 1 player.setfactionrank BrotherhoodSteelFactionDC 1
Is there any way I can help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有需要我帮忙的地方吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Indeed, we can use every able body available to us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实，我们可以接纳每个对我们有用的个体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder2nee_00001fc9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To that end, I am going to circumvent our standard recruitment procedures and declare you a Knight of the Brotherhood of Steel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为此，我依照我们的标准征兵程序宣布，你是钢铁兄弟会的骑士了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder2nee_00001fc9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before you do anything else, please speak with Scribe Rothchild. I'm sure he'll be pleased to see you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你做什么事情之前，请先和文员罗斯查德谈谈。我想他会很高兴再次见到你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder2nee_00001fc9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He can brief you on the details of the last few weeks, as well as where our efforts are focused now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他可以简要地告诉你最近几个星期的情况，以及我们最近的任务着重点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder2nee_00001fc9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand that you've been through quite an ordeal, but the sooner you can talk to him, the sooner we can put an end to all this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白你有过痛苦的经历，但是你越早和他谈话，我们就可以越早结束这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder2nee_00001fc9_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage MQ11 200 Set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC03BS1 10 1 player.setfactionrank BrotherhoodSteelFaction 1
How long was I out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我昏迷了多久？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just about two weeks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大概两周。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1how_00001097_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry. We've been taking good care of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心。我们一直在照顾你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elder1how_00001097_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterPPTopic
I think I see one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我好像看到一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3E] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : bored, talking to himself on mirelurk patrol duty EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterp_00001d22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least they don't shoot back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少他们没有还击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3E] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : bored, talking to himself on mirelurk patrol duty EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterp_00001d23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, pop your head up one more time for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，你再给我抬一次头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3E] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : bored, talking to himself on mirelurk patrol duty.
