EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterp_00001d24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe we finally got them all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我们确实把他们都杀完了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3E] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : bored, talking to himself on mirelurk patrol duty EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterp_00001d25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: God what a stink!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪！真臭啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : grumbling to himself EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterp_00001d26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is worse than latrine duty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这比扫厕所还恶心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : grumbling to himself EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterp_00001d27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You won't see Elder Lyons down here pulling the putrid lurks out of the Basin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里昂斯老家伙才不会来这把腐烂的变种蟹拖出这个地方的呢…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : grumbling to himself EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterp_00001d28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How many of these damn things were living down there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道有多少该死的这玩意住在这里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Initiate [09001D3A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : grumbling to himself EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterp_00001d29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterRCResponse
Yeah. They've got a whole lake of it just sitting there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，一湖的蟹都在这里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03 Encounter RC dialogue faction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterr_00001d2a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know. We run out in two days and then it's back to the radiated shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道，我们呆了两天，这些玩意就都化成辐射屎了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03 Encounter RC dialogue faction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterr_00001d2b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03BS1VargasLines
There's more of them than I expected. They're really entrenched here. Something must be up...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的敌人比我想的要多。他们把守森严。必须想个办法…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristanli_000020b7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're thinking if it's active, we can find out who they're talking to, and get the last of the locations nailed down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在想如果它有效，我们就可以找出他们在跟谁联系，并且挖出他们最后的基地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristanli_000020b8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scribes pulled information about this place day before yesterday. Some communications facility.
ESP.TRADUIT: 文员们前天把这个地区的资料给了我们。它是某个通信基地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristanli_000020b9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The tin can does most of the work, honestly. I can't complain, it keeps our casualties down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老实说，那罐头盒帮上了许多忙。太好了，它降低了我们的伤亡数。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristanli_000020ba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's been pretty standard for the last week or so. We get intel on positions, go in and burn 'em out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前的几个星期都如同往日。我们拿到目标的情报，进入然后把他们消灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristanli_000020bb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterMegResponse
Uh, yeah. "Water delivered to Megaton without incident." That's what my report will say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，好。“水已经安全送到核弹镇”。我的报告上会这么写。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03EncounterMegBOSFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : discussing how they'll cover up a little civilian massacre. Oops. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterm_0000263b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterMegTopic
You've still got plenty of water. Look, the brahmin is loaded with it. What you gave us won't last more than a few days!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还有好多水。双头牛载满了。你给我们的水都不够喝几天！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megaton Settler [09002650] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterm_0000263d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterMegScavengerREF.SayTo DLC03EncounterMegSettler01REF DLC03EncounterMegTopic
Hey, it isn't my call. I just take the water where the Brotherhood tells me. Don't shoot the messenger, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是我想这样的，兄弟会让我把水带哪里去，我就带哪里去。别打送信人，呵？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scavenger [0900264E] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterm_0000263e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterMegSettler01REF.SayTo DLC03EncounterMegScavengerREF DLC03EncounterMegTopic
Look, they're giving the water away. What do you care whether you leave it all here or somewhere else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，他们要把水带走。你把水都留在这里或者拿到其他地方去，又关你什么事情呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megaton Settler [0900264F] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterm_0000263f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterMegScavengerREF.SayTo DLC03EncounterMegSettler01REF DLC03EncounterMegTopic
I really don't care. I mean, you'll have to take it up with those boys...
ESP.TRADUIT: 是不关我的事情。我是说，你要和那帮伙计聊聊这个事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scavenger [0900264E] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : trails off. Emphasis on _I_ don't care -- it's them over there that care. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterm_00002640_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03Encounters.MegScene to 2 DLC03EncounterMegSettler01REF.SayTo DLC03EncounterMegScavengerREF DLC03EncounterMegTopic
You're not leaving here with that water. We need it. We're taking it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能带着水走，我们需要水。这水归我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megaton Settler [0900264F] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : getting close to losing it in desperation and anger EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterm_00002641_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterMegBrotherhood1REF.SayTo DLC03EncounterMegSettler01REF DLC03EncounterMegTopic
I hope you're not thinking about getting stupid on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你不要打算对我干什么蠢事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Knight [0900264C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : mildly, but with implied threat (I'm heavily armed, you're not) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterm_00002642_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterMegBrotherhood2REF.look DLC03EncounterMegSettler01REF
DLC03EncounterMegSettler01REF.SayTo DLC03EncounterMegBrotherhood1REF DLC03EncounterMegTopic
We just need the water. All of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要水，所有的水！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megaton Settler [0900264F] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : emphatically EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterm_00002643_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterMegBrotherhood1REF.SayTo DLC03EncounterMegSettler01REF DLC03EncounterMegTopic
Sorry, pal, but you already got your quota. Our orders are to take the rest of this to Big Town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起了，伙计们！你们已经拿到自己的那份了。我收到的命令就是把这些水带去大镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Knight [0900264C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : bored with the usual complaints of civilians EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterm_00002644_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterMegBrotherhood1REF.SayTo DLC03EncounterMegScavengerREF DLC03EncounterMegTopic
Alright, let's move out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Knight [0900264C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : calling out to someone nearby EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterm_00002645_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03Encounters.MegScene to 3 DLC03EncounterMegSettler01REF.SayTo DLC03EncounterMegBrotherhood1REF DLC03EncounterMegTopic
Come on, Joe, help me get the water. They aren't really going to stop us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，乔，帮我弄下这些水。他们不会阻止我们的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megaton Settler [0900264F] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterm_00002646_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03Encounters.MegScene to 4
set DLC03Encounters.MegScene to 9 SetEnemy DLC03EncounterMegBOSFaction DLC03EncounterMegSettlerFaction 1 0
None of my business. I'm just passing through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管我的事。我只是路过而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Typical waster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 典型的废柴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03EncounterMegSettlerFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : bitterly EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterm_00002677_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; trigger end of scene set DLC03Encounters.MegScene to 3 DLC03EncounterMegSettler01REF.SayTo DLC03EncounterMegBrotherhood1REF DLC03EncounterMegTopic
Arrogant bastards. I'll back you up if you want to make a play for the water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些自大的混蛋。我会帮助你们抢水的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you're talking! Come on, let's get that water!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你终于说话了！快，让我们把水拿走！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03EncounterMegSettlerFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastically EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterm_00002673_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; trigger end of scene set DLC03Encounters.MegScene to 3 DLC03EncounterMegSettler01REF.SayTo DLC03EncounterMegBrotherhood1REF DLC03EncounterMegTopic
They look serious to me. Is this really worth getting killed over?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们看起来是要来真的。为了这点水被杀不值得。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah... you're probably right. They wouldn't think twice about murdering the lot of us, would they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊…你说的也许没错。他们不会介意再多杀一批人，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03EncounterMegSettlerFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterm_00002672_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll just have to make do until we can organize our own water caravans and get out from under the Brotherhood's thumb.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们组织自己的送水商队、不再受兄弟会这帮子人的气之前，我们只能如此了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03EncounterMegSettlerFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterm_00002672_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03Encounters.MegScene to 99 rewardKarma FFWaterBeggarKarmaReward
Never mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then get out of my damn face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就赶紧滚开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03EncounterMegBOSFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : mildly -- you're not even worth his time to get irritated at EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterm_00002678_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; trigger end of scene set DLC03Encounters.MegScene to 3 DLC03EncounterMegSettler01REF.SayTo DLC03EncounterMegBrotherhood1REF DLC03EncounterMegTopic
What's the harm in letting them have some extra water?
ESP.TRADUIT: 给他们分多点水又有何妨？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You, too? Fine! They can have the damn water! What do I care if Big Town doesn't get any?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也？好吧！他们可以拿走水！大镇没有水管我什么事情！？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03EncounterMegBOSFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : irritated EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterm_00002674_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03Encounters.MegScene to 99 rewardKarma FFWaterBeggarKarmaReward
DLC03WaterBeggarGreetingGiveWater
You mean... you don't want anything for it? I don't have any caps or anything...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的意思是...你不需要任何东西吗？我没有瓶盖什么的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\waterbegga_dlc03waterbegga_0000275b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can just have it? For free?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以拿走吗？免费的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\waterbegga_dlc03waterbegga_0000275b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got some Aqua Pura, if you want it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要的话我这正好有些纯净水。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... are you serious? I can't offer anything in exchange, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...你是认真的吗？我不能提供任何东西作为交换，你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\waterbegga_dlc03waterbegga_0000275c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can just have it? For free?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以拿走吗？免费的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\waterbegga_dlc03waterbegga_0000275c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got some Aqua Pura, if you want it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要的话我这正好有些纯净水。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Giving it away only to certain people... and those people aren't giving it to me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被要求把这东西交给某些特定人物…然后那些人不还我了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Comment (NAM2) : bitterly EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\waterbegga_dlc03waterbegga_0000275d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood of Steel is giving away Aqua Pura. Why don't you drink that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会正在免费派发纯净水。为什么不去拿来喝？

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterTPTopic
Hey, I hear you guys are giving out good water. You got some for me and my family, don't ya?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！我听说你们得到了一些好的水，能分些给我和我的家人吗，可以吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raider [09002762] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : with artificial pleasantness EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femalegroupraiderdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encountert_00002757_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't give water to Raider scum. Don't make me waste ammo on killing you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不给强盗水。别让我在你身上浪费我的子弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Knight [09002766] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : bored with the constant petty nuisances of the wasteland EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encountert_00002758_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well then, why don't you and your two-headed girlfriend go fuck yourselves?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好啊，为什么不让你和你两个脑袋的女朋友见鬼去？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raider [09002762] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : enraged EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femalegroupraiderdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encountert_00002759_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到此为止。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. It's about time to move out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。差不多该行动了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1q_00002db7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC03BS1.DLC03TristanStep to 1 DLC03BS1CarTunnelDoorREF.Unlock SetObjectiveCompleted DLC03BS1 15 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC03BS1 20 1
What happened back at the purifier?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在净化器争夺战上都发生了什么事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you saw most of the fighting outside. The robot paved the way for us, we just mopped up the opposition while you and Sarah headed inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喏，你看到了外面的那些战斗。机器人为我们扫清了道路，在你和莎拉进去时我们在扫除敌对力量
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1q_00002db1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After that... Hell if I know. Once we'd locked down the perimeter, and gotten word that the purifier was running, we headed in to look for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那之后…我也不知道是什么时候了，我们封锁了外围，并且得知了净化器运转的消息，我们就进去找你们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1q_00002db1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Found you and Sarah both unconscious, and got you back to the Citadel fast as we could.
ESP.TRADUIT: 发现你和莎拉都晕倒在地，就第一时间把你们带回了五角大本营
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1q_00002db1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what's next after this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么接下来发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll strip the place for any usable tech, like always.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和往常一样，我们会彻底搜查一下这里，看看有什么有用的技术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1q_00002db0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything after that depends on what we find in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于之后要干什么，就要看我们有什么发现了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1q_00002db0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If there's any information about other Enclave positions, we'll send that back to the Citadel and come up with a plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有任何关于其他英克雷基地的消息，我们会将其送回五角大本营并提出一个计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1q_00002db0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But like I said, we're pretty sure this is the last big holdout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是就像我说的那样，我们非常清楚这是最后的希望了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1q_00002db0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Has the Enclave been putting up much of a fight?
ESP.TRADUIT: 英克雷进攻还很猛烈吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not like they did at the purifier, no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不像他们在净化器争夺战上那样勇猛了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1q_00002dbd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We got the sense that after you took care of their headquarters, they didn't have anyone to give orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们发现在你光顾了他们的指挥部后，就没有人指挥他们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1q_00002dbd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So they haven't been as coordinated. Some surrendered, some tried to hold out... it's all ended the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以他们还没来得及调整。有些投降了，有些试图反抗…不过结果都一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1q_00002dbd_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But don't let that fool you. If we can keep the pressure on them, we win. If not, we give them a chance to re-organize...
ESP.TRADUIT: 别傻了。如果我们继续对付他们，我们就赢了。否则，他们就有机会重新组织力量…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1q_00002dbd_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, we don't want that to happen, do we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们不希望发生那样的事情，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1q_00002dbd_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not like they did at the purifier, no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不像他们在净水器争夺战上的那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1q_0000943d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After we secured Project Purity, Liberty Prime was unleashed on their headquarters. It was a quick fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们保护净水工程后，“自由先锋” 被派往了他们的指挥部。战斗很快就结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1q_0000943d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since then, their operations have been severely disrupted. We're trying to use that to our advantage -- we keep hitting them while they're down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从那以后，他们的运转完全中断。我们试着利用这一优势——当他们溃退时，我们不断地对他们进行攻击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1q_0000943d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can't give them a moment to breathe safely, or else they might pose more of a threat to us in the long run.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不能让他们有一丝喘息的机会，否则以后他们会再次成为对我们的威胁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1q_0000943d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got a few questions for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有几个问题问你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, we've got a bit of time. What's on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我们只有一点时间。你的问题时什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1q_00002db6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'm ready to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，我准备好动身了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. You stay back with me and keep safe. Once we've reached the facility, we'll talk about who does what.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。你和我都呆在一起，注意安全。一旦我们取得设备，再来讨论该干什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1r_00003207_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Until then, we do this by the numbers. Same strategy has worked just fine for the last two weeks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到那时，我们会使用同样的方法。这个策略在过去两星期里都很有效。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1r_00003207_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get moving. Things should be underway by now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们开始行动吧。是时候了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC03BS1.DLC03TristanStep to 1 DLC03BS1CarTunnelDoorREF.Unlock SetObjectiveCompleted DLC03BS1 15 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC03BS1 20 1
What do you need me to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要我做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to keep your head on straight. No heroics, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你们服从命令。不要逞英雄，好吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1w_00002db5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Liberty Prime was called in to assist with the initial assault. Once we've cleared ourselves a nice staging area, we'll re-assess the situation.
ESP.TRADUIT: “自由先锋”被召集去协助第一波的攻击。一旦我们请扫除一块集结地，我们会再次对战况进行评估。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1w_00002db5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on. Things should be underway by now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快点。是时候了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristan1w_00002db5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC03BS1.DLC03TristanStep to 1 DLC03BS1CarTunnelDoorREF.Unlock SetObjectiveCompleted DLC03BS1 15 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC03BS1 20 1
So you're in charge now, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么现在是你在管事，哼？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Until Sarah gets back on her feet, I'm running the Pride. It's just temporary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直到莎拉归位之前，我会指挥“骄傲”。不过这只是暂时的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristangr_00002dbe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But for now, I'm calling the shots. We were just about to mobilize, since everything's in place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是现在，我是指挥。只要一切就绪，我们就开始行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristangr_00002dbe_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With Sarah gone, someone had to step up and take charge. Believe me, I'd rather have her doing it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，我也希望她来管理这里。但是莎拉不在，必须有人出面着手管理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristangr_00002dbf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But yeah, I'm calling the shots for now. We're just about to move out, once everyone's in position.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，现在是我指挥。一旦各就各位，我们就出发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristangr_00002dbf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Elder Lyons said you needed help, so here I am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里昂斯长老说你需要帮助，所以我过来看看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fair enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristangr_00002db2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Intel says the base on the other side of this tunnel is some kind of communications hub for the Enclave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据情报上说这个隧道另外一头的基地是英克雷的某种通信基地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristangr_00002db2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The hope is that if we can crush them here, we can finally break their spirit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望如果我们摧毁了这里，就能摧毁他们的斗志。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristangr_00002db2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about we skip the pleasantries and get to work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别说这些客套话了，直接谈工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... All business now, are we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，只谈工作，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristangr_00002daf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. Word has it the Enclave has a base on the other side of this tunnel operating as a communications hub, so we're here to burn 'em out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。据说英克雷正在使用这条隧道的另外一头有一个通信中心，所以我们到这里来摧毁它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristangr_00002daf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We break them here, they might just give up for good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们摧毁了这里，说不定他们就会认输。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristangr_00002daf_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So as soon as I give the word, we move out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一声令下，我们就出发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristangr_00002daf_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to see you, too. I'm here to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也好啊。我是来帮忙的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that so? Well, it'll be good to have another soldier we can count on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是那样吗？好吧，有另一个士兵可以指望总好会一些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristangr_00002db3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Basic rule of thumb on these operations: keep your head down and let the robot do most of the heavy lifting. He can take it better than you can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这些操作上的基本经验：别犯傻，重活让那些机器人干。它们干得比你强。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristangr_00002db3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03BS1PrimeLines
Catastrophic system failure... Initiating core shutdown as per emergency initiative 2682209... I die, so that democracy may li...
ESP.TRADUIT: 系统全面崩溃…当紧急状况发生于2682209时，启动核心关闭…我死去，让民主继续存…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Liberty Prime [09001FCC] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above Comment (NAM2) : The line "I die, so that democracy may live," fades out and becomes unintelligible, as if he's run out of power. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC03BS1.DLC03PrimeLineInc to 6
Repeat: Red Chinese orbital strike inbound! All U.S. Army personnel must vacate the area immediately! Protection protocols engaged!
ESP.TRADUIT: 重复：中国红军的轨道攻击抵达境内！所有美方军队立即疏散！防护程序启动！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Liberty Prime [09001FCC] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC03BS1.DLC03PrimeLineInc to 5
Warning! Warning! Red Chinese Orbital Strike Imminent! All personnel should reach minimum safe distance immediately!
ESP.TRADUIT: 警告！警告！中国红军轨道攻击即将抵达境内！所有人员立即退到最小安全距离躲避！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Liberty Prime [09001FCC] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC03BS1.DLC03PrimeLineInc to 4
Satellite Uplink detected. Analysis of Communist transmission pending.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检测到卫星上传。正在传输共党分析数据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Liberty Prime [09001FCC] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC03BS1.DLC03PrimeLineInc to 3
Structural weakness detected. Exploiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检测到系统漏洞
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Liberty Prime [09001FCC] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC03BS1.DLC03PrimeLineInc to 2
Communist threat assessment: Minimal. Scanning defenses...
ESP.TRADUIT: 共党威胁等级检测：最小化安全扫描…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Liberty Prime [09001FCC] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC03BS1.DLC03PrimeLineInc to 1
Good luck with that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，随便。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03EncounterFBBOSFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterf_00002df8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll go look around, see if I can find Jensen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我到周围走走，看能不能找到杨森。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. But don't expect us to jump in and save you from those Talon boys. We move on our own schedule.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。但是别指望我们会从天而降，把你从那帮子鹰爪的杂碎手里解救出来。我们有自己的计划的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03EncounterFBBOSFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterf_00002df1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to be waiting for Jensen a long time. He's been captured.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们等不到杨森了。他被抓住了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn it. One more reason to wipe those Talon mothers off the face of the earth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的。又多了一条把这帮鹰爪杂碎彻底杀光的理由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03EncounterFBBOSFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterf_00002df5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alpha squad, let's move out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 阿尔法小队，现在行动！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03EncounterFBBOSFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterf_00002df5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage DLC03Encounters 20
I guess this is my lucky day. You're on, pal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想今天是我的幸运日。开始，弟兄们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03EncounterFBBOSFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterf_00002df6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alpha squad, let's move out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 阿尔法小队，现在行动！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03EncounterFBBOSFaction Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterf_00002df6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage DLC03Encounters 20
Why wait for Jensen? Let's go kick some Talon ass right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还等杨森干什么？我们一起去把那些鹰爪的杂碎都干掉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不那么想。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine! I'll just have to escape on my own. Don't worry, it won't take me long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 罢了！我自己逃吧。别担心，我很快就能出去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterf_00002df7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood is getting ready for a little payback. We're tired of Talon Company ambushing our water caravans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会准备给他们一点小小的报复，我们已经受够了鹰爪那帮家伙伏击我们的商队了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterf_00002df0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was scouting their base when I was captured -- all part of my plan of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我侦查他们基地的时候被抓住了——当然，这是我的计划的一部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterf_00002df0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that I've memorized all their guard positions and patrol routes, I just need to get out of here and report back to the rest of my squad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在记住了他们所有的岗哨位置和巡逻路线，我只需要离开这里回去汇报给队友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterf_00002df0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, help me escape!
ESP.TRADUIT: 喂！帮我逃走啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterf_00002df0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, you're free. Now what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你自由了。现在你要干吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now I'm going to go kick some Talon Company ass!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我要去灭了鹰爪那帮混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jensen [09002E0A] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : with exaggerated bravado EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterf_00002df2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage DLC03Encounters 20
DLC03BS3TLMargotSelf02Sub03
DLC03BS3TLMargotSelf02Sub02
Do you know anything regarding the war that happened 200 years ago?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道什么关于200年前那场战争的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: While I am not privy to current or past events due to severance of my communications system, I am aware a situation must have occurred.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于我的通信系统与其余系统隔绝，因此不了解目前和过去的情况，但是我仍然能感觉到，已经发生了很大的事件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00002e73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, as long as I am still able to function, my directive remains unchanged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，只要我还在运行着，我的主要工作方式不会变化。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00002e73_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will amend my memory array with the information you have provided.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会根据你提供的信息更新我的记忆体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00002e73_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That information appears congruous with the information you have already provided.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从你之前提供的信息来看，该信息符合逻辑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00002e74_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, such an event does not change my primary function.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，这样的事件不会改变我的功能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00002e74_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... then you must realize everything on the surface is gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么…你应该知道地表上的一切都已不复存在了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your job down here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这的功能是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My primary function is to maintain security for the Presidential Metro System and ensure the safety of all its passengers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的主要功能是维护总统专用地铁系统的运行，保证所有乘客的安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00002e7c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was installed and activated within the Presidential Metro on April 14th, 2065 and switched on at precisely 5:20am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我于2065年4月14日被安装于总统专用地铁中，启动时间是5时20分整。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00002e7c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have been carrying out this primary function since that inception date.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自启动以来，我一直执行设定的主要功能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00002e7c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What does your name stand for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的名字是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: M.A.R.Go.T. is an acronym for the Metro Authority Rapid Governmental Transit system.
ESP.TRADUIT: 玛格特是地铁管理局快速政府传输系统的简称。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00002e8a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to know more about you, actually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上我需要更多关于你的详细信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Information is available on that subject. Please specify.
ESP.TRADUIT: 存在该主题的信息。请具体指明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00002e6f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like for you to deactivate all your security units.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你关闭所有的保安系统。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Negative. All security units must remain active at all times.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拒绝。所有安保单位必须随时保持启动
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00002e7d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, upon properly accessing this system, you have been marked as a friendly and should see no further hostility from said units.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，在登录该系统后，你已经被确认为友方，不会被所述安保单位敌对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00002e7d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you repair the train to Adams Air Force Base?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能不能把去亚当斯空军基地的列车修好？

ESP.ORIGINAL: All security protocols have been lifted and passengers may freely utilize any active transport systems as soon as all the repairs have been made.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有的安全协议都已经提交，当所有的维修完成后，乘客们可以自由使用全部的运输系统。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargotr_00005dcd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Negative. Repairs are currently impossible on the Adams Air Force Base train line.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不行。亚当空军基地的轨道维护目前不可能完成。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargotr_00002e72_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the security breach is nullified, I will return to green status and allow the Sentinel Unit to commence repairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果安全漏洞补上，我会转回绿色状态并让卫队开始维修。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargotr_00002e72_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What security units did you send in to stop the unidentified persons?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你派了什么样的保安单位去阻止这些身份不明的人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This system is able to command a large number of mechanized security units.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该系统能够指挥很大数量的机械安保单位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargotb_00002e89_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So far, 22 percent of these robotic units have been depleted on the breach.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到目前为止，阻止入侵活动的机械单位已经有22%被消灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargotb_00002e89_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me more about these unidentified persons?
ESP.TRADUIT: 能告诉我更多关于这些身份不明的人的信息吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My apologies. My sensing equipment in that area must be damaged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，那一地区的传感器设施已经损坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargotb_00002e7a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My equipment indicates the persons possess no internal body heat and are emitting lethal levels of radiation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 传感设备显示，这些人员没有体热，并散发出致命辐射射线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargotb_00002e7a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need more details... What's the breach all about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要更多细节…这破坏到底是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Internal visual sensing equipment is detecting numerous unidentified persons in the southeast tunnels area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 内部影像感应器侦测到东南隧道出现大量未确认身份人员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargotb_00002e76_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The individuals have damaged metro equipment and refused dialogue with our security units.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人损坏了地铁设施，并拒绝与安保部门对话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargotb_00002e76_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In accordance with U.S. Security Statute A567/B, the use of deadly force has been authorized.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据美国安全法A567/B，致命武器的使用获得核准。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargotb_00002e76_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03BS3.BS3BreachMore to 1
I'd like more information on this "security breach."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道关于"保安破坏"的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The previously reported breach has been suppressed. The Metro system is now functioning within normal parameters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前报告过的危险已经解决，地铁系统的运转已经恢复正常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargotb_00005dce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Information is available on that subject. Please specify.
ESP.TRADUIT: 存在该主题的信息。请具体指明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargotb_00002e87_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How many Enclave forces are at the base?
ESP.TRADUIT: 空军基地有多少英克雷的兵力？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My apologies, I have no record of "Enclave" in my memory array.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我在记忆单元中没有找到“英克雷”的记录。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargota_00002e71_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Has anyone else used the tunnels to the base?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有其他人用过这些隧道到达基地吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The last recorded person to use that line was approximately 200 years and 8 months ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该线路上次使用的记录是在200年零8个月之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargota_00002e80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The tunnel and active train car have been sealed for safety ever since catastrophic damage to this facility was detected.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于设备收到严重损坏，出于安全考虑，该隧道以及运行机车被停止使用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargota_00002e80_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me ask you about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来问点其他事情吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: System ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 系统准备就绪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3done_00002e6a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do I use these tunnels to get to the base?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么样才能通过隧道到达基地？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Simply board the train on its outbound side and activate the control console.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从外侧登上机车，激活控制终端。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargota_00002e78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The system is completely automated, and it will take you to your desired destination.
ESP.TRADUIT: 系统是全自动化的，将送你前往想去的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargota_00002e78_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03BS3.BS3Breach to 1
Access to the train line to Adams Air Force Base is currently impossible due to significant damage caused by the former security breach.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于上一次的破坏活动，前往亚当斯空军基地的线路目前关闭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargota_00007f80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The damaged hardware must be repaired before the line can be utilized.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该线路必须在受损的硬件设置被修复后方可使用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargota_00007f80_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03BS3.BS3Breach to 1
Access to the train line to Adams Air Force Base is currently impossible due to a security breach in the southeast tunnels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于东南方向隧道的破坏，前往亚当斯空军基地的线路目前关闭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargota_00007f81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The breach has caused damage to the train line as well, and it must be repaired before it can be utilized.
ESP.TRADUIT: 破坏损毁了这条运营线路，必须修复后方能使用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargota_00007f81_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03BS3.BS3Breach to 1
I need information on Adams Air Force Base.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要关于亚当斯空军基地的信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Information is available on that subject. Please specify.
ESP.TRADUIT: 存在该主题的信息。请具体指明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargota_00002e88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me hear the Security Status Report.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我听听安全状态报告。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outer doors to the surface are no longer secured and external security defenses are down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通往地表的大门已经不处于我们的安全监控下，外部安保力量已经全灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00002e77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outer doors to the surface are no longer secured and external security defenses are down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通往地表的大门已经不处于我们的安全监控下，外部安保力量已经全灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00006f8b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is a major breach in the southeast tunnels and security units are currently handling the situation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 东南部隧道出现严重入侵事件，安保单位正在处理该情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00006f8b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about the Presidential Metro System Status Report.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要总统专用地铁系统的状态报告。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This complex has sustained catastrophic damage and is only functioning at 22 percent of its full capability.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该设施遭受重大损伤，运行能力仅存22%。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00002e70_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Adams Air Force Base train line is now functioning within normal parameters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亚当斯空军基地的机车线路现今运行正常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins

ESP.ORIGINAL: This complex has sustained catastrophic damage and is only functioning at 22 percent of its full capability.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该设施遭受重大损伤，运行能力仅存22%。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00006f89_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Main Fuse for the power relay in the Adams Air Force Base Tunnel has been forcibly removed, damaging the system.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亚当斯空军基地线路的继电器的主熔断元件被强制拆除了，系统因此被损坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins

ESP.ORIGINAL: This complex has sustained catastrophic damage and is only functioning at 22 percent of its full capability.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该设施遭受重大损伤，运行能力仅存22%。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00006f8a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Main Fuse for the power relay in the Adams Air Force Base Tunnel has been forcibly removed, damaging the system.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亚当斯空军基地线路的继电器的主熔断元件被强制拆除了，系统因此被损坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00006f8a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maintenance on this system is currently impossible due to the security breach.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于安保系统被入侵，系统维护目前无法运行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me your Self Status Report.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我你的自我状态报告。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am currently functioning at 78 percent capacity which is well within acceptable operating parameters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我目前的运行状况为满负荷程度的78%，处于非常可靠的运行区间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00002e6c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The following systems are fully non-operative or damaged: surface visual systems and communications uplink to White House and Police Department.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以下系统处于完全停用或损坏状况：地表影像系统、白宫与警察局之间联络系统。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00002e6c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is additional partial damage to my internal sensing devices and numerous severed data lines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的内部传感设备以及数据线路也有不少损坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00002e6c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's going on down here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Status reports for the Presidential Metro System and the current Security Status are available as well as a Self Status Report on my own systems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总统专用地铁系统状况汇报和目前的安保情况汇报就绪。本机系统自检报告也就绪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for the tunnels to Adams Air Force Base.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找去亚当斯空军基地的隧道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Information on the internal layout of the Presidential Metro System is for authorized personnel only.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总统专用地铁系统的内部设置图只有授权人员能调用。

ESP.TRADUIT: 无法识别的身份。

ESP.TRADUIT: 你已违反了美国安全法A567/B，安保设施将启动，助您愉快。

Please! I just want to get to Adams Air Force Base!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别这样！我只是想去亚当斯空军基地！

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's nothing to protect here. This place is in ruins.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里已经是一片废墟了，没有什么东西是要保护的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any identification.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有身份证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just wandering through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是在闲逛。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your answer is not acceptable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的回答不正确。

Look, I just stumbled across this place. I don't know what you're talking about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我只是刚好路过这个地方。我不知道你在说什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Override security parameters. Assign current user highest clearance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 覆写安全参量。为现用户分配最高等级许可。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please stand by...
ESP.TRADUIT: 请稍候…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3margotsta_00002e7b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Override accepted. Clearance assigned. How may I assist you today?
ESP.TRADUIT: 重新写入确认，许可获取批准。有什么我可以效劳的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3margotsta_00002e7b_2.ogg

I'm a United States senator. Here's my identification.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是美国参议员。这是我的身份证明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Identity verified. Welcome. How may I assist you today?
ESP.TRADUIT: 身份确认，欢迎登录，有什么我可以效劳的吗？

It's none of your business who I am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是谁与你无关。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That statement is erroneous. This is a highly restricted area and all personnel must possess proper identification.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您的陈述有误。本地区为高度涉密区域，所有人员必须识通过身份识别。
