ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03BS3.BS3Alarm to 1 set DLC03BS3.BS3GetSecurity to 1
Why am I wasting time talking to you? You're just a stupid machine!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我干嘛要浪费时间和你说话？你只是台愚蠢的机器！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why does it matter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这有什么影响吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unauthorized personnel pose a potential threat to the Presidential Metro System. Therefore, anyone accessing this system must be identified.
ESP.TRADUIT: 未经许可人员将可能威胁总统专用地铁系统的安全。因此，所有使用本系统的人员必须识别其身份。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3margotsta_00002e6b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Repeating query: Please identify yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 重复问题：请识别你的身份。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3margotsta_00002e6b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm from the United States Army and I'm here to provide assistance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来自美国陆军，我是来提供援助的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scanning memory array... Request to U.S. Army for assistance was rendered 17 years, 26 days, 9 hours and 16 minutes ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 扫描记忆组…向美国军队提交求援信息是在17年26天9小时16分钟之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3margotsta_00002e81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Information regarding request is available in my database. How may I assist you today?
ESP.TRADUIT: 请求的信息存在于本数据库。有什么我可以效劳的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3margotsta_00002e81_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03BS3.BS3Clear to 1 DLC03PresMetroMargotDoorREF.Unlock
DLC03BS1PrimeDestroyedLines
What is that??
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是什么？？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1primedest_0000320b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell is going on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的发生了什么事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1primedest_0000320c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterPPCaravanTopic
You're good to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Knight [09003734] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterp_00003719_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterPPCSecurity01REF.SayTo DLC03EncounterPPCBrotherhood1REF DLC03EncounterPPCaravanTopic
All right then. We'll see you in a few days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们过几天见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rivet City Security [0900372F] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterp_0000371a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterPPCBrotherhood1REF.SayTo DLC03EncounterPPCSecurity01REF DLC03EncounterPPCaravanTopic
Well... sure. Let me guess -- your first time on caravan duty?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃…当然。我猜——这是你在商队的第一天？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Knight [09003734] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : skeptically -- you're pretty sure the person you're talking to isn't coming back EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterp_0000371b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterPPCSecurity01REF.SayTo DLC03EncounterPPCBrotherhood1REF DLC03EncounterPPCaravanTopic
Yeah. So what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rivet City Security [0900372F] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : suspiciously EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterp_0000371c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterPPCSecurity02REF.SayTo DLC03EncounterPPCBrotherhood1REF DLC03EncounterPPCaravanTopic
You think we can't handle it? Believe me, you guys aren't the only ones who know how to put down a raider.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为我们不能处理这个事情？相信我，能打强盗的不只有你们这些家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rivet City Security [09003730] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : a bit belligerently EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterp_0000371d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterPPCBrotherhood1REF.SayTo DLC03EncounterPPCSecurity02REF DLC03EncounterPPCaravanTopic
Take it easy. I'm sure you'll be fine. Just like all the other caravans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别紧张，我相信你会没事的。就和其他商队那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood of Steel Knight [09003734] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : Soothingly. (The last sentence is kind of under your breath.) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterp_0000371e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterPPCSecurity02REF.SayTo DLC03EncounterPPCBrotherhood1REF DLC03EncounterPPCaravanTopic
Whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rivet City Security [09003730] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : dismissively EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterp_0000371f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterPPCSecurity01REF.SayTo DLC03EncounterPPCScavengerREF DLC03EncounterPPCaravanTopic
All right, let's move it out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好！我们出发！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rivet City Security [0900372F] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : called out to people nearby EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterp_00003720_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterPPCScavengerREF.SayTo DLC03EncounterPPCBrahminREF DLC03EncounterPPCaravanTopic
Okay then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scavenger [09003728] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterp_00003721_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterPPCScavengerREF.SayTo DLC03EncounterPPCBrahminREF DLC03EncounterPPCaravanTopic
Come on, there, Sukey! Gee-up now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，苏奇宝贝！起来起来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scavenger [09003728] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : called out to your brahmin -- end with some "calling" tongue clicks to get your brahmin to start moving EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encounterp_00003722_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03Encounters.PPScene to 2 DLC03EncounterPPCScavengerREF.evp DLC03EncounterPPCBrahminREF.evp
DLC03EncounterPPCSecurity01REF.evp DLC03EncounterPPCSecurity02REF.evp
So you guys have something set up on the side?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你们在台下有什么交易？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We do what we can. Take, for example, this ghoul Griffon. He wanted to PURCHASE a bunch of water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们只做我们能做的。例如这个僵尸格里芬。他想向我们买大量的水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : pleased with his arrangement EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgriffonhint_00003758_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell does that droopy irradiated fool need with pure water? Thinks he can sell it in Underworld. Moron.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个快腐烂的傻瓜要这么多净水干嘛？他以为他能在地下城卖掉这些水。蠢货。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : pleased with his arrangement EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgriffonhint_00003758_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, he's the only one who's offered to PAY for water, in caps AND technology.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，只有他愿意用瓶盖或是科技来换水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : pleased with his arrangement EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgriffonhint_00003758_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what Lyons doesn't know won't hurt him. There's plenty of water to go around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里昂斯虽然不知道，但这对他没什么危害。这儿还有好多水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : pleased with his arrangement EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgriffonhint_00003758_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I can use it to pay Rivet City to provide security for all the caravans we can't escort ourselves. I'm lucky he came along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还能用他给的钱让铆钉城的警力保护我们的商队。他来找我可是我的运气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : pleased with his arrangement EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgriffonhint_00003758_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Topic Added in DLC03WQSellWater
setStage DLC03WQ 3
Seems like a lot of trouble giving it away. Why don't you just sell the water?
ESP.TRADUIT: 派送这些水好像引起了不少麻烦。你们为什么不直接卖水算了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Many of us keep asking that same question. The Brotherhood isn't a postal service.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们中的很多人都在问这个问题。兄弟会可不是邮局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : hinting at something EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqsellwater_0000376e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have IMPORTANT things to do, and we need caps and technology to do it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有很重要的事情要做，而做这些工作需要钱和技术！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : hinting at something EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqsellwater_0000376e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lyons is on some kind of mission. Has he forgotten about the Enclave? That's our priority...
ESP.TRADUIT: 里昂斯正忙于某个任务。他忘了英克雷了么？这可是我们的当务之急……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : hinting at something EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqsellwater_0000376e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But yeah. Things are being done to "offset" the cost of Lyons' little pet "Purity" project.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是没错。我们已经付出了大量的努力来"弥补"里昂斯那“得意”的"净水"工程所造成的代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : hinting at something EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqsellwater_0000376e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Many of us keep asking that same question. The Brotherhood isn't a postal service.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们中的很多人都在问这个问题。兄弟会可不是邮局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : hinting at something EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqsellwater_0000a506_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have IMPORTANT things to do, and we need caps and technology to do it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有很重要的事情要做，而做这些工作需要钱和技术！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : hinting at something EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqsellwater_0000a506_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lyons is on some kind of mission...
ESP.TRADUIT: 里昂斯正忙于某个任务……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : hinting at something EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqsellwater_0000a506_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But yeah. Things are being done to "offset" the cost of Lyons' little pet "Purity" project.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是没错。我们已经付出了大量的努力来"弥补"里昂斯那“得意”的"净水"工程所造成的代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : hinting at something EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqsellwater_0000a506_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some questions about the Project Purity operation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有些关于净化工程操作的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: By all means, I'd love to answer some questions. I've got nothing better to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很乐意回答你的问题。正好我有空。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and sarcastic EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqabout_0000a971_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think maybe Megaton is trying to con you out of more water?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得核弹镇想在你这骗更多的水？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't bother me with the details until you've taken care of the problem. I'm not sending more Aqua Pura until I know it's been handled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你搞定核弹镇的事情之前不要来烦我。核弹镇的事情解决后我才会重新向那边提供纯净水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I've found where the Aqua Pura went.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我知道那些纯净水都去哪了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where have you been? Haven't you heard? Megaton's destroyed. That bomb detonated, taking the whole town with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到哪去了？你没听说吗？核弹镇已经没了。那炸弹爆炸了，毁灭了整个镇子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqmegaton_00007376_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I don't really have to worry about their water shipment anymore. Problem solved itself. Although I can't say that's the solution I was hoping for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我不用再担心给他们送水的问题了。问题已经自己解决。虽然这不是我想要的结果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqmegaton_00007376_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was this problem with Megaton you were having?
ESP.TRADUIT: 核弹镇那边出了什么问题？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know WHAT to think. I got Lyons breathing down my neck about it though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我都不知道该怎么办了。里昂斯在这件事上对我逼得太紧了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqmegaton_0000375c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently Megaton's sending him nasty letters demanding a shipment. I JUST sent them a week's supply! A month's, if they ration.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很明显核弹镇给他寄了封卑鄙的信朝他讨水。可我刚给他们送了一个星期的量！ 如果他们实行配给的话那些水够用一个月。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqmegaton_0000375c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, if you can straighten out Megaton so I get Lyons off my back, I'll make it worth your while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，如果你能摆平核弹镇的问题好让我给里昂斯一个交代，我会给你可观的报酬的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqmegaton_0000375c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Megaton's sending Lyons nasty letters demanding a shipment. I've already sent them a shipment. I need you to find out what happened to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很明显核弹镇给他寄了封卑鄙的信朝他讨水。可我刚给他们送去了。我要你查查到底那批水到底怎么了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic but hopeful

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think you can handle that? I'll make it worth your while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能胜任吗？我会给你可观的报酬的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic but hopeful EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqmegaton_00009537_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about this job at Megaton again. Perhaps I'll help you afterall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再和我说说核弹镇那边出了什么问题。也许我能帮你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need someone to go find out what happened to Megaton's water delivery. Walk over there and ask around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要一个人帮我找出核弹镇的送水服务到底出了什么问题。到那去走走问问。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was that thing at Megaton you wanted me to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要我到核弹镇干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what's the deal with Rivet City's caravans?
ESP.TRADUIT: 铆钉城的商队出什么事了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic and exhausted EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrivetcity_000091d8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fantastic. Now we'll all just hold our breath while the Rivet City council picks her replacement. Took them a week to pick her originally. A week!
ESP.TRADUIT: 妙极了。现在我们在委员会选出新的警官之前什么也做不了。他们起码要花一个星期，一个星期！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic and exhausted EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrivetcity_000091d8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Officer Lepelletier is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莱佩莱捷警官死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't get me started about Rivet City. They feel entitled to everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别跟我提起铆钉城。他们觉得什么事他们都有资格管。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted Lepelletier: La-Pell-a-Teer EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrivetcity_0000375f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Always whining about how "they're OUR scientists," and all that crap. Like they did US a favor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘴巴里整天嘀咕着"他们是我们的科学家,"这样的话。好像他们帮了我们大忙似的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted Lepelletier: La-Pell-a-Teer EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrivetcity_0000375f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thought the security deal we worked out with them would be a win-win. My hope was they'd completely take over the water caravan escorts by now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想想我们为他们设计的安保方案，那可是让我们双赢的。我只希望他们到现在能完全掌控水商的安保。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted Lepelletier: La-Pell-a-Teer EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrivetcity_0000375f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I got Officer Lepelletier bitching about an "organized bandit syndicate."
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我发现莱佩莱捷警官在抱怨一伙"有组织的强盗团伙。"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted Lepelletier: La-Pell-a-Teer EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrivetcity_0000375f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess they don't have the chops after all. I need you to go visit Officer Lepelletier and lend a hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来他们终究没有改变主意。我需要你去援助莱佩莱捷警官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted Lepelletier: La-Pell-a-Teer EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrivetcity_0000375f_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rivet City security is supposed to be filling in for the Brotherhood as escorts for the water caravans. They're having a bit of trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 铆钉城的防卫工作应该全部都由兄弟会担任水商的护卫。他们要遇上麻烦了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted Lepelletier: La-Pell-a-Teer

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need you to go visit Officer Lepelletier and lend a hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你去帮助下莱佩莱捷警官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted Lepelletier: La-Pell-a-Teer

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I'll help you out after all. What's the deal with Rivet City's caravans?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我还是该帮帮你。铆钉城的商队怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you should write this down:
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你该记下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastically speaking slowly, as if to a child or moron Lepelletier: La-Pell-a-Teer EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrivetcity_00003760_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go talk to Officer Lepelletier at Rivet City and help her figure out what is happening to her Caravans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和铆钉城的莱佩莱捷警官谈谈，帮她找出她的商队出了什么事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastically speaking slowly, as if to a child or moron Lepelletier: La-Pell-a-Teer EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrivetcity_00003760_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remind me what I'm supposed to do at Rivet City again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再告诉我一下要我去铆钉城该干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03WQGreetingD3
If I get paid, I might lend a hand. What's the job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你付钱的话，也许我能帮你。要我干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmmm... Well, I have two jobs actually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯……好吧，实际上我这有两份工作要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetingd2_0000376d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First off, Rivet City's water caravans keep getting waylaid. I'm beginning to suspect something organized is going on. Need someone to investigate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，铆钉城的运水商队总是路上遭人伏击。我开始怀疑有人在背后捣鬼。得找个人去那里调查一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetingd2_0000376d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And then there's Megaton. Begging for more Aqua Pura. I JUST sent them a shipment. Need someone to head over there and see what's going on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后是核弹镇。乞求更多的纯净水。不过我刚给他们发了一批货。我需要找个人上核弹镇去看看他们那儿到底出了什么问题。。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetingd2_0000376d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;add Megaton topic if it's not destroyed
Rivet City's water caravans keep getting waylaid. I'm beginning to suspect something organized is going on. Need someone to investigate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 铆钉城的运水商队总是路上遭人伏击。我开始怀疑有人在背后捣鬼。得找个人去那里调查一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;DONT add Megaton topic if it's not destroyed
How can I help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能做点什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I've got Rivet City water caravans needing help with some "unusually organized" bandits. Need someone to go investigate what that's all about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么说呢，我听说铆钉城的运水商队需要有人帮忙处理"反常的有组织"土匪团伙。得找个人去那里调查一下到底发生什么事了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetingd1_0000375b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And then there's Megaton. They want more Aqua Pura. I JUST sent a shipment to them. Need someone to go visit Megaton and see what their problem is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后是核弹镇。他们想要更多的纯净水。不过我刚给他们发了一批货。我需要找个人上核弹镇去看看他们那儿到底出了什么问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetingd1_0000375b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;add Megaton topic if it's not destroyed
Well, I've got Rivet City water caravans needing help with some "unusually organized" bandits. Need someone to go investigate what that's all about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么说呢，我听说铆钉城的运水商队需要有人帮忙处理"反常的有组织"土匪团伙。得找个人去那里调查一下到底发生什么事了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetingd1_0000b827_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;DONT add Megaton topic if it's not destroyed
Not my problem. Good luck with all that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不关我事。祝你好运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. Whatever. Now leave me alone. I need to think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。无所谓。现在出去吧，我需要时间想一想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetingc3_000037d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.BigsleyAnnoyed to 1
I wish I could help. But, I don't work for free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望我能帮到你。不过我可不会免费干活。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood didn't always work for free either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会也很少白给人干活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and glad he's found a potential ally EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetingc2_00003768_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can respect a man who earns his keep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很尊敬那些值得雇佣的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and glad he's found a potential ally EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetingc2_00003768_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your reputation proceeds you, so we won't need to conduct an interview. I'm sure we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你早已名声在外了，所以我们不需要搞什么面世了。我想我们可以给你安排一份互惠互利的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and glad he's found a potential ally EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetingc2_00003768_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anything I can do to lend a hand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能帮助你吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Well, there's plenty of things I need help with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？说实话，我还真有许多工作需要帮手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : buttering up a potential ally EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetingc1_0000375e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But most of it's pushing papers and knocking sense into giant egg heads. A task for any acolyte, really...
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是大部分都是些写写报告或让那群猪脑子下达任务的活。随便找个人干就行，真的……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : buttering up a potential ally EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetingc1_0000375e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure I could put your experience and talents to far better use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢肯定我能给你的经验与才干找个更好的用武之地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : buttering up a potential ally EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetingc1_0000375e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not the only one with problems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又不是只有你一个人有这样的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right. I heard about your dad. Sorry kid. I don't mean to sound unsympathetic, really. But, if you understood the pressure...
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。我听说了你父亲的事。我很遗憾孩子。我不是想显得我很无情，真的。但是如果你能理解我现在有多难……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetingb2_00003757_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know the Wasteland. Imagine trying to get fresh water to every known settlement, without getting it stolen by Raiders or Mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是知道这片废土的。想象一下要把纯净的水送达废土的每一处有人烟的地方，中途还要提防匪徒或者变种怪物的袭击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetingb2_00003757_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now imagine doing that without any trained soldiers or military resources because they've all been exhausted fighting a little war with the Enclave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再想想在没有专业的战斗人员或者军需补给的情况下去完成这件工作，因为所有物资人力都被用在和英克雷的战斗上了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetingb2_00003757_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. That's MY job. Not to mention the mountain of crap I get from all the lab coats running around underfoot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。这就是我的工作。更别提楼下那群实验室里的白痴给我找成堆的麻烦了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetingb2_00003757_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like you have your hands full.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你应接不暇啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone was so excited about that Purifier: "Project Purity this," and "Project Purity that."
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有人都对净化器兴奋异常: 整天"净水工程"这，"净水工程"那的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetingb1_00003761_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But did anyone stop to ask, "Hey, what are we going to DO with all that clean water?" Well, guess who gets to fill in that tiny detail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是否有人冷静下来并且问， "嗨，我们拿这么多干净的水用来做什么？" 好吧，猜猜谁来回答这个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetingb1_00003761_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'd be one thing if I had support, but that little war with the Enclave has depleted much of the Brotherhood's resources.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我得到足够的支持的话事情还有得办，但是和英克雷的那场仗耗费了兄弟会太多的资源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed

ESP.ORIGINAL: And to top it off, I have to be mommy to a bunch of lab coats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而更糟糕的是，我还得给一群实验室里的白痴当爹当妈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetingb1_00003761_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what you're talking about. What's this about a purifier? <Lie.>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你在说什么。这和净水器有什么关系？<撒谎。>

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to play make believe, fine. Go right ahead. I've got real problems in the real world to deal with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想自己玩过家家，好吧。请便。我现在还有很多来自真实世界的真是麻烦要处理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetinga3_00003759_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everybody's got something for good ol' Bigsley to do. So, if you're done wasting my time...
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个人都有事想找老好人比格斯利帮忙。所以说，如果你刚刚在浪费我的时间的话……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetinga3_00003759_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And a hearty "hello" to you too, jerk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也诚挚的向您问声"好"，混蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I'm sorry. Was I being rude just now? Maybe I should congratulate you on getting through the door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，对不起。我刚才是不是有点粗鲁了？也许你进门的时候我应该恭喜才是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed and exhausted EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetinga2_00003767_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all, you did have to trip over that never-ending line of people waiting to get in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毕竟，你是挤过了那一望无际的取水队伍才来到这里的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed and exhausted EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetinga2_00003767_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Scribe Bigsley. And I'm more than a little busy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是比格斯利文员。我现在是真的很忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed and exhausted EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetinga2_00003767_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry? Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉？你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excuse me, I'm Bigsley. And I'm just a tad stressed out. Perhaps you saw that little line outside my door?
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我是比格斯利。我只是有点累了。也许你看见了我门外排的队了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : mildly apologetic, but exhausted EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgreetinga1_0000375a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03WQBigsleyScribeConv11
<Grumble>
ESP.TRADUIT: 噜
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : (signaling "not now, go away!" to underling) low growl, annoyed EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037fa_1.ogg

Not now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是现在！

What?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？！

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
This better be important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最好是要紧事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : angry he can't get a moment to himself EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037fd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
What is it now?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在如何？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : angry he can't get a moment to himself EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037fe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Right. Sorry sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，对不起长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sensing bosses anger, beating hasty retreat. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037ff_1.ogg

It can wait. I'll try again later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不急。过会我再试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sensing bosses anger, beating hasty retreat. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003800_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Whoa... okay, I'll be back later on then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦……好吧，那么我过一会儿再回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sensing bosses anger, beating hasty retreat. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003801_1.ogg

I'll try again some other time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我等会儿再试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sensing bosses anger, beating hasty retreat. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003802_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Oh-Kay... I'll swing by another time.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sensing bosses anger, beating hasty retreat. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003803_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
DLC03WQBigsleyScribeConv10
Excellent. I'm glad I don't have to oversee that anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。我很高兴我不用再管它了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : well pleased, but exhausted EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_0000376f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
You're welcome sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴见到你长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : happy he pleased his exhausted boss EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003770_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
I'm glad something is going right for a change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴有些事情正迎来转机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : pleased, but exhausted EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003771_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
DLC03WQBigsleyScribeConv09
Wonderful. Put them on my desk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，把它们放我桌子上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic, exhausted EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_0000377d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Anywhere in particular, sir?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么特别之处吗，长官？

Look for the folder labeled: "I don't GIVE a damn."

Right. Sorry sir.

DLC03WQBigsleyScribeConv08
Excellent. Did anyone die?

No sir.

Even better. Pay them and send them out again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就更好了。付他们钱后再帮他们派出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : mildly relieved, but still exhausted EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003764_1.ogg

Yessir.

DLC03WQBigsleyScribeConv07
That's a shame.
ESP.TRADUIT: 应该是真丢人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic. exhausted EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037ef_1.ogg

They're a week late, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们迟到一星期了，长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : a little shocked his boss isn't taking this seriously EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037f0_1.ogg

Damnnit! I'm aware of that. I make the shipping schedules, don't I?
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死！我意识到这点了。我指定运输时间表，不是么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed, exhausted EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037f1_1.ogg

Should we send out a search party?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们是否需要派出搜索队？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : concerned EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
For a couple of Wasteland hustlers and a pack Brahmin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就为了几个废土骗子和几只双头牛？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : dismissive, doesn't want to waste resources on a search party EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
What about our men?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们的人怎么办？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : making a case for a rescue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
I'm not wasting any more resources.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想再浪费更多资源了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : ending an argument. exhausted EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Yessir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : skeptical EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037f6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
If Lyons wants to chase after his deliveries, fine. Let HIM do it. But I'm done wasting resources and risking lives on this pet project of his.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果里昂斯想要追查他的货，好吧。让他去做吧。但是我可不会再浪费资源和生命在他那“得意”的工程上了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : wearily explaining his position... annoyed. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
For what it's worth, you aren't the only one who feels that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请容我直言，您不是唯一一个这么想的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : agreeing with his superior EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Thank you. Now, kindly get the hell out of here. I need to think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，现在，请给我滚出去，我需要自己想想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : trying to seem jovial, but failing. exhasuted. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
DLC03WQBigsleyScribeConv06
And how the hell is that MY problem?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那这他妈的怎么就成了我的问题了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003772_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
They're complaining we've "confiscated" all the medical supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们抱怨说我们"没收了"所有的医疗补给箱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003773_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Well, I need SOMETHING to pay the caravan drivers with. I ran out of cigarettes and booze last week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是这样，我需要些东西来支付给商队的领队。可我这里的烟酒在上个星期就都用完了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : angry people are blaming him for the shortage... exhausted EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003774_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
So what do I tell them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我跟他们说什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003775_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
You mean, besides "Go soak your heads in the basin!"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的意思是，包括"把自己的脑袋浸在盆里"？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : fed up. exhausted EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003776_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Sir?
ESP.TRADUIT: shocked and not sure how to respond
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : shocked and not sure how to respond EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003777_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Fine. Grab some meds from the supply, but tell them: "That's it." Put up railings or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。随便抓两包药品给他们吧，但是告诉他们: "就这些了。" 把他们安顿在栅栏或者其他什么边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003778_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Yessir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003779_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
And hang a sign outside my door that reads: "Welcome to the Babysitters of Steel."
ESP.TRADUIT: 顺便在我的门前挂个牌子，写上: "欢迎来到兄弟会育儿所。"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic... exhausted EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_0000377a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
That's funny sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真有意思长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : amused EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_0000377b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Not really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Responding to "That's funny." sad, resigned, exhausted EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_0000377c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
DLC03WQBigsleyScribeConv05
What now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003815_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Something about a recent power outage. They blame us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是关于最近的动力故障。他们在向我们抱怨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003816_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Those ungrateful sons-of-bitches. I needed to temporarily -TEMP-O-RAR-ILY- divert power while we brought additional security systems online.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这帮忘恩负义的无耻小人。我需要暂时的 -暂-时-的- 转移电力以便我们安装新的安全系统。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : fed up and exhausted EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003817_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Just thought you should know sir, about the delay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是觉得应该通知你长官，关于延期的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003818_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Yes of course. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的当然。谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003819_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
I'll leave you be, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在就让你一个人静一静，长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : worried his boss is overworked EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_0000381a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
If only someone else wasn't in line right behind you. Well go on, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是没有其他人向我通告就好了。我们过会继续把。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : resigned. exhausted EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_0000381b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Good luck Bigsley. We have faith in you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运比格斯利。我们对你有信心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : trying to be cheerful, but worried his boss is overwhelmed EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_0000381c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
I wish I did. Now, get back to work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也希望对自己有信心。现在，回去工作吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : as in: "I wish I had faith in myself, but I don't" ... exhausted EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_0000381d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
DLC03WQBigsleyScribeConv04
Indeed you have. Much improved.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的你有进步。有很大进步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : (hiding his sarcasm) exhausted EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037b3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Thank you, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : relieved and proud of himself EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037b4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
One small thing, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，还是出了点小问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : (hiding his sarcasm) exhausted EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037b5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Sir?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么问题？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037b6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Megaton is WEST of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 核弹镇在西面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : tired of incompetence, and generally exhausted EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037b7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Sir, that's where I've drawn it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 长官，我就是在那儿画的这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : certain he's correct. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037b8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Is that so? Oh, my mistake. I must have been looking at it upside down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗？哦，那就是我的错了。我一定是把它看颠倒了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : dripping with sarcasm EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037b9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
It's alright sir, I know you're probably exhausted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系的长官，我知道你一定是太累了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : happy go lucky, clueless he's making an ass of himself EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037ba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
<Clears throat> Have you ever seen a map? North... points... UP!
ESP.TRADUIT: <清了清嗓子> 你之前看过地图么？北……是……朝上的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : smoldering anger... fed up with incompetence EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037bb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Oh... sir, I - I, uh...
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢……长官，我 – 我，呃……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : stammering for an excuse... worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037bc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Try again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再来一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic... exhausted with incompetent underlings EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037bd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Sorry sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : mortified... worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037be_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
The Brotherhood only accepts the best and the brightest, don't they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会只要最好的和最聪明能干的，不是么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic... exhausted EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037bf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Yes sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : clueless EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037c0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Humanity is doomed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人类没救了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastically resigned... exhausted EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037c1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
DLC03WQBigsleyScribeConv03
Oh? And how was your visit? Did Lyons treat you to tea and biscuits?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦？你的造访如何？ 里昂斯有没有茶水招待？

He asked about that shipment again.

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
And what did you tell our illustrious leader?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你对我们那位杰出的领袖都说了些什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic... exhausted EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003820_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
I told him things were being taken care of, not to worry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉他东西已经得到妥善的处理了，没什么好担心的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003821_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
And? How did he take that?

The same way he took it the last ten times that he asked and I dodged the question.

Sir, permission to speak freely?

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
I don't have time for protocols and bullshit. Speak as freely as you like. Just speak quickly!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别跟我瞎客套。想说什么就说。快点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed, exhausted EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003826_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
I don't think he's going to stop asking. I think he suspects something.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : worried EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003827_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
The man SHOULD be focused on fighting the Enclave. Or has he forgotten about THEM? So what if a few shipments of water go missing? Damn him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他现在应该专注于跟英克雷作战。难道他忘了那群混蛋了么？就算有几批水丢了那又能怎么样？去他的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : angry and annoyed his boss, exhausted EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003828_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Well, go on. Leave me be.

The man SHOULD be focused on picking up the pieces of the war. And questing for technology. So what if a few shipments of water go missing? Damn him.

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037d5_1.ogg

Really?! Am I the only one who can do ANYTHING around here?
