ESP.TRADUIT: 是长官，谢谢长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : relieved EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Go on. Get out of here. Shoo!
ESP.TRADUIT: 走吧。离开这儿。呼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and attempting to be lighthearted EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_000037ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
DLC03WQBigsleyScribeConv01
What? Oh yes. I'm just a little tired. What was this about them running into trouble?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？哦是的。我只是有点累了。这跟那帮身处麻烦的家伙们有什么关系？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : startled awake, exhausted EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003782_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Waylaid by Raiders. Or was it Mutants? They want additional "compensation" for losses and "unexpected expenditures."
ESP.TRADUIT: 被匪徒或是被变种人伏击了？他们想要为他们的损失和"意料之外的破费。"索要额外的"补偿" 。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003783_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
It's the goddamned Wasteland. What the hell did they expect?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是他妈的废土。他们以为能要到什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed and exhausted EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003784_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
I don't know, sir. Should I tell them to go away?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，长官。需要我请他们离开吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003785_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
I wish. But no, I need them. They're some of the few that bothered to come back at all - a hardy bunch, this group. Almost as good as our own men.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我倒是想。但不要，我需要他们。他们是为数不多敢回来的人 - 这群人，算得上硬汉。 和我的人有的一拼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003786_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
I see. Well, what should I do with them? About their demands for compensation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。好吧，我能对他们做点什么？关于他们索要赔偿的要求？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003787_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Did anyone die?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有伤亡么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003788_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
I don't think so, no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003789_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
That's good. Some bottle caps then? How much is left in the petty cash box?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。赔点瓶盖怎么样？小金库里还剩多少了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : relieved he won't have to make a large contribution... exhausted EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_0000378a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
They want plasma weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们想要电浆武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : (fearing his boss will explode in anger) worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_0000378b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
What?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : shocked and angry he's being extorted EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_0000378c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
They saw an initiate lugging a crate to the armory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们看见了有个新兵搬运一个大箱子往军火库去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : (explaining why someone wants the crate) worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_0000378d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Fucking hell... ... Damn it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真他妈的……该死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed... a long pause ... resigned. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_0000378e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Sir?
ESP.TRADUIT: 长官？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_0000378f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Those weapons were to go to Rivet City. But, whatever. A rifle, grenade or two. But only if they agree to take a shipment -immediately!- to Big Town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些武器本来是要运往铆钉城。但是，管它呢。那就给他们一两把步枪，几颗手雷。但前提是他们必须同意护送一批货 -就现在！-前往大镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed, but exhausted and wanting to be done with it EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003790_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Yessir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : worried his boss is disappointed EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003791_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
What kind of name is "Big Town" anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 话说回来"大镇"算哪门子地名啊？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : lighthearted, offhand random question EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003792_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
I don't know sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : surprised and uncertain by the question EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003793_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Well go on. Don't keep our "guests" waiting any longer. I have work to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你去吧。别让我们的"客人" 等得太久了。我还有事要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and shooing away an underling EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003794_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Yessir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Faction : DLC03WQScribeFaction Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : relieved he can leave EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003795_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Now, where the hell did I put that damn clipboard?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我把那该死的书写板放哪了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : to himself, exhausted EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyscri_00003796_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.convStage to DLC03WQ.convStage + 1
Maybe you can focus on analyzing this data instead of crying about your robot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与其为了你的机器人嚎啕大哭，你不如来分析一下这些数据，。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00003888_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. There's no time to focus on what's passed. With Liberty Prime gone, the Enclave will be quick to seize the opportunity to regroup.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是对的。现在没时间去管那些逝去的东西了。随着“自由先锋” 的失败，英克雷会迅速抓住时机重新整编。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00003888_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll get the Scribes working on this right away. You should report to Elder Lyons. See if there's some way we can salvage this mess of an operation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会让文员们尽快开始这项工作。你应该向里昂斯长老汇报。看看我们是不是还有方法收拾这个烂摊子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00003888_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC03BS1 50
I'm not sure what I found. Some kind of data... Maybe you can figure it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也不知道我找到了什么。好像是些数据…也许你能看看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, well... We'll do our best. It won't be the first time we've had to crack one of their codes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，不错…我们尽力吧。这已经不是我们第一次不得不破解他们的密码了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00003929_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With any luck, their lack of leadership has made them a bit sloppy and they're re-using old decryption methods we've already cracked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真幸运，由于缺少领导，让他们的工作变得马虎了，这次他们又重新使用了我们已经破解了的加密方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00003929_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll get the Scribes started on this right away. In the meantime, you should find Elder Lyons. I believe he wants to see you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会让文员们尽快开始这项工作。同时，你应该去找里昂斯长老。我想他很想见见你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00003929_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC03BS1 50
I found some encrypted data at the relay station.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在中继站找到了一些加密的数据。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, yes. Well, I'll see if we can't figure out how to read it. Perhaps it can give us some insight as to just what happened out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔，是的。呃，我看看我们该如何看懂它。或许它能告诉我们到底发生了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_0000392a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It would be good to salvage something from this mess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 能从这堆烂摊子中找到些有用的东西的话已经很不错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_0000392a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for bringing this to me. I believe Elder Lyons will want to speak with you as well. Perhaps you should find him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你拿给我这个。我相信里昂斯长老也想和你谈谈。或许你可以去找他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_0000392a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you'll excuse me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不介意…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_0000392a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC03BS1 50
DLC03BS1RothchildGreetD
Hopefully I found something that can help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望我找到了些对你有帮助的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what could help at this point. If anything, we should be thankful they waited this long to use... whatever they used.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道现在还能做些什么。如果有的话，我们应该庆幸他们等了这么久才动手…无论他们干了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00003884_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nonetheless, we should try and move on. What is it you have for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: DLC03BS1RothchildGreetD
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00003884_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It could've been worse. They could have attacked the Citadel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事情可能会更糟。他们也许已经袭击五角大本营。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, there's certainly nothing stopping them from doing that now, is there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，现在确实没什么能阻止他们那么做，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_0000388c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And with our primary defense gone, I don't know what we can do to stop them. I need more to work with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而随着我们了失去主要防御，我不知道我们还能做什么来阻止他们。我需要更多资料。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_0000388c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry about the robot. There wasn't anything anyone could've done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 机器人的事我很抱歉。当时我们什么也做不了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps not, but that doesn't change the fact that it sets us back years... YEARS...
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许不是，但那改变不了它使得我们倒退了几年的事实…几年…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00003885_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and it removes the one significant military advantage we had over the Enclave.
ESP.TRADUIT: …而且它削减了我们对于英克雷拥有的一项至关重要的军事优势。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00003885_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm on my way back to the Citadel now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在回五角大本营的路上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Let's hope the Scribes can do something useful with it before the Enclave pulls another fast one on us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。希望文员们能赶在英克雷对我们实行下一步计划前得出结果
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristanst_0000388f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll mop up here, and see if there's anything worth salvaging. Get that to the Citadel as soon as you can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会扫清这里，并且看看有什么有用的。你尽快把那带回五角大本营。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristanst_0000388f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found something, but I'm not sure what.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了些东西，不过我不知道是什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry about that. The Scribes can figure it out; it's their damn job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心那个。那些文员们会弄清楚的。他们就是干这个的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristanst_00003886_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll try and clean up this mess here. You get moving; the faster that can be analyzed, the faster we can counter whatever the Enclave does next.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会试着扫清这里的阻碍。你们继续；越早得出分析结果，我们就越早推断出英克雷下一步计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristanst_00003886_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found some encrypted data on one of their terminals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在他们的终端里找到了些加密的数据。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's hope the Scribes can make sense of it. Get it back to the Citadel and get it to Rothchild as fast as you can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但愿文员们能成功。以你最快的速度把它带回五角大本营并交给罗斯柴尔德。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristanst_0000388e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got to try and stay a step ahead of the Enclave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们必须尽力抢在应克雷之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristanst_0000388e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'm going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be careful in there. Who knows what else they're going to throw at us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那里务必小心。鬼知道他们会怎么对付我们
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristanst_00003882_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't what I signed up for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我加入可不是为了这个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: At this point, this isn't what ANY of us signed up for. We can't let them get the advantage now. Get moving!
ESP.TRADUIT: 到了这个时候，这并不是我们想看到的。我们不能让他们夺走战果。继续前进！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristanst_00003887_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, wait! You said you didn't need my help!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，等等！你说你不用我帮忙！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, well that was before they blew up our one advantage. Consider it a field promotion. Now get going!
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，幸好那是在我们的优势被搞砸之前。就把它当成是战场难度提升吧。现在继续前进！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristanst_0000388d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What am I looking for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该找些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know, I don't know! Terminals, data, anything that can help us figure out what just happened, and where it came from.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，我不知道！终端，数据，什么能告诉我们一下到底发生了什么，为什么会这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tristanst_00003883_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why I'm here, actually. Bigsley sent me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上这就是为什么我来找你。比格斯利派我来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, he did? I was beginning to think he forgot about us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，他这么做了？我还以为他把我们给忘了呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : confiding in a potential ally EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not sure how much you know: There's been an increase in attacks on the caravans. Seems organized and not just the random Raider or Mutant encounter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不确定你知道多少: 现在开始有越来越多针对商队的攻击。看上去是有组织的而而不像是与匪徒和变异生物的零星冲突。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : confiding in a potential ally EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b1d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm running out of resources and I'm down to my greenest men. I want to get to the bottom of these coordinated attacks. The sooner the better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我快没补给了而且我现在只剩下几个菜鸟手下了。我希望这些协同的攻击能快点结束。越快越好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : confiding in a potential ally EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b1d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a decent shot. Need another hired gun?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可是神射手。想要雇我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm... I've heard about you. I suppose you can handle yourself out there, and I AM down to my greenest boys...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯…我听说过你。我听说你能照顾好自己，而我现在手下只剩几个菜鸟了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : confiding in a potential ally EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. But it's no cake walk. I got to get these caravans full of water to the farthest reaches of the Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。但这可不去旅游。我要护送这些满载着水的商队到达废土最偏远的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : confiding in a potential ally EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b15_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm running out of resources, and attacks have increased. I suspect something organized is going on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我快没补给了，而攻击却愈加猛烈了。我怀疑什么有组织的阴谋正在进行着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : confiding in a potential ally EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b15_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought Rivet City security was a police force, not a military organization.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为铆钉城的保安只是警察，而不是军事组织。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh. Tell me about it. It's enough trouble just keeping the miscreants on that leaky boat under control.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵。跟我说说。让船上的那些个恶棍老实点已经够麻烦的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : frustrated, confiding in a potential ally EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b32_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the Brotherhood needs help delivering all that water. But I'm not getting the support I need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是兄弟会需要有人帮忙运送那些水。但是我总是得不到必要的支援。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : frustrated, confiding in a potential ally EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b32_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's been an increase in attacks on the caravan. And they don't seem random any more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 针对商队的攻击越来越多。而且看上去不像过去那样是偶然的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : frustrated, confiding in a potential ally EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b32_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To make matters worse, I'm running out of resources and I'm down to my greenest men.
ESP.TRADUIT: 更糟的是，我现在快没补给了而且身边只剩下几个菜鸟了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : frustrated, confiding in a potential ally EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b32_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Military operations"? You've got be kidding. Rivet City security are chumps.
ESP.TRADUIT: "军事行动"？你在开玩笑吧。铆钉城的保安都是些蠢货。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say that a little louder. I've got a lot of disgruntled men who'd be happy to prove you wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有种再说一遍。我这儿有一大帮子人乐意动手给你来点教育让你知道错在哪里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : annoyed and smoldering with deadly anger EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, remove yourself before I have you arrested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，在我把你给抓起来之前赶紧滚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : annoyed and smoldering with deadly anger EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b16_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ01.LepelletierUpset to 1
Sounds like you could use some help. What do you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来你要人帮忙。你需要什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. I can really use a strong arm on this one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。我有件事需要像你这样有能力的人去做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : briefing new recruit, certain an attack will happen EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to escort a caravan from Project Purity to Canterbury Commons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你护送商队从净化工程到坎特伯雷社区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : briefing new recruit, certain an attack will happen EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b17_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If, or rather, WHEN they get ambushed, I need YOU to figure out who's behind the attack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果，很不幸地，他们遭到了伏击，我需要你查清楚是谁在幕后主使。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : briefing new recruit, certain an attack will happen EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b17_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hire me and your problems are as good as gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 雇了我你的问题就解决了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. My veterans are all already out in the field, or worse, never came back. I could use someone who knows what he's doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。我手下的老将们都被派出去了，很有可能，有去无回了。我需要找几个脑子清醒的帮手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : briefing new recruit, certain an attack will happen EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to escort a caravan from Project Purity to Canterbury Commons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你护送商队从净化工程到坎特伯雷社区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : briefing new recruit, certain an attack will happen EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b24_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If, or rather, WHEN they get ambushed, I need you to figure out who's behind the attack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果，很不幸地，他们遭到了伏击，我需要你查清楚是谁在幕后主使。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : briefing new recruit, certain an attack will happen EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b24_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. My veterans are all already out in the field, or worse, never came back. I could use someone who knows what she's doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。我手下的老将们都被派出去了，很有可能，有去无回了。我需要找几个脑子清醒的帮手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : briefing new recruit, certain an attack will happen EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to escort a caravan from Project Purity to Canterbury Commons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你护送商队从净化工程到坎特伯雷社区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : briefing new recruit, certain an attack will happen EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b25_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If, or rather, WHEN they get ambushed, I need you to figure out who's behind the attack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果，很不幸地，他们遭到了伏击，我需要你查清楚是谁在幕后主使。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : briefing new recruit, certain an attack will happen EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b25_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, not interested in dying. Good luck to you and your men.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我可没兴趣去送死。祝你们好运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, right. Clear out of here before I have you arrested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，说得对。在我把你抓起来之前从我眼前消失。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : "yeah right" - sarcastic disbelief... annoyed EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01greetin_00003b0c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ01.LepelletierUpset to 2
You sound pretty certain this particular caravan will be attacked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好象很确定这个运输队会受袭击。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm "pretty certain" ANY caravan will be attacked. This "particular" caravan also happens to have my most junior men escorting it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我"非常的肯定"任何商队都会被袭击。而这只 "特殊的"商队正巧由我手下的新人来护送。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : explaining why she needs the player's help EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01briefin_00003b0e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They could really use someone with Wasteland experience leading the team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们非常需要一个经验丰富的人来领导队伍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : explaining why she needs the player's help EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01briefin_00003b0e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we do get attacked, and I do find a ringleader, then what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们确实受到攻击了，而我又找到了他们的头目，然后呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: After protecting the caravan, track down the attackers base of operations and put an end to it once and for all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保护完商队之后，找出袭击者的大本营，然后把他们一网打尽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : briefing a recruit EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01briefin_00003b08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm getting paid, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有报酬吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do the job right and report back to me, and I'll make certain you get paid appropriately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把活干的漂亮些然后向我报告，我会确保你拿到适当的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01briefin_00003b07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, I'll protect the caravan and track down the attackers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，我会保护运输队，找出袭击者。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. I had a feeling you would. Officers Davis and Lorin should have just left Project Purity. If you hurry you'll catch them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。我就知道你会的。官员大卫和洛林应该才刚刚离开净化工程。如管你动作快应该能赶上他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : worried her men might run into trouble EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01briefin_00003b09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their course hugs the river closely. If you head north following the river from Project Purity, you should catch up to them. Please hurry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们紧沿着和行进。如果你从净化工程出发沿着河向北走，你应该能赶上他们。请快点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : worried her men might run into trouble EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01briefin_00003b09_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQ01 2
If you head north following the river from Project Purity, you should catch up to them. Please hurry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你从净化工程出发沿着河向北走，你应该能赶上他们。请快点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : worried her men might run into trouble

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where do I find the caravan again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说一次到哪找运输队？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to pass on this one. Find someone else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还是不干了。去找别人吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you aren't man enough for the job, fine. I don't want you. Now, if you'll excuse me, I have operations to conduct.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你无法胜任这工作，那好吧。我不需要你了。现在，如果你不介意的话，我还有工作要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : annoyed

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ01.LepelletierUpset to 3
If you aren't woman enough for the job, fine. I don't want you. Now, if you'll excuse me, I have operations to conduct.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你无法胜任这工作，那好吧。我不需要你了。现在，如果你不介意的话，我还有工作要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : annoyed

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ01.LepelletierUpset to 3
Is that a Plasma Rifle you've got there? I could use that on the mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你那是把电浆步枪吗？我可能会用得上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose I don't really need it pushing papers around here, do I? Alright. Consider it an advance on your payment. You better not disappoint.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜我其实不需要用这写来文件，不是吗？好吧。把这个当作订金吧。别跟我抱怨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : begrudgingly giving up a prized weapon EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01briefin_0000629a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ01.gotPlasmaRifle to 1 removeitem WeapPlasmaRifle 1 player.additem WithAmmoPlasmaRifleEnclave 1
I'm afraid I'm going to need to get paid up front.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕你要先付钱给我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you talking about? You did already get paid up front. Or have you forgotten that little Plasma Rifle I gave you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在说什么？你已经拿到头款了。难道你忘了我给了你一把电浆步枪吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01briefin_00006290_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I'm afraid you're not the man for the job. I don't have anything I can offer you up front.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕你干不了这活儿。我没什么可以提前赴给你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : mildly annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01briefin_00003b21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I'm afraid you're not the woman for the job. I don't have anything I can offer you up front.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕你干不了这活儿。我没什么可以提前赴给你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : mildly annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01briefin_00003b22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Understood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01briefin_00003b20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you at least tell me what I'll be getting?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你至少能告诉我报酬是什么吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can pay you in bottlecaps, maybe some weapons and armor if I have any left from requisitions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以付给你瓶盖，或者武器和装甲，在征用之后还有剩余的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : negotiating EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01briefin_00003b28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some questions about my mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有几个关于我的任务的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you need to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想知道什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01mission_00003b29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks. That's all for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢。够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm nobody you need to worry about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是你要担心的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brother, I worry 'bout everybody. Can't trust no one. You know the pass phrase?
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟，我担心大家。谁也不相信。你知道口令？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01splitja_00003b13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sister, I worry 'bout everybody. Can't trust no one. You know the pass phrase?
ESP.TRADUIT: 姐妹，我担心大家。谁也不相信。你知道口令？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01splitja_00003b14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm your worst nightmare!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会是你最恐怖的噩梦！

ESP.ORIGINAL: That so? You're one of the newbies? You best know the pass phrase asshole. Or you're dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这些？你也是新来的？ 你最好知道口令你这混蛋。否则你就死定了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : a serious threat EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01splitja_00003b11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Say nothing.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <沉默不语>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You an idiot or something? I don't got much like for idiots. You better know the pass phrase, asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是智障还是什么？我可不喜欢弱智。你最好知道通行暗号，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01splitja_00003b12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I came for the job. You still hiring guns?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来找工作。你们还要人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huhnn. You're one of the newbies then. Fine. So long as you know the pass phrase, you're in. If not -- you're dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼。那么你也是个新来的。很好。如果你知道通行口令，你就可以进去。否则 -- 就准备受死吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : smiling while offering a serious threat EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01splitja_00003b0f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Mirelurk stew."
ESP.TRADUIT: "炖蟹人。"

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. You're lucky you knew that. Don't know who let you in, don't really care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。能知道这些你可真走运。我不知道是谁让你来的，我也不关心这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : curtly giving an order EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01passphr_0000b2f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a real simple gang. Whoever's the toughest sets the rules, and that's ME. And I got just one rule: Do what the hell I say, when I say it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这儿的情况很简单。在这里最强悍的人才能立规矩，那个人就是我。而我只有一条规矩: 我让你干什么，你就他妈的干什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : curtly giving an order EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01passphr_0000b2f9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, find a seat. We're waiting for some of the boys to get back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，找个地方坐下。我们在等小子们回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : curtly giving an order EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01passphr_0000b2f9_3.ogg

Okay. You're lucky you knew that. Don't know who let you in, don't really care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。能知道这些你可真走运。我不知道是谁让你来的，我也不关心这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : curtly giving an order EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01passphr_00003b0b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a real simple gang. Whoever's the toughest sets the rules, and that's ME. And I got just one rule: Do what the hell I say, when I say it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这儿的情况很简单。在这里最强悍的人才能立规矩，那个人就是我。而我只有一条规矩: 我让你干什么，你就他妈的干什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : curtly giving an order EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01passphr_00003b0b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, find a seat. We're waiting for some of the boys to get back. Oh, and put this on. We're a gang. We all wear the same uniform.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，找个地方坐下。我们在等小子们回来。哦对了，穿上这个。这儿是个帮会。我们都穿统一的制服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : curtly giving an order EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01passphr_00003b0b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem condMetalArmor 1 player.additem condMetalArmorHelmet 1 set DLC03WQ01.inGang to 1 DLC03SplitJackRef.addToFaction DLC03WQ01PlayerFriendTrackCrimeFaction 0 DLC03WQ01BanditBodyGuardRefA.addToFaction DLC03WQ01PlayerFriendTrackCrimeFaction 0 DLC03WQ01BanditBodyGuardRefB.addToFaction DLC03WQ01PlayerFriendTrackCrimeFaction 0 DLC03WQ01BanditBodyGuardRefC.addToFaction DLC03WQ01PlayerFriendTrackCrimeFaction 0
Pass phrase? I don't know anything about a pass phrase.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通行暗号？我不知道什么暗号。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sad for you. 'Cause only people that know the pass phrase get away with snooping around our business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真替你难过。因为那些来打探我们内幕的人必须知道口令才能离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic anger, about to kill someone EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01passphr_00003b19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 'Fraid you're gonna die, boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕你要死了，小子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic anger, about to kill someone EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01passphr_00003b19_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
Sad for you. 'Cause only people that know the pass phrase get away with snooping around our business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真替你难过。因为那些来打探我们内幕的人必须知道口令才能离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic anger, about to kill someone EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01passphr_00003b1a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 'Fraid you're gonna die, girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕你要死了，小妞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic anger, about to kill someone EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01passphr_00003b1a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
Ummm... oh yeah, the pass phrase. It's "Eye patch"!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃…对了，通行暗号是"眼罩"！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very funny, asshole. You won't be laughing when I'm done with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好笑，混蛋。等我把你杀了你就再也笑不出来了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : deadly anger (he has an eye patch, thinks the player is mocking him) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01passphr_00003b0d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
"Open sesame"?
ESP.TRADUIT: "芝麻开门"？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The hell's that supposed to mean? No matter. That ain't the pass phrase, so you're dead, asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这他妈的是什么意思？没关系。这不是口令，所以你死定了，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : deadly serious and about to murder EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01passphr_00003b2a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
I'm here to send you and your gang into retirement. Got any last words?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来送你们归西的。有什么遗言吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damnit. And I was just gonna have some stew that Grandma whipped up. Fine. Have it your way asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死。我该去弄点老奶奶做的炖菜吃。好吧。你可以滚了，混球。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : about to murder someone EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01splitja_00003b1b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
Damnit. And I was just gonna have some stew that Grandma left in the freezer, God rest her soul... Fine. Have it your way asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死。我该去弄点老奶奶留在冰箱里的炖菜吃，愿上帝让她的灵魂安息……好吧。你可以滚了，混球。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : about to murder someone EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01splitja_00003b1c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
DLC03AudioHolotapesWQ01Recording
Hi, I'm Split Jack. I'm recording this 'cause I figure half you idiots can't read for shit. But you best don't lay this tape around just anywhere!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我是斯普利特·杰克。我录下这个是因为我估计你们多半都是文盲。但是你最好别把这磁带乱扔！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 Comment (NAM2) : deadly serious - leaving a message for new recruits

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're listening to this, it's 'cause one of my boys thinks he can trust ya. If he's wrong, you're dead. If he's right, then you're gonna be rich!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你在听这个，那是因为我的伙计们觉得你可以信任。如果他是错的，那你就死定了。如果他没错，那你将成为富翁！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 Comment (NAM2) : deadly serious - leaving a message for new recruits EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioholot_00003b2f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got us a plan, see. We hit the water mules with the Brotherhood busy fighting the Enclave. Soon they'll wanna give up the whole delivery thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有个计划，你看。我们像兄弟会老是攻击英克雷那样去攻击那些走私水商，不久他们就会放弃这整条线路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 Comment (NAM2) : deadly serious - leaving a message for new recruits EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioholot_00003b2f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then we offer our "protection services." Wasteland's dangerous and all. We charge 'em steep. On top of it, we SELL the water to who ever we want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我们提供我们的"安保服务"来抵挡废土上的一切危险。我们一点点渗入他们。成功之后，我们就可以想把水卖给谁就卖给谁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 Comment (NAM2) : deadly serious - leaving a message for new recruits EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioholot_00003b2f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want in, ride out with the next ambush. Stash the water when its done, the regulars will show you where, and then get up to Grandma Sparkle's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想加入，去参加下次埋伏。成功之后藏好那些水，老队员们会告诉你在哪里，然后去斯帕柯奶奶那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 Comment (NAM2) : deadly serious - leaving a message for new recruits EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioholot_00003b2f_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grandma loves visitors and keeps her mouth shut. That and she cooks a mean stew. So that's where we meet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老奶奶很好客，她口风很紧，并且做得一手好菜。所以我们在那里见面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 Comment (NAM2) : deadly serious - leaving a message for new recruits EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioholot_00003b2f_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wilhelm's Wharf. It's on the river. Don't get lost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维尔海姆的码头。在河上。别迷路了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 Comment (NAM2) : deadly serious - leaving a message for new recruits EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioholot_00003b2f_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and memorize the pass phrase. It's: "Mirelurk Stew." If you forget it, don't bother coming 'round. You'll get shot. No kidding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，记着口令是："炖蟹人。"如果你忘了，那就别在附近徘徊，你会被射死的。不开玩笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 Comment (NAM2) : deadly serious - leaving a message for new recruits EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioholot_00003b2f_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage DLC03WQ01 10
A guy named Split Jack. Not to worry. He's dead now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个叫斯普利特·杰克的家伙。不用担心。他已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? That's excellent. Thank you. As soon as I have a moment, I'll make arrangements to see to your reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？太棒了。谢谢。只要我有空，我马上安排给你的奖赏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : grateful EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01complet_00003b1e_1.ogg

Really? That's excellent. Thank you. As soon as I have a moment, I'll make arrangements to see to your reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？太棒了。谢谢。只要我有空，我马上安排给你的奖赏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : grateful EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01complet_0000b2f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;If Bigsley is hostile because Citadel is destroyed, end quest if getStageDone DLC03WQFunctions 255 == 1 player.additem caps001 300 setStage DLC03WQ01 200 startQuest DLC03WQ01Fin set DLC03WQ01.playerCheatedGang to 2 endif
A guy named Split Jack. Not to worry. I sent him and his gang packing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个叫斯普利特·杰克的家伙。不用担心。我送他那帮人回老家了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed the ringleader. You owe me big time, lady.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我解决了他们的头目。你这回可欠我一个大人情，女士。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, yes. I'm sure it wasn't easy. I'll make the necessary arrangements to have you paid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，是的。我知道那很不容易。我会妥善安排你的奖赏事宜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : grateful, but annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01complet_00003b0a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;If Bigsley is hostile because Citadel is destroyed, end quest if getStageDone DLC03WQFunctions 255 == 1 player.additem caps001 300 setStage DLC03WQ01 200 startQuest DLC03WQ01Fin set DLC03WQ01.playerCheatedGang to 2 endif
Yes, yes. I'm sure it wasn't easy. I'll make the necessary arrangements to have you paid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，是的。我知道那很不容易。我会妥善安排你的奖赏事宜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : grateful, but annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01complet_0000b2f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;If Bigsley is hostile because Citadel is destroyed, end quest if getStageDone DLC03WQFunctions 255 == 1 player.additem caps001 300 setStage DLC03WQ01 200 startQuest DLC03WQ01Fin set DLC03WQ01.playerCheatedGang to 2 endif
I dealt with the ringleader. They're gone now. You owe me big time, lady.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我解决了他们的头目。你这回可欠我一个大人情，女士。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean you'll make "arrangements"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说要"安排"是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes well, I don't really have anything I can give you at the moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，好吧，我现在真的没什么东西可以给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : trying to get out of a conversation EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01rewarda_00003b27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've simply run out of resources. Only a quarter of my escorts have made it back. I fear the worst.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是快没有补给了。我的护卫队只有四分之一回来了。这是我最担心的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : trying to get out of a conversation EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01rewarda_00003b27_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll send word to Bigsley, the Brotherhood Scribe running things over at Project Purity. I'm sure the Brotherhood can reward you for your efforts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会捎信给比格斯利，这位兄弟会的文员掌管着净化工程一切。我敢打赌兄弟会肯定会为付给你幸苦费的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : trying to get out of a conversation EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01rewarda_00003b27_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, if you'll excuse me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，如果你不介意的话…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : trying to get out of a conversation EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01rewarda_00003b27_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage DLC03WQ01 150
I want my money, and I want it now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在就要我的报酬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid I don't have anything to give you. Now don't you go getting upset!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我恐怕没什么能给你的。不过别对我摆出一副愤怒的嘴脸！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : trying to get out of a conversation EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01rewarda_00003b23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've simply run out of resources. Only a quarter of my escorts have made it back. I fear the worst.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是快没有补给了。我的护卫队只有四分之一回来了。这是我最担心的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : trying to get out of a conversation EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01rewarda_00003b23_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll have to see about getting a reward from the Brotherhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得上兄弟会那儿讨要你应得的奖赏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : trying to get out of a conversation EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01rewarda_00003b23_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Scribe Bigsley at Project Purity. I'm SURE he has something he can reward you with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找净化工程的 比格斯利文员谈谈。我敢打包票他会有东西奖励给你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : trying to get out of a conversation EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01rewarda_00003b23_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, if you'll excuse me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，如果你不介意的话…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : trying to get out of a conversation EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01rewarda_00003b23_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage DLC03WQ01 150
You're not trying to stiff me, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会是想欠钱不给吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing of the sort! How dare you even suggest such a thing. Look around for Godsake. Do you see a mountain of bottle caps? A stash of weapons?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想都不要想！真不敢相信你如此大胆。睁开眼给我他妈的好好看看。你看到堆成山的瓶盖了么？或者成堆的武器？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : trying to get out of a conversation EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01rewarda_00003b18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only a quarter of the escorts have returned! Those poor boys are likely dead, and sadly for you, they took the last of our resources with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有四分之一的护卫队回来了！那些可怜的小伙子们可能已经送命了，而他们把最后的补给给带走了，真为你难过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : trying to get out of a conversation EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01rewarda_00003b18_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. You will just have to pry a reward from the Brotherhood. Speak with Bigsley at Project Purity. I'm sure he'll be able to offer you a reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。到兄弟回那碰碰运气吧。跟净化工程的比格斯利谈。我敢打赌他那儿有东西奖励你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : trying to get out of a conversation EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01rewarda_00003b18_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, if you'll excuse me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，如果你不介意的话…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : trying to get out of a conversation EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01rewarda_00003b18_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage DLC03WQ01 150
Officer Lepelletier said you'd be rewarding me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 莱佩莱捷警官说你会给我奖励……

ESP.ORIGINAL: I still don't understand why the Brotherhood isn't just selling the water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还是不明白为什么兄弟会不肯卖水。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd think that'd be the smart thing, right? Then the caravan drivers could use the markup to simply pay for their own security. Wouldn't need us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能认为这是个好主意，是吗？这样的话商队的领队们可以用这些资源来自己支付一切安保费用，那就不需要我们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : doubtful EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqlepelletier_00003b62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe it's an indirect marketing campaign for the Brotherhood. Considering the war with the Enclave, they might need new recruits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许这对兄弟会来说不失为一种间接营销手段。考虑到与英克雷的战争，他们可能需要兵源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : doubtful EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqlepelletier_00003b62_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever the case, as long as they keep paying us in caps and tech, we'll keep escorting the water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管情况如何，只要他们付给我们瓶盖和技术，我们会继续护送水源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : doubtful EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqlepelletier_00003b62_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's Rivet City getting out of helping the Brotherhood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么铆钉城不愿意继续帮助兄弟会了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: At first it was a win-win. They paid us and shared their technology with us. The spoils of their war with the Enclave were particularly enticing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一开始这是双赢的。他们付给我们钱并且和我们共享技术。他们与英克雷之间战争的战利品真的很有吸引力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed with the situation EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqlepelletier_00003b63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, with all the recent attacks, the "extra" resources end up being used just protecting the caravans from being exterminated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，因为最近的这些袭击事件，所有的"额外"资源都被用于保护商队免遭袭击上了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed with the situation EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq_dlc03wqlepelletier_00003b63_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm done playing your guessing game.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想玩你的猜谜游戏了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. You're blocking all the real customers anyway. Go on. Get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。别挡住那些想要买的人。快点，滚开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056d9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ02.notInterested to 1
Do I really have to guess?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一定要猜吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why yes! You can't imagine how low the special introductory price is. Go on, just guess. You'll never believe it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然！你都想象不到我们的特别折扣价有多便宜。继续，猜猜看，你肯定猜不出来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056e7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're no fun. 10 caps. Pretty amazing, huh? You want a bottle?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真没劲。10个瓶盖，真不错，是吧？你想来一瓶？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056e8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ02.priceKnown to 1
Look, just tell me the price or I'm leaving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，告诉我多少钱，不然我就走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go. Run along now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你。走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : (cheerfully) caveat emptor! EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056e9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And remember: All sales are final. No refunds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有别忘了: 一旦售出，概不退换。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : (cheerfully) caveat emptor! EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056e9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQFunctions 3
Fine. Take my 10 caps already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。这就给你10个瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know, 40 caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，40个瓶盖？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, sir. Try again. Lower!
ESP.TRADUIT: 错了，先生。再试一次。这次低一点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : extremely enthusiastic, asking to guess the LOW LOW price! EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know, 40 caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，40个瓶盖？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, ma'am. Try again. Lower!
ESP.TRADUIT: 错了，女士。再试一次。这次低一点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : extremely enthusiastic, asking to guess the LOW LOW price! EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wrong! Try again. Lower still!
ESP.TRADUIT: 错了！再试一次。这次还要低！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : extremely enthusiastic, asking to guess the LOW LOW price! EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 30 caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 30个瓶盖？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nope. It's insane isn't it? How could I sell it for any less? But I can! And I WILL! Try again. LOW-WER!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。这真是疯了，不是吗？我怎么可能卖得如此之便宜？但是我就敢这么做！说做就做！再来一次。超-低-价！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : extremely enthusiastic, asking to guess the LOW LOW price! EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 20 caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 20个瓶盖？

ESP.ORIGINAL: DING-DING-DING! We have a winner, ladies and gentlemen!
ESP.TRADUIT: 叮-叮-叮！女士们先生们，幸运儿诞生了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right, for the low-low price of just 10 caps you can walk away with your very own bottle of the Amazing Aqua Cura!
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这样，跳楼价，撂这儿10个瓶盖，一瓶沌净水拿回家！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056f4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ02.priceKnown to 1
10 caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 10个瓶盖？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right you are! Here's the bottle, and I'll take those caps. Pleasure doing business with you, sir. Come again!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的！拿好这瓶，瓶盖我收下了。非常高兴和您做买卖，先生，欢迎再来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : (cheerfully) caveat emptor! EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And remember: All sales are final. No refunds or exchanges.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有，别忘了: 一旦售出，概不退换。不退款，不换货。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : (cheerfully) caveat emptor! EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056f5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQFunctions 3
Sure. Here's 10 caps. Give me a bottle of the "Amazing" Aqua Cura.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。给你10个瓶盖。给我一瓶"神奇的"沌净水。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right you are! Here's the bottle, and I'll take those caps. Pleasure doing business with you, ma'am. Come again!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的！拿好这瓶，瓶盖我收下。非常高兴和您做买卖，女士，欢迎再来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : (cheerfully) caveat emptor! EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056f6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And remember: All sales are final. No refunds or exchanges.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有，别忘了: 一旦售出，概不退换。不退款，不换货。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : (cheerfully) caveat emptor! EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056f6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQFunctions 3
Sure. Here's 10 caps. Give me a bottle of the "Amazing" Aqua Cura.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。给你10个瓶盖。给我一瓶"神奇的"沌净水。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'll pass. Thanks anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要走了。谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh really? I'm sure you'll change your mind after you discover how AMAZING the product really is! Stick around, I give regular demonstrations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，真的吗？我敢打包票当你知道这东西有多神奇之后一定会改变主意的！别这么着急走啊，我给你做个常规演示。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : trying to keep a potential customer, snake oil salesmen EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ02.notInterested to 1
How much are you selling them for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一瓶多少钱？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well friend, how much would you be willing to pay? For such an AMAZING product as the Amazing Aqua Cura?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，朋友，你打算付多少呢？为了这叫做沌净水的神奇的好东西？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic snake oil sales pitchEmphasis on "limited time only" EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056df_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Many would pay 50, 75, even 100 bottlecaps for such an amazing product! With such an amazing guarantee!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人愿意为这奇妙的东西花上50，75，甚至100个瓶盖！尤其当它有如此好的口碑！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic snake oil sales pitchEmphasis on "limited time only" EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056df_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, for a limited time only I'm able to offer the Amazing Aqua Cura for an introductory, exceptionally low price! Care to take a guess at how much?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，有的时候只有我才能以低廉的价格提供沌净水！想猜猜到底有多便宜么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic snake oil sales pitchEmphasis on "limited time only" EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056df_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got a free sample I could try?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有免费样品吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A FREE sample you say? Hmm... Well... I normally don't do this... but, for YOU, for this ONE TIME ONLY, a VERY special VIP promotional offer...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说免费样品？嗯……好吧……我一般是不会这么做的……但是，为了你，仅此一次，给你一次VIP的待遇吧……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic, snake oil sales pitch EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ladies and gentlemen, DING-DING-DING! We have a new winner in our daily Aqua Cura Sweepstakes! Here you go, sir. Your FREE bottle!
ESP.TRADUIT: 女士们先生们，叮-叮-叮！一位沌净水抽奖的幸运儿诞生了！给你，先生。免费试饮！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic, snake oil sales pitch EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056da_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Step right up in the next 5 minutes, and get your VERY OWN bottle of the Amazing Aqua Cura at HALF price! Ladies and gentlemen. Half price!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你五分钟内行动起来的话，你就能以半价得到一瓶属于自己的神奇的沌净水！女士们先生们。半价！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic, snake oil sales pitch EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056da_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ02.freeBottle to 1 setStage DLC03WQFunctions 3
A FREE sample you say? Hmm... Well... I normally don't do this... but, for YOU, for this ONE TIME ONLY, a VERY special VIP promotional offer...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说免费样品？嗯……好吧……我一般是不会这么做的……但是，为了你，仅此一次，给你一次VIP的待遇吧……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic, snake oil sales pitch EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_0000b02c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ladies and gentlemen, DING-DING-DING! We have a new winner in our daily Aqua Cura Sweepstakes! Here you go, ma'am. Your FREE bottle!
ESP.TRADUIT: 女士们先生们，叮-叮-叮！一位沌净水抽奖的幸运儿诞生了！给你，先生。免费试饮！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic, snake oil sales pitch EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_0000b02c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Step right up in the next 5 minutes, and get your VERY OWN bottle of the Amazing Aqua Cura at HALF price! Ladies and gentlemen. Half price!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你五分钟内行动起来的话，你就能以半价得到一瓶属于自己的神奇的沌净水！女士们先生们。半价！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic, snake oil sales pitch EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_0000b02c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ02.freeBottle to 1 setStage DLC03WQFunctions 3
Tell you what. I'll trade you a piece of blue sky for a bottle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样吧。你免费给我来一瓶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha ha ha.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈哈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic, snake-oil sales pitch EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056d7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what, friend. Just for you, and only if you act in the next five minutes, I'll sell you a bottle for half-price!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么跟你说吧，朋友。给你个特别优惠，如果你五分钟内行动起来的话，我就半价卖给你一瓶！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic, snake-oil sales pitch EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056d7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you say? You want to procure a bottle?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得怎么样？想来一瓶吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic, snake-oil sales pitch EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056d7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got a nice head of hair. For a Ghoul, I mean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说，作为一个僵尸，你的头发真不错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aha! That's right my good fellow. The Amazing Aqua Cura will rescue, restore, and regrow your hair back from premature balding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哈！没错兄弟。神奇的沌净水会拯救和恢复你们过早变秃的脑袋，让它们重新长出头发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056dd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Act now, and I'll throw in a box of Abraxo for, wait for it... FREE! Mix those together and you'll have the best shampoo known to mankind!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在就行动吧，我还会附赠一盒清洁剂，并且……不收钱！把它们混合在一起，你就会得到全世界最好的香波！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056dd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what do you say, young man. Care to procure a bottle?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得怎么样啊，先生，想不想来一瓶？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056dd_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aha! That's right my dear! The Amazing Aqua Cura will rescue, restore, and regrow your hair back from premature balding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哈！这就对了亲爱的！神奇的沌净水会拯救和恢复你们过早变秃的脑袋，让它们重新长出头发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056de_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Act now, and I'll throw in a box of Abraxo for, wait for it... FREE! Mix those together and you'll have the best shampoo known to mankind!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在就行动吧，我还会附赠一盒清洁剂，并且……不收钱！把它们混合在一起，你就会得到全世界最好的香波！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056de_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what do you say, young woman. Care to procure a bottle?
