ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得怎么样啊，女士，想不想来一瓶？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056de_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that any different from regular Aqua Pura?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这和普通的纯净水有什么不同吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why? Have you heard otherwise?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么？你听到了还有其他人在卖？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : suddenly worried his scam is found out EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EncounterADTopic
Don't shoot! We surrender! We fragged our lieutenant! We just want some water!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别开枪！我们投降！我们连长官都杀了！我们只是想要些水喝！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enclave Soldier [060BFE4B] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegroupenclavedc\dlc03encou_dlc03encountera_00004c12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: if DLC03Encounters.ADScene < 2 set DLC03Encounters.ADScene to 2 endif DLC03EncounterADOutcastA2REF.evp
Hahaha. We're not Lyons' pack of softies. We're the real Brotherhood of Steel. This is how we deal with people like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈哈。我们可不是里昂斯手下那帮软蛋。我们是真正的钢铁兄弟会。准备看看我们是怎么收拾你们的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Outcast [09004C19] (mod) Quest : ([090011AB]DLC03Encounters) DLC03Encounters Comment (NAM2) : grimly amused before you open fire on surrendering Enclave troopers EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult06dc\dlc03encou_dlc03encountera_00004c13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setEnemy DLC03EncounterADOutcastFaction DLC03EncounterADEnclaveFaction
I need a break. Olney was tougher than I thought.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要休息一下。奥尔尼那地方比所我想的要危险。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time is running out. If we don't take the fight to the Enclave soon, they're going to bring it to us, and that won't end well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 时间流逝。如果我们不能尽快进攻英克雷的话，他们就要打过来了，那结果就不一定那么好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanst_000068b4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pull yourself together, and do it fast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 加把劲，尽快完成。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanst_000068b4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, get yourself ready and report back to me. I'll be waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，等你好了来告诉我。我会等你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanst_00005679_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC03BS2 50
I'm good to go. What's next?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了。接下来干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Based on the data you brought us from the relay station, we've identified where the Enclave is basing their operation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据你从中继站带给我们的数据，我们找出了英克雷部队的基地位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanst_0000567f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It seems they have a second base of operations at Adams Air Force base, outside of DC.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来他们还有第二个基地，位于华盛顿特区外的亚当空军基地
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanst_0000567f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only safe way to get there is through the Presidential Metro used by the government before the war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一能够安全抵达那里的方法是通过政府战前所使用的总统专用地铁
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanst_0000567f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to be on your own again for now; the rest of the Brotherhood will be providing a distraction so you can slip in undetected.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在又将独自一人， 兄弟会的其他人会引开对方的注意，让你潜入。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanst_0000567f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you breach the Presidential Metro and get to Adams Air Force Base, look for the Resupply Crate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦你通过了总统专用地铁就前往亚当空军基地，寻找补给板条箱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanst_0000567f_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Inside, you'll find your new orders and hopefully we can put a working Tesla Cannon into your hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那里，你会获得新的命令，希望我们给你的特斯拉 加农炮能有用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanst_0000567f_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted DLC03BS2 40 1 if ( GetStageDone DLC03BS2 50 == 1 ) SetObjectiveCompleted DLC03BS2 50 1 endif SetStage DLC03BS2 200
Olney? No, I don't think so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奥尔尼？不行，我不去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, perhaps there was a misunderstanding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，你可能还没明白。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanol_0000567a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not asking you to go. I am, as your superior officer, ORDERING you to go. This is your assignment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是在请你过去。做为你的长官，我是在命令你去。这是你的任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanol_0000567a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are to proceed to the Olney Powerworks. Once there, you are to locate and acquire a Tesla Coil, and return to the Citadel with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要继续前往奥尔尼供电站。抵达之后，你要去搜寻并取得一个 特斯拉线圈，然后带回五角大本营。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanol_0000567a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now get moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在行动吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanol_0000567a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC03BS2 20
You want me to go all the way to Olney?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要我直接去奥尔尼？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to go there, and quickly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你尽快去那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanol_00005677_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the best chance to locate a key piece of experimental equipment, called a Tesla Coil.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是最好的机会，去找到一个关键性的实验设备，叫作特斯拉线圈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanol_00005677_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Information we've gathered suggests it's the best place to look for one, and for what the Scribes are cooking up, it's absolutely essential.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们收集的情报显示那是最有可能找到那东西的地方，而就像那些文员吹嘘的，这玩意儿非常重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanol_00005677_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can find one, get it back here right away. We don't have much time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能找到一个，立刻带回来。我们时间不多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanol_00005677_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC03BS2 20
Olney Powerworks? What's there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 奥尔尼电站？那儿有什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hopefully you'll be able to find a Tesla Coil, an experimental device from before the war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但愿你能找到一个特斯拉线圈，核战前的一个实验设备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanol_00005675_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our scribes need it to complete a little surprise they've been preparing for the Enclave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的文员需要它来完成一项工作，以给英克雷一个惊喜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanol_00005675_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get there, get the coil, and get back as safely and quickly as possible. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 去那里，拿到线圈，然后尽快地安全返回。有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanol_00005675_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC03BS2 20
I don't get paid? At all? This gig sucks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有报酬？一点也没有？真他妈混蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I cannot imagine how you've come this far being under such a delusion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无法想象你们在那样的情况下是怎么走那么远的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanpa_00005680_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need someone I can count on. If you're not that person, turn around and walk away now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要某些能指望得上的人。如果你不是这样的人，现在就转身离开吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanpa_00005680_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you are, I need you to stop stalling and immediately head for the Olney Powerworks in Old Olney, north of the city.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是，我需要你立马去城市北面的奥尔尼供电站
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanpa_00005680_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have much of a sense of humor, do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好象没什么幽默感也没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have yet to find a sense of humor to be essential to my survival.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有发现幽默感对我的生存有多大用处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanpa_0000567c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should that change, I shall be sure to seek you out for advice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 万一现状改变了，我会去听听你的建议的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanpa_0000567c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the meantime, I need someone willing to scout out and potentially retrieve valuable technology from the ruins of Old Olney.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同事，我需要有人愿意去老奥尔尼遗址里中搜寻并尽可能找回有价值的科技。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanpa_0000567c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're looking for something that I believe can be found in the Olney Powerworks. Are you up to it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们正在找某样东西，我认为能在奥尔尼供电站找到。你干不干？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanpa_0000567c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, it was just a joke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，只是开个玩笑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. You'll forgive my lack of humor, given that we face annihilation on a daily basis.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道。你会原谅我的缺少幽默感，因为我们每天都要面对这么的杀戮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristanpa_00005672_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do I get paid for it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有报酬吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Paid? No. Perhaps there's been some misunderstanding about how this all works.
ESP.TRADUIT: 报酬？没有。我觉得你对整件事情山可能有些误解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristangr_00005671_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are not a mercenary. You are serving the Brotherhood of Steel to ensure our way of life, to help advance the lives of everyone in the Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是雇佣兵。你效力于钢铁兄弟会，以保证我们的生活方式，并帮助废土里的每个人生活得更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristangr_00005671_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our continued survival should be payment enough. If that is insufficient, you would do well to reconsider your involvement here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了继续生存下去，我们已经付出了很大的代价。如果那还不够，你最好再考虑一下是否要卷入这场纠纷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristangr_00005671_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any job you've got, I can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么任务，我都可以完成。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope that's true. With all of the Brotherhood's resources committed to protecting against an Enclave attack, we're spread thin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望那是真的。由于所有的兄弟会的兵力都被布置于抵抗英克雷的攻击，所以我们兵力太分散了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristangr_0000567b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So thin that we can't spare anyone to research a new weapon that might help us against the Enclave's vertibirds. At least, until now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太分散了以致我们没有任何多余的人员来研究能帮我们战胜英克雷飞鸟的新武器，。至少，现在是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristangr_0000567b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: From information we've gathered, it seems what we need may be located in the Olney Powerworks, north of that city.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从我们收集的情报来看，我们要的东西可能就在城市北面的奥尔尼供电站
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristangr_0000567b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready for more. What do you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了。要我干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the setbacks the Brotherhood has suffered, we find ourselves in a difficult position.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于兄弟会遇到的挫折，我们发现自己的处境很艰难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristangr_00005676_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All our available resources need to be positioned for the inevitable counter-attack from the Enclave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于我们与英克雷德遭遇战是不可避免的，所以所有我们可用的资源必须被适当安置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristangr_00005676_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At the same time, we believe we may have developed a tool to help our chances of victory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同时，我们认为也许我们已经制造出了一种工具来帮助我们取得胜利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristangr_00005676_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But with everyone needed to help defend against the Enclave, we have no one to send on a recovery mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是由于每个人都要参与抵抗英克雷的攻击，所以我们没有人手来执行这项回收任务
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristangr_00005676_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I'm going to have you travel to the Olney Powerworks to secure some tech for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我想让你去奥尔尼供电站为我们取得一些科技。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tristangr_00005676_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That doesn't sound like much of a leader talking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这听起来可不像是一位领袖人物在说话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, do not presume to tell me my place, or how I should act. I am well aware of my responsibilities.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请不要如此冒昧的告诉我我的处境，或是我应该怎么做。我非常清楚我的责任。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elderstag_000092c7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, if we're through, you need to report to Paladin Tristan. He has another assignment for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，如果我们成功了，你需要P特里斯坦圣骑士报告。他还有别的工作交给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elderstag_000092c7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC03BS1 200
Everyone here believes in you, and in the Brotherhood. We can do this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会的每一个人都相信你。我们会成功的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sincerely hope you are right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真心希望你是对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elderstag_000092c6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we are to succeed now, it will once again be largely thanks to you. Paladin Tristan has requested you for a special assignment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们取得了成功，那我们将再次深深地感谢你。特里斯坦圣骑士邀请你参加一项特殊的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elderstag_000092c6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please report to him at once. We've little time to waste before the Enclave seizes this opportunity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请立即回复他，我们在英克雷抓住这个机会之前没有太多时间可以浪费。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elderstag_000092c6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC03BS1 200
We have to keep fighting them. We can't back down now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们必须继续战斗，我们已经不能退缩了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very true. And to that end, I'd like you to speak with Paladin Tristan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错。而为此，我想让你去和特里斯坦圣骑士谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elderstag_00005673_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's requested you for a special assignment. One that could prove vital to our success.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他要邀请你参加一项特殊的工作。那对于我们的胜利非常重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elderstag_00005673_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage DLC03BS1 200
Now's not really the time to be getting cold feet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在可不是退缩的时候。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, it's far too late for that now. We committed ourselves to this course, and now we must see it through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，现在说这个已经太迟了。我们把自己送上这条路，而现在我们必须勇往直前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elderstag_00005678_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I fear that victory may come at too high a price, if it can be achieved at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我害怕的是要赢得这场战斗的代价会十分昂贵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elderstag_00005678_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it's too late to turn back now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在要回头也晚了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right, which is precisely my concern. We have pushed the Enclave, and now it seems they are pushing back, much harder than we expected.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得没错，那也正是我所顾虑的。我们曾进攻过英克雷，现在看来他们打回来了，比我们想象的更厉害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elderstag_00005674_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we cannot identify and neutralize this new threat, we have little hope for success. It's already cost us our greatest weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们不能联合并消除这新的威胁，那我们就没什么获胜的希望了。这已经值得我们使用最强大的武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elderstag_00005674_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You couldn't have known this would happen. No one knew.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也不知道事情会这样。没人知道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And yet here we are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而我们还是到了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elderstag_0000567d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Discounting the fact that our best field commander is in a coma, and my personal feelings for my daughter, things have not gone well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从我们最好的战场指挥官还在昏迷当中以及我对我女儿的个人感情来看，事情并没那么顺便
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elderstag_0000567d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we fail now, we could lose everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们这次失败了，我们可能会一无所有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elderstag_0000567d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And yet here we are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而我们还是到了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elderstag_0000567e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've lost my daughter, and the Brotherhood has lost its best field commander. Our very existence is jeopardized if we cannot defeat the Enclave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经失去了我的女儿，而钢铁兄弟会则失去了他们最好的战场指挥官。如果我们不能击败英克雷，那么我们的处境就会相当危险了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elderstag_0000567e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And with the loss of Liberty Prime, defeating them may have become impossible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而随着“自由先锋”的失败，击败他们或许已经不可能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1elderstag_0000567e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I might like a bottle of Aqua Cura. How much are you selling them for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想来一瓶沌浄水。多少钱？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well friend, how much would you be willing to pay? For such an AMAZING product as the Amazing Aqua Cura?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，朋友，你打算付多少？为了这奇妙的好东西—奇妙的沌净水？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic snake oil sales pitchEmphasis on "limited time only" EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02buybott_000056fd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Many would pay 50, 75, even 100 bottlecaps for such an amazing product! With such an amazing guarantee!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人愿意为这样如此奇妙的东西花上50，75，甚至100个瓶盖！尤其当它有如此好的口碑！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic snake oil sales pitchEmphasis on "limited time only" EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02buybott_000056fd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, for a limited time only I'm able to offer the Amazing Aqua Cura for an introductory, exceptionally low price! Care to take a guess at how much?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，有的时候只有我才能以低廉的价格提供沌净水！想猜猜到底有多便宜么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic snake oil sales pitchEmphasis on "limited time only" EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02buybott_000056fd_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go! Another satisfied customer, I'm sure!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了！毫无疑问，又有一个顾客心满意足了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastically making a sale EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02buybott_0000725f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQFunctions 3
Here's 10 caps. I'll take a bottle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你10个瓶盖。给我来一瓶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03WQ02GreetingB2aPoor
Oh. I didn't realize you were so poor. Well, tough break kid. Maybe you can find someone who can spot you the caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢。我还真没发现你竟然这么穷。那么，好吧可怜的假货。也许你能找到人施舍你点瓶盖？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you'll excuse me, I have real customers waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不介意的话，我还有买卖要谈呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056e5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ02.playerIsPoor to 1
Well, if I had 10 caps, I might buy a bottle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果我有10个瓶盖，我可能会买一瓶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03WQ02GreetingPoorCanPay
Right you are! Pleasure doing business with you, sir. Come again!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的！非常高兴和您做生意，先生。欢迎再来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : extremely enthusiastic snake oils salesmen EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQFunctions 3 set DLC03WQ02.playerIsPoor to -1
Sure. Here's 10 caps. Give me a bottle of the "Amazing" Aqua Cura.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。给你10个瓶盖。给我一瓶"神奇的"沌净水。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right you are! Pleasure doing business with you, ma'am. Come again!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的！非常高兴和您做生意，女士。欢迎再来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : extremely enthusiastic snake oils salesmen EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQFunctions 3 set DLC03WQ02.playerIsPoor to -1
Sure. Here's 10 caps. Give me a bottle of the "Amazing" Aqua Cura.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。给你10个瓶盖。给我一瓶"神奇的"沌净水。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I'm not really interested in buying your Aqua Cura.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我真的不想买你的沌净水。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wh-ell, w-hell, well... if you aren't here to buy the Amazing Aqua Cura, what are you here for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好-啊，好-啊，好啊……如果你不是来买神奇的沌净水，你是来干什么的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : blustering exaggerated shock EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056d2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ02.notInterested to 1
I'm afraid I don't have 10 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕我连10个瓶盖都没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03WQ02GreetingPoor
Well then I presume you won't mind if I focus on the customers who actually brought money with them? Have a nice day, and good luck finding a job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然如此我猜你不会介意我去关照下那些真正带钱来了的顾客吧？祝你过得愉快，也祝你能找到份工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : not going to waste his time EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056ea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't quite have 10 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我连10个瓶盖都没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Care to tell me where this water operation of yours is located?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我你是在哪里给这些水加工的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : ducking out of a conversation EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02locatio_000056e2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, if you'll excuse me. I have customers that need my attention.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉。我这还有其他客户呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : ducking out of a conversation EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02locatio_000056e2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Relax. I don't care. Take these morons for all their worth. I'm just curious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别紧张。我没有别的意思。你怎么骗这些白痴都行。我只是好奇而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's true, I got a thing going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，我正在干一番大事业。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : threatening EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02irradia_000056ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I take the Aqua Pura, store it to sell to humans later, then I put the regular irradiated crap in the bottles and sell it to these fools.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我买来纯净水，储藏起来过一阵子再卖回给人类，之后再往剩下的空瓶子里灌满普通的受过辐射的脏水卖给那些傻瓜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : threatening EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02irradia_000056ee_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No one's getting hurt. In fact, the Brotherhood actually needs the caps and technology I give them to fund their "free" water caravans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有人会因此受到什么伤害。实际上，兄弟会需要我的瓶盖和技术来资助"免费的"贩水商队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : threatening EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02irradia_000056ee_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just ask Bigsley at Project Purity, he'll tell you how grateful he is I'm helping them out like this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不信你去问问净化工程的比格斯利，他会告诉你我这样帮助他们让他们有多高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : threatening EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02irradia_000056ee_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But watch yourself. Get in my way, and... let's just say, I'm good at removing problems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是小心一点。你要是敢捣乱，那么……这么跟你说吧，我可是很擅长摆平麻烦的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : threatening EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02irradia_000056ee_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage DLC03WQ02 20 setstage DLC03WQ02 30
Heheh. You're not fooling anyone. Everyone knows you're one of the good guys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵呵呵。别跟我装了。谁都知道你是那种老实人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : lying smoothly again EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02irradia_000056ef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But seriously kid. I'm not up to anything. Just ask any of these fools - ahem - I mean, LOYAL customers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是说真的小子。我可没打算要怎么样。你去问下那些傻瓜- 哦不 - 我是说忠实的顾客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : lying smoothly again EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02irradia_000056ef_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They already see the many benefits of the Amazing Aqua Cura!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们已经看到我神奇的沌净水的功效了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : lying smoothly again EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02irradia_000056ef_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's nothing wrong with my Pip-Boy. You sir, are a liar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的哔哔小子什么问题也没有。你是个骗子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha! I'd like to see you try and prove that...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！我倒想看看你能拿出什么证据来……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : momentarily offguard, then lying smoothly again EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02irradia_000056dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Er, um, rather, even it were true, you'd need proof to convince my customers. My - ahem - very LOYAL customers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，唔，问题是，就算这是真的，你得拿出证据来让我的客户们相信。去说服我那些 - 咳 - 非常忠实的客户。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : momentarily offguard, then lying smoothly again EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02irradia_000056dc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're already convinced... er, I mean, they already see the many benefits of the Amazing Aqua Cura!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们已经诚服了……呃，我是说，他们已经看到我神奇的沌净水的功效了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : momentarily offguard, then lying smoothly again EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02irradia_000056dc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're clearly up to something. There's no denying it. Talk. Now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你肯定在隐瞒什么。不要抵赖了。现在就说！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh alright, alright. But if you start blabbing, I've got some buddies with itching trigger fingers...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，对了，对了。如果你多嘴泄密的话，我这儿有几个带枪的弟兄手可是有点儿痒啊……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : rationalizing EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02irradia_000056e6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I've got this little operation taking Aqua Pura and replacing it with regular crap. It's not like it'll hurt us ghouls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是我动了点小手脚，买来纯净水，然后用一些个次货换掉它们。但这似乎不会对我们僵尸们产生危害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : rationalizing EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02irradia_000056e6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Aqua Pura I'm storing to sell back to humans later. You know, raiders, Outcasts, etc. The guys the Brotherhood doesn't share with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些纯净水我都留着卖给人类呢。你知道的，那些个歹徒，放逐者，诸如此类的人。兄弟会不会分水给他们的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : rationalizing EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02irradia_000056e6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not a bad guy. I'm just trying to help. The Brotherhood needs me. My caps mean water for the Wasteland. Just ask Bigsley at Project Purity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不是坏人。我只是想帮忙。兄弟会需要我。我的瓶盖就好比废土大地上的清水。不信你可以去问问净化工程的比格斯利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : rationalizing EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02irradia_000056e6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage DLC03WQ02 20 setstage DLC03WQ02 30
Pip-Boy analysis shows that your Aqua Cura is irradiated. Interesting...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的Pip-Boy分析出你的沌净水里有辐射。真有趣……

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhhhh... What? That doohickey on your wrist says the water's irradiated? That's a pretty fancy device if it can know something like that...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯……什么？你手腕上的那个小玩意说这水被污染了？这小玩意可真有意思，还能显示这种东西……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : nervous his scam is uncovered EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02irradia_000056d4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, clearly it's, ah, misinformed. You should get that fixed, because it's definitely giving you false information.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，很明显它，呃，出故障了。你最好修理一下，因为它正向你显示错误的信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : nervous his scam is uncovered EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02irradia_000056d4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I already told you, your Pipsqueek 2000 or whatever it's called is broken. There's nothing wrong with the water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我早跟你说过了，你那个叫嘎嘎小子2000还是什么别玩意的东西已经坏了。这水没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : nervous his scam is uncovered

ESP.ORIGINAL: Griffon's up to something with the Aqua Pura. What do you know about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 格里芬在用那些纯净水秘密计划着什么。你知道？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not that it's really any of your business, but we have an arrangement. He buys water, I send him some.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并不是说这与你有什么关系，但是我们有安排。 他来买水，我们就给他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02aboutgr_000056d6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I use the caps and tech he pays me to fund the other water deliveries.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我用他给的瓶盖和技术来补贴其他运水商队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02aboutgr_000056d6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I send my men with the water to the Museum Authority in the Mall. Griffon sends the payment back with my men. So far, so good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我派手下人把水送到商业街的博物馆管理处。 格里芬再让我的人把报酬带回来。 目前为止大家都很满意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02aboutgr_000056d6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lyons wouldn't approve, but I don't really care anymore. I need the resources and there's certainly plenty of water to go around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里昂斯他不会同意，但我可管不了那么多。 我需要资金，而我们的水又有那么多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02aboutgr_000056d6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ02.locationKnown to 1 setstage DLC03WQ02 30 setObjectiveCompleted DLC03WQ02 20 1 DLC03WQ02HideoutMarker.enable showmap DLC03WQ02HideoutMarker
Just making conversation. I really don't care where you got the stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是聊聊天。我没兴趣知道你的货都是从哪来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. Sorry. I guess I'm just a little sensitive about the question. Some people think giving Aqua Pura to Ghouls is a waste, afterall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦。对不起。我想我对这个问题有点太敏感了。毕竟，有些人认为向僵尸提供纯净水终归是一种浪费。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02sourcea_000056e4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't STEAL it, if that's what you're getting at. I got it fair and square.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是在暗示这都是我偷来的话我没偷。我是光明正大得来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02sourcea_000056e4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd have thought giving Aqua Pura to a Ghoul would seem like a waste.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得给僵尸纯净水很浪费。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh. I hadn't pegged you as a bigot. My mistake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼。我还以为你是个没有偏见的人。我错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : offended EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02sourcea_000056fc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not interested in making trouble. I'm just curious where you got the water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是来找麻烦的。我只是好奇你的水是从哪来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. But keep your mouth shut about it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。但是别给我到处乱说……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic snake oil sales pitch EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02sourcea_000056d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood's happy just giving the stuff away, right? Well they drove ME out, claiming "Ghouls don't need fresh water!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会很乐意白送别人东西，是吗？但是他们把晾在一边，还说什么"僵尸不需要干净的水！"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic snake oil sales pitch EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02sourcea_000056d3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, big surprise that when I offered to PAY for it, next thing I knew, I was talking to Scribe Bigsley, the guy in charge of the whole shebang.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结果呢，当我要出钱买的时候事情出现了转机，接下来的事就是，我被叫去和比格斯利文员交涉，是他负责这些全部的劳什子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic snake oil sales pitch

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't really want to, but on principle I wanted to prove Ghouls are WORTH the cost, so I paid him. Now I'm stuck selling the stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实我对那没兴趣，但是原则上我想证明僵尸配得上那玩意，所以我付给了他钱。现在我就只能整天卖这玩意啦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic snake oil sales pitch EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02sourcea_000056d3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good thing whatever they put in it to kill the radiation also undoes the radiation damage to Ghoul physiology! And thus, Aqua Pura becomes Aqua Cura!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们往水里放了不知什么好东西，去除了水中的辐射并且消除了辐射对僵尸的伤害！因此，纯净水变成了沌浄水！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic snake oil sales pitch

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage DLC03WQ02 20
I'm curious. Where'd you get all this Aqua Pura?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很好奇。你的这些纯净水是哪来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really, what's it matter to you anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的，这东西惹到你了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : nervous his scam might be found out EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02source_000056e1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can get Aqua Pura for free. Why pay for yours?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们能免费拿到纯净水。为什么还要我们付钱买？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood doesn't deliver to Underworld, you know. There's shipping expenses and all that. Not to mention sneaking past Super Mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会没有把净水运到地下城来，你知道的。他们担心运输成本还有诸如此类的原因。就更别提路上还要小心超级变种人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic, snake-oil sales pitch EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056d8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, beyond that, I added a few of my own secret ingredients. To enhance the flavor of the original! So what do you say? Care to procure a bottle?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，除此以外，我加了一点我神秘的佐料。以改进它原来的口味？你觉得怎么样啊？要不要来一瓶？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic, snake-oil sales pitch EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056d8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. I mean, you just changed the name? Or did you do something to it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。我是说，你只是换了个名字？还是说你动了下手脚？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I changed the name to help Ghouls realize its amazing properties. And, well, just between us...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对名字稍作改动以帮助僵尸们了解它的特性。并且，好吧，这话只有你和我知道……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic, snake-oil sales pitch EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've also added a few secret ingredients to enhance the flavor of the original. So it's not EXACTLY the same, it's BETTER! Care to procure a bottle?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还加了一点神秘佐料来改进它原来的口味。所以这与原来的不是完全相同的，它更好！想不想来一瓶？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : enthusiastic, snake-oil sales pitch EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02greetin_000056f7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... Any thoughts on the Enclave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么……对英克雷有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well this is it, isn't it? If we can't stop them now, we can't stop them at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这了，不是吗？如果我们现在不能阻止他们，我们就再也阻止不了他们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0601937D] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_0000582e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing like certain death to get you motivated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有真正的死亡才能让你们积极一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0601937D] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_0000582e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not only have we lost our main weapon, but now we've got to deal with some sort of orbital strike capability?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不仅失去了主要武器，而且现在还要面对某种轨道攻击？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0601937D] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_0000582f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They sure pulled a fast one on us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们确实弄了个快的家伙给我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0601937D] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_0000582f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Things are going our way, no question about it. We've cut off their head, now we just need to carve up the body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一切都在掌握之内，没有任何意外。我们已经割掉他们的脑袋了，现在只要切碎身体就好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0601937D] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005830_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we can disable this orbital platform of theirs, we can still come out on top.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们能使他们的轨道系统瘫痪，那我们仍然能取得胜利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156ED] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005831_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a shame, really. I'd love access to that kind of tech.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太遗憾了，真的。我好想使用以下那样的技术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156ED] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005831_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The tables have certainly been turned on us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 胜利的天平已经偏向我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156ED] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005832_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With Prime gone, we're back to trying to counter their Veritbirds with limited success. Hopefully we can come up with something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着先锋的离开，我们只能用有限的成果来对付他们的飞鸟了。希望我们能想出对抗他们的办法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156ED] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005832_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plasma weapons certainly aren't saving them now, are they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 电浆武器现在也救不了他们了，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156ED] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005833_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've been able to salvage a good amount of their technology. If we can reverse-engineer it, we'll be much better off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经挽救回很多他们的科技。如果我们能反向研究这些科技，一切都会变得好起来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156ED] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005833_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The data you recovered gives our best chance at finishing the fight. I only hope we didn't miss anything in the decryption.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你恢复的数据让我们有很大的机会结束战斗。我只希望我们在解密过程中没有遗失什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156EC] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005834_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to admire their resourcefulness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也很佩服他们的足智多谋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156EC] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005835_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we can't defend ourselves against this new weapon of theirs, there's little hope for our current campaign.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们没法在他们的新武器前保护好自己，那我们眼下这场战役就没什么希望了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156EC] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005835_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've held up very well against them so far. Our Power Armor modifications are showing positive results.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到目前为止，我们的抢劫行动都完成得很好。我们的动力装甲改良研究有了进展。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156EC] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005836_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that we've gotten our hands on more of their weaponry, we can adjust to better shield against it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然我们已经取得了他们的大部分武器资料，那我们就可以研究更好的护盾来保护自己了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156EC] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005836_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is our last chance. Either we finish them off now... Or we won't be around to talk about them anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我们最后的机会。要么我们现在把他们全部干掉…要么，我们就再也没有机会这样围在一起谈论他们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06025FD0] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005837_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right now I need to focus on how to keep our men alive. I don't have time for speculation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我必须关心的是如何让我的战士们活下去。我没时间考虑别的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06025FD0] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005838_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My thoughts haven't changed. They're still not worthy of discussion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的想法没有改变。他们仍然不值得考虑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06025FD0] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005839_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hopefully before long we won't have to think about them at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望用不了多久，我们就不必再考虑他们的问题了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06025FD0] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005839_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear maybe we've got a new way to kill them. That'll be fun. If it works, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说或许我们有个新办法能干掉他们。那可真棒，当然，如果有效的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E8] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_0000583a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess they still have a few tricks up their sleeve. Kind of hard to destroy a weapon you can't even see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜他们还有底牌没翻。像是一种你见都没见过的，很难破坏的武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E8] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_0000583b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turns out they die rather frequently. More so than us, which works in our favor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然他们的死亡频率很高。比我们高，这对我们有利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E8] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_0000583c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the playing field is even, the Brotherhood is going to come out on top. That's all there is to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这场游戏公平的话，兄弟会将会获得胜利。只是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E6] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_0000583d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what to think. Men we can kill. Some sort of missile from out of nowhere? How do we beat that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道该怎么想。敌人我们可以干掉。但是外面不知道哪来的飞弹呢？那个要怎么解决？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E6] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_0000583e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As long as we keep grinding, we'll be through them in no time. We just need to keep the pressure on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要我们不断消磨他们的力量，很快就能把他们磨平了。我们只要对他们维持这种压力就好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E6] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_0000583f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This plan sounds crazy, doesn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个计划听起来太疯狂了，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E9] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005840_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, I guess it's all we have. If we can't pull this off, they're going to roll right over us. So we might as well try.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是，我想这就是我们的全部了。如果我们不能把这个除掉，那他们反过来把我们干掉。所以我们最好试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E9] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005840_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They've got us by the throat now. If we give them room to recover, there's no way we're going to be able to stop them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们利刃已经架在我们脖子上了。如果我们再给他们恢复的余地，那我们就再也没法阻挡他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E9] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005841_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll keep fighting. It's all we can do. But I can't see this ending well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们将不断战斗。那是我们唯一能做的。不过我不看好这个结局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E9] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005841_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've held out pretty well. If we keep them on the defensive, and can keep pressing them, we've got a good shot at winning this fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们防守得很好。如果我们能一直把他们挡在外面，并保持对他们施压，我们就赢定了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E9] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005842_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Things are looking a hell of a lot better than they were a few weeks ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这该死的情况看起来比前几个星期要好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E9] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005842_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're going to kick their asses, plain and simple. And once we do...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要往他们的屁股上来一下，就这么简单。一旦我们出手…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06026C57] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005843_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With all this new tech, and all this field experience... Well, we'll see who controls things around here then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有了这些新的技术，还有这么多战斗经验…嘿嘿，我倒要看看到时候谁说了算。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06026C57] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005843_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cowards, the lot of them. Taking pot-shots at us from who knows where? That's no way to fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 懦夫，他们都是。不知道躲在哪里对着我们扫射？架不是这么打的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06026C57] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005844_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're still cowards, far as I'm concerned. Hiding in their little bunkers, flying away first chance they get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如我所担忧的，他们仍然是懦夫。只会躲在他们小小的掩体里，一有机会就会逃跑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06026C57] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005845_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll root 'em all out eventually. And the initiates that survive will be better trained than any group that came before 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们最终会把他们杀光的。到时候，那些活下来的新手会比之前的士兵训练得更优秀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06026C57] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005845_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no sport in launching missiles from space. It's so... Impersonal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从太空发射飞弹可不是开玩笑的事。那太…残忍了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E7] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005846_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some interesting developments. Still, there's a way to beat them. There always is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很有趣的进展。不过，仍然有办法打败他们的。一直都有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E7] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005847_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their armor isn't as thick as it could be. I'm not complaining.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的装甲没有想像中的那样厚。我没在抱怨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156E7] (ID) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlcitadele_00005848_1.ogg
