ESP.TRADUIT: 听着。我不会揭穿你的谎言……但是你必须开始卖真正的纯净水。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's seriously going to cut into my profits... but perhaps you're right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这毫无疑问会减少我的利润……但也许你是对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02endreal_00005e17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all it's not like it was going to be a piece of cake selling the Aqua Pura to Raiders and Slavers. They're a nasty bunch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毕竟卖纯净水给那些土匪和奴隶贩子可不是什么容易的事情。他们是群下流的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02endreal_00005e17_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I'll sell them the real deal. But I'll keep the Amazing Aqua Cura patter. It gives this sorry lot a little hope for the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。我会卖给他们真货。但是我仍然会保留沌净水的牌子。这能给那些不幸的人一点对未来的憧憬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02endreal_00005e17_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope no one notices the switcheroo. And who knows, maybe it really WILL be a miraculous cure! Come back in a few days. We'll see if anyone notices.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望没人注意到这一变化。而且谁知道呢，说不定它真能产生神奇的疗效呢！过几天再来吧。让我们看看有没有人察觉到这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02endreal_00005e17_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ02.realAquaPura to 1 if DLC03WQ.FEV == 1 rewardKarma -100 endif
I've seen your bottling operation. The jig is up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看见你是怎么装瓶的了。一切都结束了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My what now? My bottling operation? Oh you mean where I add my secret ingredient to the Aqua Pura.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我什么? 装瓶? 噢，你是指我在把神秘配方加入纯净水的时候吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : worried his con is discovered EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02end_000056e3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage DLC03WQ02 200
Either you tell them, or I tell them. Your call.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要么你告诉他们，要么我来。你自己选。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe it... I have a good thing going here... Why mess that up for me? What have I done to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真不敢相信……我正在这忙我的好事呢……你干嘛来捣乱？我惹你了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : worried, but pretending to be chipper EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02endconf_00005e19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not hurting anyone. I mean, really? Reverse the ghoul condition? With a bottle of water? I wasn't fooling anybody; they were fooling themselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我谁也没伤害。我的意思是，真的？把僵尸变成人？就靠一瓶水？我谁也没骗; 是他们自欺欺人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : worried, but pretending to be chipper EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02endconf_00005e19_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I've made enough money here, anyway. Well, um... It's probably best if I tell them. I think I know what to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。反正我也赚够了。那么，呃……还是我来告诉他们好些。我知道该说些什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : worried, but pretending to be chipper EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02endconf_00005e19_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wish me luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝我好运吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : worried, but pretending to be chipper EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02endconf_00005e19_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;NOTE need to conditionalize this on at least one of the audience not being dead so he doesn't try to confess when no one can be dialoged with
set DLC03WQ02.confess to 1
That's NOT Aqua Pura. If you want my silence, you'll have to buy it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是纯净水。你想要我闭嘴，那就要给我点好处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why you... I ought to... <Grumble>
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么……我真该……<嘟哝>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : negotiating EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02endblac_00005e18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Sigh.> Fine. If you promise to keep your mouth shut, I'll cut you in.
ESP.TRADUIT: <叹气。>好吧。如果你保证闭上你的嘴，我就算你一份。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : negotiating EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02endblac_00005e18_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me and my boys continue to do our thing, you come and check on us once in a while, and I'll cut you in for your share.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和我的人继续干我们的，你每过段时间来一次，我们的收入算你一份。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : negotiating EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02endblac_00005e18_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Each week you make it by, I'll give you 20% of the previous week's profits? That's more than fair for doing nothing. I'm doing all the hard work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要不每周你来一次，我分给你上周利润的20%？这相当划算了，而你什么事都不用干。脏活累活我全包了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : negotiating EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02endblac_00005e18_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A guy named Split Jack is behind the attacks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个叫斯普利特·杰克家伙在幕后操纵这一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, what are you doing here? You should be out there tracking him down and putting an end to this once and for all!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还在这儿干什么？你应该出去跟着他，然后给这件事画个圆满的句号！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01aboutsp_0000628f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's time for someone else to take charge. You and me. Right now. Time to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的位置该换人打理了。你和我之间的事。现在就来解决吧。准备受死吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got a deathwish? Fine by me. Knives, pipes, or boards?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想找死？很好。你要用刀子，管子，还是棒子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : accepting a duel EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01splitja_000062fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're not going to pay you to protect something they're giving away for free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们可不会付钱让你保护他们免费派发的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Well...
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么? 好吧……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01splitja_000062f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damnit... You're probably right. What the hell was I thinking?
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的……你说得对。我他妈的在想什么呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01splitja_000062f5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess I'll have to come up with another plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我得用另一个计划了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01splitja_000062f5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, boys. Not worth sticking around here. Let's go blow off some steam. Kill anything or anyone you like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走吧，小的们。 别在这儿瞎晃悠了。 去找点有激情的活干干。 想杀谁就杀谁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01splitja_000062f5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;TOPIC ADDED in DLC03WQ01SplitJackAbout
setStage DLC03WQ01 99
So what's the score?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么我们该怎么干？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No one told you? It's simple. We hit water caravans and stash the Aqua Pura...
ESP.TRADUIT: 没人告诉你吗？很简单。我们袭击水商队，再把纯净水都拿走……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : proud of himself EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01splitja_000062f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And after Rivet City's had enough, we offer our "Wasteland Protection Services."
ESP.TRADUIT: 等到铆钉城受不了了，我们就提供我们自己的"废土保护服务"。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : proud of himself EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01splitja_000062f4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then we control the water. And we charge whoever whatever we want for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样一来我们就控制了水资源。到时候想卖给谁就卖给谁，想卖多贵就卖多贵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : proud of himself EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01splitja_000062f4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you like that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : proud of himself EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01splitja_000062f4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03WQ03Scene1
Please, water. I'm so thirsty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 求你了，水。我好渴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Water Beggar [09006517] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : Begging EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03scene1_00006e9f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03WQ03Scene2
Oh, poor dear. Here, I've got some water I can spare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢。我可怜的。拿着，我这有点水可以分给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [090064FE] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : Ministering to the ill EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03scene2_00006ea1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03WQ03Scene3
For... for me? Crystal clear water? Oh, bless you! Bless you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 给……给我？水晶般纯净的水？噢，上帝保佑你！保佑你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Water Beggar [09006517] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : Begging EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03scene3_00006eac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03WQ03WaterBeggarREF.additem DLC03WQ03WaterHoly 1
DLC03WQ03Scene4
No, bless you. I'm glad to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，愿上帝保佑你，我很高兴帮助你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [090064FE] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : Ministering to the ill EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03scene4_00006e9e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03WQ03Scene5
The Apostles of Eternal Light? Is that just you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 永恒之光的门徒？只有你一个？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no. Ours is a modest order, but our ranks are growing slowly, as others hear our words and are Enlightened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不。我们是最低级别的，但是我们的级别会逐渐提升，其他人听了我们的话，得到启示。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water

ESP.ORIGINAL: As our Luminescent Mother says, "Where others walk only in the dying waste, we offer the path of eternal light."
ESP.TRADUIT: 正如荧光嬷嬷所说，“其他人都走在将死的废土上，而我们却给予通往永恒之光的道路。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03gerardmeeti_00007e1b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And to spread goodwill, we offer this holy water to any and all supplicants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了宣示教义，我们将圣水给予所有索求的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03gerardmeeti_00007e1b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks, but I'll pass. I've had bad luck with cults.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，还是算了。我遇上迷信的东西就没好事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you wish, of course. In this cruel world, simple prudence says he who offers help in one hand, conceals a knife in the other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，随你。这是一个残酷的世界，警惕的直觉告诉我们，如果有人一只手送来了帮助，那往往在另一只手里却藏着利刃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I assure you, we wish only to help the unfortunate, and expose them to the eternal light that can guide us all to salvation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我可以向你保证，我们只想帮助那些不幸的人，使他们沐浴在永恒之光下，指引拯救的通路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03gerardmeeti_00007e1c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is why we offer our blessed water to any and all who are athirst.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我们为何将圣水给予所有索求的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03gerardmeeti_00007e1c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure you mean well, but this has to stop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你本意是好的，但这一切必须停止。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop helping the needy? I don't think so. And even if I did, it's not my decision to make.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对需要帮助的人袖手旁观？我可不会这样。如果我真的这样做了，也是我逼不得已才为之。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blessing of the holy water is overseen by Mother Curie the Third, our Luminescent Mother. And she's far too busy to speak with outsiders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 圣水的赐福是在圣母居里三世的看护下完成的。她太忙于事务了，不能见外人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQ03 60
You know this water is full of radiation, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道这些水充满了辐射吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's full of Atom's Light, if that's what you mean. Brighter and warmer than any water I've ever seen before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它注满了原子的圣光，如果这是你的意思的话。它比所有其他水都温暖，都明亮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blessing of the holy water is overseen by Mother Curie III, our Luminescent Mother. But her work keeps her busy within the monastery at all times.
ESP.TRADUIT: 圣水的赐福是在我们的荧光嬷嬷——圣母居里三世的看护下完成的。但是她太忙了，成天都在修道院里无暇分身。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQ03 60
Sounds like a nice little setup you've got. Have fun poisoning people!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你这个小骗局弄得不错。祝你毒害群众愉快！

ESP.ORIGINAL: What you see as the "taint" of radiation, we see as Atom's Eternal Light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你所见的辐射“污染”，恰是我们所理解的原子的永恒光光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQ03 60
Spreading tainted water under the guise of helping humanity? I can relate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在拯救人性的外在下分发辐射过的水？我能理解。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Laugh if you want, but our good deeds shall not be corrupted by your cynicism. We will continue to help the needy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随你怎么笑吧。但是我们的善行不会因为你的讽刺而停止。我们会继续帮助需要的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blessing of the holy water is overseen by Mother Curie III, our Luminescent Mother. And she works tirelessly in our monastery to Enlighten the world!
ESP.TRADUIT: 圣水的赐福是在我们的荧光嬷嬷——圣母居里三世的看护下完成的。她整日不知疲倦地在修道院里启迪着世界人民！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQ03 60
Luminescent Mother, I need to speak with you about your holy water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 荧光嬷嬷，我想和您谈谈您的圣水。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes? If you wanted some, I'm sure that Brother Gerard would have gladly given you a bottle or two. We don't charge for charity, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦？你如果需要，我想杰拉德兄弟会很高兴地给你一两瓶的。这是免费的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC01CurieMeeting1B
I'm putting an end to your twisted cult, right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在就给你们这变态的邪教划上句号。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah. We are accustomed to this sort of religious persecution. However, I refuse to respond to violence with violence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊。我们已经习惯于这类宗教迫害了。不过，我们反对以暴制暴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : Disappointed in the player

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC01CurieMeeting2A
DLC01CurieMeeting2B
DLC01CurieMeeting2C
DLC03Meitner1A
Slow down. What happened here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 别急。怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just gave him some water I picked up on the way through Springvale. It tasted pure, and it looks clean. How was I supposed to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是给了他一些我在春之谷路上找到的水。喝起来似乎很纯，看起来也很干净。我怎么知道它…？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [090064FE] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : Shocked and a little grief-stricken

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's okay. You couldn't have known.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。你也不知道会这样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, it's not okay! Not for him! It was supposed to be holy water. The man at the monastery in Springvale said it was blessed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这水有问题！他不能喝！这应该是圣水。春之谷修道院里的人说它是被祝福过的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [090064FE] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water

ESP.ORIGINAL: He gave me this pamphlet along with the water. Called himself Brother Gerard. You can find him on the road through Springvale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他还把这个宣传册随水赠给了我。他自称杰拉德兄弟。你可以在春之谷的路上看到他
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [090064FE] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03rosa2a_000076b4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if it'll help, but I don't know what else I can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道这有没有用，但是没有其他办法了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [090064FE] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03rosa2a_000076b4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQ03 50 player.addnote DLC03WQ03HolyWaterPamphlet evp
I'll look into it. Where did you get the water?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会去查查看的。你的水是从哪来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought it would help him. It was supposed to be holy water. The man at the monastery in Springvale said it was blessed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为这能救他。这应该是圣水。春之谷修道院里的人说它是被祝福过的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [090064FE] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water

ESP.ORIGINAL: He gave me this pamphlet along with the water. Called himself Brother Gerard. You can find him on the road through Springvale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他还把这个宣传册随水赠给了我。他自称杰拉德兄弟。你可以在春之谷的路上看到他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [090064FE] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03rosa2b_000076b3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They said they had lots of this holy water. Please, do something to stop them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们还说有好多这样的圣水。拜托，请阻止他们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [090064FE] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03rosa2b_000076b3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQ03 50 player.addnote DLC03WQ03HolyWaterPamphlet evp
Sounds to me like you wanted him dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你是故意害死他的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I promise, I thought it would help! It was supposed to be holy water. The man at the monastery in Springvale said it was blessed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不， 我发誓，我真的以为能帮上忙！它应该是圣水！修道院里的人说它是被祝福过的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [090064FE] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, he gave me this pamphlet with the water. Called himself Brother Gerard. You can find him on the road through Springvale! He's responsible!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看这个，他还把这个宣传册随水赠给了我。他自称杰拉德兄弟。你可以在春之谷的路上看到他。他要负责！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [090064FE] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03rosa2c_000076bf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was just trying to help. It's not my fault! Please!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想来帮忙的。这不是我的错！真的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [090064FE] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03rosa2c_000076bf_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQ03 50 player.addnote DLC03WQ03HolyWaterPamphlet evp
Tell me about your order.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我你的命令。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, the Apostles of the Eternal Light were first introduced to the majesty of Atom's Glow by the holy teachings of Confessor Cromwell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，永恒之光的信徒们是最早被克伦威尔神父引领进原子的荣光之中的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : Slightly rapturous, as if reciting by rote EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutapostl_000071ce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And we were content to stay in Cromwell's Church, until Atom gave a vision unto our Luminous Mother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们原本心满意足地待在克伦威尔神父的教堂里，直到原子赐予了我们的荧光嬷嬷一个神谕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : Slightly rapturous, as if reciting by rote EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutapostl_000071ce_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She learned that Atom did not call for Division, that sundering which drives us apart. Atom calls for Enlightenment, the warmth which feeds us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她意识到那种让我们分散力量的原子并没给我们带来分裂。原子带来的是启发，温暖
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : Slightly rapturous, as if reciting by rote EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutapostl_000071ce_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For it is only through Atom's supreme and total Enlightenment that we may attain salvation in Eternal Light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为正是通过原子的终极而又全面的启发，我们才能够在永恒之光中获得救赎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : Slightly rapturous, as if reciting by rote EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutapostl_000071ce_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, to offer Enlightenment to all those who suffer, of course. No more, no less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哈，当然这正是为那些仍在苦难中的人们提供启发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutapostl_000071cf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Atom came to me with a vision: the starving, the ill, the weak, all being made whole and well by receiving the sacrament of Atom's Glow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原子带给了我们这样一个景象：饥饿，疾病，虚弱，一切生命在接受了原子的荣光的圣礼后都重新复苏了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutapostl_000071cf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And so, with our holy water, we can make this vision a reality. When exposed to Atom's supreme Glow, the ill are reborn in his glowing visage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，有了我们的圣水，我们可以让这种景象实现。当你笼罩在原子的终极光辉下，苦难中的人们将恢复生气从而获得新生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutapostl_000071cf_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those reborn never hunger, never suffer, and never age. All our Enlightened brethren need is to know Atom's Glow, and they are happy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们重生之后将永不饥饿，永无痛苦，永不老朽。我们所有启发过的同胞只须谨记原子的荣光，便可仙福永享。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutapostl_000071cf_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you doing all of this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要这么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where did you get your water?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些水都是哪来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our Luminescent Mother went to meditate outside of the city, and as she wandered in a trance, she was visited by Atom's angels of war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的荧光嬷嬷离开城市去外面深思，当她迷惘的时候，原子的战争天使到来并指引她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : Slightly rapturous, as if reciting gospel EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutholywa_000071d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These angels brought her "Aqua Pura." Water so pure, so pristine, and so unsullied that she knew it would make the perfect vessel for Atom's Glow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些天使把"纯净水"带给了她。这水如此纯净，如此天然，如此清澈，她知道这能使原子的荣光更加的完美。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : Slightly rapturous, as if reciting gospel EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutholywa_000071d1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since that day, she has busied herself consecrating Atom's pure water into the Waters of Light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从那天开始，她就忙于把原子的净水转变为圣光之水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : Slightly rapturous, as if reciting gospel EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutholywa_000071d1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a gift from Atom. I was meditating right here in Springvale, when four of His armored angels came to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是原子赐予我们的礼物。当他的四名天使降临时，我正是在春之谷深思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutholywa_000071d2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I said I was from Megaton, they gave me barrels of "Aqua Pura," and said I should share it with my people. They were very clear on that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我说我来自核弹镇时，他们给了我几桶"纯净水"，并让我与那里的人民一同分享。他们非常清楚这点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutholywa_000071d2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But when I shared some with my Enlightened brethren, it made them terribly ill. I questioned why Atom had brought a pestilence upon us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但当我和我的几个被启发的教友分享时，使他们得了重病。我想知道为什么原子会为我们带来瘟疫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutholywa_000071d2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's when I thought to consecrate it with Atom's Light. And lo and behold, it removed the pestilence and made the finest holy water imaginable!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就是在我想要用原子的圣光启发它的时候。没想到的是，它不仅除掉了瘟疫，并造出人们能想象到的最好的圣水！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutholywa_000071d2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you make your "holy water"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们是怎么制作"圣水"的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a gift from Atom. I was meditating right here in Springvale, when four of His armored angels came to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是原子赐予我们的礼物。当他的四名天使降临时，我正是在春之谷深思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutholywa_00008167_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I said I was from Megaton, they gave me barrels of "Aqua Pura," and said I should share it with my people. They were very clear on that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我说我来自核弹镇时，他们给了我几桶"纯净水"，并让我与那里的人民一同分享。他们非常清楚这点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutholywa_00008167_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Naturally, I understood Atom's message. And so, I've been busy blessing this holy water and sharing it with the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我理解了原子所下达的讯息。从那以后，我就一直忙着为祝福这圣水，并与世界人民一同分享。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutholywa_00008167_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you make your "holy water"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们是怎么制作"圣水"的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever think about letting people bring in empty bottles to fill with Aqua Pura?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有没有想过让人们带着空瓶子来装纯净水？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mind if I ask some questions about your role in all of this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你介意我问一些关于你工作的问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. It's not like I'm going to be able to get much done today anyway. Ask away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。看起来我今天就忙到这里了。问吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsley_0000a96b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03AudioLDFFE02
It's been confirmed. The Purifier has been activated. We've been ordered to fortify our current position and wait for orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 已经确认。净化器已经启动。上级命令我们在原地防守，并等待指示。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wastelander [09006722] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioldffe_0000663f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With a lull in the fighting, we set up and fortified our position outside the Capitol Building, near Seward Square.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在战斗的间歇，我们在国会大厦的外围，苏华德广场附近，建造起防御工事并再次加固。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wastelander [09006722] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioldffe_0000663f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Things have been relatively quiet around here lately. That'll all change when word spreads of the purifier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前段日子的情况相对起来还是较为平静。但当关于净化器的流言传开，这些全都变了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wastelander [09006722] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioldffe_0000663f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyone and everyone will do whatever they can to get there hands on some of that water. For life or profit, it makes no difference.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任何一个人都想在这水中分一杯羹。为了生存或利益，这没什么区别。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wastelander [09006722] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioldffe_0000663f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Same old killing, just a different ingredient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一如既往的杀戮，只是为了不同的理由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wastelander [09006722] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioldffe_0000663f_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03AudioLDFFE03
We've been in position for a couple of days now. No sign of the caravans. This is bullshit! I want some god damn water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经在目标地点等了好几天了。没有商队的消息。真他妈的！我要那该死的水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wastelander [0900671D] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioldffe_00006640_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna kill Jed for putting us girls through this shit. Why get close to the caravan when we could just blow 'em away from a distance?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打算为了姑娘们把杰德干掉。如果可以从远距离赶走商队我们为什么还要靠近他们呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wastelander [0900671D] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioldffe_00006640_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He says we need the ammunition and can't afford to lose anybody. "Just use your good looks or something", he says. What an ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说我们需要弹药，并且没法承受失去任何人了。他说，"只要使用你的美貌或别的什么"。多么愚蠢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wastelander [0900671D] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioldffe_00006640_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, never mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔，算了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't think so. Now, sit down and shut up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不这么想。现在给我坐下保持安静。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : cocky EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01splitja_0000673a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did I say guns? No I didn't. I said, Knives, Pipes, or Boards. I'm still the boss of this gang, so I still set the rules. So what will it be asshole?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有说枪么？我可没说。我说的是，刀子，管子，或者棒子。我仍然是这个帮的老大所以我说话还算数。所以你打算怎么样，混球？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : annoyed, setting rules to a duel EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01splitja_00006736_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 棒子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. Here's a Nail Board. Use that and only that. I get hit with something other than that, or by anyone else, and my boys join in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了。拿着这根狼牙棒。除了它你不能用别的武器。如果你敢使用别的武器或是让你的手下捣乱，那我的兄弟们可不会袖手旁观的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Split Jack [09003B3A] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : about to kill the player EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01splitja_00006735_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck. You're gonna need it.

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03WhiteFlagGreet
Please! Don't shoot!
ESP.TRADUIT: 求你了！别开枪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) NPC : White Flag Radio [090068BC] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03encla_dlc03whiteflagg_000068b7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I killed him. But I'm here to set up a "protection" deal with the gang.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，我把他干掉了。不过我想和你谈谈"保护费"的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : shocked and angry EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01deadext_00006954_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not good enough. 500 caps now, and more when I say it's time for more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不行。先给500个瓶盖，下次我还会来要多点的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I gave you the money. That's it. You've pushed me too far. Walk away. Right now. If you come around here again, I'll kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你钱了。就是这样。但是你得寸进尺。离开这儿。马上。如果你还敢在这儿出现，我就干掉你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : pissed EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01deadext_00006b25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage DLC03WQ01 170
It's a deal. I'll call off the attacks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 成交。我会取消袭击的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. Here. But really, that's it. There's nothing left. You're squeezing a rock to get water now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。拿着。但是说真的，就这些了。没什么剩下的了。你这是从石头里面榨水了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : deadly serious EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01deadext_00006b22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our business is concluded. If you or any of your gang come back here to try to get anything more out of me. I'll kill you. Now get out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: deadly serious
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : deadly serious EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01deadext_00006b22_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage DLC03WQ01 170
Never mind. I was just kidding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没事。我只是开玩笑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not very funny. Now get out of here until you've made progress with taking care of that gang.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个人很是无聊。现在在你惹到那帮人之前赶紧滚蛋吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : annoyed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01deadext_00006b23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The protection contract costs a mere 200 caps per week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保护费只要每周200个瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe you're trying to extort me! I'm trying to do the right thing here, and you're totally taking advantage. You're a horrible person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不敢相信你竟然如此敲诈我！我只是为了维护正义，而你却一直在利用这点为自己谋利。你真是个糟糕的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : pissed off EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01deadext_00006b21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, tell your gang to send someone over once a week. I'll find some way to get the caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，还是让你们自己每周派人去干这种烂事儿吧。我还是去找找其他赚钱的道儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : pissed off EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01deadext_00006b21_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you... I never want to see YOU again. I trusted you. If you come around again, I'll kill you. You understand me?! I'll kill you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是你…我在也不想见到你了。我那么信任你。如果你再敢来，我就杀了你！听明白了么？！我就杀了你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : pissed off EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01deadext_00006b21_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQ01 160
Pay 500 caps now, and I'll call off the attacks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在给我500个瓶盖，以后你们就不会再受袭击。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn it. I just don't have that kind of money at my disposal...
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的。我手头可没那么多钱…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : frustrated but with no other choice EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01deadext_00006b26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's the deal. I'll give you 500 caps, from my own personal savings, mind you, and you call off the attacks. But that's it. That's all I have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的条件就是这样。我付给你500个瓶盖，请注意，这是我私人的积蓄，而你去阻止这次进攻。就这样。我只有这么多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way Comment (NAM2) : frustrated but with no other choice EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01deadext_00006b26_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.addItem caps001 500
So long. I'll see you in a week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 咱们下周见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right boss. G'luck out there. The Wastes are dangerous! Ahaha.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的老大。祝你在那儿好运。废土是很危险的！哈哈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09006B28]DLC03WQ01Fin) 09006B28 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : joking EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01f_dlc03wq01finext_00006c32_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, I know you've got something more. Quit holding out on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，我知道你还剩了点。别再装了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. Here's an extra 50 caps. Now get out of here until next week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。这里还有50个瓶盖。现在离开这儿下个礼拜前别回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09006B28]DLC03WQ01Fin) 09006B28 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01f_dlc03wq01finext_00006c3a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: removeItem caps001 50 player.additem caps001 50
Give me more. Or I'll bust you upside the head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再给多点。不然我就把你的脖子拧下来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damnit man, why you got to be like that? Here. Take half my caps. Then get the hell out of here until next week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真该死，哥们，你什么时候开始变得这么贪？拿着。我的钱分你一半。现在滚吧下周之前别回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09006B28]DLC03WQ01Fin) 09006B28 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : partly scared partly annoyed EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01f_dlc03wq01finext_00006c37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ01Fin.cutAmount to getItemCount caps001 set DLC03WQ01Fin.cutAmount to DLC03WQ01Fin.cutAmount / 2 removeItem caps001 DLC03WQ01Fin.cutAmount player.addItem caps001 DLC03WQ01Fin.cutAmount
Not good enough. Give me your caps, or I'll take them from your corpse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不行。把你们的瓶盖都给我，省得我在你们尸体上搜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just don't hurt me, alright? Here's all my caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别伤害我好吗？我的瓶盖全在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09006B28]DLC03WQ01Fin) 09006B28 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : scared EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01f_dlc03wq01finext_00006c34_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ01Fin.cutAmount to getItemCount caps001 removeItem caps001 DLC03WQ01Fin.cutAmount player.addItem caps001 DLC03WQ01Fin.cutAmount
I don't got shit for you to take. Honest man. My pockets are empty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我身上没东西值得拿的。说真的伙计。我的口袋空空如也。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09006B28]DLC03WQ01Fin) 09006B28 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : scared EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01f_dlc03wq01finext_00006c35_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha. I might of believed you were capable of that. But everyone knows you're a softy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈。我真该相信你能做的出来那种事。但每个人都知道你是个软蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09006B28]DLC03WQ01Fin) 09006B28 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : laughing off an idle threat EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01f_dlc03wq01finext_00006c36_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahem. If it wasn't for me, there'd be no protection racket.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃哼。如果不是我，你们连保护费都没机会交。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. I guess you're right. Here's a bigger share of the take. We'll see you next week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。我猜你是对的。我再多分你点儿钱吧。我们下周见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ01BanditFaction Quest : ([09006B28]DLC03WQ01Fin) 09006B28 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : begrudgingly EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq01f_dlc03wq01finext_00006c33_1.ogg

DLC03WQ03MeitnerPanic
No... What do I do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不……我该做些什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [090064FE] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03meitner_00006ead_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He can't be dead. He just can't be! It was just water!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不可能死的。他根本不可能死！那仅仅是水而已啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [090064FE] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03meitner_00006eae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh god, somebody help!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，上帝啊，快来人呐！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [090064FE] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03meitner_00006eaf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Accident, huh? Why should I believe that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 意外，哼？我为什么要相信你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, please! I just wanted to share some of my water with him! How could that kill him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不要！我只是把我喝的水分给了他些！怎么会毒死他呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [090064FE] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water

DLC03WQ03MeitnerReact1
No! That's not supposed to happen! No, get up! Get up! You can't pass out, you're supposed to get better! I gave you holy water, and everything!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！这本不该发生的！不，起来！起来！你不应该死的，你本该好起来的！我给了你圣水，我给了你一切！

That water... you... damn you!

DLC03WQ03BeggarDies1
I haven't tasted water this pure since... urk... Oh. Oh god, what's wrong? Water...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我好久都没喝过这么纯的……呃……噢。天啊，怎么了？这水……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Water Beggar [09006517] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : Suddenly succumbing to stomach cramps from poisoned water - dies at end EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03beggard_00006e9d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ03.BeggarScene to 1 kill
What about Megaton's water supply?
ESP.TRADUIT: 核弹镇的供水怎么样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone's dead, you stupid tin can!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有人都死了，你这愚蠢罐头盒！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your candor in this matter is not productive but unsurprising if the situation on the surface is exactly as you have described.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这一问题上的陈述是没有意义的，但如果地表的情况确实如此，则毫不奇怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00006f88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for my primary function, I will continue to execute its instructions for as long as necessary or until I am no longer able to carry out this task.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于我的主要功能，我仍将继续坚决执行，直至我不能在执行该任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00006f88_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I appreciate your concern regarding this matter, and have noted and filed it in my memory array.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我感谢你的热心，并在我的记忆体里作了记录。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00006f88_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03BS3.BS3Self to 1
Hmmm. Suit yourself. Seems like a waste of time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯…。随你的便。看起来只是浪费时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This unit has been successfully carrying out its primary function for over 200 years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该单元已经正常执行其主要功能达200多年了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00006f9b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My primary function is paramount to any other function and must be followed until I am no longer able to perform the task.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的主要功能要优先于其他辅功能，必须坚决执行，直至我不能在执行该任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00006f9b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I appreciate your concern regarding this matter, and have noted and filed it in my memory array.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我感谢你的热心，并在我的记忆体里作了记录。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00006f9b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03BS3.BS3Self to 1
That seems admirable, but hardly necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这值得钦佩，但是没有必要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My core central processing and logic unit has many variables and opportunities for independent thought and learning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的中央处理和逻辑单元具有独立思考和学习的变量和条件设定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00006f8c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, my primary function is paramount to any other function and must be followed until I am no longer able to perform the task.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，我的主要功能要优先于其他辅功能，必须坚决执行，直至我不能在执行该任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00006f8c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I appreciate your concern regarding this matter, and have noted and filed it in my memory array.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我感谢你的热心，并在我的记忆体里作了记录。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargots_00006f8c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03BS3.BS3Self to 1
DLC03BS3MargotDone
The security breach inside the Presidential Metro System has been cleared. All sections, stand down from alert status.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总统专用地铁系统的安全问题已经排除。所有区域解除紧急状态。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3margotdon_00006f87_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what exactly did these unidentified things damage in here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些身份不明的人到底造成了什么破坏？

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of the main power relays for the Adams Air Force Base line has been disrupted by the forced removal of a Main Fuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亚当斯空军基地线路的一个主继电器由于主熔断元件的强制拆除而停止工作了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargotb_00006f8d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a replacement part on our main Sentinel Unit, but I cannot risk the repair until the breach is dealt with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在主卫队上有一个替换部件，但是在入侵活动被阻止之前，我们不能冒险去修理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tlmargotb_00006f8d_2.ogg
