DLC03BS3
Due to the security breach, access to the southern and eastern metro lines is currently prohibited.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于安全系统被侵入，通往南部和东部的地铁线路目前被封闭了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0900D502] (ID) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_dlc03bs3announc_00006f8e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Currently, the Presidential Metro System is functioning at 22 percent. Please expect delays and plan your usage accordingly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目前，总统专用地铁系统只有22%可用。请您预计出延误时间并作出相应处理计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0900D502] (ID) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_dlc03bs3announc_00006f8f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Senate Luncheon with Chinese Ambassador Xiu-Ling scheduled for October 31st at noon has been indefinitely postponed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安排在10月31日中午，与中国议员秀林的参议员午餐会已经延期，具体时间未定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0900D502] (ID) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_dlc03bs3announc_00006f90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Nuka-Cola Corporation is proud to announce its newest taste sensation, Nuka-Cola Quantum. Try one today.
ESP.TRADUIT: 核子可乐股份公司公司非常自豪地推出了它们的最新口味的产品，量子版核子可乐。今天来试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0900D502] (ID) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_dlc03bs3announc_00006f91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In accordance with U.S. Security Statute A567/B, passengers must have their Senatorial identification ready for inspection at all times.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据美国安全法规A567/B，乘客们必须持有各自的参议员证明以便随时随地的检查。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0900D502] (ID) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_dlc03bs3announc_00006f92_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This holiday season, bring home a gift for your child that he or she will cherish for a lifetime... bring home a Red Racer Tricycle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个假期，给你家里的孩子带回一份永生难忘的礼物…带一辆红色三轮赛车回家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0900D502] (ID) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_dlc03bs3announc_00006f93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please note that it is against the law to inhibit or interfere with any of the Presidential Metro Security Units.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请注意这违反了关于禁止干涉总统专用地铁保安的相关法律。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0900D502] (ID) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_dlc03bs3announc_00006f94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Metro Theater Group production of "Subway, Subway" originally scheduled for November 4th, 2077 has been postponed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 地铁剧组的作品"地铁，地铁"最早预定于2077年11月4日发布，但已经延期了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0900D502] (ID) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_dlc03bs3announc_00006f95_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you've misplaced an item within the Presidential Metro System, please check the Lost and Found Kiosk located at the Capital Building Station.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你在总统专用地铁系统中遗忘了了物品，请到首都站的失物招领处确认。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0900D502] (ID) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_dlc03bs3announc_00006f96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Metro Transit Authority would like to extend it's very best to our soldiers fighting abroad and wishes them a safe and speedy return.
ESP.TRADUIT: 地铁运输机构对我们在外国奋战的士兵表达最热诚的祝福，希望他们能早日凯旋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0900D502] (ID) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_dlc03bs3announc_00006f97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This next series of announcements is brought to you by the Nuka-Cola Corporation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来的一系列通告都是来自核子可乐股份公司
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0900D502] (ID) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_dlc03bs3announc_00006f98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please stop by any of the conveniently placed Nuka-Cola machines throughout the Metro and purchase some refreshing Nuka-Cola today!
ESP.TRADUIT: 请在地铁乘览时务必赏光我们为您专设的核子可乐机，饮一听让人心旷神怡的核子可乐！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0900D502] (ID) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_dlc03bs3announc_00006f99_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For your own protection, please stand clear of the moving trains and refrain from standing on the train tracks at all times.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了您的安全，请在机车进出站时退后至安全区域，请不要站在铁轨上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0900D502] (ID) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_dlc03bs3announc_00006f9a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03CitTalk4Neg
This is a bad situation...
ESP.TRADUIT: 目前的局面真不好…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk4ne_00006fcc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No pressure, right? Heh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不必紧张，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic, nervous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk4ne_000075d9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. Thanks, I feel so much better now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 必须的！谢谢！我现在好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk4ne_000075da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not exactly the answer I was hoping for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可不是我想要的回答。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk4ne_00006fcd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well that's not going to help me sleep any better tonight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这又不能让我晚上睡个好觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk4ne_00006fce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for the pick-me-up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你让我精神了点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk4ne_00006fcf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03CitTalk5
Look, this is the path that Elder Lyons committed us to. He believes in it, and we have to trust him. Otherwise we've got nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是里昂斯长老给我们指的路，他深信不疑，我们也要信任他。否则，我们什么都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk5_00006fb4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, just focus on what needs to be done right now. Whatever happens after that, we'll deal with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，集中精神做现在的事情。以后的事情我们以后对付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk5_000075db_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just stick to your training, and you'll be okay. We all will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好好训练，你会没事的。我们都会没事的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk5_00006fb5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Spend some time on target practice in the Bailey. That'll get the jitters out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去城堡外场做点射击训练吧，能让你不胡思乱想的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk5_00006fb6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're worried, talk to the Scribes. See what kind of progress they've made on that Enclave tech. Maybe they can put your mind at ease.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你担心的话，那就去和文员们谈一谈。看看他们目前对于英克雷的技术研究到了哪一步。也许能让你安心一些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk5_00006fb7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your equipment in good condition, and keep your head on straight. The Brotherhood will make it through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保持装备处于良好状态，别胡思乱想。兄弟会会胜利的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk5_00006fb8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03CitTalk4
I guess that's a good way to look at it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这是一个很好的看问题的方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk4po_00006fa2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you're right. We'll get through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的没错，我们能闯过去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk4po_000075dd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sure hope you're right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然希望你没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk4po_00006fa3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've made it this far, right? We'll get through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们走了这么远，是不是？所以我们能闯过去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk4po_00006fa4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的对，谢谢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk4po_00006fa5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03CitTalk3
Look, we've won every engagement we've been in so far. We've got that robot on our side. Everything will be fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们赢了目前为止所有的战斗，我们有那个机器人，一切都没问题的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk3_00006fc3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we're going to come out on top. Their headquarters was destroyed, and now we've got them on the run. Don't worry about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们占着优势。他们的总部被毁了，我们追着他们打。不要担心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk3_00006fc4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our training is superior. We're reverse-engineering their tech, so they've lost that advantage. Everything is fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的训练是最有效的。我们正在反向研究他们的技术，他们的优势已经没有了，一切都会好起来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk3_00006fc5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're walking a fine line. If we can keep the pressure on them, we've got a shot. If we give them time to re-group, we're in trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的情况会更好的，只要我们继续对他们施压，我们就能胜利。如果给他们时间喘息，我们就有麻烦了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk3_00006fc6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's put it this way: if we don't win, there isn't going to be a lot of time to stand around and worry about it. Know what I mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说吧：我们如果不是赢了的话，哪有这么多时间在这里闲聊和担忧呢，明白我的话了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk3_00006fc7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The robot is our best weapon. If we can keep it running, we have a chance. If not, we have to find another way to counter their Vertibirds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 机器人是我们最好的武器，如果我们能保持它的运转，我们就有取胜的机会，如果不能，那必须找到其他办法来对付他们的飞鸟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk3_00006fc8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's just another day in the Brotherhood. We'll find this new weapon of theirs, and we'll stop it. That's the only way to look at it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在兄弟会的又一天。我们会找到他们的新武器的，我们会阻止它的。这是唯一的办法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk3_00006fc9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Scribes have some tricks up their sleeves. Trust me. They're not giving details, but they're working on something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 文员们已经想出了好办法，相信我，他们没有给出具体的细节，但是他们绝对正在做一些事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk3_00006fca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The operation wasn't a total loss. If we can make sense of the data we recovered, we can still pull out ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这次行动并没有完全失败。如果我们能破解所发现的数据，我们就能再振作起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk3_00006fcb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enjoy the clean water while you can. We may not have it for too much longer, know what I mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 趁你还有机会，赶紧享受这干净的水吧。我们可能享用不了多久了，你知道我的意思吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk3_000075de_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, their vertibirds are going to be a real problem now. The robot was our only good counter to them. We might be in trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，他们飞鸟是个大麻烦。机器人曾经是我们的唯一的对抗手段。我们会有麻烦了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk3_000075df_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't forget they apparently have missiles they can launch at us from... hell, I don't know. Space? Kind of hard to fight back against that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别忘了他们还有导弹，他们可以从…操，我也不知道从哪里打击我们。也许是太空？见鬼，那样的话，怎么还手啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk3_000075e0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got to do something. If they don't know we're coming, that might be enough to turn things in our favor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们必须做点什么。如果他们不知道我们要来了，也许事情会转而有利于我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk3_000075e1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at it this way: they probably won't use their missiles on their own positions, right? So that evens things up a bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以这么想：他们也许不会用导弹打自己的阵地，对不？所以这样的话两边就基本相当了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk3_000075e2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Scribes say this thing they've been working on should neutralize the Enclave's vertibirds. That'll catch them off-guard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 文员们说他们正在研究的玩意能搞掉英克雷的飞鸟，如果真的能行，那可以打得他们防不胜防。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk3_000075e3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, this is it, isn't it? We're throwing everything we can at them. If it doesn't work, nothing will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管如何就这样了，是吧？我们把所有牌都打出来了，如果不行，那也没其他办法了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk3_000075e4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're definitely not going to get a second shot at this, so everything has to work perfectly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们绝对没有第二次的机会，所以万事务求完美。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk3_000075e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a necessary move, but yeah. If the attack fails, they're going to come at us hard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是必要的一步，是的。若进攻失败，他们就会让我们很难过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk3_000075e6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03CitTalk2
You think we're gonna win this? I mean, we've got the Enclave on the run now, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我们会赢吗？我是说，我们已经把英克雷打得满地跑了，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk2_00006fb9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think our chances of success are against the Enclave? We've surprised them so far, but do you think we can really beat them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我们能不能打的过英克雷？我们到现在为止都把他们打懵了，但是你觉得我们真的能彻底战胜他们吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk2_00006fba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've overheard some things. The offensive is going well, but do you think we can keep the pressure on them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说了一些消息。这次进攻很顺利，但是你觉得我们能一直这样压着他们打吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk2_00006fbb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't help but wonder what's going to happen. We're pushing the Enclave back, but how far is this going to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我总是在想未来会怎样变化。我们把英克雷打回去了，但是以后能打到什么程度呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk2_00006fbc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've been able to steamroll the Enclave so far, but how do you think this is going to end? Can we really defeat them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一直到现在都压着英克雷打，但是你觉得最后会结束吗？我们真的能打败他们？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk2_00006fbd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The robot's gone. What are we going to do? We don't have a way to fight back against the Enclave's vertibirds now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 机器人没有了。我们怎么办？我们现在没有办法对付英克雷的飞鸟了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk2_00006fbe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With Liberty Prime gone, how the hell can we ever beat the Enclave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有了“自由先锋”，我们要怎么才能击败英克雷啊？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk2_00006fbf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you think we're completely screwed now? I mean, how are we supposed to finish off the Enclave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我们是不是都没辙了？我是说，我们怎么才能彻底击败英克雷呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk2_00006fc0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard an update from one of the Scribes. Their projections for our chance of success are way down. I mean WAY down. What are we going to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从一个文员那里听到些新消息。他们预测我们胜利的机会大大的下调了。我是说，机会大大的减少了。我们该怎么办？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk2_00006fc1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm trying to stay positive, but losing the robot was a huge blow. Do you think we'll still be able to pull through this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想乐观些，但是没有了机器人，真是打击很大。你觉得我们能渡过这个难关吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk2_00006fc2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think this new weapon the Scribes cooked up can do the trick? This is probably the only shot we're going to get at the Enclave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得那些文员们自己弄的新式武器能行吗？估计这是我们对付英克雷的唯一办法
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk2_000075cb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if the element of surprise is going to be enough. We're only going to get one shot at this base the Enclave has.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道这种出其不意的进攻效果能有多少用。我们只能用这个办法奇袭英克雷基地一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk2_000075cc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've seen the plans for the assault on the Enclave base. I don't know what to think... this is really it, isn't it? We've got to stop them here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看过那个突袭英克雷基地的计划。我也不知道该怎么讲…这是真的，对不？我们要阻止他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk2_000075cd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if we can't at least disable whatever's controlling these missiles the Enclave has? Do we have a shot at beating them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们连阻止英克雷导弹控制系统的能力都没有呢？我们还能怎么打败他们？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk2_000075ce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not encouraged by the plans for the attack on the Enclave's position. We're taking an awful gamble by doing this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于这个进攻英克雷阵地的计划，我认为不怎么样。这样做相当地冒险
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk2_000075cf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03CitTalk1
What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk1_00006faf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk1_00006fb0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在想什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk1_00006fb1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm listening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在听。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk1_00006fb2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go on...
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03convc_dlc03cittalk1_00006fb3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This has gone on too long. Time to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一切都够了。准备受死吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Such a shame it had to come to this...
ESP.TRADUIT: 事情发展到这一步真让人遗憾…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : Disappointed in the player resorting to violence. EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_000071ca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetEnemy DLC03WQ03ApostlesFaction PlayerFaction startcombat player
I don't want to have to fight you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想伤害你们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You never need to fight, my dear. But I'm afraid you simply aren't going to convince us to stop our holy work just because you disapprove.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你根本不需要动武，亲爱的。但恐怕你无法说服我们停止我们神圣的工作，仅仅因为你不赞成它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : Slightly chiding EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_000071c7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't stop, I'll have to make you stop. Forcibly if I have to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还要这么做，我会亲自让你停手。有必要的话我会动用武力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you feel you must resort to violence, then you will do so. I will not fight you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你觉得必须诉诸武力，那随你便吧，我不会跟你打。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : Hinting at potential repercussions for violence. EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_000071cb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I cannot say that my disciples share my commitment to peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我不敢保证我的门徒们和我一样崇尚和平。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : Hinting at potential repercussions for violence. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_000071cb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, you're endangering innocent people who think your water is safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 停手吧，你这样会伤害那些以为你的水安全的无辜平民。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm... You have a point, one cannot be forced into salvation against one's will. To do so would be unjust, even in Atom's name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯…你有你的观点，一个人不能在违背自已意愿的情况下被拯救。这么做有违正义，即使是以原子之名
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_000071e4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps you're right. We must not use deception to spread the word of Atom's Light. To do so would be to make a mockery of salvation itself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你是对的。我们不该用蒙骗的手段去传播院子之圣光的教义。这么做可以说是对拯救本身的愚弄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_000071e4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We will stop using the Aqua Pura for our holy water. We will save our ministrations for those who seek us out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会停止使用纯净水来制造圣水。我们会对那些来找我们的帮助的人省去这个步骤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_000071e4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQ03 150
You can't trick people into enlightenment. They have to accept it knowingly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能把人骗来进行启发。他们应该由自己决定是否接受。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that truly what it looks like to others? We only mean to tend to the ill and offer them salvation before they pass - we're saviors, not murderers!
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他人对此真的是这么看待的么？我们只是想在他们死去之前拯救他们 - 我们是救助者，不是刽子手！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_000071e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We offer salvation, not death! We must not give the world another reason to fear Atom's Light. If that means no more holy water, then so be it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们提供拯救，而不是死亡！我们不能让世界又有另外一个害怕我们的理由了。如果这样意味着从此再也没有圣水了，我们也会这么做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_000071e5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We will leave the clean Aqua Pura for the residents of Megaton. We will save our ministrations for those who seek us out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会把洁净的纯净水留给核弹镇的居民。我们会对那些来找我们的帮助的人省去这个步骤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_000071e5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQ03 150
You need to stop contaminating the Aqua Pura for your holy water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能再为了制造圣水而去污染纯净水了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be silly! How else will we spread the word to the unenlightened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 别傻了！不这么做我们又怎能将我们的言语传给那些无知之人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_000071c8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So many misunderstand Atom, and fear the Glow of his Light as a thing of destruction, rather than humanity's next step towards perfection.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很多人对原子有误解，并且畏惧他的圣光，认为它是某种有害的东西，却不知道那是人类走向完美的下一步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_000071c8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With this marvelous holy water, they drink without fear, and by the time the Glow consumes them, they have no need to fear ever again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有了这神奇的圣水，他们喝了就不会觉得害怕了。而且当荣光毁灭了他们之后，他们也没必要再害怕什么了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_000071c8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're doing holy work here, tending to the suffering and hopeless. Our holy water gives warmth to those who would only die unsaved, otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在这里照顾那些痛苦和绝望的人们，这是神圣的工作。再说，我们的圣水能让那些无法挽救的人们带去温暖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_000071c9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Isn't there some way I can convince you to stop?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没法劝你停止这一切吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, it's full of Atom's Light. It's a tragedy that not everyone is prepared to accept Enlightenment, but such are the ways of the divine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，它充满了原子之圣光。悲惨的事不是每个人都准备好了接受启发，不过这就是预言中的道路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : Passive-aggressively trying to blame the poisoned victims EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_00007e20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, we never force anyone to drink it. We simply give the opportunity to those who thirst for something more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此外，我们从没强迫任何人喝它。我们只是在那些人口渴的时候提供这个机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : Passive-aggressively trying to blame the poisoned victims EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_00007e20_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your "holy water" is poisoned with radiation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们的"圣水"已被辐射毒化了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to enter the monastery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要进你们的教堂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, but of course! You have been blessed by Atom with Eternal Light, and are most welcome to our monastery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，没问题！你已经被原子的永恒之光祝福过了，非常欢迎来到我们的修道院。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03gerardraden_000071d4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You will find many kindred spirits within. Please, introduce yourself to our leader, our Luminescent Mother, Curie the Third.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会在里面发现很多血族的勇士。请你向我们的首领，我们的荧光嬷嬷，圣母居里三世，介绍你自己吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03gerardraden_000071d4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted DLC03WQ03 60 1 player.additem DLC03WQ03MonasteryKey 1
I'm afraid it is not open to the unenlightened. Your presence would contaminate our great works.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉这不对愚昧者开放。你的出现会污染我们的伟大工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03gerardraden_00008166_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, if you are willing to be baptized in Atom's holy Light, then perhaps I could allow you to enter and meet our leader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，如果你愿意在原子的神圣之光中受洗，那也许我能允许你进去见见我们的领袖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03gerardraden_00008166_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, but I must insist. You simply cannot be allowed on holy ground without knowing Atom's Light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，不过我坚持。如果你不了解原子的圣光，就不允许走进圣地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03gerardraden_000071d5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where you see radiation, we see humanity's salvation. And we can hardly allow the unsaved into our holy monastery, now can we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到辐射的地方，我们看到的是人性的救赎。而且我们也几乎不会允许那些未被救赎的人走进我们神圣的修道院，是不是？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03gerardraden_000071d5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may supplicate to Atom your desire for enlightenment at our Tabernacle. All may bask in the Eternal Light. All may be filled with the Glow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以在我们的礼拜堂里向原子祈祷受洗。永恒之光中的一切都会感觉温暖。一切都充满了荣光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03gerardraden_000071d5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC03WQ03 60 1
Look, I'm not going to irradiate myself to get into your church.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我不会为了进教堂而辐射自己的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, I can feel the Light within you. By all means, you are welcome in our sanctuary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我能感觉到你体内的圣光。也就是说，我们的圣所现在欢迎你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03gerardraden_000071d6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, speak with our leader, our Luminescent Mother, Curie the Third.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请您与我们的领袖谈谈，我们的荧光嬷嬷，居里三世。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03gerardraden_000071d6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted DLC03WQ03 60 1 player.additem DLC03WQ03MonasteryKey 1
There. I've gotten a little irradiated. Can I go in now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我已经受了点辐射。现在我能进去吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have been marked, but I feel your dedication is still too weak. Our holy site is only open to the truly blessed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经有了印记，但我感觉到你的心还不够诚。我们的圣所只对那些全心全意的信徒开放。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03gerardraden_000071d7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps after you have spent more time praying to Atom in warmth, you will be deemed worthy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许你在原子的温暖中祈祷足够长的时间后，你会被认可。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03gerardraden_000071d7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, I'm irradiated. Let me in now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别这样，我已经受过辐射了。让我进去吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, truly your Light is second only to the Suns of Atom themselves! You are more than welcome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，你身上的圣光已经仅次于原子骄阳了！我们非常欢迎您。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03gerardraden_000071d8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, speak with our leader, our Luminescent Mother, Curie the Third.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请您与我们的领袖谈谈，我们的荧光嬷嬷，居里三世。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03gerardraden_000071d8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted DLC03WQ03 60 1 player.additem DLC03WQ03MonasteryKey 1
I am consumed with Atom's Light. Let me into your monastery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经浸泡过原子的圣光了。让我进教堂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I tried asking nice. Let's do this the hard way!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我好声好气你不听。现在我要来硬的了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Must it really come to this? So be it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非要如此无礼吗？那就来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03gerardraden_000071cd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
You mean I have to be irradiated to be allowed inside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说我要进去就要先受辐射？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, call it what you will. We simply will not allow any who do not bear the Light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随你怎么称呼吧。我们不会允许那些不愿意承受光明的人造访的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03gerardraden_000071cc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make your way to our Tabernacle, pilgrim. Pray to Atom to fill you with Holy Radiance. Bask in the Glow of Atom's Eternal Light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请光临我们的神堂，教友！向原子祈祷，你会获得神圣的辐射。沐浴在原子永恒光芒的和煦温暖下！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03gerardraden_000071cc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC03WQ03 60 1
DLC0
I need to get into your monastery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要进你们的教堂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03CitScribeReport1
We're monitoring the robot's status remotely as best we can. Everything seems to be within acceptable parameters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们正在尽力远程监视那些机器人的状况。似乎一些还都在可控范围内。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03convc_dlc03citscriber_000075d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Prime is still exhibiting some power fluctuations, but they're within tolerances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先锋的动力有些不稳定，但还处于可以接受的程度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03convc_dlc03citscriber_000075d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're still going over data from the last few skirmishes. Prime is functioning beyond our expectations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还在检查上几次战斗的数据。先锋的功能超过了我们的预期。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03convc_dlc03citscriber_000075d2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Analysis of the Enclave armor is ongoing. We've identified a few weaknesses which we've advised field commanders to exploit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 英克雷装甲的分析正在进行。我们找到了一些弱点，已经告诉战场的指挥员了，他们可以善加利用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03convc_dlc03citscriber_000075d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be briefing the Paladins soon on what we've learned about Enclave battle tactics. I think we can definitely improve our efficiency.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有关英克雷的战术，我会向圣骑士们作一个介绍。我想我们肯定能提高战斗效率的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03convc_dlc03citscriber_000075d4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're still trying to figure out what happened... looking for any recent transmissions we might have missed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们仍在努力了解发生了什么…搜索最近我们可能漏过的电传。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03convc_dlc03citscriber_000075d5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Progress has been made on the new anti-air weapon, but without all the parts we still have yet to start field tests.
ESP.TRADUIT: 防空武器的研发取得了进展，但是我们的部件不足，我们还需要进行试射实验。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03convc_dlc03citscriber_000075d6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're going over the debriefings and scattered data we received from the site. We hope to have a threat assessment prepared later today.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要审查这些现场报告和零散数据。希望能在今天的晚些时候得出一个威胁性评估结果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03convc_dlc03citscriber_000075d7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still working on decrypting the Enclave data pulled from the last encounter. We should have solid results soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还在破解上次交锋时获得的英克雷数据。相信很快就会有重大进展。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([09002DC4]DLC03ConvCitadel) DLC03 Citadel Conversations EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03convc_dlc03citscriber_000075d8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03WQ03RosaLeaving
I can't stay here. Not after something like that...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能呆在这儿。尤其是发生了这种事之后……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [090064FE] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03rosalea_000076be_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, that's it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，明白了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, then. There have been reports of an Enclave camp southeast of Old Olney, so I'd head there if you want to try it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。有报告说在老奥尔尼的东南方有个英克雷营地，所以你想要试一试这家伙的话，我想我可以去那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2vallincou_00007b53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope the Scrambler ends up being useful. I'd hate to have spent all this time on it and get no results... or bad results. That would be worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望扰频器能够有用。我非常讨厌是我花了所有的时间在这上面，却得不到任何结果…或是不好的结果。那就更糟了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2vallincou_00007b53_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted DLC03BS2 60 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC03BS2 61 1
Is there anything I need to be concerned about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有什么要注意的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't think so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不这么认为。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2vallincou_00007b51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As long as you're within range of the Enclave's transmitter, your signal should be the one the Deathclaw follows.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你在英克雷的发报机范围内，死亡之爪将服从你的信号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2vallincou_00007b51_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you get too far away, well I'm not sure what's going to happen. I think there might be some bad effects... for the Deathclaw, not you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你离得太远，那我就不知道会发生什么事情了。我想多半会发生不好的事情…当然，是对死亡之爪而言，不是你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2vallincou_00007b51_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How does the scrambler work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 扰频器的工作原理是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It overrides the Enclave signal, so as far as the Deathclaw is concerned, you're in control.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它改变了英克雷的信号，所以只要是受到影响的死亡爪，你都能控制。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2vallincou_00007b50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And remember, it works passively. As long as you have the scrambler on your person, it'll do its job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还要记着，它是被动生效的。只要你带着扰频器，它就能起作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2vallincou_00007b50_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What exactly is this thing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这到底是个什么东西？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a semi-standard transmitter, only I altered the frequency modulation and jacked up the output.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个半导体发报机，我只要调整频率就能发送消息了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2vallincou_00007b4e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Based on some experiments I ran here in the lab, it should override the signals the Enclave uses to control Deathclaws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据我所做的实验，这可能可以改变英克雷用于控制死亡爪的信号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2vallincou_00007b4e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry -- It's constantly broadcasting, so you don't need to do anything. Just don't lose it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心——那是不间断播报，你不必做什么。只要别错过就好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2vallincou_00007b4e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And so far, I have no evidence of adverse effects of EM interference in humans. Animals maybe, but not humans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而到目前为止，都没有证据显示辐射发生器对人类的副作用。动物也许有可能，但人类不会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2vallincou_00007b4e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, it doesn't have a huge broadcast range, but it should be enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，播报范围虽然不大，但已经够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2vallincou_00007b4e_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear you can help me get into Old Olney.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你能帮我进入老奥尔尼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, maybe. I mean, possibly. I think so, but I'm not certain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，可能吧。我是说，也许。我想是的，不过不能确定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tlvallinc_00007b4f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know how much this will actually help... I mean, I'm not quite sure how effective it might be since it hasn't really been field tested...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道这能帮上多少忙…我是说，因为这还没在战场上测试过，所以我不是很肯定它多有效…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tlvallinc_00007b4f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I think I've figured out a way to override the signals the Enclave is using to control their Deathclaws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我认为我已经研究出办法，来改变英克雷用来控制他们那些死亡爪的信号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tlvallinc_00007b4f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, take this. It's only a prototype, so please don't lose it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，拿着。只有一个样机，所以别弄丢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tlvallinc_00007b4f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem DLC03SignalScrambler 1 set DLC03BS2.VallincourtFlag to 2
Old Olney is a dangerous place. Is there anything I could have to help me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 老奥尔尼是个危险的地方。有什么东西能帮到我的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Check with Scribe Vallincourt. She's been researching some of the Enclave technology we've recovered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去瓦林考特文员那里确认一下。她一直在研究那些我们找到的英克雷科技。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tltristan_00007b52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: From what I understand, she may have come up with something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据我所了解，她可能有什么成果了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2tltristan_00007b52_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...shit, how is this thing on?
ESP.TRADUIT: …妈的，这家伙怎么开了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wastelander [09006722] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 Comment (NAM2) : Realizes his recorder has been on this whole time and turns it off.

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03WQ02ConfResponseF4
"Grateful?" Really?
ESP.TRADUIT: "高兴？" 真的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ02AudienceFaction Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : appalled at the suggestion she should feel grateful to be conned by a con-man EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02confres_00007e14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03WQ02ConfResponseF3
He's made fools of us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在耍我们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ02AudienceFaction Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : smoldering anger EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02confres_00007e13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03WQ02ConfResponseF2
Lies! All lies!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谎言！全都是谎言！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : DLC03WQ02AudienceFaction Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : shocked and feeling foolish EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02confres_00007e15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough cultist crap. This is sick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别再跟我说这些邪教的疯话了。真变态。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are welcome to your own beliefs, of course. But I would ask you not to profane in our monastery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我们尊重你的个人信仰，。不过我劝你不要侮辱我们的僧侣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : A little scolding, as a sweet old grandmother might be EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutapostl_00007e1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mean, you turn people into Ghouls?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说，你把人转化成了僵尸？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's correct, it does. But we can work miracles with our holy water. Free of impurities, this "Aqua Pura" is perfect for carrying Atom's blessing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，的确如此。但是我们可以用我们的圣水创造奇迹。绝无杂质，用这样的"纯净水"来保存原子的祝福简直是完美至极。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sadly, only a small number of supplicants truly achieve Eternal Light. The rest must be satisfied with Enlightenment and an end to their suffering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可惜的是，只有很少的一部分恳求者能确实通过永恒之光。其余的人将在启发中得到满足，并且结束他们的痛苦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutapostl_00007e24_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turning people into Ghouls? But that requires an amazing amount of radiation!
ESP.TRADUIT: 把人变成僵尸？那可需要很高剂量的辐射！

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a vulgar term, used only by those who are jealous of their gifts. We recognize them for the Enlightened beings they are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是个低俗的条款，只有那些嫉妒他们天赋的人才会使用。我们把他们称为被启发者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutapostl_00007e25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But to receive such Enlightenment, people need to be exposed to a tremendous dose of Atom's Glow. That's why our holy water is so important!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是要得到那样的启发，人们需要暴露在非常大量的原子的荣光之下。这就是圣水如此重要的原因！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutapostl_00007e25_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sadly, only a small number of supplicants truly achieve Eternal Light. The rest must be satisfied with Enlightenment and an end to their suffering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可惜的事，只有很少的一部分恳求者能确实通过永恒之光。其余的人将在启发中得到满足，并且结束他们的痛苦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03aboutapostl_00007e25_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03AboutStopping
DLC03AudioLDAFBEnclave02
Little Sister, I've stashed away a considerable amount of fuel behind the small building west of the Air Traffic Control Tower as you requested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妹妹，我按你的要求在空中交通控制塔西面的小楼里藏了相当多的燃油。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wastelander [09006722] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioldafb_000081db_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The container's tucked away under some barrels and tires. And no, I couldn't safely confiscate an Incinerator for you, that's your job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个油桶就藏在一些桶和轮胎下面。不过，我没法给你弄到一把喷火枪，只有靠你自己了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wastelander [09006722] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioldafb_000081db_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I took too big a risk hiding that fuel for you in the first place. If you do come across an Incinerator, please be careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在那地方为你藏了那些燃料可是冒大风险的。如果你真想弄到一把喷火枪，那就要当心了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wastelander [09006722] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioldafb_000081db_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, they're shipping me out to some relay station far west of here in the Wasteland. I'm afraid I won't be seeing you for awhile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么说，他们要把我送去废土西面很远的一个中继站，恐怕我们要有一段时间不能见面了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wastelander [09006722] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioldafb_000081db_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take care and good luck in all your endeavors. Your Big Brother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以后的日子自己当心，祝你好运。你的哥哥。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wastelander [09006722] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioldafb_000081db_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03AFBEnclave
Did you know Griffon's stashing the Aqua Pura and selling irradiated water?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知不知道格里芬把真正的纯净水藏起来，然后卖有辐射的水？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He he. I guess he's more clever than I thought.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵呵。他比我想的还聪明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : speculating EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgriffonscam_00008247_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's probably planning on selling the real Aqua Pura to Raiders and Slavers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他可能计划着把真正的纯净水卖给歹徒和奴隶贩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : speculating EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgriffonscam_00008247_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmmm. Now there's a thought! Of course, Lyons would have my head if I tried anything of the sort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。我现在明白了！没错，如果我那样做的话，我的性命就不保了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : speculating EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgriffonscam_00008247_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thought you'd like to know. Griffon's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你很想知道这个。格里芬死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's dead? Greaaaat. I guess I'll just have to find some other way to subsidize the water caravans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他死了？这可好。我得找别的路子去补贴商队了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : annoyed and disheartened EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgriffondead_00008246_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03TransitionTopic
What the hell happened in here... Oh, man... We've got people down in here! You, check that equipment! The two of you, over here - help me get them..
ESP.TRADUIT: 这他妈的是怎么回事…噢，糟糕…我这里有人倒下了！你，检查设备！那边的两个 - help 帮我把他们弄出来。。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([0900837B]DLC03BS00) DLC03 Transition Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs00_dlc03transitiont_00008b21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean, comatose? I'm sorry, but that's unacceptable. After all this, to be left in a state like that...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这是什么意思，昏迷不醒？非常抱歉，但这事儿令人无法接受。在经过这一切之后，就留下这么个烂摊子…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([0900837B]DLC03BS00) DLC03 Transition Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs00_dlc03transitiont_00008b22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Owyn, why do you keep torturing yourself? Coming down here isn't going to help at all. We have enough to deal with already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欧文，你怎么总是给自己找罪受？你上这儿来根本帮不上什么忙。我们已经有足够的人手来处理这一切了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([0900837B]DLC03BS00) DLC03 Transition Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs00_dlc03transitiont_00008b23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Elder, sir -- I was told you'd be down here. We're getting more field reports. The Enclave is retreating. We have a location on their rally point...
ESP.TRADUIT: 长老，先生 -- 我被告知您来到了这里，我们正在搜集更多前线报告，英克雷军正在撤退，我们已获知他们的集结点的位置…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0601EF43] (ID) Quest : ([0900837B]DLC03BS00) DLC03 Transition Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03bs00_dlc03transitiont_000092c5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: RadioGNRPlayerExploitsDLC03BS1
Look Lyons, I love you guys, you know I do, but your tin soldiers better get these Enclave assholes in check, once and for all, or we're all screwed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瞧里昂，我爱你们,但你的铁管士兵最好彻底地把这些英克雷混蛋消灭，或者我们一起完蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to 0
Brothers of Steel, what's the deal? If Prime can go down, what about the rest of us? Are we sitting ducks for some kind of new Enclave terror?
ESP.TRADUIT: 钢铁兄弟会，怎么回事?我们其他人呢?难道我们是某种英克雷恐怖打击的靶子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
The Enclave are supposedly beaten, bruised, and on the run, but they have the firepower capable of destroying a 100-foot tall robot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 英克雷被打败了,伤残了，在逃跑，除此之外他们有火力可以摧毁100英尺高的机器人吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
No, I'm not really sure how, cause yeah, it would take a hell of weapon to take out that gigantic G.I. And that's what worries me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,我不太清楚原因,那需要巨大的地狱般的武器,那就是我担心的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
That's right, children, I have received word that Liberty Prime, the Brotherhood of Steel's super duper super robot, has been killed. By the Enclave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，孩子，我收到消息我们钢铁兄弟会的超级机器人已经被英克雷摧毁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
This grunt stands 100 feet tall, is made of some kind of metal alloy, and slings nukes like a quarterback chucks footballs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这100英尺高的机器，是由某种合金和核动力系统组成的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
Now imagine the tragic and untimely demise of the most amazing American hero the Capital Wasteland has ever seen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在想象首都废土竟然能见到最令人惊讶的美国英雄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
It's always a sad day when a soldier falls in the line of battle. And the greater the soldier, the deeper the grief.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当一名士兵阵亡，总是让人难过。特别是一个伟大的士兵，更让人悲伤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
If there's one thing I wish I could find out there in the rubble, it's a working bugle, cause Three Dog wants to play some Taps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果可能我真希望我能在战场的瓦砾堆中找到，它是一个工作的号角,就是三狗所说的那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b48_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
RadioGNRPlayerExploitsDLC03BS2
Don't you worry children. Three Dog's got his ear to the ground and his mic on standby. As soon as I know more, you'll know more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心,孩子。三狗有他的耳朵在,他的麦克风整装待命。当我了解更多的情况,你就会知道更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to 0
And does this have something to do with the shinies from the Brotherhood of Steel, who seem poised to pounce once again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且闪耀的钢铁兄弟会，已经再一次做好了迎接战斗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
Just what is she up to? Is the kid looking for something to use for the Enclave, or against them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 她在做什么？这小子在为英克雷做某些事，还是反对他们?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
Just what is he up to? Is the kid looking for something to use for the Enclave, or against them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在做什么？这小子在为英克雷做某些事，还是反对他们?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
My flies on the wall tell me that 101 was seen dodging Deathclaws and gathering up as much used tech as she could carry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的探子告诉我在101附近看到有死亡爪被广泛收集然后搬走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
My flies on the wall tell me that 101 was seen dodging Deathclaws and gathering up as much used tech as he could carry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的探子告诉我在101附近看到有死亡爪被广泛收集然后搬走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
But wouldn't you know it, that kid from Vault 101 has once again proven the exception to the rule.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们不知道,那孩子从101避难所出来也再一次证明了事情也有例外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b2a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
Lucky he made it out alive. Most people don't. At least not in one piece.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸运的活着完整出来。绝大多数人都做不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b2b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
I met a guy once, name was Johnny 12 Fingers, had one arm. Turns out the other one was ripped off while he was scavving in Deathclaw central.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以前见过有个人,名字是强尼12,有一把武器。结果被人宰了扔在死亡爪中心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b2c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
Ah, but you locals, you know the place. Am I right? It's become a veritable Wasteland legend. Why? Cause it's filled with goddamned Deathclaws!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊,但是你，当地人,你知道这个地方。我说的对吗?这使它成为一种废土传说。为什么?因为这充满了该死的死亡爪!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b2d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
There's one place you find on a tourist map of D.C. and it's lovely suburbs, and that's the cozy little villa known as Old Olney.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一个地方特区旅游地图可以找到。在可爱的郊外,那是舒适的小镇被称为老奥尔良。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b2e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
RadioGNRPlayerExploitsDLC03BS3
And if you see that kid from Vault 101, pass along your thanks, cause the Brotherhood did NOT act alone. Thank you 101!
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且你知道101小子，感谢有你，让兄弟会没有孤单行动。谢谢你101 !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b6e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to 0
So if you see some Enclave rejects wandering around, have pity! They're homeless, after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此,如果你看到一些英克雷残兵四处乱跑,别遗憾!他们无家可归。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b6f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
Children, I am pleased to announce that the beautiful Brotherhood has mangled the last base those Enclave bastards had left!
ESP.TRADUIT: 孩子们,我很高兴宣布经过兄弟会漂亮的最后一击那些英克雷杂种已经完蛋了!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b70_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
Now, the Brotherhood of Steel may have taken care of those losers back at that new-fangled faucet called Project Purity. But they weren't done!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在,钢铁兄弟会,也许得到了净水工程。但是他们还没有成功!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b71_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
Man, I thought that blow-hard Eden was just a pre-recorded pain-in-my-ass. That was before devil-headed stormtroopers moved into the neighborhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，我认为伊甸总统只是一些事前录制好的声音和图像放在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b72_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
We've had our share o' problems here in beautiful Washington D.C., but did any of us really see those Enclave idiots coming?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们经历了很多问题在这美丽的华盛顿特区，但为什么我们就应该让那些英克雷白痴来管理？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
Why, 101? Why has it come to this? Children, pray for the soul of that lone wanderer, and pray for the rest of us too, while you're at it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么,101小子?为什么它变成这样呢?孩子,孤独的流浪者,祈求神灵,并祈求还有别的,当你在看着它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b74_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to 0
It's a dark day for us all, when someone sees fit to destroy the only guys standing between us and complete obliteration.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个黑暗的日子对我们所有人来说,当有人认为合适的唯一的人挡在消灭我们的东西面前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
And, my sources tell me, this is the same hail of hellfire that destroyed Liberty Prime himself. Looks like an Enclave super weapon at work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而我的来源告诉我,这有冰雹般的地狱之火破坏了“自由先锋”号。看上去像是英克雷超级武器所为。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b76_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
As reported by loads of people around the Capital Wasteland, missiles rained down from the sky and left the Citadel a big smoking crater.
ESP.TRADUIT: 报告说首都周围废土,导弹飞射,从天空把大本营打成一个巨大的云团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
Wrong, my children. So very wrong. I really can't believe I'm saying this, but the concrete casa of those shiny guys with big guns has gone kablooey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 糟了,我的孩子们。非常糟糕。我真不敢相信我的话,但是各位朋友，钢筋混凝土的大炮已经损坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
But that would be impossible, right? Nobody would have the power, the opportunity, or the giant gorilla-sized balls to destroy the Citadel. Right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这是不可能的,是吧?没有人会有这种能力,没有巨人般可以破坏大本营。是吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
Not too long ago, I saw a big boom from my bedroom, in the direction of that bastion of neo-knightly badassness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不久前，我在我房间里听到一阵巨大的隆隆声开向骑士们的堡垒，真混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrplayere_00008b7a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitVar + 1 )
RadioGNRNewsStoryGenericDLC031A
So get your glasses ready, children. This round's on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以把你的杯子准备好了,孩子们。这次我请客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrnewssto_00008b3a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar to 0
As I speak, the Brotherhood is working with Rivet City security to get that fresh water to the Wasteland. The caravans are coming!
ESP.TRADUIT: 听我说,兄弟会正在与铆钉城市保安把那些淡水送到废土。小篷车就来了!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrnewssto_00008b3b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar + 1 )
God, ain't that beautiful? But even better, it's finally happened! The water is clean, and hell yes, it's free! Just a little patience, children.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天,不漂亮吗?但更重要的,最后成真了!水是干净和无害的,它是免费的!只要有点耐心,孩子们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrnewssto_00008b3c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar + 1 )
See, she was a scientist too, worked on that project. You know what she wanted? "The waters of life. Free and clean, for any and all."
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，她也是科学家,参与那项目。你知道她的想法吗?“生命之水。干净的免费的,给所有的人。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrnewssto_00008b3d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar + 1 )
Now you all remember James, right? Father of 101? Well, Three Dog has learned that back in the day, James' wife had a dream.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你记住詹姆斯,好吗?101小子的父亲?嗯,三狗在以前已经认识了,詹姆斯的妻子的梦想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrnewssto_00008b3e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar + 1 )
Two weeks. It's been two weeks since our boys in Power Armor kicked those Enclave bastards out of Project Purity, and started that baby chugging.
ESP.TRADUIT: 两个星期。已经两周了我们的孩子在那些穿电力盔甲的英克雷混蛋手里抢回净水工程后，开始了新生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrnewssto_00008b3f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar + 1 )
RadioGNRNewsStoryGenericDLC031B
Three Dog's advice? If you've got one of those Mister Dandy butler bots, have him make you some purified water, and count yourself lucky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 三狗的建议吗?如果你能让那些上等人或管理者给你些纯水,算你走运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrnewssto_00008b33_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar to 0
The water going 'round may be free, but it sure as hell ain't clean. So when you see that caravan comin', tell 'em to keep on going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 水可以免费的拿，但是这样是不道德的。所以当你看到运水队，一定要付点什么才让他们走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrnewssto_00008b34_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar + 1 )
Coincidence? Three Dog thinks not. For all their good intentions, it looks like those eggheads at the Jefferson Memorial screwed up royally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 巧合吗?三狗的想法,不是。因为他们的善意,它看起来像那些有知识的人在杰佛逊纪念堂搞砸了很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrnewssto_00008b35_1.ogg
