ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar + 1 )
It also happens that this new illness ONLY started showin' up AFTER the Brotherhood started distributing so-called "clean" water from that purifier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在发生这种新疾病后才开始关心调查研究水净化器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrnewssto_00008b36_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar + 1 )
Experience would tell ya this is your garden variety radiation sickness, but nuh uh. This is something else, children. Something worse. Much worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 经验告诉你这是多种多样的辐射病。这是别的什么东西,孩子们。更大的灾难。更糟了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrnewssto_00008b37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar + 1 )
People are gettin' sick. Sicker than usual, I mean. Weakness, nausea, you name it. Even a couple of deaths reported.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人是肯定病了。往常一样,我是说。软弱,恶心,就是这样。甚至有了死亡病例。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrnewssto_00008b38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar + 1 )
All righty, children, time to let you know about yet another problem plaguing our tranquil little post-apocalyptic neighborhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,孩子们,时间让你知道另一问题新的瘟疫出现在启示录之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrnewssto_00008b39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar + 1 )
RadioGNRNewsStoryGenericDLC032
The Enclave's been responsible for enough death and destruction. We need to get back to normal. You know, like fighting Raiders and Super Mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有太多的死亡和破坏了。我们需要回到正常的生活。你知道，如同抵抗歹徒和超级变种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrnewssto_00008b1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar to 0
You know, some laser beams here, a few exploded corpses there. Let's just hope this mop up operation ends ASAP.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道,一些雷射光束闪过,一些尸体被分解。我们希望尽快完成操作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrnewssto_00008b1e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar + 1 )
But the fight, dear children, did not end there. The Brotherhood has been pursuing "President" Eden's little minions throughout the Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是这样战斗,亲爱的孩子们,并没有到此为止。兄弟会还在废土追缴伊甸总统的一些走狗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrnewssto_00008b1f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar + 1 )
It's been some time since those plucky paladins in Power Armor first stormed the Jefferson Memorial and gave the Enclave their walking papers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 未来一段时间，因为那一群勇敢的骑士在杰佛逊纪念堂，把穿电力装甲的英克雷赶走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602248B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquethreedog\radiogalax_radiognrnewssto_00008b20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar to ( RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.NewsStoryVar + 1 )
DLC03BS3PilotTalkGoodEnd02
Strap yourself in, we're headed back to the Citadel. Elder Lyons wants to speak to you when we touch down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 系好安全带，我要回大本营了。到时候里昂斯长老要和你谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [09005C55] (ID) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3pilottalk_00008bb3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03BS3PilotTalkBadEnd04
There must be a malfunction or some trouble over there. We're going to head right over and see what's going on. Hang on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 肯定是故障，或者是出了事情。我们去那里看看到底是什么情况。坚持住。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [09005C42] (ID) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3pilottalk_00008bb2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03BS3PilotTalkBadEnd03
Lemme try this... Citadel Control, come in. This is Pride One. Citadel Control, where the heck are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是勒米…五角大本营控制台，请回答。这里是“骄傲”小队。五角大本营控制台，人他妈的都去哪了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [09005C42] (ID) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3pilottalk_00008bb0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03BS3PilotTalkBadEnd02
What the hell's wrong with the equipment on this flying junk pile?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的，这架破飞行器上的设备出了什么问题？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [09005C42] (ID) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3pilottalk_00008baf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03BS3PilotTalkBadEnd01
Citadel Control, this is Pride One... Citadel Control, come in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 五角大本营控制台，这里是“骄傲”小队，…五角大本营控制台，请回答。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [09005C42] (ID) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3pilottalk_00008bb1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03BS3PilotTalkGoodEnd01
Hang on, I'm going to set this bird down near the control tower so we can watch the fireworks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坚持住，我要把飞鸟降落在控制塔附近，这样我们就能看看这场烟火大会了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [09005C3F] (ID) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3pilottalk_00008bae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03BS3PilotTalkOutSideCitadel01
I've got to ask... why am I going through the Presidential Metro alone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要问一下…为什么我要一个人穿过总统专用地铁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to send you in one way, and the bulk of our guys in another.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要让你走某条路，而我们的大部分战士会走另外一条。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tltristan_00008c8f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Elder Lyons wants the Enclave to fall for the distraction and look the other way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里昂斯长老想要引开英克雷的注意力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tltristan_00008c8f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless I miss my guess, the Enclave will have a sizable force at the airbase and you'll need all the covering fire you can get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非是我猜错了，不然英克雷肯定在空军基地有大部队，你必须准备好尽可能大的火力覆盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tltristan_00008c8f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like I'm walking into the airbase blind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来像是叫我盲目的冲进空军基地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry about it. I wouldn't send you on some sort of suicide mission without some intelligence to back it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你别担心。我不会派你去执行某些没有事先准备的送死任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tltristan_00008c8e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just find the Resupply Crate. By then, we'll have scouted the place and can give you more detailed instructions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去找到补给品板条箱。到时候，我们会侦察整个区域，然后再给你详细知识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tltristan_00008c8e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, just be ready when you make your way topside... I'm sure you'll find plenty of action in the airbase.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你要去的时候务必做好准备…我敢肯定你会在空军基地里遇到大量的战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tltristan_00008c8e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I expect to find in the Presidential Metro?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在总统专用地铁里我该注意些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The best information we have is that the place still has an active automated security contingent. You should watch yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们知道隧道里面还有一个活动的自动防御小队。你要注意点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tltristan_00008c8d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure if the Enclave has a foothold in there or not, but I do know the metro tunnel should dump you right inside Adams Air Force Base.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定英克雷有没有在里面设置据点，不过这个地铁隧道能将你直接带到亚当空军基地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tltristan_00008c8d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about Split Jack's gang?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么看斯普利特·那帮人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What else can you tell me about the fight against the Enclave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于对抗英克雷的战斗，你还有什么能告诉我的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you know, I had my reservations about engaging the Enclave. They did not directly attack us, and I believed we had time. Time to be cautious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的，我在关于与英克雷交战的问题上还保留意见。他们不会直接攻击我们，我认为我们还有时间。是时候谨慎行事了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tlelderwh_00009438_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their assault on the purifier forced our hand. We had no choice but to engage them directly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们对净化器的袭击迫使我们动手。除了开战，我们别无他法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tlelderwh_00009438_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, once that engagement had begun, we could do nothing but see it through to the end. If they had not considered us a threat before, they do now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有就是战斗一打响，我们所能作的只有等待它的结束。如果他们之前没有把我们当成威胁的话，那现在他们该改变想法了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tlelderwh_00009438_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So we have spent the time since you and I last spoke systematically locating and destroying every bastion of Enclave force we can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从我们上次找出并摧毁英克雷的每一个堡垒之前已经有些时日了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tlelderwh_00009438_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Liberty Prime has proven far more successful than any of us could have hoped for.
ESP.TRADUIT: “自由先锋”已经证明我们能取得的成功远超出我们的期望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tlelderwh_00009438_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Directions to the Presidential Metro would be helpful, Tristan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你告诉我怎么去总统专用地铁就行了，特里斯坦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, it's a bit tricky to find, but you'll manage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，是不好找，但是你肯定能找到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tltristan_0000944c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to head into downtown D.C. and find the plaza in front of the ruins of the old White House building.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要去华盛顿特区，并找到白宫废墟前的广场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tltristan_0000944c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enter the utility sewer nearby and you'll find some connecting tunnels that should take you right into the heart of the Presidential Metro.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进入那附近的设备检修通道，穿过一些联络管道，你就能进入总统专用地铁的核心区域了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3tltristan_0000944c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll lend Officer Lepelletier a hand, but fees may be incurred.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会去帮莱佩莱捷警官的，不过这是要收费的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. Yes. Of course you'll be paid. Go see what she needs, lend a hand, take care of whatever their problem is, and you'll have your reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。当然。我们当然会付给你钱的。去看看她需要什么，帮把手，不论他们有什么问题只管搞定它，我们会奖励你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted but pleased EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrivetcityye_00009530_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQ01 1
I'll see what assistance I can offer Rivet City security.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我过去看看我能帮铆钉城警卫做点什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! Hopefully you can get them straightened out. We really can't do this without them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了！衷心希望你能把一切搞定。我们真的不能没有他们来干这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted but pleased to find an ally EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrivetcityye_00009531_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQ01 1
I'm not a fan of Rivet City or risking my life. Good luck with all that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是很喜欢铆钉城，我不会为此冒险。祝你好运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm starting to lose my patience with you. If you aren't here to help, then please: leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我快对你失去耐心了。如果你不是来这里帮忙的，那么请：离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : upset, exhausted EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrivetcityno_00009534_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.BigsleyAnnoyed to 2
As long as I get paid, you'll get your problem solved.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要我收到了报酬，你的问题就会解决。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course you'll be paid. Most of our assets have been exhausted by war with the Enclave. But I'm a resourceful fellow. Don't you worry about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然我们会付给你钱的。我们大部分的资源都因与英克雷的战争消耗殆尽了。但我自有办法。这点你就不用担心了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted but pleased EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqmegatonyesp_00009535_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get Megaton straightened out, and I assure you, you won't be disappointed by my, or rather, the Brotherhood's generosity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你把核弹镇的问题解决了，我向你保证，我，还有兄弟会的慷慨都不会令你失望的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted but pleased EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqmegatonyesp_00009535_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQ 2
I'm not going to help you with Megaton. I've got better things to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 核弹镇的事我不会帮你。我还有别的事要干。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a very busy man. I only have time for people who have time for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是个很忙的人。你只和我用得上的人谈话
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : upset, exhausted EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqmegatonno_0000952f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ.BigsleyAnnoyed to 2
I'll see what I can do about Megaton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会看看对核弹镇的事我能做些什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? That's great. I'm sorry I can't offer you any support in this. All our resources are tied up at the moment. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？太好了。不过很抱歉我没法对此给你更多的帮助。这阵子我们所有的补给都很紧张。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : (exhausted) an after thought EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqmegatonyes_00009532_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and of course I'll have a little something for your efforts if you're successful. Stay safe out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，当然，如果你成功了的话我们会给的努力提供点小小的回报。多加小心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : (exhausted) an after thought EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqmegatonyes_00009532_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQ 2
Let me ask you about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来问点其他事情吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: System ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 系统就绪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_dlc03metrodone_00009599_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03BS3TLMargotSelfPQ03
What's your job down here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这的功能是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My primary function is to maintain security for the Presidential Metro System and ensure the safety of all its passengers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的主要功能是控制总统专用地铁的安保和保证每一位乘客的安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_dlc03metrotlmar_00009590_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was installed and activated within the Presidential Metro on April 14th, 2065 and switched on at precisely 5:20am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我于2065年4月14日被安装于总统专用地铁内，启动时间是5时20分整。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_dlc03metrotlmar_00009590_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have been carrying out this primary function since that inception date.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自启动以来，我一直执行设定的主要功能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_dlc03metrotlmar_00009590_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What does your name stand for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的名字是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: M.A.R.Go.T. is an acronym for the Metro Authority Rapid Governmental Transit system.
ESP.TRADUIT: 玛格特是地铁管理局快速政府传输系统的简称。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_dlc03metrotlmar_00009591_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to ask some questions about you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想问些关于你的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Information is available on that subject. Please specify.
ESP.TRADUIT: 存在该主题的信息，请具体指明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_dlc03metrotlmar_00009598_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the current status of the Presidential Metro?
ESP.TRADUIT: 总统专用地铁现在时什么状况？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Currently, the Presidential Metro is running at 22 percent capacity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目前，总统专用地铁系统正在以22%的能力运行着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_dlc03metrotlmar_0000958f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only fully functional train line at the moment is the White House to Adams Air Force Base line.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目前唯一完全正常运行的是从白宫至亚当斯空军基地的线路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([0900817C]DLC03DialoguePresidentialMetro) DLC03 Presidential Metro Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03dialo_dlc03metrotlmar_0000958f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's going on with the purifier?
ESP.TRADUIT: 净水器怎么样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood has taken over control of the purifier, and is managing distribution of the water to the people of the Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会接管了净化器，并且正组织把水分发给废土的居民。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlpurifier_000097f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you travel there, speak with Scribe Bigsley. He's heading up the on-site operation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你到了那儿，与比格斯利文员聊聊。他正领导着现场的工程。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlpurifier_000097f7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was determined that the Brotherhood should directly oversee the purifier, so as to prevent any mishaps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无疑问兄弟会应该接管净化器，以防止它出意外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlpurifier_000097f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scribe Bigsley was placed in charge of the operation, and is directly overseeing our efforts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比格斯利文员受命负责整个工程，并且直接监管我们的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09002DC3]DLC03DialogueCitadel) 09002DC3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03dialo_dlc03tlpurifier_000097f8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03BS1RothchildMapLines
Now, did you have any other questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，你还有其他问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00009a3b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
EnablePlayerControls Set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to -1 ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
The team will move in, eliminate any opposition inside, and cut off their transmitter. Any relevant data should be brought back here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个小队会进入，清除里面所有的反抗，并切断他们的通讯。任何有关的数据都会被带回这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00009a3c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
Set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep + 1 ) ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
Prime's directive is to neutralize their defenses and create an entry point for the team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先是摧毁他们的防御并为小队制造进入点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00009a3d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
Set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep + 1 ) ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
Paladin Tristan is leading the team setting up a forward base in an old car tunnel near the site. Once he's settled, Liberty Prime will be deployed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 特里斯坦圣骑士正带领队伍在一条靠近目的地的旧汽车隧道里建造前线基地。一旦他完工，就会展开部署“自由先锋”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00009a3e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
Set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep + 1 ) ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
Our advance scouts have checked over the area, but no easy access to the facility was found. So we're making our own access point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们派出的斥侯已经侦察了这个地区，但没有找到取得那些设备的简单方法。所以我们要用我们的方式获取目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00009a3f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
Set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep + 1 ) ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
We isolated the transmissions and found their origin point; an old military installation in Rockland, to the southwest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们隔离了通讯并找到他们的发送点：在西南方，洛克兰得一个旧军事基地
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00009a40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
Set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep + 1 ) ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
Based on data and tech gathered from these locations, we've determined that the Enclave forces are still maintaining remote communications.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据这些地方收集来的数据和技术，我们可以确定那些英克雷力量仍然保持着远距离通信。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00009a41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
Set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep + 1 ) ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
Cut off from their leadership, it was expected that their forces would be in complete disarray. This has not been the case.
ESP.TRADUIT: 切断他们与领导层的联系，可想而知他们的部队会陷入混乱。但事实并非如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00009a42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
Set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep + 1 ) ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
Based on a combination of intelligence and field reports, other Enclave locations throughout the Wasteland were found.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据一系列的情报和战地报告，找到了废土上的其他英克雷基地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00009a43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
Set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep + 1 ) ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
After their defeat at the purifier, Liberty Prime was deployed to their main headquarters, here. It has been completely destroyed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在他们遭遇了净化器争夺战的失败之后，“自由先锋”被派往了这里，他们的总部。他们已经完全被消灭了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00009a44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
Set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep + 1 ) ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
Thanks to you, their main headquarters, here, was utterly destroyed. They then suffered a second defeat at the purifier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，他们在这里的主要成员，已经完全被消灭了。而他们在净化器争夺战上又遭遇了第二次失败。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00009a45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
Set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep + 1 ) ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
As you well know, this all began with the Enclave's occupation of Project Purity, here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也清楚，这些都始于英克雷将净水工程占为己有之后，就在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00009a46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
Set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep + 1 ) ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
I'll give you a brief history of what's happened over the last few weeks, and what's going on now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会给你一份简报，关于过去几星期发生的事件，以及现在正在开展的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothchild_00009a47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
Set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to ( DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep + 1 ) ScribeRothchildRef.Look Player
All I know is that you need my help. Again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只知道你又要找我帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It would seem that way, yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来还是那样，没错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothgreet_00009a3a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you would, please step over to the map. I'll give you a brief update on what you've missed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果可以，请到地图那里去。我会简单和你说说你错过的部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothgreet_00009a3a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to 2
He said you'd give me the details.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说你会告诉我细节。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, Owyn does have quite a bit on his mind lately, as I'm sure you can imagine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，最近欧文的思想负担确实很大，我知道你一定能想象得到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothgreet_00009a39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the first time the actions of the Brotherhood have affected him in such a... personal manner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是第一次，兄弟会的行动以那样的一种…私人方式影响到他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothgreet_00009a39_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, step over here. I'll bring you up to speed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请来这里。我会告诉你最新的进展。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothgreet_00009a39_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to 2
I've learned a little bit, but was hoping you could tell me more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经了解了一点，希望你能和我详细的讲讲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I believe I can. Step over here for a moment, will you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，可以。尽快来我这里，可以吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1rothgreet_00009a48_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC03BS1.DLC03RothStep to 2
DLC03StiggsWhyHelp
I've been trying to get outa here for awhile. See, I've done things for the Enclave.... Things I can't say I'm proud of, but a man's gotta eat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尝试离开这里已经有一段时间了。你也看到了我为英克雷做事…。这些事当然不怎么光彩，但是人总要吃饭啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03encla_dlc03stiggswhyh_00009acb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the Enclave picked me up, I was starving and suffering from radiation poisoning. I felt I owed them. But now... now it's time to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当年英克雷收留我的时候，我正饱受饥饿之苦和辐射的伤害。我觉得我欠他们的。但是现在…现在是时候离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll make a great distraction while I make off with a few robots and supplies. I help you, and you help me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你尽可能的吸引他们的注意力，而我去弄点补给和机器人。我们互帮互助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03encla_dlc03stiggswhyh_00009acb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage dlc03EnclaveBase 50
You're really helpful. Why should I trust you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你突然这么帮助我。我为什么要信任你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03StiggsAboutSatelite
Well, the Satellite Tower is right on top of the base. I'm sure you saw it before you came in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是这样的，卫星发射塔就在基地的顶层。我想你进来的时候看到它了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03encla_dlc03stiggsabou_00009ad0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to have to make it into the central control area before you get on top of the launch platform.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你到达平台的最顶上并向发射塔进发时，你可能会遇到一大批士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03encla_dlc03stiggsabou_00009ad0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you're on top of the platform, you're probably going to have to make your way past a bunch of soldiers before you get to the tower.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你到达平台的最顶上并向发射塔进发时，你可能会遇到一大批士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03encla_dlc03stiggsabou_00009ad0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do I get to the Satellite Tower?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该怎么去卫星发射塔呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03StiggsAboutMainframe
DLC03StiggsRoboXPert
Huh. It's nice to finally meet someone who knows what the heck I'm talking about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。终于遇见有人能听懂我说的话了，真他妈地棒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03encla_dlc03stiggsrobo_00009ac9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's actually a modified version of the V-29, but response/recall protocol is improved and the data transfer is much more secure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上它只是V-29的修改版，不过它的“响应/回复”协议改进了，数据的传输更加可靠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03encla_dlc03stiggsrobo_00009ac9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you got into the mainframe, you could control all of the robots in the facility!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你登入主机，你就可以控制这里所有的机器人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest

ESP.ORIGINAL: All of the robots are run off of a V-31 Mainframe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有的机器人都是由一台V-31的主机来控制的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03StiggsAboutRobots
DLC03StiggsAboutPast
DLC03StiggsAboutDefenses
Well, just above us is a deathclaw research facility. Most of the deathclaws are out fighting, but there might be one or two left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么说呢，就在我们上面的是用来研究死亡爪的设施。它们中的大部分正在外面厮杀，但是可能有一两只留在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03encla_dlc03stiggsabou_00009ac7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are also a bunch of robots in the facility, and they're all controlled through the mainframe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 设施内还有一大堆机器人，全部由中央电脑控制。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03encla_dlc03stiggsabou_00009ac7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are also some military types left but not nearly as many as there used to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 本来那儿还有很多军用型号的，但是已经不像以前那么多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03encla_dlc03stiggsabou_00009ac7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What type of defenses are upstairs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 上面有什么样的布防？

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03StiggsInfoPumpMean
Right. Well let's get down to it, then. Ask me anything you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，让我们直奔主题，你有什么问题？。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03encla_dlc03stiggsinfo_00009ac6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only reason you're still alive is because I want information.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你活着的唯一原因就是我还要点情报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03StiggsInfoPumpFriendly
Man, am I glad you realize I'm not one of the bad guys. I'll be happy to answer any questions you have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，我很高兴你明白了我不是个坏人。我很乐意回答你的任何问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03encla_dlc03stiggsinfo_00009ac5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Likewise. I was wondering if you could answer a few questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也很高兴见到你。不知道你能不能回答我几个问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03StiggsImNotGoingToHurtYou
Oh, thank goodness! I'm Stiggs. Nice to meet you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，感谢上帝！我是斯迪格斯。很高兴见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03encla_dlc03stiggsimno_00009aca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set dlc03EnclaveBase.StiggsState to 1
I wasn't planning on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可没打算动你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03StiggsYeahImGoingToHurtYou
Please! I never did anything to you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 求你了！我从没对你做过什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03encla_dlc03stiggsyeah_00009acf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03StiggsRef.startcombat player
Yeah, I'm going to hurt you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，我要杀了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03StiggsWhatAreYouDoing
I uh... work on the robots. I fix 'em up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…我是个摆弄机器人的。我负责修理它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03encla_dlc03stiggswhat_00009acc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw what you did before you got in the base. You're not going to hurt me are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道来这座基地前你都干了些什么。你不会伤害我吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03encla_dlc03stiggswhat_00009acc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing down here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EMBDClawUnresponsive
There's something jamming the control frequency!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有东西在干扰控制波频！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enclave Scientist [0900946A] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest Comment (NAM2) : This is said during combat. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegroupenclavedc\dlc03encla_dlc03embdclawun_00009ac4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03EMBReleaseDClaw
Releasing Deathclaw!
ESP.TRADUIT: 放出死亡爪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Enclave Scientist [0900944F] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest Comment (NAM2) : This is said during combat. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegroupenclavedc\dlc03encla_dlc03embrelease_00009ac8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03MargotDoor
DLC03BS3MargotHello
Warning. Unauthorized personnel will not be tolerated in the Presidential Metro. Please access this workstation and identify yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 警告！未经许可，任何人不得擅自闯入总统专用地铁。请登录此工作机台，确认你的身份。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : M.A.R.Go.T. [0900266C] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquemargot\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3margothel_00009b86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anything else I can do to help the Brotherhood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还能帮兄弟会什么忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, yes indeed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，没错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbosjob_00009f91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe Paladin Tristan and Scribe Rothchild can enlighten you with a myriad of ways you can assist us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信特里斯坦圣骑士和文员罗斯查德可以告诉你，有什么事情你能帮助我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbosjob_00009f91_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad to see even after all you've been through you're still willing to lend a hand. That's the mark of a noble member of the Brotherhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴即使是经历了这些，你仍然愿意帮助我们。这是作为兄弟会一位高尚成员的完美体现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbosjob_00009f91_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, yes actually. If you're still up for it, I could always use a hand with my next assignment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，没错。如果你还乐意，我的下一个任务的确需要帮手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbosjob_00009f92_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Super Mutants are still a major problem in the Capital Wasteland and one of our primary missions is to cleanse this place of their stink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 超级变种人仍然是华盛顿废土的主要威胁，我们的一大主要任务便是把它们清理干净。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbosjob_00009f92_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I need you to do is to thin their numbers. You see one, you put a bullet into its head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你做的，就是减少他们的数量。看到一个，就毙一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbosjob_00009f92_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm outfitting your Pip-Boy with the same blood sampling device we usually give our Scouts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会给你的哔哔小子装上于我们的巡逻队配备相同的血样分析仪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbosjob_00009f92_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After you kill a Mutant, grab a sample from its corpse and bring it here. I'll see you're properly compensated for your ammo expenditure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每杀一个变种人，就取一份血样回来。我给你弹药补给。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbosjob_00009f92_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03BloodSampleChance to 0
Just keep wiping out those Super Mutants and you'll be helping plenty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要坚持清除他们，你就是帮了我们的大忙了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbosjob_00009f93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah... actually, I think Rothchild is looking for stuff to rebuild Liberty Prime. You should ask him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃…实际上，我记得罗斯查德好像在找重建“自由先锋”的材料。你可以问问他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbosjob_0000ad8f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, yes please. Your help would be most welcome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好，我们欢迎你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbosjob_0000ad90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you know, my main task is the reconstruction of Liberty Prime. A daunting task indeed, given his current state.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正如所见，你的主要任务就是重组“自由先锋”。鉴于他目前的状态，这是一个艰巨的任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbosjob_0000ad90_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To get him back on his feet will take not only a good deal of scavenged parts, but I need some special items for his complex systems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要让他重新站起来，你不仅仅需要大量的材料部件，还需要一些特殊的玩意，因为他的系统太复杂了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbosjob_0000ad90_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In your travels, be on the lookout for sensor modules. That will help me with restoring his electrical components.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在旅行中，你可以注意收集那些传感器模块。这可以帮助我修复他的电子元件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbosjob_0000ad90_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But what I need most are old cameras. Prime's optics were completely destroyed in the explosion and I can use the components inside to replace them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我最急需的是老式的照相机。先锋的光学设备完全被炸损了，我可以拆掉照相机，替换坏掉的元件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbosjob_0000ad90_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03Cams to 1 set DLC03Sensor to 1
Remember, I'm looking for sensor modules and cameras. Bring them back here if you discover any.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住了，我要的是传感器模组和照相机。如果你找到，就带给我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbosjob_0000ae64_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the Pride's got the downtown area pretty well covered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，先锋使得市中心地区很安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbosjob_0000ae65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may want to talk to Paladin Tristan or Scribe Rothchild. They may have something for you to do. Good luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以找特里斯坦圣骑士和文员罗斯查德谈谈，他们也许有什么事情让你帮忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbosjob_0000ae65_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what happens to the Brotherhood now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会下一步怎么走？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although we've all but eradicated the Enclave, many difficult paths still stretch out before us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管我们几乎消灭了英克雷，但是摆在我们面前的困难还有很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbrothe_00009f8f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Wasteland is still rife with peril, and I intend to dedicate the Brotherhood to maintaining it in a peaceful state.
ESP.TRADUIT: 废土依然遍布着危险，我希望指引兄弟会维护这里的和平状态。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbrothe_00009f8f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hold out high hopes for you; that you'll still wish to be a part of our future and help us in our struggles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对你的期望很高；你仍然对我们的未来以及我们的奋斗存有愿景。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbrothe_00009f8f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the Enclave might not be a threat anymore, but we're not done by a long shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，英克雷也许不构成威胁了，但是我们依然任重道远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbrothe_00009f90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've still got Muties crawling all over the ruins like rats and they're multiplying every day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 变种人仍然像耗子一样在废土乱窜，他们的数量几乎每天都在成倍增长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbrothe_00009f90_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's no picnic keeping their numbers down, but that's our job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 减少他们的数量并不是容易的事情，但那是我们的职责。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbrothe_00009f90_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been amazingly busy ever since we began clashing with the Enclave. All their technology is amazing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从和英克雷冲突以来，我一直忙得昏天黑地的。他们的技术令人目眩神驰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbrothe_0000a0f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's going to take me years to sift through the wreckage of their mobile platform alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 光是他们的移动平台废墟就够我们研究几年了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbrothe_0000a0f0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose we have you to thank for that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这都归功于你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbrothe_0000a0f0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you think this means the Pride has nothing to do anymore, you're crazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你以为以后先锋就没有用武之地了，那就大错特错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbrothe_0000a0f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've still got the damn Frankensteins crawling all over D.C. and Rothchild's got us picking up every blinking gizmo from here to Virginia.
ESP.TRADUIT: 华盛顿还有好多丑陋的怪物，罗斯查德还忙着把这里的设备开始运往弗吉尼亚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbrothe_0000a0f1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quite a bit of work cut out for us, eh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 以后有的忙咯，唉？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbrothe_0000a0f1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now? Now the real work begins.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在？现在，有些工作才刚刚开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbrothe_0000a0f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got just piles and piles of Enclave technology to take apart and put back together. Who do you think got our captured Vertibird flying?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得到了不计其数的英克雷技术，需要研究如何把它们拆分再装配起来。你觉得我们让这个缴获的飞鸟再飞起来怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbrothe_0000a0f2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now let me get back to work before Rothchild assigns me trash detail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在要去忙了，罗斯查德还要告诉我那些该死的数据细节。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlbrothe_0000a0f2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03BS3PilotTalkGoodEnd02a
Don't worry about the remainder of the Enclave forces, we'll mop up the rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心英克雷的余党，剩下的我们会搞定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [09005C55] (ID) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3pilottalk_0000a0ef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03BS3PilotTalkGoodEnd01a
Should be a hell of a show.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的肯定很好看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [09005C3F] (ID) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult05dc\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3pilottalk_0000a0f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got blood samples to turn in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我带回了些血样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good job. I'll inform Lyons of your progress.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得漂亮。我会告诉里昂斯你所做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlblood_0000a0f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03PostQuest.DLC03PQGoBlood to 1
Fantastic. I'll get the Scribes to record your kills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 难以想象。我会让文员们记录下你的杀敌数量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlblood_0000a0f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03PostQuest.DLC03PQGoBlood to 1
Nice work. Come back when you have more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得不错。如果你取得了更多的就回来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlblood_0000a0f6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03PostQuest.DLC03PQGoBlood to 1
Great! Keep them coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了！请再给我多带一些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlblood_0000a0f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03PostQuest.DLC03PQGoBlood to 1
How is Liberty Prime holding up?
ESP.TRADUIT: “自由先锋”现在怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Performance is exceeding all our expectations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进展超出我们所有人的期望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tlrothchi_0000a0fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's been especially effective against the Enclave's Vertibirds, for which we previously had no counter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在对付英克雷的飞鸟上非常有效，这是我们以前从未有过的筹码。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tlrothchi_0000a0fb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're fine-tuning his programming as we go, but on the whole I'm pleasantly surprised.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一边开展工作一边调整他的程序，不过大体上进度上让我感到十分惊喜
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tlrothchi_0000a0fb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's as I always suspected. Prime's real issue was energy management, and when Doctor Li helped us solve that problem, well, the rest was easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和我一直猜想的一样。真正的问题在于能源管理，而当李博士帮我们解决这个问题之后，嗯，剩下的就简单了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1tlrothchi_0000a0fb_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03StiggsWhereMainframe
Well, you'll want to get to the floor above, and then make your way to the middle. That's where the mainframe is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样，你先要进入上面的一层，然后找到中层。中央电脑就在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03encla_dlc03stiggswher_0000a62f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So where exactly is the mainframe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么主机具体在什么位置？

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03AudioBoSOrders
This is Paladin Tristan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是特里斯坦圣骑士
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03audio_dlc03audiobosor_0000a674_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're listening to this, then you've made it through the Presidential Metro and Adams Air Force Base is all that stands in your way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你听下这个，那你就能成功通过阻挡在你面前的，也就是唯一剩下的总统专用地铁以及亚当斯空军基地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03audio_dlc03audiobosor_0000a674_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our scouts report that the fire controls for the orbital missile satellite are located in the main tower of the Enclave Mobile Platform.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的斥候报告说轨道飞弹卫星的火力控制位于英克雷移动平台的主塔里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03audio_dlc03audiobosor_0000a674_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only way into the platform is by way of a ramp that lowers from a watch post the Enclave set up in the old air traffic control tower.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一进入平台的方法是从哨所下面的坡道走，这个哨所位于英克雷的旧空中交通控制塔中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03audio_dlc03audiobosor_0000a674_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you opened the crate it triggered a beacon. We'll pick up the signal and start the assault to cover your entry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你打开板条箱时会触发一个信号。我们接到信号后会开始袭击，以掩护你进入。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03audio_dlc03audiobosor_0000a674_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck, and Godspeed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运，一路顺风。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03audio_dlc03audiobosor_0000a674_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not in the mood for a long story. Never mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我今天可不想听什么长篇故事。算了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted. dismissive. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleybnev_0000a96e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm interested. Continue...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很感兴趣。继续……

ESP.ORIGINAL: I started out in the Swords. I upped the output of a few Laser Rifles. Apparently some initiates couldn't handle the extra power. A few got hurt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我首先从武器开始。我增强了几把镭射补强的能量输出。很显然有些新兵还适应不了这个修改。有些人因此受了伤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted (sarcastically reliving unpleasant memories)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I joined the Shields. Bowditch wasn't all that pleased with me proving him and his theories on forcefield resonance were a bit "antiquated."
ESP.TRADUIT: 之后我开始改进护盾。鲍蒂奇对于我的出现有些恼火，因为我证明他和他那套关于矢量场共振的理论有点"过时了"。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted (sarcastically reliving unpleasant memories) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleybcon_0000a972_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I found myself among the Quills. Jameson refuses to accept any fact that conflicts with her rose colored optimistic views.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接着我发现自己进退两难。詹姆森拒绝接受任何与他过于乐观的想法相悖的观点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted (sarcastically reliving unpleasant memories) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleybcon_0000a972_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She likes to assign "contradictory" personalities to "field operations." Take for example myself here, or Yearling, exiled to that accursed library.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他喜欢安排些性格"自相矛盾"的人来进行"战地操作。"比如把握弄到这里，或者像伊尔琳，被发配到了那座该死的图书馆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted (sarcastically reliving unpleasant memories) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleybcon_0000a972_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I used to think Rothchild and I were on the same page. Turns out he's happy to blindly follow the old man's orders like the rest of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以前以为罗斯查德和我意见是一类人。可他现在却变成和其他人一样，对那些老家伙的命令一味盲从。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted (sarcastically reliving unpleasant memories) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleybcon_0000a972_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all I was curious about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道这些就够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Sigh.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <叹气。>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleytopl_0000a96c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your take on Elder Lyons?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得里昂斯长老如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's probably best if I don't answer that question.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最好还是不要回答这个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted, frustrated EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleylyon_0000a970_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look pretty tired.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来很累啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I literally can't remember the last time I got sleep... I must have dozed off recently though, if the drool on my desk is any indication. <Sigh.>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我都忘了上次睡觉是什么时候的事了……不过从桌子上的口水来看，我一定是打过瞌睡了<叹气。>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted, but trying to make a joke

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what Order of Scribes are you part of?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是在文员的哪个部门工作的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah... that's a long story actually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的……实际上说来话长啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted (sarcastically reliving unpleasant memories) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyorde_0000a96f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So how'd you get stuck with this job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 工作上碰到了什么棘手的问题了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I follow orders, but I'm not exactly a "yes man." I figure a Scribe's job is to find the devil in the details. Consequently I seldom get promoted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我服从命令，但我绝不是一只"跟屁虫。" 我认为一个文员的工作就是发现隐藏在细节中的危险。这让我很少获得晋升。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted, and feeling betrayed EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyjob_00006527_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think Elder Lyons finally had his fill of people questioning him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得里昂斯长老最终导致他的人民对他产生质疑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted, and feeling betrayed EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyjob_00006527_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And while Scribe Rothchild and I usually see eye to eye on things... it's apparently time to set an example for those who ask too many questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而与此同时文员罗斯查德和我经常能够想到一块去……显然是时候给那些一直有问题要问的人做个榜样了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted, and feeling betrayed EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqbigsleyjob_00006527_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where's Doctor Li?
ESP.TRADUIT: 李博士去哪了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tch. She apparently decided to pursue "more interesting projects" up north in the Commonwealth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很显然她为了寻求"更多感兴趣的工程"而去了北面的联邦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and sarcastic EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqaboutdrli_0000a973_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The real reason is that she couldn't handle us Scribes "improving" upon her work. She's the kind of woman who needs to be in charge of EVERYTHING.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说到底是因为她无法忍受我们文员对她的工作进行"改进"。他是那种什么事都要自己说了算的女人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and sarcastic EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqaboutdrli_0000a973_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck to her out there in the Wasteland; it's a long walk to the Commonwealth. Can't say she'll be missed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 愿她在废土中好运; 到达联邦的路途很遥远。说不清她是否能到达那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and sarcastic EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqaboutdrli_0000a973_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's discuss some other matters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来说点别的吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Sigh.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <叹气。>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqabouttoplev_0000a96d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was going to ask you something but I forgot what it was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我忘了我要问你什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, well, when you remember what it was you were going to ask. Take it up with one of the other Scribes, okay? Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，好吧，等你记起来你要问什么的时候。去问问其他的文员吧，好吗？谢谢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and done with fools EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqaboutforgot_0000376c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it hard bottling all that water? Or is it all done by machines?
ESP.TRADUIT: 把所有的水装瓶很困难？还是说让机器完成所有工序？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You take a bottle, you dunk it under water, and glug glug glug, it fills up. Amazing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你拿个瓶子放到水下，咕噜咕噜咕噜，装满了。神奇吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqaboutmachin_0000376b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you're right a machine would help. But all the Scribes are busy reverse engineering Enclave gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然有台机器能帮不少忙。可是现在所有的文员都忙着研究英克雷的装备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqaboutmachin_0000376b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A machine that puts water in bottles just isn't on anyone's priority list at the moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在没人愿意费事弄出一台用来把水装瓶的机器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqaboutmachin_0000376b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever think about letting people bring in empty bottles to fill up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有没想过让大家带空瓶子来装水？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure you can imagine the chaos if we just let anyone who wanted to wade into the basin and fill up a jug?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢肯定你能想象如果我们让任何想要水的人来到池子边用水罐来装水的话，那会有多混乱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqaboutbottle_00006526_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Frankly, there just isn't the time or resources to deal with that crowd control nightmare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坦白和你说吧，现在还不是时候，我们还没有能力对抗那操控人心的梦魇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqaboutbottle_00006526_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03WQAboutAquaPuraB
I don't think anyone really knows the answer to that. Seems to be going rather quickly though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为没有人真正知道这个问题的答案。不过进展很顺利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted

ESP.ORIGINAL: How long do you think it'll take to purify the basin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得要多久才能彻底净化整个池子？

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03WQAboutAquaPuraA
Umm... because it's not irradiated. Really? You couldn't work that one out for yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯……因为它没有辐射。你连这个都不知道？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : sarcastic, exhausted and done with fools EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqaboutnamed_00003769_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So do you know why they call it Aqua Pura?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道为什么要叫它纯净水吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's the reconstruction of Liberty Prime going?
ESP.TRADUIT: “自由先锋”重建的怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have so much to do putting him back together again. I'm uncertain as to how long it might take. Months? Years?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要让这玩意再次运转起来，我们还有很多事情要做啊。我不知道要多久？几个月？几年？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlprime_0000ad8d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only bright side in this is an opportunity to try and rebuild Prime from the ground up; make improvements on his original design.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一让人兴奋的是，这是一次彻底从头再建先锋的机会，能使其在原有的基础上获得能力提升。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlprime_0000ad8d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If only we hadn't exhausted so many of our supplies fighting the Enclave...
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是我们与英克雷交锋的时候没有用光所有的材料，那该多好啊…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlprime_0000ad8d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't even get me started...
ESP.TRADUIT: 别让我谈这个…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlprime_0000ad8e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trying to decipher Rothchild's schematics and wiring diagrams is exhausting. But we'll get there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 破解罗斯查德给的图纸并重写线路图真是要命的活。但是能完成的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlprime_0000ad8e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like Rothchild says, "Liberty Prime will walk again!" I believe him, but I think it's going to take a really long time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像罗斯查德说的，“自由先锋会站起来的！”我相信，但这需要很长的时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlprime_0000ad8e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03WQGriffonHintKarma
Yeah, you don't seem like the goody-goody type. But don't spread this around: So this ghoul, Griffon, comes in wanting to PURCHASE a bunch of water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你也不像是个虚伪的人。别把这事说出去了: 那个僵尸，格里芬，经常来这儿买水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : pleased with his arrangement EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgriffonhint_0000ad8a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell does that droopy irradiated fool need with pure water? Thinks he can sell it in Underworld. Moron.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个快腐烂的傻瓜要这么多净水干嘛？他以为他能在地下城卖掉这些水。蠢货。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : pleased with his arrangement EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgriffonhint_0000ad8a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, he's the only one who's offered to PAY for water, in caps AND technology.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，只有他愿意用瓶盖或是科技来换水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : pleased with his arrangement EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgriffonhint_0000ad8a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what Lyons doesn't know won't hurt him. There's plenty of water to go around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里昂斯虽然不知道，但这对他没什么危害。这儿还有好多水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : pleased with his arrangement EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgriffonhint_0000ad8a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I can use it to pay Rivet City to provide security for all the caravans we can't escort ourselves. I'm lucky he came along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还能用他给的钱让铆钉城的警力保护我们的商队。他来找我可是我的运气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : pleased with his arrangement EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgriffonhint_0000ad8a_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Topic Added in DLC03WQSellWater
setStage DLC03WQ 3
I know you've got something set up. Don't worry, I won't tell your superiors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你正在偷偷的干些什么。别担心，我不会告诉你上司的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, it's not that I don't trust you. I know you're trustworthy... but see, that's just it. I don't think you're capable of discretion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，不是我不信任你。我知道你值得信任……但仅此而已。我觉得你不够谨慎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and not going to confide in the player EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgriffonhint_0000ad8b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing immoral is going on, but I'm already in a lot of hot water with the Brotherhood. I need to be careful with what I say and to whom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里面没有什么不道德的事，但是我和兄弟会的麻烦已经够多了。我说话可得小心点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted and not going to confide in the player EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqgriffonhint_0000ad8b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Topic Added in DLC03WQSellWater
I know you've got something set up. Don't worry, I won't tell your superiors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你正在偷偷的干些什么。别担心，我不会告诉你上司的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's next for the Pride?
ESP.TRADUIT: “骄傲”接下来要干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Father is sending us into D.C. to scour the ruins and try and cleanse it of Super Mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 父亲派我们去华盛顿的废墟里清除那些超级变种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlpride_0000ae85_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's calling it "our next great obstacle." Sometimes I wish we could just take a rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他称其为“我们下一个最大的障碍”。有时候，我希望我们能歇一会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlpride_0000ae85_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I have to keep a stiff upper lip and help the machine run smoothly, so that's what I'm going to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我还是得坚持下去，确保机器人运转正常，所以这是我要做的事情。
