ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlpride_0000ae85_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, have we totally wiped out the Enclave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们彻底清除英克雷了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nah. There'll be stragglers and patrols still wandering the Wasteland. They won't know what happened at Adams probably for months.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。废土还有很多零散的士兵和巡逻队，他们几个月内都不会知道亚当斯基地发生了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlenclav_0000ae6e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One thing I can tell you is they'll still shoot you on sight... so watch yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以肯定的一点是，他们看到你的话，还是会开枪的…所以，当心点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Tristan [09005686] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03maleuniquetristan\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlenclav_0000ae6e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It would be naive of me to assume the Enclave threat is completely eradicated from our future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果以为英克雷的势力已经被彻底消灭了，那就太天真了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlenclav_0000ae6f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With their resources and advanced mobility, I wouldn't be surprised if we see them return to the Capital Wasteland one day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于他们掌握了资源和先进的机动性，如果未来有一天发现他们又重返在华盛顿，也不足为奇吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Lyons [060156E4] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniqueelderlyons\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlenclav_0000ae6f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, for a while at least. You'll still bump into a few of them in the Wastes... deep scout patrols and outposts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，至少能清净一阵子。你可能还会在废土遇到一两个散兵…可能会是巡逻得比较远的哨兵和前哨部队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlenclav_0000ae70_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hopefully, they'll stay far from here and let us do our job now that we kicked their butts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这次赶走了他们后，希望他们别再来骚扰这里，让我们专心做自己的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Vallincourt [09005685] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03femaleuniquevallincourt\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlenclav_0000ae70_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My father says we need to watch the borders for them to send reinforcements, but I think it'll be a long time before anything happens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的父亲说，我们要盯紧外围防线，以免他们再派援军来，但是我觉得这要在一段日子以后了吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlenclav_0000ae71_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We dealt them a hell of a blow and it's going to take them a good amount of time to recover.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们沉重地打击了他们，估计他们要很久才能恢复元气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlenclav_0000ae71_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: From the amount of equipment pouring in, I'd say if we didn't destroy them, we certainly threw a major wrench into their works.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从缴获的装备来看，我敢说，我们即使没有摧毁他们，也让他们有够受的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlenclav_0000ae72_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found some Sensor Modules for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你拿了些传感器模块。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, very nice. I'll have my assembling team get right on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，很好！我现在就让装配组去做！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlsensor_0000ae66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03PostQuest.DLC03PQGoScrap to 1
We'll need a lot more where this came from to reconstruct Prime's electrical systems. Keep bringing more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还需要更多的材料才能重新建造自由金刚的电子系统。请多带点过来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlsensor_0000ae67_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03PostQuest.DLC03PQGoScrap to 1
It's but a drop in the bucket, but it'll have to do. Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杯水车薪啊，但是聊胜于无。多谢啦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlsensor_0000ae68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03PostQuest.DLC03PQGoScrap to 1
I have Cameras for you, Scribe Rothchild.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你带了相机，文员罗斯查德。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, good. Please keep bringing them to me... it's my only hope of getting Prime's optics rebuilt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，很好。请再多带一些过来…只有靠这样我才能把先锋的光学系统修复。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlcamera_0000ae73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03PostQuest.DLC03PQGoCamera to 1
Oh, splendid! Hopefully these will contain unbroken lenses unlike the last few I've acquired.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，太棒了！我希望这里面还有完好的镜头，可别像我上次拿到的那几个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlcamera_0000ae74_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03PostQuest.DLC03PQGoCamera to 1
Excellent! I'll begin disassembling them immediately. Good work!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了！我马上就把它们拆开。干得好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Rothchild [060156EA] (mod) Quest : ([09008C72]DLC03PostQuest) DLC03 Post Quest Handling EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleuniquerothchild\dlc03postq_dlc03pqtlcamera_0000ae75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03PostQuest.DLC03PQGoCamera to 1
Okay, okay... I'm coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧…我来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get the lead out, soldier! This place is about to get flattened!
ESP.TRADUIT: 快走，士兵！这里马上要被炸平了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3sarahplat_0000ae9f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03SarahRef.TalkDone to 1
Yes, ma'am!
ESP.TRADUIT: 遵命，女士！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quickly, just get on board before those missiles level this place!
ESP.TRADUIT: 赶紧的！登机！马上导弹就要把这里夷为平地！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3sarahplat_0000ae9b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03SarahRef.TalkDone to 1
Anything you say. We can talk back at the Citadel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么事还是回五角大本营再说吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurry, the orbital strike will be coming down any moment now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快点！轨道炮就要炸过来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3sarahplat_0000ae9e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03SarahRef.TalkDone to 1
Actually, I completely forgot about you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，我都忘了你是谁了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still got that annoying sense of humor, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还是那么的爱开玩笑，哼？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3sarahplat_0000ae9d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't matter. You've done one hell of an outstanding job out here, soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不要紧。我能说的是：你的工作完成得太出色了，士兵！真是太出色了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3sarahplat_0000ae9d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now it's my turn. It's my pleasure to order your ass onto the Vertibird before this whole place gets blown to hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该轮到我说了。我盛情邀请您上飞鸟！然后我们把会这个鬼地方炸翻！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3sarahplat_0000ae9d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really. Your father said you'd pull through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有。你的父亲和我说过你已经康复了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's told me everything you've done and the sacrifices your family's made for the sake of the Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他告诉了我你的所有事情，你们一家人都为废土作出了极大的牺牲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3sarahplat_0000ae9c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I can say is that you've done one hell of an outstanding job out here, soldier. A hell of a job!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能说的是：你的工作完成得太出色了，士兵！真是太出色了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3sarahplat_0000ae9c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now it's time to do my job and to get your ass onto this Vertibird before it goes up like a nuke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我该要忙我的事情了，而你要在飞鸟起飞之前赶紧上去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3sarahplat_0000ae9c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll say! You look much better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了！你看起来好多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, we both have the Pride to thank for that. Without them, we'd both be dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都要感谢“骄傲”。如果不是他们，我们早死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins Comment (NAM2) : accent on "my" EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3sarahplat_0000ae9a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But enough about me. You've done one hell of an outstanding job out here, soldier. A hell of a job!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别谢我。你的工作完成得太出色了，士兵！真是太出色了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins Comment (NAM2) : accent on "my" EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3sarahplat_0000ae9a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now it's time to do my job and to get your ass onto this Vertibird before it goes up like a nuke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我该要忙我的事情了，而你要在飞鸟起飞之前赶紧上去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins Comment (NAM2) : accent on "my" EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03bs3_dlc03bs3sarahplat_0000ae9a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks. That's all for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢。先这样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Lepelletier [09003B3C] (mod) Quest : ([09003B42]DLC03WQ01) Protecting the Water Way EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq01_dlc03wq01briefin_0000aefe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03AudioHolotapesWQ02GriffonExplains
This is Griffon recording. All you clowns listen up. I'm leaving you in charge of the bottling operation while I'm away doing my thing at Underworld.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是格里芬。你们这些小丑听好了。在我到地下城去忙事情的时候，你们要继续负责装瓶流水线的运作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 Comment (NAM2) : giving a stern warning to his gang

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here are my instructions. First off, shoot anyone who isn't me or one of you. Don't want anyone nosing around inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下面是我的指示。首先，杀死任何不属于我们的人。我不想让任何人进来打听消息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 Comment (NAM2) : giving a stern warning to his gang EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioholot_0000b170_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When Bigsley's men arrive from Project Purity pay them promptly but don't let them in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当比格斯利的人结束净化工程回来后，马上支付给他们报酬，但别让他们进来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 Comment (NAM2) : giving a stern warning to his gang EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioholot_0000b170_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take the Aqua Pura, dump it into tubs and sinks to hold for later, then fill the empty bottles with the treated irradiated water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿到纯净水，把它倒进大桶里沉淀一段时间，然后把这些处理后发光的水装进空瓶里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 Comment (NAM2) : giving a stern warning to his gang EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioholot_0000b170_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you get enough bottles to make it worthwhile, make a trip over to Underworld. I'll take the new bottles and give you your cut.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你们装好足够的瓶子后，运到地下城来。我会收下这些新货并给你们应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 Comment (NAM2) : giving a stern warning to his gang EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioholot_0000b170_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and leave the wigs alone. I don't want your greasy heads touching them. I mean it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，别碰那些假发。我可不希望让你们油腻的脑袋碰它们。我是认真的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 Comment (NAM2) : giving a stern warning to his gang EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioholot_0000b170_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ02.discoveredHidehout to 1 setStage DLC03WQ02 40
DLC03BS1PrimeFollowerLines
All right, let's do this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，让我们上吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [090087DB] (ID) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1primefoll_0000b178_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fall in, fall in!
ESP.TRADUIT: 集合，集合！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [090087DB] (ID) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1primefoll_0000b179_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fall back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 撤退！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [090087DB] (ID) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1primefoll_0000b17a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 从这儿滚出去!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [090087DB] (ID) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1primefoll_0000b17b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Move it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 快去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [090087DB] (ID) Quest : ([09000802]DLC03BS1) Death From Above EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03bs1_dlc03bs1primefoll_0000b17c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03StiggsLeaveTopic
Come on Sparky, Hoover. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧史帕基, 胡佛。我们走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stiggs [090068BF] (mod) Quest : ([09006231]DLC03EnclaveBase) Enclave Base Background Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03encla_dlc03stiggsleav_0000b367_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe you made me drink that crap. I had no idea. You're so dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你竟敢让我喝这种垃圾。我都不知道是什么东西。你死定了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I "made" you do nothing. You chose to imbibe the Waters of Light of your own volition. A choice most wise, indeed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没"让"你任何事。是你自己的意愿选择饮下那圣光之水的。毫无疑问，这的确是一个很明智的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : a battle cry EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03holyfev_0000b36c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for your threats to my person, I fear not. I am aglow with Atom's Holy Light. You may do violence to this vessel, but my spirit is inviolable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于你威胁我的子民这件事，我可不怕你。我与原子的圣光同在。你可以摧残我的肉身，但是我的精神是不可侵犯的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : a battle cry EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03holyfev_0000b36c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I shall smite thee, heathen. Atom fill me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该狠狠的教训你，异教徒。原子赐予我力量！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : a battle cry EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03holyfev_0000b36c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
Oh... I've made a huge mistake...
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢……我犯了大错……

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nonsense! The Eternal Light is faultless and blameless. It cleanses our bodies as it cleanses our transgressions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 荒谬！这永恒之光是毫无缺点，无可指责的。他通过清除我们体内的罪恶来净化我们的身体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03holyfev_0000b368_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walk in Atom's Glow, and you have nothing to worry about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走进原子的荣光，你就不用为任何事操心了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03holyfev_0000b368_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait a minute... are you saying this "Holy Water" is irradiated Aqua Pura?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下……你是说这些"圣水"是辐射过的纯净水？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is what the unbelievers from that so called "Project Purity" call it before we fill it with Atom's Holy Light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就是异教徒们把它称作"净化工程"的原因，之前他们会在水中装满原子的圣光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : with disdain EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03holyfev_0000b366_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There must be something I can do to convince you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我肯定能做什么来劝服你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give it time, child. Soon Atom will enlighten your eyes and you will come to realize the truth for yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让时间来证明，我的孩子。很快原子就会让你看清楚并了解真正的自我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_0000b404_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am the Prophet of Atom. Stop irradiating water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吾就是原子先知。立刻停止污染这些纯水。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why... you ARE the Prophet of Atom! I didn't recognize you until now... Your eyes are aglow, your very skin radiates with Atom's Heat!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么……您就是原子先知! 我刚才没认出您来……您的双眼散发出灼热的光芒，而您的皮肤散发着原子的热量
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03prophet_0000b407_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't realize... My Lord, now that you have revealed yourself to me, I do... I see the errors of my ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直没察觉……主啊，现在您向我昭示了您的身份，我……我知道我的错误了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03prophet_0000b407_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forgive me, for I knew not what I was doing... we will spread your word without the use of the holy water... we will return the Aqua Pura to Megaton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请原谅在下，我不知道我在做什么……我们会继续传播您的意志而不再使用这些圣水……我们会将纯净水送还给核弹镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03prophet_0000b407_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It shall be a test: the worthy will seek us out, and finding us they will find the Message of Atom, drinking the Waters of Light in their souls. Yes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个试炼：那些有资质的人会来皈依我等，追寻我们，他们即追寻到了原子之教诲，即以圣光之水灌沃灵魂。没错！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03prophet_0000b407_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I leave you now, Lord. I can not bear to look upon your shining face any longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请原谅在下的离开，我主。 在下不敢再直视您了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03prophet_0000b407_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ03.prophet to 1 setStage DLC03WQ03 150
You may not agree with us, but you need not mock our beliefs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以不相信，但你没必要嘲笑我们的信仰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03prophet_0000b408_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Prophet of Atom would be so aglow as to outshine the sun. You are not he.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原子先知的万丈光芒能让太阳相形见绌。你不是他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03prophet_0000b408_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may not agree with us, but you need not mock our beliefs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以不相信，但你没必要嘲笑我们的信仰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03prophet_0000b409_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Prophet of Atom would be so aglow as to outshine the sun. You are not she.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原子先知的万丈光芒能让太阳相形见绌。你不是她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03prophet_0000b409_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What makes you so sure you're right, anyway? Who are you to speak for Atom?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么这么确定你是对的？你凭什么替原子说话？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose it's a fair question... Ever since I was a girl, I knew I was destined for something special. I always resisted the feeling. Me? Special?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这是个不错的问题…当我还是个小姑娘时，我就感觉到我命中注定要些点不平凡的事。我总是抗拒这种感觉。我？不平凡？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_0000b405_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But one day I fell asleep during one of the Confessor's sermons. And I had a dream.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是有一天我在听一个信徒说教的时候睡着了。并且我做了一个梦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_0000b405_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A dream of the Prophet of Atom. Ablaze with Holy Light! He told me of my destiny. Of my mission. I was called to service, and I answered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我梦见了原子的先知。周身燃烧着圣光！她向我昭示了我的命运。以及我的任务。她要我去为人类服务，我便答应了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_0000b405_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only being able to convince me I was wrong, would be the Prophet of Atom himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一能说服我错了的人，就只有原子先知她自己了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_0000b405_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose it's a fair question... Ever since I was a girl, I knew I was destined for something special. I always resisted the feeling. Me? Special?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这是个不错的问题…当我还是个小姑娘时，我就感觉到我命中注定要些点不平凡的事。我总是抗拒这种感觉。我？不平凡？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_0000b406_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But one day I fell asleep during one of the Confessor's sermons. And I had a dream.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是有一天我在听一个信徒说教的时候睡着了。并且我做了一个梦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_0000b406_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A dream of the Prophet of Atom. Ablaze with Holy Light! She told me of my destiny. Of my mission. I was called to service, and I answered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我梦见了原子的先知。周身燃烧着圣光！她向我昭示了我的命运。以及我的任务。她要我去为人类服务，我便答应了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_0000b406_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only being able to convince me I was wrong, would be the Prophet of Atom herself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一能说服我错了的人，就只有原子先知她自己了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03stopapostle_0000b406_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me? Well, I figured after all the work we already put into this place, we could help the Brotherhood keep things running smoothly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我？这个嘛，我想在为这个地方付出了这么多辛勤与汗水之后，我们可以帮助兄弟会把这里稳定的运作下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex Dargon [0601CCA3] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03wq_dlc03tlppscientist_0000b7ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's worked out pretty well so far, I think. They're not necessarily the friendliest bunch, but I've been doing what I can to get along with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想，迄今为止这里运行的很好。这群家伙不是那么友好，但我一直在尽最大努力和他们好好相处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex Dargon [0601CCA3] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03wq_dlc03tlppscientist_0000b7ed_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's it look like? I'm doing my work, same as I've always done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在干什么？我在工作，就像往常一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daniel Agincourt [0601CCA1] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wq_dlc03tlppscientist_0000b7ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These Brotherhood "scribes" wouldn't know what to do with half the equipment here if their lives depended on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果说这些兄弟会的"文员们"要靠这儿的设备生活，而他们对如何操作它根本就是一知半解 。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daniel Agincourt [0601CCA1] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wq_dlc03tlppscientist_0000b7ee_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm basically running this place from behind the scenes, no matter what Bigsley tells you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管比格斯利是怎么跟你说的，其实是我在背后掌管一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daniel Agincourt [0601CCA1] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wq_dlc03tlppscientist_0000b7ee_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where's Doctor Li?
ESP.TRADUIT: 李博士在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. Well, she... After what happened to you when the purifier started, I think she just kind of had enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦。其实，她…在知道了净化器启动时那些发生在你身上的事之后，她有点无法忍受了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex Dargon [0601CCA3] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : pleasant, but slightly sad. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03wq_dlc03tlppscientist_0000b7ef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was really hard on her, you know? First losing your dad, and then the Enclave, and then the Brotherhood taking over here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一切对她来说太残酷了，知道吗？先是失去了你爸爸，然后又来了那群英克雷，之后兄弟会又接管了这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex Dargon [0601CCA3] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : pleasant, but slightly sad. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03wq_dlc03tlppscientist_0000b7ef_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was really just too much for her. So I guess she packed up a few things and headed off north, towards the Commonwealth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一切对她来说真的有点难以接受。所以我猜她收拾行李往北方走了，去了邦联了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex Dargon [0601CCA3] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : pleasant, but slightly sad. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03wq_dlc03tlppscientist_0000b7ef_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rumor has it there's a scientific community up there. I sure hope she finds what she's looking for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有传言说那里有一个科学团体。我真心希望她能找到她想要的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex Dargon [0601CCA3] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : pleasant, but slightly sad. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult04dc\dlc03wq_dlc03tlppscientist_0000b7ef_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You haven't heard? I guess I shouldn't be surprised.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没听说么？我想我不用对此感到惊讶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daniel Agincourt [0601CCA1] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wq_dlc03tlppscientist_0000b7f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She basically folded. After the purifier was started, she decided she'd had enough, and headed up north.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她可以说是放弃这里了。当净化器被启动之后，她觉得自己受够了，现在她离开这里往北去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daniel Agincourt [0601CCA1] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wq_dlc03tlppscientist_0000b7f0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Said she was looking for the Commonwealth. Like she'd ever make it on her own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她说她要去找邦联。看上去她打算自己找到那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daniel Agincourt [0601CCA1] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wq_dlc03tlppscientist_0000b7f0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what. You run into her, you tell her Daniel sends his regards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 麻烦你件事。我希望你去找到她并告诉她丹尼尔向她致以诚挚的问候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daniel Agincourt [0601CCA1] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wq_dlc03tlppscientist_0000b7f0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03WQ03Sermon
Children of the Light, hear my words and feel Atom's warmth!
ESP.TRADUIT: 光之子们啊，聆听我的话语，感受原子的温暖吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : giving a sermon EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03sermon_0000b808_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ03.sermonStage to DLC03WQ03.sermonStage + 1
For too long, our world has been barren, and our people have become empty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 长久以来，我们的世界贫瘠荒芜，我们的人民空虚沉沦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : giving a sermon EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03sermon_0000b809_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ03.sermonStage to DLC03WQ03.sermonStage + 1
Their hearts have become dry and cold, and thirst consumes the weak and the strong alike.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的心变得干凅而冰冷，而饥渴燃尽了一切孱弱或强壮的生灵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : giving a sermon EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03sermon_0000b80a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ03.sermonStage to DLC03WQ03.sermonStage + 1
But we can save them! For Atom's bounty has granted us the gifts of mercy and compassion!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我们能救他们！因为原子的慷慨授予了我们宽容和怜惜这两样礼物！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : giving a sermon EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03sermon_0000b80b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ03.sermonStage to DLC03WQ03.sermonStage + 1
Oh, my brethren, let us share with them the Waters of Light!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我的同胞们，让我们与众凡人分享圣光之水吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : giving a sermon EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03sermon_0000b80c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ03.sermonStage to DLC03WQ03.sermonStage + 1
Let them be fulfilled by Atom! Let them know his glow and be truly Enlightened!
ESP.TRADUIT: 让他们因原子而得到满足！让他们知晓原子的荣光并得到真正的指引！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : giving a sermon EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03sermon_0000b80d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ03.sermonStage to DLC03WQ03.sermonStage + 1
And let them live forever, and walk with us in the grace of Atom's Glow, and never be empty again!
ESP.TRADUIT: 并让他们得到永生，并和我们一道在原子的光辉中前行，而不再任由自己空虚腐化！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : giving a sermon EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03sermon_0000b80e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03WQ03.sermonStage to DLC03WQ03.sermonStage + 1
You'll see the true power of Atom when I detonate that bomb in Megaton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我引爆核弹镇的核弹之时，你们就会见到真正的原子之力了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh... Is that truly possible? Yes, that would purge all of Megaton in Atom's Holy Fire. I shall pray for your success!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢……真的能行吗？好吧, 那将会让原子的圣火净化整个核弹镇。我祈祷你能成功！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brother Gerard [09004C76] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : shocked but intrigued EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultdc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03megaton_0000b818_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No! No you mustn't! We left Cromwell's church precisely because we DON'T believe in the Great Division.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！不！你不可以！我们离开克伦威尔的教堂正是因为我们不信大分裂的那一套。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : pleading for wisdom EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03megaton_0000b819_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Atom calls us to reach Enlightenment through becoming one with his Glow. We believe in transformation - not destruction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原子让我们通过启发来获得它的荣光。我们相信那是改变——不是毁灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : pleading for wisdom EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03megaton_0000b819_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, leave the Great Symbol of Atom alone. Let the Confessor preach his misguided message to the heathens. Join us here. Gain enlightenment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请不要去动原子的象征。让神父为教徒们布道。加入我们，获得新生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mother Curie III [09004C77] (mod) Quest : ([09004C75]DLC03WQ03) Holy Water Comment (NAM2) : pleading for wisdom EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult02dc\dlc03wq03_dlc03wq03megaton_0000b819_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fawkes can start the purifier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 福克斯可以启动净化器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that's how you want to do this, fine. But be quick about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你真的想要这么做，好吧。但是动作要快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [0601D430] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\mq11_mq11sarahendsendfollo_0000b905_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set MQ11.DLC03FollowTalk to 1 SetStage MQ11 60 SetObjectiveDisplayed MQ11 65 1
Great, then get him in there. We don't have time to waste.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好主意，那就让他进去。我们没多少时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [0601D430] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\mq11_mq11sarahendsendfollo_0000b906_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set MQ11.DLC03FollowTalk to 1 SetStage MQ11 60 SetObjectiveDisplayed MQ11 65 1
Charon can start the purifier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡戎会启动净水器的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that'll work, then great. But we have to do this quickly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这行得通的话，那很好。但是我们得快点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [0601D430] (mod) Quest : ([06014E91]MQ11) Take it Back! EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\mq11_mq11sarahendsendfollo_0000b907_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set MQ11.DLC03FollowTalk to 1 SetStage MQ11 60 SetObjectiveDisplayed MQ11 65 1
I'll have RL-3 start the purifier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会让RL-3启动净水器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03AudioHolotapeNN
If someone finds this... please get this to my lover at the La Maison Beauregard Hotel in East Georgetown... he'll want to hear what I have to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有人发现了这个…请把它带给我住在东乔治敦，迈松博勒加德酒店的恋人…他会想要听听我说了什么的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audio Only NPC [0900B958] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 Comment (NAM2) : You've been shot, dying and have left a recording behind to your lover. You die at the end (trail off). EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult04dc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioholot_0000b952_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My darling... they've found me. I... I tried to get away... tried to get away so we could be together once again...
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲爱的…他们已经找到我了。我…我试着逃走…逃走回去和你再在一起…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audio Only NPC [0900B958] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 Comment (NAM2) : You've been shot, dying and have left a recording behind to your lover. You die at the end (trail off). EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult04dc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioholot_0000b952_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you risked your life to get it to me.... combing the ruins, avoiding the Super Mutants... all for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你冒着生命危险为我找到它…搜寻废墟，避开超级变种人…这一切都是为了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audio Only NPC [0900B958] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 Comment (NAM2) : You've been shot, dying and have left a recording behind to your lover. You die at the end (trail off). EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult04dc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioholot_0000b952_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It seems I shall never lay my eyes upon your gift... you... you'll have to keep it and remember me every time you see it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我没法亲眼见到你的礼物了…你…你要带着它，每当看到它时你就会想起我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audio Only NPC [0900B958] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 Comment (NAM2) : You've been shot, dying and have left a recording behind to your lover. You die at the end (trail off). EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult04dc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioholot_0000b952_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm so sorry my darling... so... so... sorry I've let you down. So many have died for this thing... so many hearts have been broken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，亲爱的…真的…真的…对不起，让你失望了。太多人为这东西而死…太多人因此心碎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audio Only NPC [0900B958] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 Comment (NAM2) : You've been shot, dying and have left a recording behind to your lover. You die at the end (trail off). EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult04dc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioholot_0000b952_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please remember, I'll always love you... you will be with me forever in my spirit... I... I...l-love... you...
ESP.TRADUIT: 请记住，我一直爱着你…你永远在我心里…我…我…我爱…你…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Audio Only NPC [0900B958] (mod) Quest : ([09003383]DLC03AudioHolotapes) Audio Holotapes for DLC03 Comment (NAM2) : You've been shot, dying and have left a recording behind to your lover. You die at the end (trail off). EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleadult04dc\dlc03audio_dlc03audioholot_0000b952_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03NNRef.Enable ShowMap DC11MMEast
Who does your hair? It looks rather similar to mine, doesn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁帮你做的头发？看上去和我的一模一样，不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aheh. Um... yeah, look at that. We practically have the same hair cut. What are the chances of that? Aheh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵呵。嗯……好吧，看着。事实上我们剪了同样的发型，这样的可能性有多高？呵呵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Griffon [09003B64] (mod) Quest : ([09003B67]DLC03WQ02) The Amazing Aqua Cura! Comment (NAM2) : extremely nervous EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wq02_dlc03wq02wigtopi_0000bb8a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you down here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来这里干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, this wasn't how it was supposed to go down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，这没有像原本猜想的那样下降。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2wintdeath_0000bb93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a good idea at the time, y'know? Figured we'd try and set ourselves up down here. Just like Underworld, only better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当时这是个好主意，你知道吗？想想我们试着在这里建立起我们自己的地盘，就像地下城那样，而且比那里更好
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2wintdeath_0000bb93_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's gonna bother a bunch of ghouls living underneath Old Olney, right? So we get down here, we start knockin' some walls down...
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有谁会想过要去惹一大堆住在老奥尔尼地下的僵尸，不是吗？所以我们来到这里，开始试着推倒几赌墙…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2wintdeath_0000bb93_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the next thing you know we're getting our faces chewed off by Deathclaws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而你会知道接下来的事情就是我们的脑袋会被死亡之爪们嚼碎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2wintdeath_0000bb93_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If there are so many Deathclaws around, how'd you survive?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果附近有那么多死亡爪的话，你们是怎么活下来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh. We ran faster than the others, that's how.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵。那是因为我们比别人跑得快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2wintdeath_0000bb96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't nothin' honorable about it, but we're still alive and they ain't. I can live with that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样的行为并不是那么可耻，毕竟我们仍然活着，他们却已经死了。我可以理解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2wintdeath_0000bb96_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, this wasn't my fault, okay? It wasn't my idea to tunnel down here, I just went along with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，这不是我的错，好吧？挖到这里不是我的主意，我只是随大流罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2wintdeath_0000bb96_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But whatever. What's done is done. Me and Kidd, we're getting out of here. You came in that way, that means we can get back out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但无论如何，该做的事已经做了。我和基德，我们要离开这里。你从那条路进来，表明我们也可以从那出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2wintdeath_0000bb96_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See ya later, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下次再见，小子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2wintdeath_0000bb96_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03BS2.DLC03GhoulFlag to 1 DLC03KiddREF.EVP
I'm not afraid of Deathclaws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不怕死亡爪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? Well then you're stupid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊？那你就傻了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2wintdeath_0000bb92_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where you think they're all comin' from, huh? Goddamn nest down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为他们来自哪里，嗯？该死的窝点就在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2wintdeath_0000bb92_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take it from me, kid. You stay down here, you're gonna die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把它从我这里拿走，小子。你呆在这里的话，你会死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2wintdeath_0000bb92_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But hey, it's your funeral, right? Me and Kidd, we're getting out of here. Figure the way you came's gotta be pretty clear if you're still alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，嗨，这是你的死期，不是吗？我和基德，我们会从你来的路上逃走。你还活着就证明了这条路很安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2wintdeath_0000bb92_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC03BS2.DLC03GhoulFlag to 1 DLC03KiddREF.EVP
I'm looking for Olney Powerworks. You know where that is?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在找奥尔尼供电站。你知道在那儿吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yeah, yeah. Sure thing. Just right through here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔，是的，是的。没错。只要穿过这里就到了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2wintgreet_0000bb95_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only there's a few Deathclaws down here that might have other ideas. You know what I'm sayin'?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里只有一小部分死亡爪有所不同。你明白我说的意思吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2wintgreet_0000bb95_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, great. Ghouls. I hate ghouls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，太棒了。僵尸。我讨厌僵尸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, nice to see you too. Listen, I'd love to chat but I'm kind of trying to avoid getting killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，很高兴见到你。听着，我很乐意聊聊，不过我可不想因此被干掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2wintgreet_0000bb91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place is crawlin' with Deathclaws, and they're always hungry. You'd do best to turn around and head back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方到处是死亡爪，而且他们永远都吃不饱。你最好还是回去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2wintgreet_0000bb91_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you? What are you doing in here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们是谁？在这儿干吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, uhh... I'm Wint. This is Kidd. We're, well it's kind of a long story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，呃…我是温特。这是基德。我们，呃，关于我们的来历，可是个很长的故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2wintgreet_0000bb94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only thing that matters now is that we're trying to steer clear of the Deathclaws on account of not wantin' to be lunchmeat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我们唯一要做的是为了不变成他们的午餐，尽量避开死亡爪，。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2wintgreet_0000bb94_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Full house today, Doc. What's wrong with everybody?
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天这里这么多人啊，医生。大家这是怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know yet. Some kind of virus that attacks the body on a cellular level. I've never seen anything like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还不清楚。某种病毒正在消灭身体内的细胞。我从未这种情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Barrows [000156F0] (file) Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wqsic_dlc03wqsickdoct_0000bbac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's strange, because Ghouls are immune to almost any known disease.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真奇怪，因为僵尸应该是对所有已知的疾病免疫的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Barrows [000156F0] (file) Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03wqsic_dlc03wqsickdoct_0000bbac_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Neither did I. Doctor Barrows is working on it, but it doesn't look good. They're getting worse by the day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也不知道。巴罗斯医生正在研究，但看上去情况不太好。他们的情况正越来越糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0602A9FF] (ID) Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femalegenericghouldc\dlc03wqsic_dlc03wqsickdoct_0000bbad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's wrong with everybody? I didn't think Ghouls got sick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大家这都是怎么了？我不认为僵尸也会生病。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's something going around, all right, but it isn't anything I've ever seen before. Definitely not contagious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实有某种非正常活动，没错，但我从来没见过。不过肯定不会传染的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6E] (ID) Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wqsic_dlc03wqsickdoct_0000bc9e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe something in the water, but that seems unlikely since I've tested it and this is the cleanest water we've ever had.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许问题出在水里，但是水我已经测试过了，再说这是目前为止我们喝过的最干净的水了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6E] (ID) Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be damned ironic if we were so used to the crap we've been drinking that actual pure water was killing us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真他妈的讽刺啊，我们看来是喝惯了脏水以至于喝纯净的水会要了我们的命啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6E] (ID) Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wqsic_dlc03wqsickdoct_0000bc9e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something going around, Doc? The clinic seems pretty full today.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出了什么问题吗，医生？你的诊所今天有这么多人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no idea how to help these people and it's really taken the shine off my normally sunny disposition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道怎么帮助这些人 而现在的惨景真的让我的内心布满阴霾啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6E] (ID) Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: So unless you have an actual medical problem, maybe you could stop distracting me from my work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以除非你真的有什么病，那么也许你不该在这里妨碍我工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6E] (ID) Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wqsic_dlc03wqsickdoct_0000bc9f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's with all the patients? You seem busier than usual.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些病人都怎么了？你看起来比平常要忙多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh no... I'm fairly certain it's not contagious. Though, we are burning the bodies of the deceased, just in case...
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢不……我很肯定它是不传染的。尽管如此，我们还是在焚烧病死者的尸体，只是为了以防万一……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156D0] (ID) Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : frustrated

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just wish I knew how to treat these people. It's like their immune system is killing them. I don't know what to do about it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真想知道到底该怎么治疗这些人。看上去他们的免疫系统正在杀死他们。我不知道该如何处理这个问题！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [060156D0] (ID) Quest : ([09008248]DLC03WQSick) 09008248 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : frustrated EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\maleadult01defaultbdc\dlc03wqsic_dlc03wqsickdoct_0000bcc1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doc, it's crowded in your clinic. Something going around I should worry about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 医生，你的诊所里到处都是人。发生什么事情了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: DLC03SarahAngry
You bastard! I'll make you PAY for this! You hear me?! PAY!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个混蛋！你会为此付出代价的！你听到了么！你会有报应的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sentinel Lyons [090009DD] (mod) Quest : ([090011AD]DLC03BS3) Who Dares Wins Comment (NAM2) : Absolutely livid... player just killed your father. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\femaleuniquesarah\dlc03bs3_dlc03sarahangry_0000bbc2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to help me, or I'm going to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们必须帮助我，否则我就杀了你们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Haha, what? You serious?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈，什么？你说真的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2winthelpc_0000bcbf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, you know what? Fine. Go ahead. Way things have been workin' out, if you don't kill me they will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你知道吗？很好，继续走。你会知道的，如果你不杀了我，他们也会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2winthelpc_0000bcbf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I am getting out of this place. If that means you're gonna do me in, be my guest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我要离开这地方。如果这表示你要杀了我的话，那就请便。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2winthelpc_0000bcbf_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC03BS2.DLC03GhoulFlag to 1 DLC03KiddREF.EVP
You're never going to make it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会成功的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, well. We're not gonna get a better chance than this, so we're gonna take it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，好吧。我们从没遇到这么好的机会，我们要把握住。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2winthelpb_0000bcbd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me and Kidd are getting the hell outta here. If you're not comin', then good luck to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和基德要离开这鬼地方。如果你不一起，那就祝你好运吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2winthelpb_0000bcbd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03BS2.DLC03GhoulFlag to 1 DLC03KiddREF.EVP
Can you help me get to Olney Powerworks?
ESP.TRADUIT: 能告诉我怎么去奥尔尼供电站吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要帮忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2winthelpa_0000bcc0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You kiddin' me, kid? We couldn't even help ourselves. Been stuck here for who knows how long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在耍我，小子？我们甚至连自己都帮不了。鬼才知道我们要困在这里多久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2winthelpa_0000bcc0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But hey, you got here in one piece, right? So now's our chance to get the hell outta here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，嗨，你安全地来到了这里，不是吗？所以这是我们离开这里的机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2winthelpa_0000bcc0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got any brains, you turn right around and go back the way you came. Otherwise, best of luck to ya!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还有脑子的话，转身离开这里。不然，只有祝你好运了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wint [0900B39E] (mod) Quest : ([09000AFD]DLC03BS2) Shock Value EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\malegenericghouldc\dlc03bs2_dlc03bs2winthelpa_0000bcc0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC03BS2.DLC03GhoulFlag to 1 DLC03KiddREF.EVP
Officer Lepelletier said you'd be rewarding me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 莱佩莱捷警官警官说你会给我奖励……

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, yes. I received a message from her. It's here somewhere... Well, no matter where it is, I know what it said.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，是的。我收到她的讯息了。在这儿……算了，找不到，我知道那讯息说什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : falling asleep EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrewardrivet_00003b10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Sigh.> The Initiates just finished itemizing a requisition of confiscated Enclave gear. There were a few items that we didn't immediately send out.
ESP.TRADUIT: <叹气。>那些新兵刚刚提交了一份详细的清单，申请发放被收缴的英克雷装备。我们只剩下一些没有送出去的装备了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : falling asleep EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrewardrivet_00003b10_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose you are welcome to those...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你会喜欢……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : falling asleep EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrewardrivet_00003b10_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood thanks you for your efforts. Now if you don't mind? I think I'll just take a brief nap here at my desk...
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会感谢你付出的努力。现在如果你不介意的话……我想我能在这儿打个盹……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : falling asleep EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrewardrivet_00003b10_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQ01 200 player.additem CondGatlingLaserEnclave 1 player.additem AmmoElectronChargePack75 42 player.additem CondPlasmaPistolEnclave 1 player.additem AmmoSmallEnergyCell 16 player.additem CondEnclaveArmorLoot 1 player.additem CondEnclaveHelmetLoot 1
<Sigh.> The Initiates just finished itemizing a requisition of confiscated Enclave gear. There were a few items that we didn't immediately send out.
ESP.TRADUIT: <叹气。>那些新兵刚刚提交了一份详细的清单，申请发放被收缴的英克雷装备。我们只剩下一些没有送出去的装备了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : falling asleep

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose you're welcome to those...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你会喜欢……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : falling asleep EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrewardrivet_000091d7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood thanks you for your efforts. Now if you don't mind? I think I'll just take a brief nap here at my desk...
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会感谢你付出的努力。现在如果你不介意的话……我想我能在这儿打个盹……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : falling asleep EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrewardrivet_000091d7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem DLC03WQ01Reward 1 setStage DLC03WQ01 200
DLC03RewardMegaton
ESP.TRADUIT: DLC03WQRewardMegaton

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard about that. News traveled fast. I couldn't believe it. I mean, everyone knew it was crazy building a city around that bomb...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这事传的很快，我听说了。不过我不敢相信。我是说，是人都知道围着炸弹建房子肯定是脑子进水了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrewardmegat_0000b816_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I don't think anyone expected the bomb to actually go off...
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我觉得没人会相信那炸弹能真正安全……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrewardmegat_0000b816_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't expect things to end like this... but it did get Lyons off my back about it, so here. Might as well take the money I was going to give you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没料到这事会这样如此结束……不过现在里昂斯也不回来烦我了。这儿，把这些钱收下吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrewardmegat_0000b816_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQ03 200 player.additem caps001 300
Megaton's destroyed. I suppose their water shipment isn't much of concern now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 核弹镇已经炸没了。你再也不用担心给他们送水的问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A cult? There's something about Megaton, isn't there. It's apparently THE place to start a cult these days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 邪教？核弹镇果然有些古怪，不是么。很明显那儿就是这些天来出现的邪教的发源地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted but genuine EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrewardmegat_00006ea6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess I can start sending them water again. Hopefully they can keep their grubby hands on their shipments this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我又能给他们送水了。希望这次他们的脏手不要来碰这些货物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted but genuine EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrewardmegat_00006ea6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here. It's not much. Most of the assets have been exhausted, but take this. It's definitely worth getting Lyons off my back. Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这儿。不算很多。有用的东西几乎都用完了，不过还有这个。这应该值得让你让里昂斯少烦我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Bigsley [0900382D] (mod) Quest : ([09003853]DLC03WQ) 09003853 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : exhausted but genuine EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\brokensteel.esm\dlc03uniquebigsley\dlc03wq_dlc03wqrewardmegat_00006ea6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC03WQ03 200 player.additem caps001 300 ;make Megaton sick if FEV if DLC03WQ.FEV == 1 setStage DLC03WQSick 20 endif
I've stopped the cult that was stealing Megaton's water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我制止了从核弹镇偷水的邪教。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take it Back!
ESP.TRADUIT: [主]失去的, 夺回来!

Speak with Sarah Lyons for the mission briefing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 向萨拉·里昂斯了解任务的细节。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Prepare for battle, and then report to Sarah Lyons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 做好战斗准备之后向萨拉·里昂斯报告。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Follow Liberty Prime as he makes his way to the Purifier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟随自由先锋, 杀出通往净水厂的血路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reach the Project Purity Control Room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进入净化工程的控制室。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Secure the Project Purity Control Room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确保净化工程控制室没有敌人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Activate Project Purity!
ESP.TRADUIT: 启动净化工程!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Follow Elder Lyons to the Citadel Lab.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟随里昂斯长老前往五角大本营的实验室。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cycle the airlock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮萨拉打开气压阀门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell your follower to start the purifer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉你的跟随者启动净化器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Project Impurity
ESP.TRADUIT: [主]不洁之水

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveDisplayed MQA 10 1
StopQuest MQA SetObjectiveDisplayed MQA 10 0
StopQuest MQA SetObjectiveDisplayed MQA 10 0
Infect the Project Purity water supply... Or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 使用病毒污染净化工程的供水系统……或者不这么做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have infected the Project Purity water supply.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你成功污染了净化工程的供水系统。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have turned the FEV virus over to Elder Lyons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把FEV病毒交给了里昂斯长老。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Power of the Atom
ESP.TRADUIT: [支]原子之力

Disarm Megaton's atomic bomb.
ESP.TRADUIT: 解除核弹镇的核弹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rig Megaton's atomic bomb to explode.
ESP.TRADUIT: 设法引爆核弹镇的核弹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Report to Lucas Simms in Megaton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 向核弹镇的卢卡斯·西姆斯报告核弹已经解除。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Report to Mister Burke in Tenpenny Tower.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回复特佩尼大厦的伯克先生。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Activate the detonator at Tenpenny Tower.
ESP.TRADUIT: 激活特佩尼大厦的炸弹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Receive reward from Mister Burke in Tenpenny Tower.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找住在特佩尼大厦里的伯克先生领赏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Disarm Megaton's atomic bomb... or rig it to explode.
ESP.TRADUIT: 解除核弹镇的核弹……或者引爆它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Report to Lucas Simms' son, Harden, in Megaton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将成功解除核弹的消息告诉卢卡斯·西姆斯的儿子哈登。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Optional] Ask Leo Stahl at the Brass Lantern about buying Mentats.
ESP.TRADUIT: [可选]在铜顶附近向利奥·斯塔尔购买曼他特。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Optional] Meet Leo Stahl at the water treatment plant for Mentats .
ESP.TRADUIT: [可选]为曼他特到水处理场找利奥·斯塔尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Optional] Loot Leo Stahl's stash at the water treatment plant for Mentats.
ESP.TRADUIT: [可选]找到利奥斯塔尔的藏在水处理厂的曼他特。

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage DLC03WQ01LepelletierDeadMsg
Meet with Officers Davis and Lorin along the river north of Project Purity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同戴维斯警官和洛林警官在净水工程北方的河边会面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Discover who is ordering the attacks on the caravans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找出针对商队的袭击是受何人指使的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with Split Jack and his gang.
ESP.TRADUIT: 料理斯普利特·杰克及其帮众。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Report to Officer Lepelletier that the job is done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任务完成，向莱佩莱捷警官报告。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Consult with Officer Lepelletier at Rivet City.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到铆钉城与莱佩莱捷警官协商。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ask Bigsley for a reward for helping Officer Lepelletier at Rivet City.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮助了铆钉城的莱佩莱捷警官，向比格斯利索要报酬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Report to Officer Lepelletier that the job is done, OR extort her for "Protection" money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 工作完成，向莱佩莱捷警官报告，或者敲诈她向她索要"保护"费。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Collect caps from gang at Wilhelm's Wharf once a week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每周向威廉码头的帮派分子收取瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Amazing Aqua Cura!
ESP.TRADUIT: 神奇的沌浄水！

Discover what Bigsley at Project Purity knows about Griffon's water supply.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Discover what Griffon at Underworld is doing with Aqua Pura.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查地下商人的格里芬在利用纯净水做些什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Discover the location and proof of Griffon's bottling operation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到格里芬灌装窝点的位置及证据。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Confront Griffon about the operation in the Museum Authority building.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到权威博物馆大楼制止格里芬的行为。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Discover who is supplying Griffon with Aqua Pura.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查是什么人在为格里芬提供纯净水。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holy Water
ESP.TRADUIT: 圣洁的水

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ask about holy water at the Monastery of Eternal Light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到永恒之光修道院询问沌浄水的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the area around Megaton to learn about the water situation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查核弹镇周围的区域以了解水源的情况。

ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）饮下沌浄水后成为修道院的一员。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop the Apostles of Eternal Light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 制止永恒之光教徒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Report back to Bigsley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 向比格斯利汇报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Drink the Holy Water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喝下沌浄水。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Brother Gerard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同杰拉德修士谈话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gain entrance to the Monastery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 成为修道院的一员。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
float dieRoll set dieRoll to getRandomPercent
if dieRoll <= 25 DLC03WQ02GhoulARef.playIdle LooseBDayClapCheerA DLC03WQ02GhoulBRef.playIdle LooseBDayClapCheerB DLC03WQ02GhoulCRef.playIdle LooseBDayClapCheerC DLC03WQ02GhoulDRef.playIdle LooseBDayClapCheerD elseif dieRoll <= 50 DLC03WQ02GhoulARef.playIdle LooseBDayClapCheerB DLC03WQ02GhoulBRef.playIdle LooseBDayClapCheerC DLC03WQ02GhoulCRef.playIdle LooseBDayClapCheerD DLC03WQ02GhoulDRef.playIdle LooseBDayClapCheerA
elseif dieRoll <= 75 DLC03WQ02GhoulARef.playIdle LooseBDayClapCheerC DLC03WQ02GhoulBRef.playIdle LooseBDayClapCheerD DLC03WQ02GhoulCRef.playIdle LooseBDayClapCheerA DLC03WQ02GhoulDRef.playIdle LooseBDayClapCheerB
else DLC03WQ02GhoulARef.playIdle LooseBDayClapCheerD DLC03WQ02GhoulBRef.playIdle LooseBDayClapCheerA DLC03WQ02GhoulCRef.playIdle LooseBDayClapCheerB DLC03WQ02GhoulDRef.playIdle LooseBDayClapCheerC
endif

Quantum Chemist
ESP.TRADUIT: 量子化学家

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have unlocked the secret to creating Nuka-Cola Quantum. With this perk, every ten Nuka-Colas in your inventory is immediately converted into a Nuka-Cola Quantum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得到了制造量子型核子可乐的秘方。 拥有了这个能力，你每得到十瓶核子可乐就会自动转化为一瓶量子型核子可乐。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No Weakness
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无破绽

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you take the No Weakness perk, all S.P.E.C.I.A.L. stats that are less than 5 are instantly increased to 5.
ESP.TRADUIT: 选择“毫无破绽”能力，你所有尚未达标的S.P.E.C.I.A.L.属性都会立刻提升至5。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Warmonger
ESP.TRADUIT: 好战分子

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've figured out on your own how to build all the custom weapons! With the Warmonger perk, all custom weapon types become available to you without the schematics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你独立研究出了所有自制武器的制作工艺! 拥有“战争贩子”能力, 无需设计图也能制造所有的自制武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Party Boy
ESP.TRADUIT: 派对男孩

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are such a Party Boy that you no longer suffer the withdrawal effect from alcohol addiction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为一个派对男孩，你已经不会再受到酒精上瘾的负面作用影响了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Party Girl
ESP.TRADUIT: 派对女孩

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are such a Party Girl that you no longer suffer the withdrawal effect from alcohol addiction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为一个派对女孩，你已经不会再受到酒精上瘾的负面作用影响了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rad Tolerance
ESP.TRADUIT: 辐射抗性

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although you are still notified when you get Minor Radiation Poisoning, you do not suffer any ill effects from it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管你受到次级辐射感染时仍会收到提示, 但你不再受到任何负面效果影响了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Puppies!
ESP.TRADUIT: 量产型狗肉

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the Puppies! perk, if Dogmeat dies, you'll be able to get a new canine companion from his litter of puppies. Just wait a bit, and you'll find your new furry friend waiting outside Vault 101.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拥有了“量产型狗肉”能力, 如果狗肉死了, 你将立刻得到他的小狗做为新的伙伴. 只要等上一段时间, 你就会在101号避难所门外找到你的新朋友。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deep Sleep
ESP.TRADUIT: 深度睡眠

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sleep deeply no matter where you are. You get the Well Rested benefit of +10% XP for eight hours no matter what bed you sleep in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管在哪里，你都能睡得很熟。你获得额外10%的经验值，只需要睡足8小时，无论你是在哪张床上睡的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Almost Perfect
ESP.TRADUIT: 近乎完美

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take the Almost Perfect perk, and all S.P.E.C.I.A.L. stats are instantly raised to 9.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当获得“几近完美”能力，你所有尚未达标的S.P.E.C.I.A.L.属性都会立刻提升至9。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nuclear Anomaly
ESP.TRADUIT: 核异常

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the Nuclear Anomaly perk, whenever your Health is reduced to 20 or less, you will erupt into a devastating nuclear explosion. Note that any allies in the vicinity will also suffer the effects of the blast!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拥有“核子异变”能力，当你的生命下降至20或者更低时，你的身体将会发生核爆，注意你身边的同伴都会受到波及！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Devil's Highway
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶魔之路

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you choose the Devil's Highway perk, your Karma is instantly set to Very Evil.
ESP.TRADUIT: 选择“魔鬼快车”能力, 你的善恶值将立刻变成非常邪恶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Karmic Rebalance
ESP.TRADUIT: 善恶平衡

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you choose the Karmic Rebalance perk, your Karma is instantly set to Neutral.
ESP.TRADUIT: 选择“中庸之道”能力 你的善恶值将立刻变成中立。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Escalator to Heaven
ESP.TRADUIT: 天堂直升梯

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you choose the Escalator to Heaven perk, your Karma is instantly set to Very Good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 选择“天堂捷径”能力, 你的善恶值将立刻变成非常善良。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Officer Lepelletier is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莱佩莱捷警官死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Protecting the Water Way
ESP.TRADUIT: 保护水路

ESP.ORIGINAL: Griffon is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格里芬死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Amazing Aqua Cura!
ESP.TRADUIT: 神奇的沌浄水！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dogmeat's puppy has died.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小狗肉已经死亡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dogmeat's puppy is waiting outside of Vault 101.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小狗肉正在101避难所外面等你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Broken Steel has been loaded. Your level cap has been raised to 30.
ESP.TRADUIT: 断钢载入完毕

ESP.ORIGINAL: Broken Steel Loaded
ESP.TRADUIT: 断钢已载入

ESP.ORIGINAL: Continued consumption of FEV-laced water will be fatal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 持续饮用含有FEV的水将是致命的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: 2 WEEKS LATER GOES HERE
ESP.TRADUIT: 两周后再到这里来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turn off the Repulsion Field? (Science 80) Set a timed charge? (Explosives 50) Smash the Control Panel?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关闭斥力场？（科技 80） 设置定时炸弹？（爆破 50） 捣毁控制面板？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turn off the repulsion field.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关闭斥力场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set a timed charge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 设置定时炸弹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Smash the Control Panel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 捣毁控制面板。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turn on the Repulsion Field? (Science %.0f or higher required)
ESP.TRADUIT: 开启斥力场？ (须要科技技能 %.0f 或更高)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave it alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别去碰它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turn on the Repulsion Field.
ESP.TRADUIT: 开启斥力场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your repair skill allows you to disarm the Radiation Box.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目前的修理技能足以拆除辐射发生器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave it alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别去碰它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Disarm the Radiation Box.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拆除辐射发生器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dogmeat's Puppy
ESP.TRADUIT: 量产型狗肉

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use the console in the front car to travel in the opposite direction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 使用前进方向车头的控制台以向反方向行驶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A fuse is required to power the train.
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要一枚保险丝来恢复列车的动力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This door can't be opened while the power is out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 电力中断时此门无法开启。
